Swvi0kJCXFDb3hij47xqAg.text: My husband and I were looking for a new place for breakfast last week and we truly found a gem!!! After reading the great reviews, we took the trek all the way from Aliante and we were not disappointed. Although there was a line (inside and outside of the restaurant), we were greeted with a warm smile by Shaun. He told us the wait would be about 30 minutes. When we mentioned it was our first time here, he promised we would be well taken care of. It was no nice to see a restaurant where guests are treated like welcomed guests to their  home.         Our first experience was so wonderful, we came back and brought my son along. My husband and I were welcomed back by Kat and Shaun. It was so great that they remembered us. The owner, Nick came over and spoke to us and thanked us for coming back. The food is absolutely delicious and freshly made to order. Lourdes, our server, went out of her way to make sure everything was perfect. My husband and son appreciated the huge plate sized pancakes and I enjoyed their corned beef hash that is freshly prepared in house. The customer service is amazing! Everyone is so kind and the servers are so attentive, without being intrusive. The atmosphere is welcoming and relaxed. I highly recommend that you try Mr. Mamas for breakfast or lunch. The food is delicious, the atmosphere is welcoming, and you are treated like family. It is well worth the trip from any location in the valley. Thank you Nick for treating my family so well. My son really enjoyed his conversation with you. ( As a college senior he is not easily impressed, but you did just that.) Thank you Shaun, Lourdes, and Kat for making our second visit even more wonderful than the first.

859AKzWjvbub5QCz8n9yrg.text: This has got to be one of my new favorite spots! The food is incredible! The gravy is insane! The service is always excellent. There's usually a wait but it's well worth it! 10/10 would recommend!

AWB5B98X2MVGQyMQZxId-g.text: I ordered take out. Got an omelette, oatmeal and a cup of coffee and everything was so great. While food was definitely delicious, what made the experience even better was the people who worked there. Just the warmest welcomes to their customers!

kNfEaFy8vCscyPa7Kq-fvA.text: this place is by far the best breakfast place in Vegas. If you're here on vacation or just a party on the strip. This is well worth an Uber or taxi ride to come and try. I could not tell you what was better the service or the food. Everything here is five star from when you first walk in too when you get seated so when you're eating your food all the way till when it's time to pay....  This last time I went which was earlier today. I ordered my food to go. While sitting in the waiting area I was observing how the greeter was. Before you even walk in they are already getting you a table set (if it's not busy) the interact with every customer that comes into that restaurant. I couldn't even call it a customer it make you feel more like a guess or family. Best breakfast brunch spot in Vegas bar none!

Wqx_3K_6pO5XNmRI4Nz2SQ.text: We were visiting Las Vegas for a bowling tournament and saw all of the great reviews for Mr Mamas so decided to try it. So glad we did! The service was incredible and so was the food. This will definitely be a place we are sure to visit when we're in town!

V7y9Imp3C9SEa1ZON_FY1w.text: The service is amazing! They're super friendly from the minute you walk in to the moment you leave. I had the steak and eggs and it was great. Even the toast was tasty. There's so many things I wanna try on the menu.  Love this place and hope to come back again in the future.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

btUJ1lhbSk-rg0FAQEx13w.text: This place is so good! We got Eggs Benedict (florentine for my "meatless Monday" & one with sliced turkey) both great! The house potatoes were so good! Crispy on the outside and soft in the middle! We also got the French toast and eggs for our little girls and they both enjoyed it! We will be back for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast and eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict Florentine

PZTvPsSPUccTwH0Lt7Hzvw.text: The service here sets the standard and the portions are huge! I have never been treated better by a team of workers (manager, servers, greeters) in one sitting. Keep it up Mr Mamas!  This appears to be a place that the locals frequent. Prices are average, food was served very quickly, quantities were huge, taste was very good, and must I repeat- service was impeccable. Get there!

VXWhj0r4zwUAGLAn1j6D6g.text: The service was very friendly and quick and the place was well kept and clean.. However food was lacking quality! Biscuits were dry and gravy needed more seasoning. And be sure to check ingredient listing on menu as some omelettes don't come with cheese :(           Is an omelette without cheese really an omelette?

nnSrfYkcQFIw7XPczr4WMA.text: OMG!!! The burgers are do good and juicy! The breakfast had large portions and flavorful. It is worth 5 stars!

4EmYUKTMgfXhJnAdwF8GXw.text: We found a gem when we were looking for something other then the typical casino food. The entire staff was amazing. The food was delicious as well. We will definitely be back next time we are in town.

XVH9HzwQ0iLwdwtcOPjFRw.text: Worth the wait!! That's all I can say! I am not a potato fan at all but this place has the absolutely best perfectly made home fries!   There pancake is real big and fluffy, so rich and delicious, buttery combination melting in your mouth.  I had the western omelette with avocado and mozzarella cheese, everything was so delicious I had to take seconds for the drive back home.

wbT7wswxqa3ZX24LvrwK6g.text: Excellent service, excellent food and clean establishment...   if you feel like eating away from the strip, this is the spot for breakfast or lunch.   Will definitely be coming back

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Good food
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Bh63qanWfWJGLdocNgu8KA.text: We came here so excited based on the reviews to have breakfast! Even though we had to wait 40 minutes to be seated, excitedly we didn't even mind! The owner greeted us very kindly! The hostess and the waitress were both very nice but the food was tasteless and not worthy of the reviews! My goodness I ordered the veggie omelet and with egg whites! I only ate half of it because I was very hungry and left the rest! My husband ordered the California omelet and he couldn't eat more than half of it as well. The potatoes were dry and overly done! Thank goodness I gave them to my husband..... after we left surprised to what we just ate and how is this possible to be so bad based of high reviews, I had to go to Starbucks to grab a latte and a energy bar! We travel a lot and we know good food! My husband makes the best eggs and omelets! This place lacked flavor, quality and nothing to brag about! It makes me mad to have wasted our time to eat here. Did they change cooks? I mean even if they did, the recipe should stay the same? I'm just shocked!

p3BsZ09-rhYpgnRYOvFAxw.text: We were super happy that we took a quick trip off the beaten path in Vegas to this awesome breakfast spot! Old-school, homestyle diner in a strip mall with good portions, high quality and reasonable prices (hard to find in Vegas!). The homemade cinnamon rolls were amazing, and our breakfast platters were filling and tasty. Service was excellent - always a win when everyone is nice to the three year old - and the owner even stopped by our table to check in on us. I'd highly recommend this spot if you need a filling breakfast after a night of partying in Vegas!

WFXpZLIhA-bQcqFTRWbHwA.text: Highly recommend this place! The menu says it all! They greet you when you come in and put a smile on your face till you leave. Great service & good food for a reasonable price!  All the workers were very nice. The owner even comes out to greet the customers. Love their philosophy where they make you feel at home and like your family.  Updated review-  We came back again a day after. Our friends just came in from Hawaii and brought our friends here for breakfast. They loved it! Thank you Mr. Mamas & staff for accommodating us. You guys are awesome! Always great service & good food.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BSges7lr4nbSziQrhzyDXQ.text: We came across this place while on a visit from Texas. Great food, wonderful hospitality. The owner actually came and chatted with us(really great guy). We now have a go-to spot for breakfast the next time we're in town. It was "big enough" lol. Thanks for the warm welcome!

nePeB15x4m1seuphdWO51A.text: Great food, fastens friendly  service . I would highly recommend it I would go there again and again

M7-Sjt73i8ypJ9t15ohm5g.text: THE WAIT IS WORTH IT!!  Came in the day after Christmas with a party of 6. We had a wait of about 35 minutes but they were good about answering our questions of when we were next. We were packed in the small waiting area, but they have chairs and a small nice seating space - which can get cramped.  The food is delicious! Best pancakes I've had in a long time! I loved that they had smaller orders of the same great meals - the kids (10 and 13) got to get the same adult favorites but in their sizes without being called kids. :)   My chicken fried steak was very yummy and I'd even order it again - super large portions! Family all loved their dishes and the hot chocolate and coffee were perfect. Pancakes are definitely sharable but you could finish them off yourself if you wanted to.   And I love it how they do not pack more tables and chairs in the dining hall just to alleviate the waiting customers. Makes the dining experience more comfortable and roomy. I'm not cramped while eating or playing elbow hockey.  Cathy our server was phenomenal! She has our coffees filled and our order exactly right with the biggest smile and nicest personality. The youngest was even smitten with her and couldn't take his eyes off her. LOL! She was great!  You are definitely eating with family here! Mr. Mama comes around and gives you a smile, shakes a hand and makes sure he took care of you while you were in his house. Loved it! I am definitely coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mama&#39;s short stack. These pancakes are out of control delicious!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and eggs with home fries. Devoured!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Very yummy chicken fried steak! And the eggs don&#39;t look it, but they are perfectly over easy.

gckBA_jKIim_Jjas0R60uQ.text: Really solid, classic breakfast with excellent service to make our Monday morning that much better. Go with the recommendations here and enjoy yourself.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

IaaehriPEY_sl3bKIUD8gA.text: My family and I wanted to try a family friendly breakfast restaurant that wasn't on the strip and found this place. The good was delicious and the staff is super friendly and accommodating.

COjGYDdFyBk99YP-l7vF9g.text: The fried chicken steak was bomb and so were the gravy for the biscuits. The biscuits;however, were a let down. They were dry and just not good at all.

Il7sTjo6O_M7QtsEiqSObw.text: Mr. Mamas was absolutely delicious! So delicious that I had to have it 2 days in a row when I was visiting the strip! first off, the staff was great and the service was prompt, I visited on a Saturday and Sunday during peak hours and even then the wait was reasonable(40 mins). We got seated and got our food within 10-15 minutes on both days, I ordered the Mr. mamas French toast with strawberries and whipped cream and it was absolutely delicious!! we will definitely make this our vegas stop!

palp675gIts4WdY6tCfz3A.text: If I told you that you could eat at a restaurant in Vegas and be treated like it's your family house would you believe me (of course not it's Vegas) that is what we experienced here. From the moment we walked in the door we were greeted with smiles and warm welcomes. There was a short wait because this place is packed and it's worth it! Our server Roe was incredible, she was so kind and friendly you would have thought we knew each other for years. Ask for Roe when you dine here! On to the food. Oh my oh my the food! Western omelette is perfect and scrumptious. Those breakfast potatoes oh yes please and the cinnamon roll!!!!! I don't like cinnamon rolls particularly but I ate almost the entire thing!!! Honey got the eggs over easy and they were cooked to perfection no color yolks intact! This place is amazing if your in Vegas avoid the big name places and eat local!!!

4GEnLwAb5ZY-c0Ax7W_5IA.text: Visiting Vegas this was a place recommended by the locals. Located off the strip but still in a decent part of town. It's in a shopping plaza so plenty of parking. We were seated right away but it can get busy. The host was very personable and made great small talk with those waiting to be seated. Service was excellent. Quick, attentive, polite. I could rave about the service alone. Food was standard diner food, good portion sizes to cost, and did I mention so quick! Loved that the side fruit wasn't just melon with pineapple, but all berries. They must actually do seasonal fruit. This place isn't for those with food allergies but as always I think you can navigate to not starve while you're there. Hope you're able to try it!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zpm3JKZdnvQyCLZDsDLjkQ.text: Me and my boyfriend came here for breakfast. I ordered the veggie omelet which consists of green bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes, hash browns, and rye toast. It was delicious! My boyfriend ordered and steak and eggs which consisted of steak, eggs, hash browns, and toast! He loved it! The service was great and all staff were friendly. There was a mix up when we first sat down. The waitress thought we ordered a cinnamon roll when we didn't ask for anything yet. We made her aware of the mix up and management gave it to us for free. The two bites I had of the cinnamon roll was freaking delicious! We will definitely come again!

6L6Ij5UagGFP8pRiGSqrZA.text: I ordered the egg white cali omelette, really good but their homestyle biscuit not good. Coffee was not watered down.  First visit

0dYqALXrXeAM30hiLkJJGQ.text: Service was GREAT!!! I had the french toast, it was good but my fiance didn't like his food. But he did love his orange juice! I'd come back because of service! Props to all the employees, I love coming to a place with great service!

IAGm5LyggUOq6UF6ZoDuXw.text: Too bad I live in Texas. Dang, this place rocked our socks off! The gruff man at the door was funny and his banter with our waitress was hilarious. Yeah, the service is amazing, and the burgers are excellent. I am not a fan of home fries, but luckily, they offer onion rings. They were perfectly prepared. Our waitress offered a small cup of their homemade ranch dressing (50 cents) to accompany our onion rings.... GET THIS. It is very good. We also had a giant cinnamon roll. Oh, man! It was light and fluffy and melted in my mouth. Also, we never touched the door! They opened it for us upon entry and exit. How cool is that?

tM-4fwBqgAeBu1Qtzq1J5g.text: Great service, Good food, great price. I'll come back when I'm back in Vegas. I recommend tube chicken fried steak with the sausage gravy.

OLnCEXbOW5HpyPPuNZ612A.text: I love their staff and food! Very affordable and the plate size are pretty big-enough for two I should say. The owners are amazing too!

UfVVGrd8LTpr-HIBcwpeyQ.text: Great quick service and fresh food. Good marble rye bread. Had California omelette. Was very good.

4jj48FHbVFj1u1YJzUfh9Q.text: For starters, I am a breakfast junkie! My husband and I go out for breakfast any time of day and I can be pretty critical when it comes to this stuff. A friend and I went here for lunch on Friday to get breakfast. We arrived at 11:45 and there was a wait to get in. But the guy taking names seemed to know everyone, and if he didn't, you would have thought he did. What a great experience already, and we had to wait! You get a family feel and a friendly vibe from the second you walk in so if you want a great experience, that's what you will get!  Oh yeah, the food. While we were waiting outside for a table, 3 people left saying how outstanding the food was.  Our breakfast was perfect (you'll pay about $9-10 for a 3-egg breakfast with meat), needless to say. My medium eggs were cooked perfectly and so was my extra crispy bacon - thank you very much! And the service was top notch all around. Even the owner stopped by the table to not only check on us, but to chat with us! Super nice guy, even if he did go to Michigan State. (Buckeye fan here).  In summary, I'm hooked and I'll be back, that's for sure! I'll just be sure to get there before the lunch rush hits!

Ija7m0GgpI-YwjxseyMhdw.text: It was pretty packed when we walked in on a Friday morning. We almost left because of all the people but then saw it was just a big party and our wait would be about 15 min. You have to place your name on the waitlist Sean was the one to take our names, he was great.  And since they have have menus on the counter we were able to see what we wanted while we waited.    Once seated we ordered and food came out about 10 mins laters.  Everyone was so busy but they always ensured we had everything we needed. The service was amazing.  It was so refreshing to have a place with great tasting food and great service.    The breakfast comes in large portions for a great price as well.  My son ordered the mama short stack and couldn't finish it.  The pancakes are the size of the whole plate.  I got the Mamas French toast with strawberries and whip cream and it was so filling.    Overall i would recommend this to anyone.  Thank you Jose for the great service as well!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1N5_aKZaYE30ZadPulFpXQ.text: Very good breakfast and lunch. I see why people raved about it. One of the Reubens I've had.

4-KBH1-BkuT8PE8zU-MNIQ.text: Found this place on Yelp and it did not disappoint. Everyone is super friendly and constantly asking if everything is ok. Luckily we went on a a weekday and the line wasn't too bad. We had an omelette and the French toast both were delicious!!!

qJIRxpf16S6iyOCvc5EADQ.text: Coming from the state of California... duuuuuuuude, I wish they have a spot back home !!!! Honestly, best breakfast service and food I have had in Las Vegas. I had the country fried steak, unfortunately , I had to tap out... I was too full lol. As personally being a server in Cali, our server, Jenna, is amaziiiiing!!! She is VERY attentive and an all around great server. She informed us about the breakfast specials, throwing jokes, and whatnot. The environment is sooooooo energetic and it's just such a positive vibe. Oh, the other employees are very friendly too!!! From the beginning on having the door opened as we entered and finishing up with a checkup by the owner -- Amazing service. Oh, can't forget, the food came out fast! Can't wait to come back for another breakfast service :) thank you so much, Jenna !!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Country fried steak with all those goodies &amp;&amp; steak and eggs

5Z1tk7jfn37zniNrXafX7w.text: Just wow. We stumbled upon this place out by one of my cousins,  and they had never heard about it.  Upon arriving we found a long line out the door, good sign about the popularity but we were worried about the wait.  Our worry was unjustified we were seated and placing out orders within 20 mins.  The wait staff was extremely attentive,  the place was packed but not too loud and the food was wonderful.   I had the steak and eggs, it was perfectly cooked, with no fat , and the hashbrowns were amazing.   My wife had the chicken fried steak again perfectly cooked and the gravy was to die for , it was like liquid sausage.   Highly recommended,  and definitely someplace I will be visiting again.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and eggs

dkk9JqzUPIDERWsyAS5qeg.text: Don't believe the hype.  Went there a couple days ago.  We were seated quickly and food was served quickly as well.  Then things went down hill.  My wife ordered french toast with sausage.  She didn't eat one sausage patty so I gave it a try.  Yuck!  Very soft meat...reminded me of the frozen Walmart brand.  Watched our waitress bring coffee to table next to us, turn and walk away without so much as a glance our way and she then returned with water for the same table and AGAIN left without checking on us.  So I got up and got my own coffee.  That brought our server over and she chewed me out saying she could get into trouble for me doing that.  Later...she ignored us again.  I watched her cater to the same table next to us while both my wife and myself waited to get more coffee.  She again made two trips to the next table without looking our way.  Finally I got her attention from across the room by waving my empty cup in the air.  When she came over she blamed her poor service on us not being the only table she was responsible for, in a snotty way, and that was the last we saw her.  The manager had to take over and even she was overly nice in a very faky, patronizing way.  She asked how our food was so I told her the sausage was no good.  Well, its Hormel she tells me...as if that is the gold standard.  Prices were not as cheap as review sites led us to believe either.  $10 for biscuits & gravy?  No thanks.

n925sBSAGCV5htKAILuYJQ.text: Staying at the Orleans we were looking for some breakfast away from the smoke at the casino.  I found this on YELP a few miles away.  We arrived at 830am on a Sat morning, we waited a few minutes to bed seated.  The hostess was checking in on everyone and moving things along. The food was your standard breakfast fare.  It came fast, big portions, tasted delicious and was affordable.   I would visit again next time I'm in town.

1nG66W28-N_KZaOBYADNBw.text: Simple well executed breakfast food with extraordinarily high attention to detail. You are  Greeted and feel welcome the moment you arrive, at least four people came over and asked us if we are enjoying our meal! Well done keep up the great work everyone should visit this place!

DRl_TPsowj7FnGePl4zSsw.text: We came here, after reading numerous reviews. This place is off the beaten path.  We took a cab here. I do not know why the place is called MR. MAMAs.  I found the logo rather cute, two men wearing aprons.  This place is locally owned.    After the short wait, we were provided a table.    There is a wide variety of food to select from.  The food portions are pretty big.   I had the eggs Benedict with spinach, tomatoes & ham. I made the mistake of ordering a single order of French Toast. Mistake being way too much food.   The basic orders all come with a large share of hash browns. I mean the serving could easily serve 2 people.   The food was very tasty, the hash browns can be ordered crispy. Which is what we had. The eggs on the eggs Benedict were perfectly cooked. Nice & runny on the yolk. The spinach and tomatoes were fresh. I easily filled up on the food.  Barely had room for the French Toast.  Now the French Toast had the right seasoning of cinnamon & Powdered sugar   The bread was perfectly golden brown & fluffy.    Don't order too much food. The food won't fit on your table. We had to place some of the food on other dishes.   Oh yeah their iced coffee with chocolate is pretty good as well.    Great food & prices!

8dKItBXo0VkU2wYooo1a4Q.text: It's a bit of a wait... but so worth it! Im in Love with their hot chocolate but everything I tasted was so good too. Everyone is friendly, we even got a free cinnamon bun after a little confusion on our order. Best of all was the family feel of the place, we had Mr Mamas himself come to our table just to see how we were doing and explained all the photographs on the walls of his father and grandfather in their restaurants. We also had another manager come to our table to ask us how we were enjoying our food.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hot chocolate
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast with strawberries and whipped cream

OEQbQDLTx0Jic7UCQG0iOA.text: Mr. Mamas is a great place for breakfast and the service was good.  The wait speaks for itself.  I like it because it's out of the way from all the hustle and bustle of Las Vegas and that's good!  Sometimes you just need to have a relaxing morning without the distraction of noise, crowd and the endless temptation to gamble.  You have to try their corned beef hash and home fries! Delicious!!!  The wife's only complain was that they did not have waffles!

iouTDEotOzQf3c9Zeyo-cQ.text: Had a party of 5. Who knew that was big? Waited over an hour to get seated. Guess it took long because most of their tables seat 4. Staff thought they were funny but many guests were just annoyed by the (non) jokes. Now on to the food... couldn't tell you. They called like 100 names before us and many people left as name after name was called over and over and no parties showed. After waiting an hour and being told, yes, your next, I observed two parties who were seated 30 & 40 minutes before us didn't even have food on their table. No thanks. We left. If you have A LOT of time to waste, like 4 or more hours, and you feel like being insulted, this is the place for you.

9JG0VUFtvyD1KMFC_cSmCw.text: This place is fantastic!  It is run like a well oiled machine even when busy and chaotic.  I order French toast well done and it was perfect.  We also had the homemade corned beef hash and it too Chee led all the boxes.   Each person that worked here had a clear area of responsibility and  did their job.  The dining area was extreme clean.  The staff was enthusiastic and friendly, Jenna was awesome.

Ihwvm8HaDS1ysxZZcYaiZg.text: I finally went here. It was good.  Great customer service good coffee. Great food cinnamon  rolls were so good bought some to go

HCwY5Cun5RsLB2EHj_m4xw.text: It was my first time in Las Vegas and I was looking for a good place to eat and the good ol' internet sent me here. I knew it was a good place when I saw the herd of people crowding the waiting area. Of course there was a wait time but this is the first place where the wait time was EXACTLY what they said! And while we were waiting, I believe his name was John kept the mood light by being hilarious.  My bf and I were originally going for breakfast but after looking at their menu we decided to get burgers. I went with the swish mushroom burger and added avocado and the bf ordered the chilli cheese burger. While waiting, the table next to us was receiving their breakfast and the pancakes looked perfectly cooked! They also ordered a cinnamon roll that looked delicious so I had to have one as well. DELICIOUS! Oh the burgers?? TO DIE FOR!! The chilli cheese burger was probably the best that I have ever tasted anywhere.   Small place, but worth the wait!

idOYlte2b2aTYG0MNHYbFA.text: Definitely a place I must visit when in Las Vegas! The food is amazing and the staff is very attentive and totally on top of it! This place is definitely well work the wait!!!

drC37rn8A2PChhYh1ZLkYQ.text: This was my first stop when I hit town.  I couldn't wait to get another one of Mr Mama's magnificent chicken fried steaks.    Chicken fried steak and eggs isn't something I usually have for breakfast.  In fact, I had never had it for breakfast before having it here.  My mom occasionally made chicken fried steak when I was growing up, but we always had it for dinner.  It's rather a lot of food for breakfast, but Mr Mama's is cool with it if you don't finish it all.  I was really looking forward to this meal.  I had been thinking about their chicken fried steaks ever since I first tried one back in July.   Mr Mama's did not disappoint!  Last time I ordered the gravy on the side because I was concerned I might not like it.  Well, the gravy is outstanding, and I found I like it better served right on the steak.  Last time I got toast, and it was great.  This time I changed it up and ordered a biscuit instead.  SCORE!  The biscuit was outstanding!  And what made it really special was that they split the biscuit, then grill the insides to a crisp toasty finish.  Baby, that's some good biscuit!  The service, again, was absolutely wonderful.  I ordered hot tea.  My waitress made sure I had a fresh cup, a 2nd teabag and hot water half way through my first cup so my second cup would be ready when my first one was finished.     I can't wait to visit Mr Mama's again.  As much as I love the chicken fried steak, I think I'll try something else on the menu next time.  All I know is, whatever I get, I'm definitely getting a little biscuit and gravy on the side.    Mikey C says: Love me some Mr Mama's!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great service!  Thanks, Lourdes! Thanks, Mr Mama&#39;s!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. They&#39;ll add peppers and onions to your breakfast potatoes, if you&#39;d like.  Highly recommended!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Whoa!  They split your biscuit and grill the insidey parts. Holy hell they&#39;re good.

_8Z8njoynIHrtQRmVOocVg.text: From the moment I arrived, the level of friendliness and service was off the chain, a sample was provided of what I was thinking of ordering which is unheard of, ordered the corned beef hash with soft scrambled eggs, hash browns and toast. Best breakfast I have ever had at a restaurant. The owner and manager both visited my table and just made the entire experience totally awesome! Mr. Mamas is definitely worth a visit.

9mmlE8qxXgodzmkeiT3Mcg.text: Chicken fried steak....mmmm Must order the biscuit and gravy...that gravy doe!!!!!! Eggs Benedict with sausage = yum!!!... but seriously, the gravy, sausage, bacon, maple syrup????..

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yes!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yes!

SX4nKKAt0qtL7fcnqGMNgg.text: My boyfriend and I have been here twice on a weekend visits to Vegas. I love the strip but not the prices, found this little gem on yelp and decided to check it out. Even though it has been busy both time we went it wasn't a overly long wait time.  The food and staff def. justify a slightly longer wait time. Both vistits we had breakfast and though we went simple it didn't disapoint. Food came out quick and hot. This resturant will def be on my must stop list everytime we're in Vegas.

wiCs69U2gj88vsRQx13_YQ.text: I love the food here. You're greeted with a smile and everyone is friendly here. This restuarant is definitely one of our fav and will stay on our breakfast list.

fUg1x-fLQGiueBZthuR0Rg.text: Two of us went for breakfast on a Saturday around 10. The wait was about 40 minutes but it was worth it. We ordered the biscuits and gravy and eggs benedict with bacon. Both were fantastic. We'll be back soon!

aoluNJlSYRlM5td4hO6wMg.text: I don't live here, but I guess it's now a tradition to come and eat whenever I do visit!! The prices are very affordable and the service is always great!   The wait wasn't long and when walking in, we're always welcomed with friendly faces! Our wait time for food wasn't long either!  The cinnamon bun tasted amazing and the home fries so good! The hostess was great and very personable. Also, the owner (I think, he's bald) is very friendly!   Definitely coming back whenever I visit again!!!!

i47UzCvNb3DSONxIeYytVQ.text: Can I start off by saying this is one of the most welcoming places I have been too!! Idk if the gentlemen eating His breakfast in the middle of the restaurant own this establishment but he is GREAT.. his name was Sean !!!  beautiful vibes when you walk in.. thank you so much

QrvSQYD0h5fDMtSKtzVQDQ.text: Luv this place! My go to is always the chicken fried steak wit the house potatoes. But everything else on the menu is spot on and the owner is so friendly he comes to your table and introduces himself and asks how your experience is going. Super good breakfast place

LlM2W8_WJZe-LTgnGgW4wQ.text: This is an awesome restaurant. Service is impeccable. I can tell they emphasize the importance of customer experience. Everyone seemed pretty genuinely nice and the food was terrific. Really enjoyed this spot, will be returning and referring to friends.

b9pRN-Fb3L6IUXfPbWuGcw.text: Mr. Mama's is a good breakfast joint. It has all the standard American breakfast staples such as steak and eggs, eggs Benedict and chicken fried steak. The chicken fried steak was good, but the gravy even better! It's made of sausage, pepper gravy and a hint of syrup. If you arent looking for anything fancy and a decent meal, this is the place to go. Also, the waiting staff and managers elevated the service by always making sure our questions were answered, as well as checking with us!

IF_HYJBxghmA9PdvNN1dpQ.text: Overall I had the French toast eggs bacon and home fires potatoes and a half order of sausage biscuits and gravy.  Everything was excellent Even the potatoes were good but that was the only thing that was very salty maybe they just oversalted them that day but the potato Should come to the table without any salt .  Like I said everything else was very good and the service was excellent.

ZwMRRyi4fadf2D5eONvR7g.text: Pretty great breakfast for the money! Nice to have a great meal off the strip. The chicken fried steak was a nice change of pace. Loved the omelette too. Service was good and they treated us as if we were locals and that by far was a win in my book!  And u can have breakfast or lunch at the same time!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak with home made gravy

d7cF9qNhtY7vrfL7-AMQMw.text: My sister and I visited on a weekday morning and had a pleasant experience. Upon arrival, two individuals opened the doors for us and we were greeted so warmly!  After researching the menu and crowd favorites prior to my visit, I opted for the Homemade Corned Beef Hash and Eggs. But, I was a bit disappointed. Not because there was anything wrong, but after reading rave reviews, I was expecting a lot. The corned beef hash was fine, but it was just about as good as everywhere else and I was not impressed. My sister chose the Chicken Fried Steak and this was a much better option. Delicious, though we agreed it needed more gravy and they were happy to provide an additional bowl of it.  Service was absolutely wonderful. Everyone is so friendly and it is a lovely environment. It is a nice restaurant with decent food, but nothing special.

knHKQpvRXYaNhxKqOFmgzA.text: The food here was really good. Overall my pancakes were fluffy as a cloud and as good as heaven.  I give it 5 stars because the service here with Alex was amazing and the chicken steak,pancakes, and French toast was amazing. The only food item that was not so tasty was the biscuits and gravy

458Rneu-vz-8i8bZqHZzow.text: We ordered the Greek Omelet with mushrooms and hashbrowns. It was so good. The best part about this restaurant was Mr. Mama and his staff. They are so friendly and what the model customer service should be. Mr. Mama walks around and gets to know every one of his customers. The door is opened for people when they enter and when they leave. Good food and good servers, what more could you ask for in a restaurant. I would definitely recommend visiting this restaurant!  *FYI it is the busiest at around lunchtime, which is 12-12-30!

PjlzyN21FRk5re947oUIQw.text: This new location is bigger than the old one, but the excellent customer service and good food are the same. -Mr. Mama is there to greet you when you walk in the door and seats you. -The staff takes your order quickly and doesn't blink an eye when you ask to substitute fruit instead of the hash browns that come with your veggie omelet and then change your mind and ask for avocado instead of the fruit. Oh, and egg whites for that omelet are no problema (extra charge, of course.) -Refills are forthcoming on a regular basis so you can stay hydrated throughout your meal. -You get a free beverage with your Yelp check-in. -The food is good and won't break the bank. -Did I mention customer service is a plus?  Mr. Mama comes by to check on you as well as the staff, ever so friendly. Haven't been here for lunch yet, but this is definitely recommended if you're a breakfast/brunch food lover.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. View from our corner.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Egg white veggie omelet with side of avocado.

Z0qMYC-8b98nxZ0hKWBpzg.text: OMG I could eat here EVERY DAY!! For real this place is wonderful! Love the owner and servers as they recommend the best things on the menu and are always smiling and fun!!! The wait is never too long but even if it was I would wait!!! Yum!!!

--GzdmVCtGSGZWIgYGZ6WQ.text: Great place.  Alittle off the strip, however worth the trip.  Owner is super friendly and helpful.  I got the chicken fried steak, friend ordered the Eggs Benedict.  All was great!

4oavES1sJ7UtFC2DZHY44Q.text: Uhh-MAZING customer service!  The people running this joint are absolutely delightful(:  The manager, Kat , personally greeted us at our table and gave her recommendations- which I love a busy lady who makes time to have small talk with a new patron!  A special shout out to Alex for being so accommodating with our meal!(: As a matter of fact, I think at one point or another every team member from the front of the house either greeted us, checked on us to make sure the food was good, or thanked us for coming while on our way out- this is an outstanding set of waitstaff and you should consider yourself lucky to be in their section!   The seating in this place is well thought out. Though it may be a small diner, they certainly value guest comfort over all else. The entrance is a bit crowded- CUZ EVERYONE WANTS TO EAT HERE(for a good reason). But once you get your table, sit down, you realize that there is so much space! They could fit a few more tables to make money; but don't, and I am so appreciative that I could stretch or scoot my chair back WITHOUT hitting someone behind.   The food was just heavenly! Management of this facility is so confident in their recipes, they give out free samples of all kinds of things- great marketing tactic! Just look at the pictures posted- it is EXACTLY what you will get when ordering!  No BS, no games, great food, great people and great prices! Totally worth the wait for a table!!(:   Ten out of ten guys, thank you for a wonderful breakfast!!  Sincerely, the J's/ feather necklace girl

_4bOAw4ozw-WTOA82wwSgg.text: (Yay my 100th review) I don't normally go out much for breakfast but if I had to then I would definitely recommend Mr. Mama's.     Immediately upon arrival, my family was warmly greeted and tended to by the friendly staff.  They brought a special chair that our baby's carrier/carseat could fit into more safely than their regular chairs (that's going above and beyond good service).  Throughout the course of the meal, the staff came by to say hello and check on all their customers.  They were warm, funny, sincere.  An awesome mom & pop breakfast stop.  We used the $15 for $30 Yelp deal and it was more than enough food for my wife and I and my 3yr old.   We ordered and our breakfast came out so fast even with how busy the place was.  Nice.  I had the country fried steak and with poached eggs and hash browns.   Everything tasted great and the portion was huge.  I brought it home and it was still good later on.  The gravy they use was different, with pieces of bacon and sausage I believe mixed in.  It was good.  My wife had the Mr. Mama's french toast.  Ordered it scrambled eggs and a nice portion of ham.  The french toast came with 4 pieces powdered with sugar.  We also ordered a short stack and honestly, that was ALOT for us.  2 huge plate sized pancakes.   We wished there was an option to get our pancakes topped with either fruit or chocolate.  My daughter loves her strawberry-topped pancakes.  Finally, I also had extra from the Yelp deal, so I ordered their beef soup of the day.  There's soups with beef and then there's' Mr. Mama's beef soup.  HUGE chunks of beef.  Good broth.    4 stars for the food and 1 more star for the GREAT service they provided.  Definitely recommending their breakfast and definitely use this awesome Yelp deal!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fries steak
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yumm so cheap, so much food.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy cow, big chunks of beef.

ZPXwRMAiIEPJKHiwtKv6BA.text: Breakfast was in order the day I visited this fairly new eatery. I came with a friend and he ordered the Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs, and I ordered the Marty Wrap which came with scrambled eggs, potatoes, pepper jack cheese, avocado, tomato, garlic, and bacon, but I axed the potatoes, all for $7.25. The wrap came with a side of house made salsa.  The wrap was quite good and came tightly wrapped in a flour tortilla. The scrambled eggs were very good, but the bacon was not only plentiful, but had a great texture and flavor. I enjoyed it very much and it was present in every bite, the way it should be. The avocado was just ripe and creamy, the tomatoes added a nice acidity, and the garlic flavor was very mild. Oh yes, it would of been nice if it had more cheese because I would of liked to have seen it oozing out.   The side of salsa was great. It did not provide much heat, but what it lacked in heat, it made up in flavor. It was zesty, with a garlic flavor, and spot on seasoning. Pouring into the wrap as I ate it, was the ticket. Good stuff...  Service was quite good and our server was friendly and prompt. However I truly appreciated when the floor manager came over to check on us several times and participated in small talk. She was quite genuine.

8jDb1UXGgBUMKgd7ek1GZQ.text: Great, honest breakfast.  Stick to your ribs goodness. Friendly wait staff. A world removed from the Strip.

I9Bo58v3orW0YrTdokpAtg.text: This is a MUST every time I'm in Vegas. They make the fluffiest pancakes and omelets EVER. Try the Cali omelet with bacon instead of sausage. The BlackBerry pancakes were divine. My one regret is that my stomach had limits .

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

GoTjpOwxqiJ1bqQax-TEQw.text: While visiting Vegas this weekend, we decided to eat breakfast at Mr. Mamas on Saturday morning. We had never been there before and to our surprise we really liked their breakfast. I would have to give this restaurant a four and a half star. I ordered one pancake, a cheese and bacon omelet, breakfast potatoes, and toast. We also added their famous cinnamon roll to our order. As everyone knows who reads my Yelp, I like when food is well seasoned. Their potatoes were very well seasoned and they give you a good portion size. The pancake was a buttermilk pancake which was fluffy and good. They make homemade cinnamon rolls which were served soft and warm. The customer service was excellent. Everyone was so welcoming and willing to serve. The prices were not bad but they charge 1.25 if you want salsa on the side. We would definitely return to this breakfast spot.   They also serve lunch.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. One of their friendly staff took this picture of us.

wXOVYwz8E-jrlu_doJydrw.text: It was delicious!! We are from Miami on vacation and we wanted to go to a local place for breakfast and this place was great! The service was excellent and the owner went by our table to make sure we were happy and that everything was fine. Breakfast was delicious and they served u a lot so go with an empty stomach ready to eat...for sure this will be our go to breakfast place from now on when we go to Vegas again, we loved the experience of tasting local restaurants....

XgfwtNigCbpp82OGujiXFA.text: The breakfast were so good. I ordered steak and eggs with a fried potatoes. It comes with a choice of toast. The food came in hot and delicious. The steak was just the right portion not too big nor too small, it was tender and juicy. My husband ordered the classic breakfast, eggs, ham and toast, he loved it. My son ordered a breakfast burrito and ate half of it because it was so big. I'm happy I found this at yelp. Thank you for all the people  who reviewed restaurant.  The customer service was superb!!!

g8m0aXUj7-vZgbj0yLb9Fw.text: Unpopular opinion alert! I still don't understand the hype. Was disappointed by my experience at their previous location, but heard I "just didn't order the right thing". Took a group here and ordered several breakfast dishes at their new location. Maybe I overhyped it by mentioning that it was on Yelp's Top 100 list for 2014, but no one at the table was impressed by the food- though the service was consistently good.  The CHICKEN FRIED STEAK & EGGS was the best dish of our group- nicely breaded, good gravy, but could have used some salt. The Greek Omelet and Veggie omelets were both just okay, both were eaten with a hefty addition of hot sauce because they were bland. The hashbrowns and homefries were both nicely crispy, but had no seasoning of any sort. Pancakes did not get finished, very generic. Biscuits were done nicely, gravy was good... after adding a hefty shake of salt.   I would like to note that I do not normally add salt to my food at restaurants, I don't like salt, but the food here was not seasoned properly, or rather- at all.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak and eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Biscuits and gravy
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Greek omelet with home fries

xwBs3jZJzDJzR6lntibICg.text: They say, "breakfast is the most important meal of the day". I say, it's my favorite!  After a late night in Vegas, the first thing you want in your system the next morning is a hearty meal that hits home for you. Mr. Mama's did just that for us. We walked in to a spacious room filled with a staff that greeted us with all smiles. A view of the partially open kitchen can be seen from our table and it wasn't long before our server took care of our orders, going far and beyond with her service all throughout our meal. Thank you, Abby!   CHICKEN FRIED STEAK ($10.75) comes with 3 eggs your way, hash or home fries, and a side of carbs be it a sourdough toast or their fluffy pancake. I opted for the french toast for an extra $1.50 and it was money well spent. This meal alone can be shared between two people. Believe me when I say every part of this meal was fantastic! And that includes the hearty sausage gravy that topped the steak. Three of us ordered the same thing with different sides for variety and we were all impressed. Ideal sides for me would be two eggs sunny side up, one egg scrambled, hash browns, and their amazing pancake. Can I say, breakfast for champions?!   CHILI (12oz bowl $5.75) to share between everyone on the table was surprisingly delicious. Though I prefer eating this with their sourdough toast than the packaged crackers it came with. More kick please!  CALI OMELETTE ($8.50) was another delightful entree packed with melted cheddar cheese and sausage, then finally topped with pico de gallo, sour cream, and fresh cut avocado for that extra creamy factor. This was another generous plate that came with your choice of two sides. Can't go wrong with this.  Impressed yet? Here's more. For an already reasonable breakfast, they have a Yelp offer for $15 off $30 worth of food and a check-in offer with 1 free beverage of your choice. Hello, fresh OJ! This deal is simply unbeatable. We may have lost some at the casino but we sure walked out of here a winner. They close at 2PM so come early!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Y8o-5RRO-v3n1m0KI7Pezg.text: Was in Vegas with some friends and she recommended this place and man I'm glad she did! Awesome service and amazing food! Highly recommended. Portions are huge so we shared an omelette and French toast and left happy and stuffed. Will definitely come back next time we are in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

7Qpqp4C6bgodRNprZ-WuPw.text: We enjoy coming here for breakfast/brunch. Been here a few times already and each time they haven't disappointed. If you're looking for over priced, small dainty plates from a tv chef, you're going to be disappointed! This place is your typical breakfast spot with good food, great service that you would find in a small town. Portions are hearty size and the pricing is pretty fair. I usually get the country fried steak and it has been juicy and crunchy each time. The gravy has good flavor to it unlike others that taste like paper mache paste.    Pancakes are nice and fluffy and my kid enjoys their French toast! And if you can get this kid to eat anything, well god bless you!  Lol.    Not much else to say about a breakfasts joint. Good food. Good price. Good service. What else you need?  Sorry didn't take pics of my pancakes. They look like pancakes.

CsMemXmeJgeur-u06eGu5A.text: Decided to stop in with my daughter since we skipped breakfast. Surprisingly it was packed when we walked in and the hostess said it would be a 15 min. but we ended up waiting for less than 10 min. The hostess/manager was friendly and seated us by the window. We were curious as to the reason why it's named Mr. Mammas and she told us that previously it was a Greek restaurant, owned by a Greek owner who named the restaurant after a Greek Saint (hence the fact that the name is spelled w/o an apostrophe ['s]). Since the current owner is also Greek, he decided to keep the same name and create a logo that plays on the name (chef in a dress).    Our server, Jose, then came promptly and took our drink order. He was a good server, kept refilling our drinks, and even asked if we wanted any drinks to-go. We ordered the Reuben Sandwich with a side of chili--this is one of the best Reubens I've ever had, lots of corned beef and tons of flavor! The chili was pretty tasty too :P We also got the French Toast plate topped with fresh strawberries & whipped topping which was quite delightful! We usually share our entrees so we split them in half so we can have a taste of each. The portions are pretty decent and you usually get leftovers for a nice snack for later in the day! I've been here a couple of times before and the quality is always up to par. Will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I know, strange combo but I split and shared with my daughter :)
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

taGX9JDXY_7epnmF2AEGwQ.text: Great breakfast spot!! We got there and it was pretty crowded but the service was very fast so my wait was not that long at all. The staff was very helpful and welcoming when we walked in too!! And I loved the sports decor they had going on as well. Will definitely be back and this is definitely a place to try. The menu had a good variety to it too so everyone can get what they want. I got the Cali omelette today and was very satisfied and my hubby got the bacon cheeseburger with onion rings and that did not disappoint either.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hZjaZGq4tgsrS4_gQSF2uA.text: Amazing home made from scratch food  Great service and hospitality by the owner him self  No doubt. The best breakfast place in Las Vegas

lZ34vIIjeK9kKJS23Jtxgw.text: They were packed but the service was great!!!! They were organized with getting everyone seated. Food came out quick and was cooked great. And the portions were huge!!!! I will definitely frequent this establishment when coming back to Vegas often! We were a party of 6 and not one person had a complaint.

Sq_R24c_w40LwmrcQumt_w.text: Went with my family for breakfast during our Vegas trip. I got the country fried steak and a cinnamon roll, and both were awesome! The gravy for the steak was so good, the server said it had sausage and maple syrup in it I believe. The steak was a good thickness and still juicy, and the coating was nice and crispy. I had home fries and scrambled eggs with it as well, and those were good but nothing too special. The cinnamon roll was excellent, nice and soft dough and a great sweet cinnamon flavor. Also, the service was A+! The servers were very attentive and the food was served very quickly. They were also super nice and friendly! Definitely would recommend for breakfast or brunch if you're in Vegas!

fgS1Xdyl7-W7UzHiC_AMMA.text: Great place cheap and fast! Will defiantly be back again next time!  Pancakes were okay. For "home-made pancakes" they taste regular from the box. Nothing special.  Still I would eat here again. It was empty when we walked in then it got crazy packed 10 minutes after we got lucky with our timing.  If your planning to come I recommend coming a little early to beat the crowd.

3CgIGd2XtQD0BP1yBRqzpw.text: This place is very TASTY!  The waitresses are outstanding  And there very ORGANIZED , There's a HOST rounding around the tables making sure the unoccupied tables are beeing clean ASAP to be filled in!  100 * if I could RATE

hpFNU6YSqTpRtaGSF_ghcA.text: This place is solid! Came here today (Thursday) for breakfast and we almost left due to the amount of people waiting, but the staff here really value their customer's time. Their staff quickly and efficiently worked together to clean tables, serve food and ensure all the customers got what they needed. I got the veggie omelette and my bf got the mamma's small stack; we were impressed. I could tell that the veggies in my omelette were fresh and they added more compare to most breakfast places. The small stack had pancakes, eggs and a choice of bacon, sausage or ham. The pancakes were HUGE! Double the size and thickness of most pancakes (size of a plate). They were also very moist and flavorful. They didn't need much syrup or butter. I would definitely return to this place again.

kaaEtX0wcExRmnqCnSielQ.text: Awesome food, warm customer service from the moment you walk into the restaurant. Pancakes, sausage, cinnamon rolls, all delicious! Call ahead and see if there's a wait. They said no wait, it changes quickly though. They make the wait pleasant and friendly! The crowds tell you it's good and off the beaten path!!

fakGuvYm51_B9O9Gy844Ow.text: I absolutely love this place. When you first walk in, they hold the door open and welcome you. It was sort of busy but they sat us immediately. The service is amazing and they were very sweet. They checked up on us constantly and the wait for the food wasn't too long.  The food was amazing, I ordered the eggs Benedict with Ham with extra hollandaise sauce. Absolutely delicious, probably one of the best Egg Benedict's I've ever had. My order was a little complicated but the server was very understanding and compliant and there were no mistakes. I'd say the one thing issue I had was my French Toast and Potatoes were cold when I received them, but it was still so good! After we finished our meal, the owner went around and talked to us and other customers. He is such a nice guy, this place is amazing.   This place is great, the owner really knows how to treat his customers. From when we walked in until we walked out, the hospitality was on par. When I visit, I will most definitely visit again.

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HeUot8v6yjerkCTghuusHg.text: The south of the boarder special was so delicious! It was packed with flavor, fresh, and very filling! On another note, the customer service was phenomenal. Even though it was our first time there, we were treated like a VIP. We always had everything we needed, were given an awesome description of the specials by the manager who came to talk to us, and had a lovely conversation with an employee on our way out. We left feeling extremely happy and definitely will be back!

98-_ikG-5Vjepw6EZYK4og.text: Great breakfast! Multiple people say the best in Vegas! It's in a Strip Mall a couple miles off the strip. I think it's just breakfast and lunch . I had the breakfast burrito. Eggs, cheese, bacon , sausage, avocado, salsa. Totally kicking good. Very big. Also got killer hash browns. I could only eat half. Friends got regular breakfast fair. All was good. Very good quick service. It was a 20 minute wait but it moved quickly. The interior was meh. But it's a local place and a very good value. Worth the side trip.

uZRH_AN-pdAiW_nD5Zdrew.text: Tucked away in a small strip mall, you will find an amazing gem known as Mr. Mamas. As annual Vegas-goers, we have struggled to find awesome food at reasonable prices. We left Mr. Mamas feeling as though we got more than just our money's worth. The employees were very courteous, positive, and attentive. They have been trained well by the owner, whom we had the pleasure of meeting. Being of Greek origin, he radiated kindness and an overall "we treat you like family" kind of vibe. The food-while breakfast is a fairly simple meal to make, Mr. Mamas does it very well. Our chicken fried steak, veggie omelet, hash browns, home fries, and coffee came out piping hot and absolutely delicious. The attentive wait staff kept my coffee and water filled, as well as checked in to see how we were doing. If we could give this place 6 stars, we would. Until next year, Mr. Mamas....

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu and coffee

gBvAE7RyHoanPQYVeoj-bA.text: Nothing special here, regular breakfast, average food but extremely nice and thorough staff.  The food was probably my least favorite out of my 4 day trip.  We arrived early afternoon and had a short wait before being seated.  I ordered the corn beef hash with eggs hash browns toast.  Again just average for me, dry hash, eggs just ok and good toast.  My friend had the veggie omelet with grits and toast which she enjoyed but was disappointed that the grits had no flavor.  We picked this place because it was rated really well on Yelp but we weren't impressed.

zTmsv5dQu-TQ5xAkPUhN8w.text: 5 stars for the hash brown. Big potatoes person and the hash may be the best ever had. Something in the seasoning.   Waitress was pleasant and got us in and out quickly. 15 min wait on early (9:30a) Sunday morning.   We ordered chicken fried steak and biscuit with gravy. Portion is big. We could have shared one entree. Ohhh and the coffee! Also one of the best restaurant coffees I have had even just drinking it black.

3rQ9YEcDZb2Eg7tbaGtT7Q.text: Came across this place via Yelp because we wanted a breakfast option off the strip and on our way out of town. I can't say enough great things about this little gem.  Great location with excellent parking, amazingly friendly staff, and the food was great.  Prices are fair and they push the food so FAST! We got there just in time because the wait started growing as we were eating.  Should out to our wonderful server, Alex.

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5kqGkY0TJgYZumpqIfWRCA.text: First impressions matter!   As soon as my husband and I walked up to the door, a gentleman came outside to open the door for us and told us they already had a table prepared for us. A hostess greeted us and lead us to our table and told us our waitress would be right with us.  Lourdes came over and introduced herself as our waitress, took our drink orders then came back to drop off our coffee, juice and water before taking our food order.   My husband ordered the Corned Beef Hash, that came with two eggs, he had them prepared over medium, hash browns with the chopped bell peppers and onions and sourdough toast. I ordered the Steak & Eggs breakfast with the same fixings as my Hubby... Perfect  That was the most tender steak I've had in quite some. Just delicious. I'm so thankful the food was good but beyond the food the customer service was excellent. It's so refreshing to find a place where customer service is a priority.   The key to Great customer service is Great management. Thank you Mr Mamas, we'll be back soon.

_zZzcSTr_HAK-W7BRlAo4w.text: This is one of our best finds in Yelp. We were planning our day and hubby found Mr Mammas and it hooked us.  We were hoping for a short wait but it was not to be. With stomachs growling, we were finally called and seated after a 45 minute wait. One of the best tips from the staff was, "you should try the deep fried cinnamon roll", man, it was the beginning of a phenomenal breakfast.  My husband had the chicken fried steak (a fave by locals) and I had one of the specials, sausage quesadilla (don't let the name fool you).  The quesadilla was packed with eggs, sausage, and all the yummy goodness was lovingly held together by pepper jack cheese. My husband's chicken fried steak was quite delicious, that gravy was just scrumptious. We both ordered well done hash browns, we were not disappointed.  The staff, they were working at a very fast pace but they always answer your raised hand for any request you may have. Don't worry about getting a snapshot of your food, Shawn takes care of that. He stands on a chair to guarantee a perfect picture of that meal.   Our Vegas visit will now include a trip to tuis awesome joint

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak, gravy on the side
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Most loaded sausage quesadilla ever
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Deep fried cinnamon roll-oh my sugars

h1Ov4PLvtz_x81crm7R7Vg.text: Out-of-towners who yelped up "breakfast" while staying out near the Rio.  This is an off-the-strip gem that is frequented by both locals and out-of-towners (such as us).. you can tell by the number of taxis and ubers that were dropping folks off every five minutes.    LONG wait.. come early if you're doing a weekend breakfast.. and the big and bossy lady taking names at the front has a poor estimation of how long your wait will be.  Her sharp attitude which, on the one hand, appears to run a tight ship and keep things moving.. borders on rude.  In fact, she was getting to be so rude in my book that we almost left. She told us 20-30 min... (it seemed like her go to response on how long it would take).. it took an hour.  By the time it's 45 minutes.. you're like.. you've waited too long not to stay.  Not to judge a book by the cover.. but everyone seems like they may have had a prior criminal record with the amount of tattoos and tough guard appearance they seemed to carry.  If that is True, that's awesome this establishment provides second chances and I'd highly applaud it.  Aside from the "Mama B-tch" at the front with the clipboard.. everyone else.. ESPECIALLY Mr. Mama.. was fantastic.  He couldn't have been nicer and I appreciate an owner that does more than manage his business.. he pulls up his sleeves and buses tables so people can get in and eat.  He also goes around to ask how you're doing.. The staff earned this 4 star and the food was pretty daymn tasty.  Definitely would recommend this place.. just know the lady at the front is like a nasty guard dog you have to get past to enjoy the tasty treats within.  Overall.. I can see why this business has high reviews.  Homestyle cooking.. tasty and reasonably priced at vegas standards. We'd return and elect over the other options we've experienced in vegas.

thfnBWvTiVimseft7ROiZA.text: My first time here wasn't such a bad experience. Customer service was great and made sure we were satisfied the whole time we were there. The food I got was alright, it wasn't bad but it wasn't the best either. The one my friend had was really good she said, although it took them a while to get our food.... like maybe 40 minutes and it wasn't packed or anything but we will come back.

O6Fw0XH-ZaGWfW51ksSysQ.text: During a business trip on our way back home in L.A. decided to eat for once outside of the hotel restaurants, quick Yelp search and found 5 Stars for Mr. Mamas, not common, therefore I was curious about it, what a surprise! We arrived in 2 SUV's parked right on front and while walking towards the doors one opens and a friendly face greets us, "come on in you look ready for breakfast" (it was already lunch time, but he was not wrong) 8 of us, including a baby, experienced, as we entered a clean spacious vibrant place, friendly faces all over and the big fellow whom had great us walk us personally to our table, within seconds our waitress made herself available and coffees and OJ's started to appear. When asked about a good plate her answer was "I am confident whichever you choose will be to your liking" and she was right on the money! We all are coffee people and we all took the first sip, agreed that it was one of the best coffees we have ever had. The food? Well see for yourself too bad food aromas are not carried using yelp, yet! However you will have the opportunity to experience it personally. Highly recommended  Being a business owner, I am all about customer service, and I want to thank the Owner, yes he is the one who opened the door, escorted us to the table, came to check 2 times if everything was to our liking and even had time to chat with our littlest member of the family, our waitresses a mom and daughter team and busser where there and at the same time almost invisible except when needed, I learned about True customer service without all the fanfare and with lots of TLC from the whole staff. Thank You all and I will see you soon

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. eggs Benedict Florentine
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Omelette and hash top with avocado

sCXmc8GO94l4i7nOnbK89Q.text: If you want a good old fashion breakfast or lunch with out all the gimmicks come here. Amazing food tasty and prepared well. Staff are all super friendly and very welcoming. Bring your appetite because the portions are no joke. I recommend the clam chowder home made and well seasoned yummmmm.

9yilW-wNwEsdWQjA15hIlg.text: Good breakfast food good service I'd go there again we had the French toast and Denver omelette

AbbmkiG-7q7S5tm6RVJrqA.text: Excellent food and customer service.. a guy server also gave my one year old son crackers while we wait for our food.. i love this place so much

xp7iwwG4jDY_PzRs1jso1g.text: Took a drive out of the strip to check this place out. Turns out it was really good! The pico de gallo took the Cali omelette over the top w/some crispy hash browns on the side, yummy! Under $30 for the hubby and I, it was a great deal and awesome for the amount and taste of the food.

HezEMnrTQGttCPBrYNBHLQ.text: Great food (fills you up)  at  a reasonable price.  The staff is friendly. High marks!

FCtaEcC6lSleY2Kxtl9fmg.text: CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS GREAT!!! Food, parking, and pricing all good. The family loved this place. We'll be back Nick(the owner)!! Thank you.

b9sIys_hGnrQz0sZxafWsQ.text: I came for lunch and had a gyro sandwich with fries. My friend had the turkey wrap and fries. Food and service was great. Would have liked more alternatives for the side. Instead of french fries or onion rings it would be nice to have been able to get a small salad or bowl of fruit upon leaving the restaurant everybody said goodbye and even opened the door for us. Very nice and friendly. I definitely want to come back for breakfast because their menu is incredible

ZLXh315zShec1YMcIGe3LQ.text: Outstanding breakfast!  Bountiful menu with delicious selections. The best Eggs Benny I have ever had.  The food is so good, we came back 4 out of our 5 days in Vegas.

5uFd6fSoS28TV7LAqxMCXA.text: In this day and age ABOVE EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE is rare. We experienced it here ! ! Don't leave Las Vegas without patronizing Mr. Mama's. Good food too !

sSgzhCp42ZFBrFLTNNeW6w.text: The food I've tried here is amazing. Their portions are pretty big as well so you will likely be full or have leftovers to take home. The servers are kind and show great hospitality. The owner himself seems to always be here as well and greets customer. He makes sure everyone is having a wonderful time.

QmvZ6k2tR1wnXKlEGBxNsw.text: I'd give them a higher rating if it was solely based on the welcome that you get when you arrive. Mr. Mama opened the door and practically met us in the parking lot to tell us how happy he was to see us there. He then made some very friendly chit-chat. That was all well and good, but I was really there for the food.  I really enjoy a big breakfast, so my wife and I ordered enough food to get to $30 so we could use the $15 off $30. I had an omelette, bacon, eggs, coffee & OJ. While the portions were HUGE, and I almost ate it all, the food was a bit on the bland side. The maple syrup and salt saved the day, although the bacon was VERY tasty.    Would I repeat? Probably not since we found "The Original Sunrise Cafe" and ate there the next 2 days for breakfast :)

4MtonqXhxY0VjR3hVrRzrg.text: I love the tuna melts here they are awesome! Mostly everything I have tried has been decent and they give you pleanty of food. Hash brown are actually seasoned well! I recommended this place to my friends and family. Staff always friendly.

UPM2xIsuZx6YNVJzeUXM-w.text: I was super excited to try out Mr. Mama's after reading the glowing reviews. This was my first stop and was told there would be a wait. No problem. The owner was within a couple of minutes from what he told me when I walked in. Great.   I ordered the corned beef hash which the kitchen turned around quickly, way too quickly. The CBH was mushy and undercooked (no crisp). The owner stopped by and asked me how was my meal. I shared the same feedback and he said that the kitchen was busy and he would give them a reminder to cook the hash better, Really? He could have offered to have my meal replaced. He could have comped the meal since he acknowledged the problem. Nada. And nada again to Mr. Mama.   As a fan of great corned beef hash, try EATS downtown for a real treat.

Sj9YSCQuomycXfod_1npYg.text: Great food and service! Delicious omelettes and hash browns! Staff is friendly and professional. Will be back when we visit Vegas again!

fmR0uy-0JsHAAZoYHnrKWg.text: Great places for breakfast I usually post pics but it was so good it dint make it. I order bacon eggs over easy and hash browns with side of toast everything was seasoned salt pepper some extra little green stuff on the eggs was very good like parsley or something. The bacon was thick cut. And potatoes very fresh. I order everything to go and they included the jam jelly paper towels ketchup yummy meal. And coffee bean is just down the street.

pObi5V4qmAIm2hH4VHA4hA.text: Great service and the French toast is delicious, almost as good as my home made French toast. Fast service, fast with the coffee refills!!

89P2ekT-htouZa5uODd4Tg.text: I like it. Went there in my own on a Thursday morning and had Eggs Benedict. Delicious hash browns. Eggs done just right. Very attentive service. Mr Mama was there making sure everyone is happy, as he puts it "treated right". Simple recipe for success: an attentive owner that cares about his business. Other businesses can learn from this.

ABLvT9lDbZR5msRjJwJkeg.text: Before we left Las Vegas to head back home we stopped at this location. Be ready for an absolute journey of what customer service and food should be. You first walk into the door to be greeted with wide open arms as if you have been here 1000 times. Once seated and order placed a slice of heaven is delivered on every plate. I ordered the Mr. Mamas French toast and it was the best I've ever tasted. The perfect amount o cinnamon and powdered sugar in every bite. We also ordered the three meat omelet that had no crumbs left over and home fries that were perfection. I am not shocked that this location has a near perfect score because they truly are PERFECT! Keep up the great service.

87pW_U_wQ6ThnG_E4WxhYA.text: This place is amazing. Wonderful staff and delicious food. The place was packed when we arrived mid morning but the wait is well worth it. Besides, when a place is that busy you know it's good. Light fluffy pancakes, perfect eggs and bacon. Homemade biscuits and gravy. I'm sure every dish is amazing. The owner came to each table and greeted us like we were family.  Highly recommend going to Mr Mamas and trust me, it's worth the wait.

WNl_zwhPSDx4aBuCAY-4kg.text: Went here for breakfast when my family and I were visiting Vegas and we loved it. They're burgers and onion rings are to die for. Highly recommend!!

Y-fg0pfTc5mSLvZouGTudA.text: This place is really good. I had biscuits and gravy along with eggs and home fries. Every time I'm in Vegas, I have breakfast here. The people are really friendly with a great sense of humor.

BTCaFPswNju82V05Lrm27A.text: We were looking for a cheap(er) option for brunch around Las Vegas. We looked on Yelp and saw that Mr. Mamas was only 10-15 minutes from the strip, so after a 6 hour trip from LA, we got brunch here!  My goodness was the extra 15 minutes worth it! The food was so good, the portions were generous. I interviewed members of my family separately and everyone said "delicious"!  The customer service is what really put them on top though. There were 11 of us eating together, and the wait was not long at all. 15 minutes maybe? While we were waiting, the hostess kept us updated on the status of our table. When we got seated, we even had two servers! That's never happened before, and honestly, two servers for 11 people was pretty accommodating. I've been in a restaurant with a party of 15 and only one server. (Which is fine! Just to compare how awesome the customer service was here.) The service itself was very efficient too, even though all the tables inside were taken.  Overall, you will feel at home here, because of the staff and the atmosphere. Mr. Mamas himself introduced himself to us and even gave some customers his family background.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

xhyq6F8Je5UcmkylqgKoBA.text: Wow! What a surprise Mr. Mamas was. I had the home made corned beef hash with eggs dish for breakfast. It was GREAT! The hash was perfectly seasoned and the hash browns were perfectly cooked. Great combo! I'd come back in a heartbeat.

xyj6vIITp0T0R_Fpf1u7xg.text: There's so much love here! This was a wonderful experience since the food was delicious and the staff could not have been any nicer. Our server Roe was as so sweet and Mr.Mamma's himself stopped by our table to chat! We got the chicken fried steak with potatoes+onions/bell peppers and French toast. We will definitely come back next time we visit Vegas!

qYk3g4i6Pzt5dNnfoLOhkg.text: DE freaking LICIOUS !!! Have not had such great tasty breakfast/brunch in a while apparently. WOW is all I said when my food came. Everything so nicely placed on plate and food just melted in my mouth. Kat and her staff were wonderful and extremely attentive !! Everything was soooo yummieeee !!! If your in Vegas and don't go eat here then you're eating garbage everywhere else !! Must must mustttt go !!
