FJWQhoVQM0ASPqBbSjNG4w.text: Food is great, restaurant is very clean and the service is fast and friendly. I had the mamas stack and the pancakes are HUGE and tasty.

kfoC8HdadIs6jG1IjEXkRQ.text: Mr Mamas is a very popular destination. If you arrive close to noon, there will be a waiting g list. The best thing about Mr. mamas is the customer service followed by the food. They successfully do their best to accommodate their guests. The food is good but not exceptional. It is what I expected from a popular eatery. The staff was pretty much on-point.

cgrA-pLBf87sAjm5xjkvGg.text: Wow loving our choice from Yelp My husband said best omelette he ever had He had the three meat special today! The pancake and biscuit and heavy was also amazing Will definitely be back

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pancakes and biscuit pancakes are giant fluffy and yummy! Homemade heavy and biscuits best I ever had!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Three meat omelette Light fluffy best my hubby ever had! Great flavor! Service was friendly and fast Worth the wait to be seated

NpZUM-75cGnRSJDRsE19rQ.text: Food was good, service was great! The portion is humungous! We had food coma after eating here. I didn't think we order that much though.

MZBYmjz7qVFoRXaTTvT5Tw.text: I've only had their food once but wow! They do not skimp on their pancake size!! I loved their food! My coworker and I ordered food for pick up one morning while we were carving breakfast food, we were such happy workers after. We even had extra food after.   I need to eat from here more often!

na-il0Ob_Zo5m02Cu6oJmw.text: When I first heard of Mr. Mamas, I assumed it was a quaint little Asian restaurant that draws most of its monthly profits from take-out orders of spring rolls. I have no idea where I got that notion from. Nothing could have been further from the truth. This place is a sit-in all-American sort of breakfast place and reminds me a lot of Eggworks on a smaller scale. That does not mean their food is any less delicious, though!   My friend and I walked in at around 1 PM on a Sunday, and there were two or three couples ahead of us. The host told us there'd be a 15-minute wait time, but got us to our table after barely five minutes had passed. Under-promise, over-deliver, right?  I got Mama's Breakfast Burrito with ham and the chunky salsa sauce, and it was great. It was admittedly a bit on the smaller side, but the ingredients and ham in it were so filling that I was full by the time I finished it.    Our server was quick and attentive throughout our meal, as she kept our drinks refilled and checked up on us regularly.   Overall, great service, great food, and close to my house. I will be back.

C7VEkFFBSOfxE-2KJbHA7w.text: We had the best experience for breakfast here on our recent LV vacation.  The owner greats you at the door and seats you.  He also checks on the service periodically throughout your dining experience.  The best service ever.  Now for the food...... My husband had the chicken fried steak and eggs.  The gravy is clearly homemade with sausage and maple syrup in it.  Yumm.  I had my favorite corned beef hash and eggs also done to perfection.

vfIthO_4UE_r97Ab9tEekw.text: The food is great I was there on a Tuesday morning around 9am.. The greet so so kindly and make you feel welcomed is a great place I would definitely go back

i3tFC_eyCP3ddIYrNrUbMA.text: Food....Service.....everything A++.  Chicken Fried Steak and their potatoes are some of the best I have ever had.  The maple syrup is a nice touch.  Can't wait to go back.  Even Mr Mama stops by to say hi.  It really makes you feel appreciated there.

l73p3oseUQY5Ng-l0fKxLA.text: Fantastic. It is off thee strip and full of locals. The food was hot, on time, tasty, and hit the spot. The service is spot on with a friendly atmosphere. I was lucky enough to brought here via a recommendation from the taxi driver. Off to the airport now and with a full stomach. Thanks to everyone.

U6Qe56dL45Q7poM2SuAUFw.text: Breakfast: terrific food, great customer service and excellent coffee.  Love the biscuits, too. Yum!

ml2A1PQ5kso3i5mQi8Q-Zg.text: Came here a couple years ago and loved it. Back again, one word.... AMAZING! The customer service is absolutely fantastic. Got a killer greeting by Mr.Mamas himself. Wish I could give them a 10!

SX97svb2CbhM1-S8cz6LGA.text: My wife and I have been at Mr Mammas many times, we always were greeted by the owner when we went he was always so nice. Today 10/13/15 our stay was not good. First, it started with the waitress Claudia. We had to wait for a long time for our coffees and waters. We also waited a long time to place our food order. When we finally received our food , I found a small bone in my ham. My wife did not receive her toast she ordered, also  I did not receive the red peppers and onions on my home fries, I told the waitress she brings them in a small dish. She told me the cook didn't put them on. We asked for the owner to come over, so we could mention what went wrong. All he did was apologized two times. He didn't say anything else, like what can I do for you folks? For your bad service. When we said more about the bad service, the owner took our check and walked away with a attitude and said l'll take care of your check. It did seem to us that the owner didn't like to hear complaints. It showed us he is a very phony owner. In the past, he was a very friendly owner. Today, he showed us he has a attitude and doesn't care about his customers. We have been coming here a long time and now we know what the owner is all about. The owner , also should spend less time talking to customers and start caring about customers concerns. Or maybe walk around with coffee. Our experience was so bad, we will not be going back!

ZWR-pgfjw-L14MiVz7282g.text: Just had a breakfast wrap at Mr. Mamas, first time eating there, food was amazing, hot, fresh and fast to the table.    The staff said it was a new location, atmosphere was ok, but the food was amazing.

miKL6tuhq065WOkAJxci7w.text: Visited Mr. Mamas this weekend for the first time. The service was superb and our server was so friendly & helpful. The Albacore Tuna Melt was yummy. I will definitely go again!! Great job Mr. Mamas.

byvyGWZk9pt0hxbpqM6e3A.text: This was an A+ family restaurant. The owner actually took time out and introduced himself. The staff was great. Hold up...... The food was AWESOME!

tf2oapnr5vYcdnCk2kZIpQ.text: Amazing waitstaff.  Delicious food.  I had a eggs florentine Benedict added bacon. Was done to perfection.

vIXOvT7YiS0v7-WUyz7u4g.text: My husband and I started going here when they were on Decatur.  We loved it, but it would get so crowded we kind of stopped.  One day we drove by and saw it was gone, which was surprising because of how great it was and how busy.  I ended up calling and found out they had moved.  It is a bigger place now, which is nice, and the same amazing food and service!  Great burgers, breakfasts and even salads.

3YZLqE-DBUPey69JlSrmpw.text: Mr. Mamas never fails to deliver a great meal.  Love the new location which is easier to get to and has much better parking.  The dining area is larger so the wait is shorter.  Good as it gets.

I8qd8kcBUVn8-b0Fvl-ERA.text: Mr Mama's has great food at a great price. We have followed them from one location to the new location.  We love the claim chowder and the Cali omlete. The staff is great too!!!

w5rVa6wrJ7QcIEUSZ_ZGVg.text: Had a delicious breakfast here today when visiting Vegas. We tried the French toast, pancakes, bacon omelet and eggs. Very attentive service, great atmosphere, so accommodating and thankful. I hear the wait on the weekends isn't great but I'd wait. This is well well worth it. Come check out this breakfast and lunch spot for some cheap good eats to cure any hangover! Don't be surprised if you see the owner come over and give you a friendly handshake. He loves all his customers and it's clear he has great intentions to provide good service.

orc5dBW7ugBimhYnL7Qs4g.text: I am from Syracuse N.Y. . When I am having Breakfast at Mr Mamas does it make me feel like I am at home ? NO it makes me wish there was a place like Mr Mamas at home . Go Orange .

XN926m3RgfEhrWmqtbsMHA.text: Best Breakfast in all of Vegas.  Eat here everytime i am in the area.  Cheers to the Mamas French Toast.  Sooooooooooooooooooooo Good

SktAsfwto8TiSRtgnk0K4Q.text: You can't go wrong here. Great food, best service you will find, and a friendly atmosphere.  Worth renting a car just to go.  You won't regret making the trip.

sr-OOpggMuoguUTem1m_2g.text: Loved the original location and love the new location more! We don't get here often but they remember us every time and what we usually order. The staff is uber friendly and the food is well prepared without trying to be pretentious.  Our favorite breakfast spot in Vegas

IkiB9b0jFV1ApmvjSTFW5g.text: This place is awesome! New location and still the best customer service. Everyone is so nice and the food is great. I'm pretty picky about my breakfast and this place never disappoints. And if you don't know what you want...just ask. They are the best at giving really good recommendations based on what you like.

ECJXh1y7yFmVbESS0UUzrw.text: Thank you Yelp for leading me here! Me and my friends were trying to figure out where to eat breakfast and we came across Mr. Mamas. The reviews and pictures said it all and our decision was easily made to check it out.   When we arrived there were groups of people waiting to be seated. Our wait time was 20 minutes but it ended up being 10. Staff is great at keeping you informed when they're preparing your table.   The hardest part was trying to figure out what to order especially when you're Hangry everything sounds good!   I ordered the veggie omelette + cheddar/jack cheese (extra). This comes with hash browns, toast, and fruit all for only $9.95. I also ordered a side of bacon Everything was great! Portion size was huge I couldn't finish my plate.   We shared the half size biscuits n sausage gravy to try out ($5.95) The gravy was creamy and delicious and the biscuits warm and fluffy.   Mr. Mama himself is the man coming around greeting each table and kindly checking on customers making sure all is good. That goes to show how much they care about customer satisfaction.   Overall the entire staff is great and always checking on you. I really enjoyed the food here and would definitely return!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie omelette, hash browns, and a side of bacon - Loved it! I couldn&#39;t finish this generous portion
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spanish omelette
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Half size biscuits and sausage gravy - Delicious!

_oQxLnGHQwYbWD-C_2Pxvw.text: This is the perfect brunch spot. A clear favorite. The staff was friendly and efficient. The food was well seasoned and perfectly made. The cinnamon bun is so fluffy and the icing melts in your mouth.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spanish omelette, home fries, and french toast.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Homemade cinnamon bun!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Coffee with whipped cream and cocoa topping.

K_MWpn8Wz18DtoUOcvHMJA.text: Absolutely Delicious Breakfast! Coffee was great, service was amazing. Worth the 20 minute wait. Corned beef hash was awesome my husband loved his pancakes. Go now!

2jR1H_pkX22UGIka_LRH2w.text: The food was amazing!! Huge portions and cooked fresh! Service was fast and excellent, they were also friendly and playing and joking with my sons! Highly recommend this place!!

lScPAUpfHG_9c_gB6peFfA.text: Finally got to try this place out and I'm glad I did. The service was excellent very friendly and helpful staff. We were sat immediately and had our drinks in like a minute or two. Jazmin was our server and she was very helpful and attentive. Food came out fast and hot, the portions were huge. I had the breakfast burrito and it was delish! We also met the owner. Great guy, he greets all his guests and makes everyone feel like family. I will finally be back.

yW1fDLl3Xt1QxVLKxoH_gQ.text: Awesome place to have breakfast. Portions were good size, and price was decent. Mr. Mama was walking his restaurant and talking with the families there, super nice guy.  Big up to this restaurant. Kind of crowded, so plan to wait for a table.. but well worth it.

MV4BwT2lKjOSy2vlXXXTQg.text: Mr Mama himself was great and very charming! Spoke to everyone really felt like a guest in his home. We had to wait about 30 minutes on a Wednesday morning but it was worth it. Much better food that we would have got on the strip. Wait staff was extremely pleasant and very attentive. Everyone in my party had a great breakfast! Thanks Mr. Mama

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast and lunch spot

cjb2QBKlakrm3OJ7WtaB3w.text: Nothing to brag about it, tasteless omelette, unflavored hash browns, even worst pancakes. Despite beautiful pictures in reviews and 45 minutes waiting time......see ya never. Only good thing, waitress was nice .

4L9QaZvjvjar93K1W329UQ.text: From the time you enter the establishment to the time you leave, you will be treated with a highly efficient, helpful staff who is clearly dedicated to making each diner feel special. In our visit, the owner made the rounds to each table, a nice and in my experience unusual touch. Oh by the way the food is simply amazing. Our wait was not too long but I would  have gladly waited longer for this dining experience!!! It will be a staple on each Las Vegas visit

Ikx5q86TG9KOsEm117Z0-g.text: I wish I would have tried this spot sooner!  We came in for a late breakfast and we waited about 10 minutes.  The menu has a great variety and something for everyone.  My boyfriend got the country fried steak and I got the eggs with bacon and hashbrowns.   The food was great and the coffee kept coming (my fave!), even though I wasn't obsessed with the taste of it.  Our server was SO kind.  I would hire her in a heartbeat.  She would overhear our conversation and chime in, which some people may think is annoying, but I just thought she was so sweet and caring!  She made the most motivational comments and was just an uplifting positive person.  The owner/manager?  talked to us a few times and was very friendly.  He asked if we would like a photo which was thoughtful even though we declined.  If you're in the area and want a great casual breakfast/brunch experience I would highly recommend Mr Mamas!

7xJeD8U21gWxUqtAJ-8LmA.text: I think it is hard to beat Vegas for breakfast, that being said, Mr. Mamas fully represents!!! Looking at the pictures does not fully represent the flavor, believe that. I was looking at the pictures and even my own and I was like meh looks good but nothing crazy.  I get here and was genuinely greeted by a kind person and all of the staff was polite and welcoming my server Jazzman was very attentive and took great care of me. Even the manager Kat came over and welcomed me and helped me with my decision. She hooked me up and let me know to substitute regular toast for a pancakes (but I got sourdough as well). The fresh orange juice is just right not too sweet and delightful.  I was amazed at how fast my order came out. The Cali omelette is full of flavor and the sour cream with Pico was a perfect mix. Portions are solid. My omelette was four egg and the perfect amount, I was pretty hungry and it filled me up!  Great people great food give them a try you will be happy you did!!!

2mZp1ymwnqi1q0xuOglczA.text: I'd saved this spot since we moved here.  Finally got the chance to swing by after our 7 miles hike.  From all the reviews it seems like it gets pretty busy.  We came around 2 PM on Friday.  There were about 8 tables seated, not too bad.  We didn't have to wait to be seated.   I really like it that they care about their customers.  Mr. Mama came by our table to introduce himself and checked on us.  It's been a while since we went to any restaurants to where the owner/manager swings by to check up and thank you for coming in.

-oeJaGg-rSW-eu-WerFSoQ.text: I had the bacon breakfast burrito. It balanced the ingredients well. The salsa that comes with it is super good. Service is the best I've had in a long while! We had a 30 minute wait to be seated and it was well worth it. I also tried a friend's Texas toast and that was perfectly buttered.

sXWgWoG0G49-vSmKg51j4A.text: If you see a crowd outside and your so hungry please wait! Trust me it's worth it. It's not hype it feels like home and all the waitresses and staff make you feel so Welcomed. Pancakes were on point . Loved it definitely coming back next time I'm on Vegas.

RI1_sLnQ0gySbD0N_8Fq6Q.text: OMG!  You will not believe the experience I just had at MR.MAMAS !  From the time you step to the front door you are greeted with a warm and inviting smile. Seated Swiftly, greeted again by another team member. Drink order was taken immediately. Greeted again by another amazing staff member.  The menu is just right!  I ordered The Mama's French toast with scrambled eggs and cheese with bacon and a side of grits. (Wait until I tell you about these grits)  The French toast you can taste the cinnamon sprinkled on top... Fluffy. Mmmmmmmm Not a fan of eggs, however they were also fluffy and tasty with the perfect amount of cheese.  NOW THESE GRITS! My Mama (get it) lol. In my opinion makes the best grits to man kind. She's in NYC. Second from her grit is Mike from The Home of Chicken and Waffles in the Bay area. Now Mr.Mamas is added to the list. I love my grits with a little lump and airy. Mr.Mamas grits is life.  My Husband ordered Mr.Mamas pancakes. The pancakes was the size of your head. For the first time in history my husband was not able to finish his food. I was so happy that he met his match.  The pancakes by the way fluffy and the syrup soaks into the pancake....so tasty.  Looking around the the restaurant, everything is so clean, organized in place the equipment look brand new out the box but it's not. I was in HEAVEN! For me to be such a foodie and dine out a lot I never truly feel comfortable and safe eating food from others maybe it's the inspector in me   Oh yeah! A really awesome employee took a really great picture of us at the table with our food from a great angle...thanks buddy  Our server Eileen, sweet as pie, very nice not over baring....just perfect  I also noticed that all the staff is happy with each other, helpful like a team and having a good time being at work. Great Atmosphere  I had the pleasure of meeting Mr.MAMA. GREAT GUY. FEELS LIKE THAT FAVORITE UNCLE WHO YOU CALL TO GET YIU OUT OF TROUBLE WITH OUT JUDGING YOU BUT WILL GIVE YOU A STERN LECTURE AND HUG YOU AFTER.  Maria the Manager. (Bad with names) so nice, with a great smile.. God Bless you!  At the end of my experience. I felt I was leaving really close family members and I don't want to go. I was left wondering how can I franchise and put this restaurant next door to my house.  MR.MAMAS IS DEFINITELY 5 STAR ALL THE WAY!  I ALMOST FORGOT! HOW CLEAN TO CONDIMENT BOTTLES ARE! IM A STICKLER FOR BOTTLES THAT HAVE GUNK ON THEM. THESE BOTTLES WERE SPARKLING CLEAN AND I LOVE THAT THEY OFFER DELI MUSTARD, IT'S MY FAVORITE. (NO I didn't need it for my meal, but I did taste it just because)

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Yf6s9otoMN54Tap7XNcWVw.text: Everything was awesome. My friend and I arrived around 8am. we're sat right away, there was about 4 tables already our server arrive gave us prompt service and we ordered our coffee and our food. Everything was fresh and spot on!! I would definitely come back when I'm in Vegas. By far the best breakfast joint I've tried in Vegas.

_cllCt3ybueIpGSFjpIJ9w.text: From the time you arrive it's non-stop service! The door was opened and a personal greeting was rendered. Followed by prompt seating and an attentive staff. The food was made in a good amount of time and served in large portions. I couldn't finish it all.   I was pleasantly surprised by the involvement of the owner (Mr. Mama) in the dining experience and overall satisfaction of the customers. He greeted everyone and even engaged in a few conversations. I will definitely visit again. If personal service with a positive attitude is what you seek in a dining experience, I urge you to give Mr. Mamas a try.

Zrbgbdn-_eW2bNAZ-NC6lQ.text: Love it awesome food and awesome staff!! I make sure to visit every time I'm in Vegas!!

AYo80y-qo9f2_Z_YIsaZVA.text: Love, love Mr. Mamas. It's a nice little hidden breakfast gem. The food is delicious and the staff is always friendly. This restaurant really knows how to treat its customers. I always recommend this place to everyone I know.

pGdJSLZoHITViIyibKqkgQ.text: Found Manas on Yelp and so glad we came. It was close to where we were staying, but now that I've come I'd travel a ways if needed to come back.  The owner Nick is so friendly as is the staff. And the food is really good. You gotta try this place.

hfNXIh1gfhGDTQh3mzTI6Q.text: So happy I went to breakfast here today! The service was fantastic and the food was great! I had to get the mamas stack, pancakes, 2 eggs & a choice of bacon, ham, or sausage. I obviously got bacon and was very pleased ! I would definitely recommended it :) thanks for the amazing hospitality & breakfast ! I will be back

hdHZDsMvxKZvoobYfMpubQ.text: Incredible food.  This restaurant  is fabulous and the staff is extremely friendly. . It's off the strip and roomy.  I  strongly suggest  if you are looking for reasonable food and great service .

Ec6n0SkEiduxSmvn-Okg7w.text: I found this place randomly on an app and saw its Yelp reviews so decided to give it a try. It was amazing! Super friendly and attentive staff. Our food was out really quick and tasted fantastic! I've had such a hard time finding a place with good biscuits and gravy so I decided to only order a half to share with my husband because I was sure I wouldn't like it, however I ate the whole thing and then what I ordered! We will definitely be coming back.

oX7Y2UtK1lntnm8YZAxPTg.text: We  found this place through Yelp.  We had the mamas French toast and Western omelet. It's was delicious. Service was great. Just a little wait because it was a hoppin place.

IwPEgh3ubSh-V6GFIFWbZw.text: The food was excellent and service was the same! It's worth the drive as its off the beaten path.. The owner was very friendly.  It was clean, food was fresh, pancakes are made by scratch.. Omelettes are made with 4 eggs.. Hashbrowns were perfect! The owner said we look fit..  said the portions are meant to fatten us up..  thanks mr mama!

hxFrBvxZM2gsuF_fjU38gQ.text: You know what don't take my word for it just go you will be so glad you did! Amazing place!

iZYOJca0DMcVlTIlPrdeog.text: First off hats off to a wonderful management and service team. We stopped here while our exploring the area and we were not disappointed. We were greeted with enthusiasm and smiles. There was a small wait but wasn't more then a few minutes with a larger party in front of Us exceeded our expectations. Once we were seated we ordered a little bit of everything on the breakfast side. We had the Cali omelet which was moist and perfectly done. We also ordered the biscuits and gravy which has some bacon in there with the sausage and was excellent. The egg Benedict had perfectly poached eggs that accompanied the hollandaise sauce which I couldn't get enough of. The potatoes with peppers and onion on the side were a excellent accompaniment. We will definitely be back next time we are in town and not only cause of the wonderful service but we want to try more off the menu. Thank you again till next time.

aWvVlDLdlQqj8zrGWVZNAQ.text: This place is fantastic! The moment you walk in you are greeted with a smile and told to pick a spot wherever you like. The restaurant is clean and inviting with comfortable chairs and well kept tables. The menu had a good selection of breakfast choices.   I ordered french toast with bacon and my boyfriend ordered the California omelet. The food came very quickly and looked amazing. The omelet had large slices of avocado on top with sour cream and pico de gallo. My french toast was golden and fluffy with cinnamon sprinkled on as it cooked  (I assume) & dusted with the perfect amount of powdered sugar. The bacon was the thick cut kind which was surprising  because most places cheap out with the super thin bacon.   The owner was also extremely nice. There was a couple from out of town that had located the restaurant online and thought to give something off the strip a try. The owner took the time to recommend some excellent things to do while they were in town. I thought it was great how he makes everyone feel so welcome and takes the time to make sure everything is perfect with your meal.   Good food, good service, good price, can't beat that.

bs73tRl2Moaen-JB3xBknw.text: Superb breakfast spot. 5 stars for everything! Cleanliness, check. Great coffee, check. Crispy hash browns, check. Great service, check. And last but not least, my personal benchmark for a go to breakfast joint, great chicken fried steak, check!!! Believe the hype.  Legit. Solid. Killer. Bomb. Call it whatever you want and just f'ing go!!!

oaX8NnN-okjv7hjnb2aHPQ.text: This place is awesome. My husband and I were visiting Vegas and Heard about it from a local. The 5 star reviews is well earned. Friendly staff and great food. It felt like home.

-203NoU6kqTP6H41O4PpFQ.text: went here with my friend for breakfast. we had two babies with.  wait was very long, so i was expecting amazing food. food came undercooked. staff was very nice though. but the food was disgusting. im not sure how you screw up omlets but they managed to do that.  i will never eat here again. i personally prefer the cracked egg in henderson for breakfast.

qxSjeUFcnX0MSzIwvBGaNA.text: Great portions. Great prices and AMAZING owner and staff members.  Glad Yelp helped me find this gem!

K9-tlnrfrXWq9t4wQLnwIw.text: We were hopeful that with all the amazing reviews this place was going to finally be a great las vegas food experience.  Sadly though, as has become the trend, the food here was pretty mediocre.  Certainly not the worst food ive ever had, but it's not the life changing expirencing most people seem to be having.  The biscuits and gravey tasted like they were comprised of 2% milk, flour, and jimmy dean bacon sausage, with a dusting of black pepper and no salt for miles.  My friend had the chilli cheese fries, and commented that it tasted like Ragu from a can with ground beef.  No traditional seasoning and it was "from a jar" bright red.  Setting aside the food, the space is arranged nicely.  Tables are positioned in such a way as make it feel like youve got a nice amount of room to enjoy your meal.  The service was fast and attentive, which is a nice change from the usual off strip dining expirences we've had this far.  All in all, sadly just not worth getting out of bed for.

GTVpiKEiuO3EO9c37aSvzQ.text: Best breakfast in Vegas worth the drive away from the strip.  Their bacon is to die for, best I have ever had. Did I mention how amazing the staff was.  Nothing more valuable than an engaged owner who cares about their business.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The most amazing bacon strips ever.

MG-vbwPOtl8NoXtvXqprZA.text: Yelp reviews  bring me here and I can  say  I was not disappointed, even a single piece. The place is really good especially for breakfast. Pretty quiet, feels like home to me.  The service is also fantastic.  This restaurant  will go a long way because their staff are very friendly.  Coffee is always full.  Ordered french toast, chicken  fried steak with eggs and all of them taste excellent and very affordable.  You can never go wrong with Mr. Mamas

_BMxln7D-jwBpwSY7_rf5A.text: Awesome breakfast place! My co workers and i always come here after work. Even though its a breakfast place i cant resist their bacon avacado burger. Juicy burger with fresh ingredients.The owner is always friendly and welcoming. Plenty of parking now with the new location. Great service too, Claudia's the best!

g9ao2wtHSP5q10vdFaz9VA.text: Was great the feeling is very welcoming and the food is great worth venturing off from the strip to head out this way. The guy that greets you is cool as hell and makes you feel like your in the right spot .

LkbmpYLcWhboZc0F57c11w.text: So many wonderful things to say about this restaurant! The food was delicious, the staff was amazing, the restaurant was clean and not-overcrowded, and the owner is amazing! While eating our breakfast, the owner was walking around checking-in on tables. You can tell he cares deeply for his patrons and the experience they have in his restaurant. Next time we're in Vegas we will be paying Mr. Mamas a visit!

YMrY5gO3rC2zf2iOy814bQ.text: The owner is always at the door, taking names and running a very efficient restaurant. He engages in pleasant conversation during the small wait we've had almost every time and is very gracious to guests.  The wait staff is always friendly and accommodating.  The food is fantastic, try the Marty Wrap and Cinnamon Roll.  Prices are right.

I-1o-EMgbRRAPXQmA1VKTw.text: This place has some of the best breakfast food I have ever had! From the front of the building it looks like an office space because of the tinting on the windows, but the inside is a casual open dinning room with a medium sized kitchen serving up some awesome food! I had the mama's French toast which includes three eggs any way you want and a choice of bacon or sausage etc.. Every bite of my food was fantastic... the eggs were cooked perfectly as well as the bacon! I will definitely be back when I take a trip to Vegas again! Awesome service too!

AcvED46LOPQStUoNeL8vxw.text: Best place ever. So good I had  to stop eating to write this review.. the owner is awesome.  The food is great

-pDTutDOuMot35cfNiWUrA.text: We had the biscuits and gravy they were ok.  Club sandwich was great and standard breakfast eggs, bacon,  hash browns were good!

BGXO3npMWO7TC0gMwo7xUw.text: Awesome service, and great food! Will definitely come back here! It's off the strip, but so worth the 15min cab ride. The staff is incredibly welcoming and professional!

lKn48RV4Dh692nPcNRMZWA.text: Great food, and great service. I rarely have time to ever go out for breakfast so i do wish they were open longer ..!

hqI6U8NST9IxNWG2EsPP5A.text: I had to come check this place out after reading the reviews and they were right! My girlfriend left her phone at the table. he made sure to have it put to the side for us and waited for us to come get it even though they were closed

XZNSGZE3Nq1oydb9oIIoug.text: Excellent place!! Super fast service super nice service....portions are great and very reasonable prices....its a must outside the strip

oXQ1W-bCqNw3tmCb76l3zg.text: Place wasn't very impressing.  It's in a corner plaza next to a med spa and play area for kids.  The food was ok.  Service was good but there wasn't any "wow" factor in this place.  The prices range from $8-$14 and the food was that of Denny's.  I don't think I will be returning any time soon.

xVvcijRZjDhjZlz7BM3XFA.text: After a crazy weekend in Vegas, make a pitstop on your way back at this local family breakfast/brunch place. The stellar service and food made a nice finale for a great weekend.   The spinach, avocado, and mozzerella and pamersan cheese in the Spanish omelet blended well togetheher. The French toast was the right balance of sweetness and cinnamon.

2ZJ3gIbQr-W9UDIVrahnsw.text: Wanted to have breakfast off the strip and my wife was directed to Mr Mamas by google. Very awesome place for breakfast. They open from 6am - 3pm m-f and 7am - 2pm sat-sun. Was going by to order the chili/cheese burger but upon ordering her homemade corned beef hash, our server commented that that was a very good choice and her favorite dish. Once I heard that I ordered the same thing. Their corned beef is actually homemade and one of the best I've ever had. Free refills for coffee and hot tea are available. Props to Lourdes for the awesome, sincere, and genuine service provided to us. If you are in the mood for a great breakfast at very reasonable prices visit Mr Mamas; you won't be disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned Beef Hash

yddo5FPHcOIauwwiToc7pA.text: Great customer service and outstanding breakfast food. Simple off the beaten path place that obviously has a great following with the locals. Short stack pancakes were excellent and my coffee cup never emptied. Good prices. I'd come again

NNg3FvnUDZbON4Ehhb4DEQ.text: Where do I even start. Easy to find.right off the strip.... Very welcoming..opening doors.. Accommodating to our large family. Every one in there are so super friendly and it is the little things..  Plastic silverware for our 1 and a half year old so he could play with it without the bang on the table.. Food was oh my amazing! One ordered chicken fried steak..another one the breakfast burrito...also biscuits and gravy and a Denver omelette..all in our party was so very pleased with what they ordered. We saw pancakes come out of the kitchen that looked amazing! Portions are nice size .. Hard to eat it all ... The gravy is different and they offer to let you try it before getting it and wow was it good! Sausage..bacon...so very tasty. Ask for Tamara ! She was fabulous! One last thing .. this restuarant was so very clean! They are always cleaning ...condiments on table look brand new! You will not be disappointed for coming here!!!

qcysQsBC9twmTnah_2jWKA.text: Seriously one of the best places. The food is hot and delicious and they give you plenty of it too so you can't leave hungry. On top of it the whole staff there is so friendly. They all help each other and are super attentive making sure you have everything you need and that you have a great experience, including the owner himself. Truly genuine people and very yummy food.

KF5v7wvp4VH4eRNvxKK0DA.text: Very clean and classy American style open seating diner style with no frills. I ordered the BBQ beef in a pita with a bowl of chicken noodle- soup. Was very clean and fresh tasting

yRO1T7MelXSaLb8O110wVA.text: Place is fantastic.   Only thing that was tough bout it is its way off the strip.  Taxi was $23 from planet hollywood.  Their homemade hash is great as well as their hash browns.  Breakfast is pretty cheap though so it was well worth the trip

ckZ1M3iNeAURF4bLwM3p6A.text: The service was great.. Sean took an amazing photo of the family with the food..!! Can't wait till we come back!!

hwm7ilrQ6l39YRoG01TAdg.text: Visiting Las Vegas and wanted a great breakfast. That is what we got at Mr Mamas. From the moment we walked in we were impressed, we could tell the place was ran with the deliberate intention to provide exceptional excellent customer service.  We notice the bus boys clearing and clean the tables and chairs, then looking all around making sure the space around was clean.  The hostess was interacting with the customers. The servers were waiting for plates to be ready.  When were seated the waitress, Jenna, was knowledgeable, friendly and very quick to keep our beverages full.  She was attentive without being annoying. We had decided even if the food was only ok we were happy. But the food was delicious! Best meal we had the entire weekend!

5L_v_A-kfxEpTib81hFlyA.text: Very very good food great for lunch and breakfast. Highly recommend for breakfast or lunch.

BL2mjXuX1wWX5U_xnzXCtA.text: Owner Nick's impeccable standards are evident in the food and service. Enjoyed the Michigan photographs and memorabilia on the walls. Our waitress was friendly and efficient. Great place for breakfast and lunch!

SFu5X-8Vxrl43wULxtlSog.text: Mister Mamas is a great local breakfast and lunch restaurant. Easy to find and plenty of parking. Always nice to support the small local business.

sgyeEARtSRSXalzzQCTXIw.text: To be honest, I am completely baffled at how this place has a 5 star rating from so many reviewers. A friend was coming into town and wanted breakfast with us so I suggested this place because of the ratings, they were so good! My expectations were high, and what we experienced was very poor.   Upon walk-in, our friends were already seated but we weren't allowed to sit next to them or put any tables together because there was no room, even though we were willing to wait to put our tables together. That was not going to happen & we ended up sitting there, waiting for a table while our friends got theirs. I told the host that it was okay, although honestly it was an inconvenience. Once we were seated, opposite of our friends' table, his parents decided to take our table so that we could sit with our friends.   Our server was Julia, who seemed rushed. I understand, there's a lot of people waiting to be seated; I saw several customers waiting outside as well, but we are the ones seated, we shouldn't be rushed; we waited our turn just as they are waiting theirs. Once we ordered our food, it came back to us in a fairly good time. I ordered steak & eggs with hashbrowns and so did my boyfriend. Unfortunately my plate had my steak & eggs but it had thinly cut potatoe wedges/fries and I told her I asked for hashbrowns, she assumed my boyfriend asked for the thin cut wedges and told us to swap our steaks. She literally told us to swap our steaks. We had different eggs too, why would we swap plates????  My boyfriend said he ordered hashbrowns too so she left to get a separate plate of hashbrowns and said that now we could have both. (Although I didn't touch a single potato wedge thing.)  She frequently checked in on us.... A little too frequently to the point where again, it made us feel rushed. She spoke quickly, came and went quickly, and came too much.   The food here was mediocre in comparison to other breakfast places. I have had better steak and eggs & I honestly don't plan on coming back here again. It's not terrible, but I didn't have a very nice experience and the food wasn't all that great either.

ytnNkOkuhVL9uoFMLrWFdA.text: Delicious! Our whole experience here was one that has made this our favorite food spot of our trip. The host was on top of things , got us on the wait list and sat within the time given The server was on point made sure any questions were answered . We got a pancake and a cinnamon roll for the table we shared between 4 people and it was so good. The pancake was delicious I ate it without syrup and it was perfect the syrup took it to her next level of goodness . The cinnamon roll had us wanting more!  We had eggs Benedict, chicken fried steak and steak and eggs and no one had anything but excellent things to say about their food . The home fries and hash browns I definitely recommend getting the bell peppers to go on it it takes it up a notch for sure!   The place was clean the food didn't take too long to come out and the service was great . Definitely bookmarked for future trips !

Ogpx5WITQk1_UXjnbJadBQ.text: Awesome breakfast spot in the 702.   Super friendly and quick service. I ordered the homemade corned beef hash which came with eggs and hash browns. The dish was perfect.   What was most memorable about my visit was the nice lady who was working the host area. She was constantly telling her crew "great job guys" and "keep up the good work". That made me smile.  Will definitely return.

4SeK35hInbJjO52w7gLpwQ.text: This place has the best service! Constantly checked on, never had to ask for refills. The owner stopped by and introduced himself.   The cinnamon roll was so yummmmmy! We ordered one to share before our breakfast arrived?  I ordered the California omelet. It was really good. A good portion of avocado. I substituted hash browns for fresh fruit. The fruit was actually fresh! Usually they give you old fruit or canned fruit.   My dad and sister got chicken fried steak and biscuits and gravy. They both said their breakfast was mediocre. I tried each of their breakfast and I would agree, both were not amazing.

k524G5ev2KX3kR6IGC4h2A.text: Very friendly. Owner visited at table. Food was good and clearly popular. There was about a 25 min wait at 10:00 am on a Friday.

tt1PI3KUjUgk75trWCfY2g.text: This place is some of the best breakfast I've ever had in my life!!!! The gravy make you wanna slap yo momma!!! Huge portions, excellent service and friendly staff. A vegas must try!!!

cdAv67grYnWUzzGuN4KCXw.text: Good American diner food. I ordered eggs with hash browns and toast, and it tasted fine. My friend's chicken fried steak was delicious but definitely on the heavier end. On a Monday afternoon, we waited for about 20 minutes, which was not too bad. The service was decent and the prices are affordable.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs with hash brown

Jxt0Xw7B-mIpXdA-ghq1Zg.text: We were hungry and wanted to find a place that locals go. We looked at the menu and new it was a perfect fit... the service was perfect everyone was engaged in making the experience welcoming. From the door being opened when we arrived. Good morning with meaning was said. Our table was ready right away.  Jasmine was our waitress... we ordered steak and eggs with tater tots and then an  omelette with mushroom, spinach, pepper jack with a side of avocado and their wonderful salsa ... the coffee was fresh the orange juice delicious. Places like this are so special because they hold True to older values of making the customer feeling welcome and then serving them quality food at a great price. Great food !!! Great prices but the friendly environment is what truly makes this place extra special. Thank you Mr Mamas

8UCbf7oeCVqKjN3RYiqvPA.text: We were in Vegas for a fun getaway. We rented a car for the day. We turned to Yelp to find us a great lunch and were tired of paying tourist prices.  We decided on Mr Mamas based on reviews.   The staff was so nice and very hard working.  My husband got a turkey club and ask our waitress what bread she would pick for the sandwich. She said the hamburger bun.  ( Really a hamburger bun?) I got a chili burger.  The hamburger buns were SO good. We loved both of our lunches.   This place is a good choice and affordable.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

NDlDg8HGJ-udHpM9FR2BIg.text: Excellent food. The place is packed. Hubs had the pancake special. I had the Jenna wrap. Service was great despite how busy they were/are

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon and egg. Pancakes wirh raspberry drizzle and whipped cream.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Jenna wrap.

yUrSwChnTQO1JaLrem1ecg.text: Solid, no frills local breakfast spot about 10 minutes from the Strip. It's not one of those fancy places with creative and funky names, so don't expect to be "blown away" to quote one Yelper. They have all the usual breakfast staples, whatever you're in the mood for. Service is always very warm and efficient, and they welcome you like family.

EET3lVduvuaJZ9YDnY5KTA.text: Prologue: A co-worker of mine recommended this restaurant during a recent discussion of favorite places to eat in Las Vegas. My fiancee and I had originally decided to try someplace new in Chinatown for breakfast. However, our experience in Chinatown at dinner time on the day before was less satisfying and so we opted to visit this restaurant for our Sunday brunch.  The Plot: We shared two entrees, which included Mamas Chicken Fried Steak & Eggs (with eggs over easy) and a Cali Omelet (with peppers, mushrooms, and onions added).  We also ordered a Buttermilk Pancake because I had been told they were very good and so we just had to try one.  The Scene: The portion sizes for both entrees were very generous and more than enough for both of us. Each entree also came with potatoes and toast to order.  My fiancee absolutely loved the omelet and all of the sides. It was made with four eggs, which were cooked perfectly, so the omelet was large enough to hold all of the cheese and veggies without anything spilling out.  The eggs that were served with the chicken fried steak were the best example of over easy that I have experienced as long as I can remember. The steak was very tender and flavorful.  The Rest of the Story: The service was courteous and very friendly. The host went out of his way to help us take a selfie. The wait was reasonable for a Sunday busy morning and the prices were average.  Epilogue: My fiancee has decided that this will now be our regular breakfast spot when visiting Las Vegas.   Photo Design By: Billie Z.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali Omelet
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mamas Chicken Fried Steak &amp; Eggs

zzcqyqeCu6wOFgrSColFUQ.text: This little Vegas hidden gem was amazing!!!!  The restaurant was clean yet packed with about 15 minute wait time.  I have to tell you-even though my tummy was growling--it was WELL worth the wait!  The staff was super friendly right front the start!  They seated us, gave us info on any of the dishes we asked about and the food came our fairly quick!  The staff came and checked on us while waiting on our food as well as after the food came out.  They seemed to go around joking with all the tables too!  Best comment ever was when the manager (who is bald) went up to a customer eating (also bald) and said "Hey man, you have a nice looking head" ROFL--my cousin and I laughed so hard--then my cousin even asked him "why didn't you tell me I had a nice head?"  --his reply, with a serious face "you have too much hair covering yours up"  hahahahahaha!    The food was amazing and pretty big portions!  I got the french toast, eggs and bacon. I was not a fan of the eggs as they had a weird taste to them, but everything else was spot on!  My cousin devoured her eggs Benedict saying it was amazing!!    I would highly recommend you check this place out when you are in Vegas next!  The food, staff and pricing was top notch!

aq3IWlIx8uFISdMvzDXOXw.text: To me, it's just about the best breakfast in town and every time I'm in Vegas I make sure I don't skip it. Just good food and great service ho and just about the most friendly owner you will ever find. He will never skip a table asking if they're treating you right today and if the food is to your liking. Surprisingly enough he always remembers me among the hundreds he sees each day. Hat down to you sir.

nIZGDYmtA75yYy7xOfjUiA.text: It was our first day in Vegas and we were looking for an inexpensive option for breakfast that wasn't too far off the beaten track.  The food was great and the service was fantastic.  Literally less than 5 minutes and our children's French toast was in front of them.  Not too long after the entrees for my wife and I arrived at our table.  The food was great and the portions were huge.  Will be coming back here during our week stay.

UylCiAtKj5jXFl9v47G-SA.text: Classic American diner food done well - come here for a traditional experience and a hearty breakfast.   We waited 20mins, as quoted, to be seated on  Sunday morning around 10a. The service was prompt and friendly.   Cinnamon roll - was excited to try this based on reviews, but I have to say I wish I skipped it. The roll itself is quite dry, and as it sat it only got more dry. Don't recommend getting this.   Breakfast burrito - large portion, full of eggs and meat and hash browns. Yum!  Eggs and toast - a perfect portion for someone who doesn't have a huge appetite. Comes with crispy hash browns (or home fries). My over easy eggs were perfect, and the toast was crisp and buttered.   Overall, definitely stop by for a hearty American diner breakfast, but skip the cinnamon roll!

UzZfMbb2UxdFDs-m4AGaPQ.text: Favorite Eggs Benedict... recommend getting it with the real corn beef hash.  Food was most excellent.   Get here early, as the lines starts to build by 9:30am.

pTIz_fQET3SM1KxVWpPLiw.text: First time coming to this place after reading a few reviews and I was not disappointed. This place is delicious. I had the chicken fried steak and eggs and the gravy that came on it was absolutely amazing one of the best gravies I've had. This is now my favorite breakfast spot. And the staff is super friendly.

dZL8Tn4cORFPyt_rCQuhqA.text: This place definitely was more than I expected! Came here while I was in Vegas with my family. Everything was great! The food and service was exceptional. My family and I waited for about 10 mins to be seated. We ordered the steak and eggs, a breakfast burrito, western burger, and the berries French toast! My dish was the berries French toast and it was perfect. The dish is not listed in their menu so you would have to ask for them. All the other dishes were great and tasty too. The staff are friendly and attentive! The service was fast.   When I am back in Vegas, I will most def come back here!

RmMuc902DXRPKuj6Vz7A4A.text: From opening the door for you coming in AND  leaving to the attentiveness of the staff, this place is staffed to impress.  The menu is great and the food was delicious. Our waitress, Lourdes, was great and even brought out a mini-sized Mickey Mouse pancake to show my son what it would look like when he said he didn't want more than just one pancake. He of course changed his mind and she brought him a Huge one! We ordered that plain, along with the Manhattan Burger and Mr. Mama's French toast. All were delicious! Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a place off the strip in Vegas for breakfast or lunch.

VmCeu-txu86COuF5hvcQBg.text: Definitely lived up to the hype and the 4+ star rating. Have the chicken fried steak and you won't regret it. Pancakes really good as well, service was outstanding and the manager on duty was excellent as well. I would recommend without hesitation, and definitely return the next time I'm in Vegas.

JQMBaojtc0jO-t14s2f3zQ.text: My favorite breakfast place in vegas!  I make sure to come here every time I'm in town. The one downside of this place is that everything is so good that it is hard to choose what to order! Also the line can be a bit long (~30 min on a Saturday morning) but it's worth it.  My go to's are the biscuits and gravy, cinnamon roll, french toast, and the hash browns are a favorite side of mine. I also recently tried the chili and it is a good sweet, spicy, and hearty side, too!  The staff is also incredibly friendly, which puts the icing on the cake, or cinnamon roll in this case. ;)

07-bW4bY2X-eoW5YALNUAw.text: Excellent breakfast spot in Las Vegas. Good food and service. Very friendly staff. Your food comes out quick, fast, and good. Will be back and tell others of this place.

1MoolsrItyz0WGMzajUEEw.text: Super convenient and close to our AirBnB - great sit-in or easy takeout options. I had a Greek omelet with home fries and a side of sauteed veggies. Good gluten free options and very affordable, especially compared to all the options on the strip.

5CkEgZwH2UJM7foE9L_FsQ.text: Amazing establishment! Service is outstanding. Came in a Saturday morning around 830 and only had a 20 min wait. Ordered the country fried steak. Their gravy is thick with tons of bacon in it! So good! The breaded steak is great! Man, lived t all.   Fiance ordered mommas stack and it was good! He added whip creams and strawberries to it. Look delicious. Picture perfect. Everyone is so friendly and patient.

b3rlffDMVCJC8xv-erijTQ.text: Back in Vegas for our anniversary and back to MR. Mamas for the best breakfast in Vegas. Was getting ready to leave and talking with Kat, told her we were here celebrating our anniversary. She ask if we had a few moments and they would make us a special desert for our anniversary. OMG, fried cinnamon rolls with raspberry sauce, to die for. We had told her we were full but ate both cinnamon rolls with ease. Thank you Kat & Ed for making our anniversary special. Don't miss MR. Mamas when in Vegas, you'll be sorry you did.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried cinnamon rolls with raspberry sauce.

SOuM1MrlvDHy7ZvbBLK0FA.text: Just got the Vegas this morning and was looking for a new place to have breakfast. I'm a huge fan of Eggs Benedict, so when I saw that Mr.Mamas offers this on their menu I decided to go check it out. Best decision I have ever made! The food, the service, the atmosphere was just great! Our hostess was so sweet and very attentive in making sure we knew how much longer we had left to wait. They really do try to get the line moving as fast as possible as this is a popular spot and the wait can become very long. Once we where seated, the staff made sure to ask us if we where having a good time and if we needed anything. They where all so lovely. Best customer service I have experienced in a while. Food was great and tasty. Definitely recommend anyone to make a stop here if they can. Will be making this one of my spots to visit every time I'm here.

yDKOu82-MvVy8wviVM9lCg.text: This is my new go to spot when I'm in Vegas. I will definitely be making the trip to grab breakfast here even though it's a bit far from the strip. Their food is simply unmatched. I have never had a breakfast spot this amazing (well only 808 grindz in Hawaii).   I ordered the eggs Benedict with the eggs a little over easy. I highly recommend the eggs Benedict if you are a fan. The hash brown came out nice and crispy on the outside but soft on the inside. To top it off, it was perfectly seasoned.   Service - the staff is very accommodating and polite. When you walk in they greet you with a smile and are more than happy to help.   If you're in Vegas, come here!!

2z5RXX66WXVgwSZWFp2hcw.text: Food is delicious! Service is exceptional!!! We will definitely be returning when we're in town!!! Highly recommend the biscuits and gravy, country fries steak and the deep fried cinnamon rolls!!!

nBCB_DowyqkiJmkRM5rCBw.text: Since it is only 5 minutes from the hotel where our daughter's Cheerleading competition is taking place. We thought we would try it out.  As soon as we walked up for the door, the manager open the door for us & gave us the friendliest introduction to their menu & specials. I had the Chicken Fried Steak. Beware ..the white gravy is dotted w/ bacon & sausage.  Loved it! Wife had biscuits & gravy..biscuits were toasted on one side that gave it more texture. Son had pancakes & sausage..giant stack of 4 pancakes.. eggs & 2 sausage patties. The other manager cane by & checked on our food. In and out within 40 minutes & beat the Sunday breakfast rush.  Food 5 Stars Service 5 Stars Parking 5 Stars Bathrooms 5 Stars  No Slot Machines 10 Stars No room for their special today...2 Fried Mini Cinnamon  Rolls w/ Ice Cream.  They had me at "Hello"

xX5Pey0AmkIBVlU5cQWrpg.text: This was a great breakfast stop before we started our drive home to California.  We received a very warm welcome and greeting at the door.  Our waitress was super sweet.  Service was prompt and efficient. We will definitely be back.

nCGuxLZQHD8DFrpY1tEwIQ.text: Cute little spot away from the Vegas strip , was greeted with a beautiful smile, seated in 15min, served right away, love it!!!! Plenty of parking, reasonable prices, good services

RyGnL6xtp5kdYm-kQgtijw.text: Small mom and pop place. The owner come out and chatted with all the guests. Service was on point and fantastic. Prices were great. Keep up the good work guys. BTW, you know how some places you go the pancakes are just delicious?  This is that place.

jXNW5WgqjplJn2Ms0eTaOg.text: Great breakfast place. Fast service. Friendly staff, delicious food. We will definitely come back next time we're in town.

nbnunnTCkqecH8NGx8BPKw.text: Was told the wait would be 45 mins but we were called in 30 mins because some people decided not to wait. I am gladdddd we did! Service and food was great! We ordered corn beef hash, chicken fried steak, and french toast. The gravy on the fried chicken steak has bacon and sausage chunks...it was so good! I like the the way the chicken was breaded too. Corn beef hash was homemade... bomb! The french toast was good too but our favs were the other two dishes. It would have been nice if there was a kids menu but the home fries, orange and a side of avocado was a good option.

EtoUIL72hcQHr4_EP3KkfQ.text: Affordable and delicious! My sandwich was delicious, I wish I had order the pancakes as well! Would definitely come back during my next vegas trip! .

NZKPhuvKm9sZKdEZmMS24g.text: Excited to bring the family to Mr. Mamma's well we were on vacation in Vegas. The hospitality was a 5. We waited about 30 minutes for a table. There was 8 in our party. Not to bad. French toast, country fried steak and my omelet were good. The home fries, steak and eggs, corn beef hash and pancakes didn't make the grade. The steak wasn't seasoned well, the pancakes were chewy and corn beef hash was to salty. Lastly the manager reprimanded an employee on the floor in front of many customers, not good.  I wouldn't say not to go but I would ask questions about how they prepare their food...make your own decision

SjDEifVg6UHdv6jnc2Q0PQ.text: We loved our entire welcoming experience. We tried this restaurant for breakfast and we returned for two more additional visits just for breakfast. Nick, Shane & Cat greeted us from our arrival to our departure. Customer service was outstanding. The food was hot and delicious. Jose was an efficient server together with their entire team they all worked together to serve all customers in a prompt efficient manner. There was so many great choices on their breakfast menu there is something for everyone to enjoy. I would recommend this off the stripe breakfast or lunch restaurant as a must at least once. Great prices, good ambiance, delicious food and outstanding efficient customer service tops the charts. Try their buttermilk pancakes made with sweet cream and a few berries. Oatmeal topped with a wee bit of cinnamon and a few berries on top just to name a few. Thanks again for a wonderful memorable experience

x41pWTHOQaAh-SJxlGSg7Q.text: Had the eggs Benedict florentine, soo good. Other than the food, what a wonderful staff. As you approach the door a friendly staff opens and greets everyone that walks in. The staff are friendly and informative. They make you feel at home. Lots of sitting and an easy place to find. Get here early because it can get busy. We will be back. Thank you for the great food and service.

wQWzx_CQ0umpg-05Loqi3A.text: Very Busy little breakfast spot. Mr. Mama's is located in a little strip mall on the corner of Jones and Russell. Every time I've stopped here the service and food have been awesome! It's usually pretty busy every time I've gone and as busy as it is someone (usually an employee) manages to open the door upon your arrival which is so pleasant especially when you're hungry. I was a little hesitant to wait cause it was SO busy but they hustle. Not like they are rushing people out but as soon as a table opens up it is cleaned right away and ready to be occupied. As for the food, it was fast and yummie!

8GilUXCWXXshkChWw-oZzQ.text: Cool simple place that is extremely busy but efficient.  The vibe is very comfortable.  I had extra crispy corned beefhash with eggs & potatoes with OJ & house coffee.  SOLID!  The portions were perfect and the corned beef hash  was very tasty.  I will be back here again to try out the rest of the breakfast menu.

yga1tE0Z_i89Iqf3vXtnMA.text: Mr.Mamas was just a pleasant and welcoming place. As soon as we walked in we were greeted. There was a small wait but gave us time to look over the menu. The staff were all friendly and helpful. The environment was was comfortable, cozy, and clean. For food, I ordered the eggs Benedict with meat (ham) and it was just delicious, right portions and cooked just right. My husband ordered Mr.Mamas French Toast, which were also delicious. Came with 4 slices of French toast which were soft, not too sweet, and buttery, got 3 sunnyside eggs, medium done bacon, and extra side of hashbrowns. Food was just amazing. Would highly recommend trying this place if in town.

From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with friendly smiles! The waitress, Lourdes, I believe recommended the chicken fried steak, Cali omelette, and corned beef hash. She even said that they can give you samples so you can try it, which is awesome! We need up getting the corned beef hash, chicken fried steak, and biscuits and gravy...all of them were DELICIOUS! On top of that, the customer service here is on point which always brings me back no matter how the food is! Thank you Mr. Mamas, we will definitely be back the next time we're in town!!

HUlJHpDqQk7hG9exWY_Qgw.text: Very good restaurant. Service was great. Very busy but very accommodating. Orange juice very fresh. Top quality cinnamon rolls. Breakfast delivered quickly in spite of full house. Best in vegas

Fq6m5z4YgyfEi8AMtJ8wpw.text: Got here at around 9:15 am on Sunday morning, was told the wait is around 20 minutes, 10 minutes later my table is ready, I was going to order breakfast burrito but didn't see any reviews about breakfast burrito so I went for chicken fried steak, scrambled eggs and hash brown, the chicken fried steak is good, gravy is tasty, hash brown is VERY crispy, not the server's fault, she recommended home fries and she mentioned that the hash brown is being cooked on a flat top. Here's the MAIN reason why Yelp should add 1 more star in their rating system as an icing on the cake, because some businesses deserve it, this one definitely do, as I walked out of the restaurant, one of the worker cane out of nowhere and cut me off to hand me my jacket, THAT was huge for me, I wouldn't have noticed that I left my jacket there until probably later on the day when it gets cooler or even the next morning, that was VERY cool of him.

TWRltuvZ9HkRQ9g-_0XSKg.text: Excellent food, staff and price. Completely remote we had to take a cab as my son found this place online but worth it. Everything is so overrated on the strip. We will be back in Vegas after our road trip through the canyons and will have breakfast there again before heading to the airport Keep the good work!

JTcJHvXOQOkzXqivf6Lx6w.text: This place is good first for the customer service. How many times would you find a successful eat out business owner greeting you and holding your door?? This was my first time .... well the point I'm trying to make is customer service lingers goes longer than the exchange of dollars for food. That said the breakfast was fresh, tasted good  and staff was very warm as well. Definitely recommend you to check this place. I'd go back for sure if visiting Las Vegas again.

P1gUW_irwgce06OrhsBhvg.text: This place was the BOMB.COM. We were headed to IHOP for a quick breakfast before our hike & decided to look up nearby Breakfast Restaurants & this place had so many reviews so we decided to go. The owner Nick & not sure if Shawn is his son, but they were off the chain with INCREDIBLE Service.  I highly highly recommend this place if your ever in Vegas. About 10-mil3s from the strip.

ng3dfDdIm7RXiTluqV0G6g.text: Found Mr Mamas when looking for reasonable breakfast locations to eat on Yelp while in Vegas. My boyfriend and I decided to give it a try. The service was amazing. Every employee is so helpful and you could tell they took pride In where they worked. The food was delicious. Ate here twice during our stay. The California omelet was one of my favorites. My eggs were perfect. We would highly recommend.

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

-ZTe5AUNxbMS4aNFiMEfxA.text: I came here for breakfast the other day. This place is definitely a locals hotspot for breakfast.   As you walk in, the staff greet you and are all very friendly. The waitresses and waiters are all very attentive even on a busy morning like that one. This place definitely has that diner feel. I'm not in love with the setup, just a bunch of low sitting tables all spread out. No booths or dividing walls.   Food:  I ordered an egg white omelette with added chicken, avocado, and spinach with side of fruit. Omelette cooked perfectly. Great taste.  I also ordered a short stack of pancakes as well. The pancakes were fluffy and great taste. I have a big sweet tooth for breakfast - I didn't see much for options with their pancakes or French toast.   If this place had more sweet options, I would have given it a five. I should have ordered the cinnamon roll... Next time I come in I will.   Overall a great experience. I can see why locals come here for breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Egg white omelette with a short stack of pancakes

ZB8Q4_SugCicqv5RLofiiQ.text: Mr. Mammas and his staff are outstanding! Very quick service and a very clean place. I feel like I am eating at home. Fair prices comfortable temperature. The only bad part about this place is that we don't have it in Denver. It's a must to check this place out.

CyOtHRdrx9IPEbYve1Mg0g.text: I had the Mushroom Swiss burger with avocado, medium-rare. And it was outstanding. The owner was greeting every table, and the service was everything everyone said it was. I will definitely be back when I am on this part of town. Opa!!

iFhVecXQ9aaZt9_RYKtmGw.text: Hands down the best corned beef hash I've ever had!  Even more impressive is the team that works there. Ro helped us today was attentive and helpful!  I want to be sure that the managers there know that she is a tremendous asset to their restaurant and they're lucky to have her!

Hcsz9eJaTm5jKBZBrjMjVw.text: Very friendly atmosphere. Food was delicious. We love it! It was our first time eating there. We had to way around 10 minutes. I will recommend this restaurant 100%. Homemade type of food.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

RAXiL1fFIKW17C92GN8KgQ.text: Great breakfast place off the strip.  Tasty food and excellent service. I had the chicken fried steak and it was very tasty and filling. For the price the portion size was huge, I couldn't finish my food. The steak was crispy and the home fries were cooked and seasoned to perfection. The gravy on the steak is good, but as a personal preference, I don't care for gravy. If you want quality food and want to avoid the strip prices, come here. You won't regret it.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious. The chicken fried steak

V4u4cJye6reUCJoEusS-tw.text: This is my top breakfast spot in Las Vegas. The service is always good and Claudia our food server from day 1, always makes us feel like family. I have never had a bad meal here .  The only problem we have with this place is that it's so popular now, we can't get a table with out waiting a long time . I guess that's a good problem!

tYhylulCyQRLtF9PmVFq-g.text: I was looking for a new breakfast spot for my friends and I to try and I came across Mr. Mamas on yelp. I noticed they had great reviews on food and service so we decided to try this place. We arrive on Sunday in the afternoon and it was packed! Immediately I thought this was a good sign :) the hostess told us it would be a 45 min wait. I was in no hurry so I wasn't too worried about waiting. They were on point about wait times because after 45 mins we did get our table. As mentioned on other reviews, food and service was great! Just be aware that there may be some wait times.. it seems long but it's worth it!

1RnAdSeoWFrOSH4WY-GgpQ.text: Went to Vegas for the weekend my sisters and I wanted a breakfast that didn't have to do with a buffet or in hotels. So first time going to Mr Mamas and it's was great!!! The service from everyone was awesome. Our waitress was Jenna and more then helpful and kind. The food was excellent, we all were very satisfied. Ever in town again I will definitely go again or recommend!

YZl8FOSoK1jFSUzwIA7Bkg.text: If you're a brekkie person then you have to make an effort eat here.   The owner Nick is such a personal guy, he has such interesting Greek family history and told us how the restaurant got its name. You have to loved a guy who comes to your table to thank you for coming to eat at his restaurant, really makes you feel at home and welcome.   Ordered the Chicken Fried Steak with their homemade sausage gravy and a biscuit instead of toast. You have to bring a good appetite to polish off this order. Great gravy with a little kick, the Chicken Fried Steak was crispy on the outside, perfectly cooked on the inside.  I finally can take Mr. Mama's off my LV Bookmark Brekkie list,I'm happy that I drove all the way here. Hey you have to support local businesses that have this kind of passion.   Mr. Mama's is located in the Spanish Palms Plaza on S.Jones Blvd between W.Hacienda Ave. and W.Russell Rd.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nick&#39;s Dad first one on the Left
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Biscuits, delish!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak with Homemade Sausage Gravy

3a_04yZK1s9wDl7dwjwlfQ.text: Off the beaten path and a few miles from the strip, Mr. Mama's is inconspicuously nestled in the middle of a small strip mall and hidden from the roving eye of those who choose to inhabit the multimillion dollar name brand food giants dotting Las Vegas Boulevard.  Although the wait time (@ 11:30 on a Sunday morning) was 45 minutes, the casual, easygoing atmosphere, superb service and delectable menu items laid to rest the original apprehension to bolt for a less crowded establishment - this place definitely optimizes the term "all good things to those who wait."  Our eight strong and very hungry party was completely satisfied with the service, food choices and tastiness of the food! Yes, Mr. Mama's serves mainly breakfast and brunch items, but everyone was thoroughly satiated with the gratifying bill of fare.   Wade your way through the local populace, place your name on the wait list and be prepared to indulge in a tiny slice of breakfast and brunch heaven. If you are not already on this list, you are definitely missing out!

D0q4Hfsb0TtWKYfZuCLHRQ.text: This is a great little place that specializes in breakfast and lunch. My best friend brought me here one morning after a long night out on the strip. We both ordered omelettes, hashbrowns, toast and my friend ordered an extra side of biscuits and gravy with his. The only downside is that we didn't care for their country gravy, it was really plain and dry tasting, unfortunately. Otherwise the food was delicious! My chili omelette was really good! The chili was perfect, not too spicy, served fresh and it had a delicious taste to it. The hashbrowns were amazing, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The sourdough toast was big, soft & fluffy. The coffee was hot, fresh and good---i enjoyed mine with some French vanilla creamer and sugar. Yum! The staff and service was fast, friendly and awesome. Our wait time for food was just about 10 minutes total. Finally, the prices are very reasonable. In my opinion, it was well worth the $12 Uber ride from the strip to receive a quality breakfast and reasonably priced breakfast. On the strip you'll pay $5 just for a single cup of coffee! I will definitely be back again in the future!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Biscuits and gravy
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zflMjDukYxeX-_-awP16uA.text: Fast service and wonderful, diner-style breakfast. Highly recommended!

tqwsS6bIqTaBI2K4fxx6iQ.text: Amazing restaurant! Highly recommend!  The service is great starting from the host, to the servers, all the way to the cooks. Our server, Alex, was great and super helpful. We came hungry and left satisfied! My family and I were in town for the weekend and we had never been here before but glad that we found this place! The pancakes are huge and the French toast are delicious. You won't regret coming here! It was packed with plenty other satisfied customers. They said the wait was 25 minutes or so and we were inside in less than 15, definitely worth the wait!

2L89jGLPl2wZbfCjb8TFmQ.text: The chicken fried steak's exterior had a nice crunch and had a medium texture throughout. The fried steak holds up without the gravy but...you owe it to yourself to taste  the gravy! The southern gravy has the goldilocks stick to your ribs thickness, a hint of sweetness and generous chunks of sausage.  Hash browns cooked with butter (I presume), 3 eggs and a flakey biscuit really rounded out the meal.  The servers were attentive and the food was delivered quickly.  Crowds generate here so be prepared to wait. Ask yourself what good place have you eaten at without a wait?

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak, eggs, and hash brown

s_X25GrGnNZT1enMJF5tUA.text: We knew this was going to be a good place to eat from the crowd outside. Waited for 30 minutes which wasn't bad. The owner was there and introduced himself which was very nice. But the food was really good. The kind of breakfast food that takes you back to America's favorite diners! We will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

xVGufTXxOdL5mi2aRdwXxA.text: Mr.Mamma himself greeted us as we waited for our table. Super honey spot. Great A+ service. We were witted within minutes on an early Saturday morning. The whole spot seems to be enjoying their food.

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

KGaJGjKLLndtFyohsPPaxQ.text: Came on a Saturday morning expecting a long wait time. We were told wait time would be about 30 minutes and we only waited about 15! Very casual breakfast vibe. Basic breakfast and lunch menu options but homemade flavors. Excellent customer service! Everything came out right, and fast! Will come back and try the pancakes with hopes of bumping my review to 5 stars.   *May experience longer wait times with parties larger than 4

PY1NQMSGibzGxWl7bZOF3A.text: I love this place. Been here 3x and I've never left disappointed. They're vegan breakfast burrito was the 1st thing I tried & it was so yummy. Next I tried a special they had it was and omelet topped with avocado. Again, so yummy. The last time I went I tried their french toast. So freakin goood . It always packed and I don't mind because I know everyone wants some Mr Mamas. I recommend this place to everyone. The service is also great. The staff is awesome.

4OeU20sSO3uTPznV5bWMVg.text: I ordered: Food: Denver Omelette: got it w crispy has browns and chocolate pancake (plate sized). It was delicious!!! I had half of my omelette and half of pancake left over. I love breakfast foods!  $: super affordable and huge portions  Ambience: casual, feels like I'm at a friends place or relatives place   Staff: Super super super friendly and helpful!  You can tell they have a good work environment and great rapport with their customers and each other!   Next time I come back, I will be ordering the eggs Benedict and time after that I will get house hash, and then after that I will get the biscuits and gravy (they offer if you want to sample the gravy).   Thank you for a great experience!
