_WNUsUW0tBRWJxA5j7lDEQ.text: Love the place... great environment and clean the staff is very welcoming and friendly got my food super fast

AvFKAInRBrF0Ikh737A53g.text: Awesome servers who are all so kind and sweet, and very welcoming! We never ran out of water, coffee or diet Pepsi, and this place was super busy but still quick. The portions are absolutely giant! It's a smaller strip mall eatery, but very well worth it if you want to drive 10-15 minutes from the strip!! I highly recommend this place!! We will be back again for sure!

zdGy5FfwE7F5X28WNErb9A.text: Had brunch here Sun/15 Mar: - Great service. - Good Greek Omelette. - Bad home fries (few other guys in my group also found them unpalatable).

g7YHyzmajNKEuu0WBIn6hg.text: I come to LV 4-5 times a year from SoCal and am always on the lookout for new places to eat. Thanks to Yelp, I stumbled on this gem. The friendliness and service begins before you walk in the door. The owner (Nick) and staff were very accommodating and welcoming.  I got the distinct impression that people actually LIKE working there.  Now for the breakfast fare. I had the Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs like many Yelpers recommended and it did not disappoint.  No need for the steak knife as you can cut it with your fork.  My server (didn't catch her name ) offered a sample of the gravy before the breakfast order was sent to the kitchen; nice touch.  With countless options around town, this ranks right up there with Jamm's etc. I never made it to their old location, but this one seats almost double and there are no issues with parking and is quite family friendly.  ATTN: Out of towners! Buffets? Forget about it!   Get out and explore, you will thank yourself later, not to mention it is also easier on the wallet.  Nick: Thank you my friend, you earned a customer for life. (when I'm in town, that is!)  Enjoy...

NhbY1a3lXxBDxuLUt3964Q.text: Wow y'all, this place has both great food and super friendly Service. You have to try the homemade biscuits and gravy. Amazing!!!!! Run don't walk.

Vz7AwoM5Fs-6rgeuSPUtVw.text: Always my go to breakfast place when working in Vegas. Always friendly, busy in the weekends so plan accordingly, but still completely accommodating and pleasant. Food is always great and my custom order comes out perfectly every day. Well done bacon? Well they are one of the only places around that makes my bacon well done how I love it. You can rely on these guys to take care of you.

CY42PXWCUa_-uIc7XGUPJg.text: I've heard good reviews from co workers so I decided to give this place a try. I'm glad I did! They are very busy, waiting about 20 minutes to sit but it is breakfast rush hour. The menu is pretty simple, all of the classics. The food came out so quickly I was shocked. It was big portions, hot and tasty. They manager and waitress came to check on us multiple times. I'm so used to getting mediocre customer service that this was a shock to me! I highly recommend coming here.

AzVhG9HTpEepPGluU-gX4Q.text: Definitely the best breakfast place in town. Greeted when you first step in the restaurant to great customer service with the waitress. We had the biscuit and homemade gravy along with the Mamas Stack which were in good big portions and so delicious. Highly recommend.

mo3ieCxGiURlmmIt3RmlKg.text: Awesome great fantastic.  This place is a must try.  Staff are very attentive. Delicious food. My wife and I both left with a smile!

J-TLXiP9XFqT8MHlmNrO5Q.text: We can't get enough of Mr Mama's!   As Vegas LOCALS we eat here at least twice a week!  We take all our friends, visitors and business colleagues here.   Clean.   Affordable.  Great food.  Amazing service.   Plenty of FREE parking.  Easy access from the strip.   You will LOVE this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Clean and nice.

s2Y8ijpLW1awxP5t94TNBQ.text: I choose this place specifically from the Yelp reviews and was not disappointed. There was a small wait but only about 10 minutes. The staff was friendly and portion sizes where very large. The fresh OJ was delish! It was very affordable. I ate one of the wraps and my friend had the ginormous pancakes. I would definitely recommend. It is a diner set up so if you are looking for a hipster place, it is not where to go.

Eg8nSGpYSevlMZZVvKQ9Mg.text: If I'm in a laid back, chill kind of mood, I'm going to Mr. Mama's. Breakfast comfort food in a relaxed, unpretentious environment. The kind of place you need to be ready to eat though. The portions are HUGE. My must have at Mr. Mama's is the chicken fried steak. Did I mention the HUGE portions? Eggs scrambled over easy with extra sausage gravy, please. The service is just alright

mMxNc5KwmrBdbzGo4EIHYw.text: First off, service is great! Staff is friendly, management is very involved and everyone overall genuinely cares about your dining experience. The food tasted very good and the prices back up the experience you get here.

ouZ9JowuaDdrYDoQo7BQ6g.text: Clean facilities. A very professional and efficient staff. Taste of food was excellent, and priced very fairly.  I am a fan of this establishment. I like them for the taste of their food and prices, but I love them for the way they operate. Efficient and friendly - So simple, but so many other business fail miserably at this.

b4xjVabQUTGMwKVi_7HNUg.text: The food is good and the service is even better! The owner is SO NICE and personable. He goes around and checks on every table and makes sure everything is going well. He always has a smile on his face and is super welcoming and is sure to talk to everyone and help them out. It really makes the restaurant stand out!

nrVuOzIT6pbhPg6zl_rWWg.text: Five stars is not enough. We were in town visiting from Milwaukee and and pulled in to get breakfast quick at subway but decided to check this place out. The entire staff was extremely nice and helpful, and the food was outstanding. Seriously the best French Toast I've ever had.

z8GyFb0wcYExQsyBoI8tUw.text: Just finished breakfast! Amazing. Amazing. Amazing.  The food was spot on. The service was prompt and friendly. The new location is roomy and not far from the strip.   Best part... Mr. Mama stopped by and said hi to the table. As everyone has said.... He's the nicest guy you'll ever meet. I wouldn't come back to Vegas and not come here.   Definitely best breakfast in Las Vegas.

gTvqOzgqhYUwFXnBSHFHlg.text: We walked in at noon on a Thursday and the place was on fire and this is a slow day. Nick greets you at the door with a huge hello and prides himself on large portions of great food. I started with a cup of coffee to get a good feel. It was an awesome start! I ordered an egg white omelette with bacon avocado spinach and cheese. Guys shared chicken fried steak and eggs and mom had a cinnamon roll. The gravy made with sausage bacon and maple syrup delicious. A+ thank you Nick

DE3fH_b5royLn6UHn1dhiQ.text: Great food & Roneshia provided AMAZING service!!!  Ordered a side of peanut butter for the French toast....YUM!!!

zTGuL6n8PnP2Z8DizOgRWg.text: Get off the strip and come to Mr Mamas! Great food and great service. We even met Mr. Mama himself. I definitely recommend taking a break from the strip and coming to this place it's for sure worth the wait  times.

ePmoUcw2WnPaaBUOqPGxMw.text: Great service, incredible food, Friendly atmosphere. Also has a person who takes the best selfies. Great way to end our Vegas trip. Must visit! And I defiantly will return.

KdmjHfQyJW5Xz1wajrmGyg.text: This place is extremely affordable but come in BIG portions! The staff are so warm and welcoming too! Food is delicious! I don't usually like breakfast places but this one is better than egg works/IHOP etc! I love love this place 10/10 :)))

QqAzXIBhPsXlDpkJHAJE4A.text: Okay, so I've had this place bookmarked for months! I was able to finally come in on a Saturday morning. We arrived at around 9 or 10. We had to wait about 10 mins to be seated. They have TVs in there so that you're able to watch while you wait.   I ordered an omelette. I'm not sure what it was called but it had avocados on it lol. Maybe it was the California omelette? Something like that. It was delicious! Order their house potatoes because those were super good. It came with bread & I usually get wheat bread. I also ordered hot tea & I'm pretty sure it was just the Lipton kind. The only complaint that I have is that their water sucks... It's tap water & I can really taste it lol but I'm a drama queen when it comes to water so yeah.   The service is really good tho! The servers are really nice & will check up on you frequently!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Ly9FSs4wOiCoY-3TjSGnfQ.text: Service is incredibly good and the personnel attention to everyone in my Peru was exceptional.  Food quality was rally good.

zTVD7owNSUn94weNLLJu0g.text: We had a great breakfast here. The service was great and the food came out quick. Good prices compared to other restaurants in the area with similar style food.

lxs_LK1hgrZKeggvyNBVzQ.text: I absolutely love this place! Everything here is great, the food, the staff, the coffee, the selections, I mean EVERYTHING! Everyone here is so nice, funny and exceed all expectations. The food is amazing, I have yet to receive something I didn't like. Although I do not live in Vegas, how I wish I had a Mr. Mama's in southern California. I would be there all the time. The gravy is a must. Whether it be right on your entree or on the side, the maple syrup, bacon, sausage concoction is the best thing ever. The biscuits are freaking great, very buttery, not too dry. I'm a breakfast person so I have yet to order a lunch item, but I'm sure they do not disappoint. Expect a wait for greatness here. Party of 6 waited for about 40 minutes, but it was well worth it. LOVE MR. MAMAS!!

yDC5PObO-moEyqf3f1ohpA.text: Like the new location but it's still too small for the number of customers. They should have kept the old place open in addition to opening this place. 30 min wait. Great food for great price though.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. There still a long wait at the new bigger location.

bxqenNwcEJWrZvWNR650nQ.text: On our home from Vegas....stopped for a quick bite! Pancakes were delicious....but what stood out the most was the service! Everybody was wonderful! Very friendly and attentive! The hostest with the mostest Roe was amazing! Will definitely stop by again when we are here! Thanks!

MryEV7B38A-ERiA5oAdzVQ.text: Nothing short of outstanding.   The food is really good.   The service is excellent and the people who work there amazing.    4 of us are breakfast and I wouldn't come back to Vegas without taking a car service here for breakfast.   A little too far to walk but worthy of the trip.

WaB8AryCcYWhlKUzBsK7QA.text: We are visiting from out of town and googled a breakfast place. We decided on this one because of the good reviews. Our breakfast was delicious! I had a patty melt because it was almost 11. My sisters had biscuits and gravy and an omelet. everything was just so good, as was our waiter, Alex! I highly recommend this place to anyone wanting a delicious meal with comfy surroundings and excellent staff!

o97LG14dVVTW01f105WTsA.text: Ate here before leaving town. Amazing service from every employee, honest and helpful staff. Food was delicious and huge portions. Chicken fried steak, biscuits and gravy were the best. Highly recommend, so much better than the strip choices and the price is awesome!

xUpmMHmF9mFTyeYlBrp3nw.text: The breakfast burrito was good. It was very busy so we placed a to go order. Seems like a good place to go for breakfast.

J4Zpcbg0rxnm4BjgZgKzHQ.text: Loved it. The taste was excellent. Quantity was a lot. More than we could eat. We ordered Eggs Benedict, omlettes and pancakes. Eggs were well made. Hash browns with peppers and onions was delicious. Best I had. Wanted to add that the service was excellent.

0NtwsqaxLA9dyBcykTaRcw.text: Great family run restaurant!   We were on vacation and yelped for a place to eat breakfast. Mr. Mama's was at the top of the suggestions. This is a great place to dine. It's a family run restaurant so the customer service experience is great, they have a home-y feel to it.   Service and wait time was very fast and efficient.   We tried to biscuits and gravy which is amazing! Their homemade gravy is something else. You have to try it yourself!

mfxO4D_Ru5cSOpIsaVTleA.text: Wonderful owner and staff, very warm and welcoming. Food was amazing and made from scratch. You can tell the family takes pride in their restaurant. Lots of food for a decent price.

iHIiV0SE6Grhqu1HkM3Xjg.text: Having eaten enough for a bear's hibernation at Via Brasil the night before, we decided to hit an early breakfast with some out of town friends before their flight home.   I'm not generally a breakfast person and wasn't too hungry so two of us split a full stack of pancakes and neither of us walked out hungry. The other party both got steak and eggs and neither of them complained.   There's nothing too fancy or incredible on the menu, just your basics done well. The host was friendly. The prices were decent. The food came out hot, it was pretty good and the service was on point as well. I had to ask for butter three times and each time I got my butter pretty fast. If you're doing regular pancakes I like to place a ball of butter between each pancake and let it melt with the heat, then hit the syrup...yelp tip courtesy of my arteries.  The place was packed for us on a Saturday morning so if you are coming on a weekend, expect a short wait.

45rhwcD7M-JICLUARb8N7A.text: We love eating at Mr. Mamas when in Vegas... off the strip, you can share as the portions are a good size, price is great and food is AWESOME!!  We always share and order one or two things on the side. The owner was in and very down to earth and personable.  It is also not to far off the strip depending on where u are staying...

mOmwwDUa4kCyYomOojvT_A.text: Came here early in the morning on the way to Utah for a Zion trip.  Very nice location, service was great. Our server was very nice a polite, even offered to take our picture stating that his are the best.  Orders the mamas chicken fried steak with potatoes. It was pretty delicious and filling. Comes with potatoes, two eggs, and toast. All at an affordable price.

ol6SbIsqtzD1ZzToen5xEw.text: Home cooked meals at their finest.  Great service! Great prices! Portions run a bit big so bring your appetite.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs are the best!

yZboSHJHELgq1bUVQj5ucg.text: The perfect, classic breakfast spot. The owner was super friendly, awesome staff and solid dishes.

zdBYye6JDD6g20pVzncARQ.text: Absolutely delicious - traditional breakfast fare done very, very well!  Get the EGGS BENEDICT!  Such a simple dish but they put a lot of care into everything and you can taste the quality in the food.  I got eggs benedict w/ bacon, which was perfect.  The home fries w/ peppers and onions were delicious.  We also got pancakes, which were soooo fluffy and thick!   There's nothing fancy on the menu, just high-quality, delicious food.  Portions are huge!  The place was very busy when we got there but only had to wait about 5 minutes before being seated.  The service was outstanding, they were constantly refilling our coffee and water.  Very friendly and helpful!  Tried this place for the first time last Saturday morning for breakfast, it's a bit off the strip but well worth the short Uber ride.  Will definitely be back!!

tRNsYI6b6XzMU16UICccqA.text: Where do I began. The staff here is friendly and fast service, the owner is super nice and trying he's best to make you feel welcome. The food is very good, all very traditional American brunch nothing out of the ordinary but is well done and price is  very affordable. We will be coming back soon for more. They do not have a kids Menu but they will accommodate for your kids.

dgZ7SgjsYOHa6m7tqrbOLQ.text: If you are in the area this is a must stop.. we were very lucky to find this hidden gem. The food is amazing much better than the strip. I'm so glad that we went off the beaten path and found this place. Everyone in there was so sweet and kind you feel very welcomed as if you were having a bite to eat at grandmas house.. I loved this place kudos to the owners.. my pancakes were delicious!!! They employee were fabulous

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

T_ORbQVVeFxIYEJPr8_FKg.text: GREAT breakfast!  Service was quick and the food perfect. A nice diversion from hotel food.

oKLg3LB4ibpqBes6dcV51Q.text: This place was a bit of a wait but it was worth it. Enjoyed the food and great service. Would definitely go back again the next time I'm in Vegas.

9SFNNH7yusobzyqjHmljoQ.text: Looking for a breakfast/brunch place that was out of the normal (IHOP, Denny's, Coco's, Casino Cafe's, etc). A good friend told us about Mr. Mamas.  Upon arrival the crowds await! It being a Sunday & 4th of July weekend there was a wait. We made the choice to wait 35 minutes. I have to say it was worth the wait!  The staff was very friendly made us feel welcome & personable from the moment we walked in until the very end when we left. They all worked together helping each other out. A+. The server was very helpful she introduced the daily specials plus the popular items. The menu has quite the variety to choose from. Started off with a Cinnamon Roll that we all shared. That was good! A nice starter.  I ordered the Mamas Chicken Fried Steak with that O so Yummy Country Gravy, over hard eggs & home fries with sourdough toast! I enjoyed my meal very much. Didn't want it to end.  My friends ordered Mamas stack (bacon & eggs), homemade pancakes, Mamas Burger with onion rings & Greek Omelette. They all enjoyed their meals & were very happy.  I will soon be back. Definitely a must try. They get pretty busy but it's surely worth the wait.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Daily Special located outside - Cute thing to showcase the special of the Day.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This is a sweet sign outside to see as you leave the restaurant.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Highly recommended! We are here @ Mr. Mamas!

HMI6b58EwrPFKtk_7-bt-A.text: Their biscuits and gravy were delicious. I went here on my way to the red rock canyon and happy I did. They had great prices, portions, and service.

sHcLv9CGf0q4PLmiILgFJQ.text: Let me start by saying that the service here was fantastic. Every staff member goes out of their way to make you feel welcome and that they appreciate your business. We came here the day after a long night out with hangovers. The breakfast (eaten more at lunchtime) was just what we needed. We got french toast, a build-your-own omelette, and started with a bowl of beef vegetable soup (weird I know but I wanted something substantial in my tummy fast) plus coffee and soda. The omelette was great -  we ordered it with ham and mushrooms plus fresh slices of avocado on top - it wasn't greasy like you often get at diners, so I was happy. The french toast was just ok - bread tasted not so fresh. Home fries that came with the omelette were ok, but not as crisp or as seasoned as we like. Beef vegetable soup had great flavor and tasted like something my mom would make (that's a good thing). In short, I'd give the service a five star and the food a three star - so I rounded it to an overall 4 star.

xhWzkl4Lz0F-RgSYmEFsUQ.text: This place is at a new location now but is just as great as before but with more seating! If you need a meal recommendation try the chicken fried steak and eggs - the gravy is different than anywhere I have ever had and is to die for!

They are doing something right at this place, everyone is super friendly and make you feel very welcome. There was a little bit of wait on a Wednesday but it was well worth it. I had the chicken fried steak breakfast and it was very good. Our son in law said that was the best gravy he had ever had. Very reasonably priced also.

8_pir7SsYi-M62Pz_Z7SAQ.text: We came to Vegas for a quick getaway and my husband stumbled upon this place. The people are very friendly and helpful. Our server was Roneshia and she gave excellent service even gave me some of their homemade Chile verde sauce was amazing and was made fresh today!! Definitely recommend this place.

ExmpDvLGC18vKtqiDgnTMQ.text: Yes. As good as it gets... for diner food.   This was my first venture here ever and it happened to be for my birthday brunch. My girlfriend chose it randomly and I'm glad she did, I mean a free cinnamon roll for birthday celebrators? Awesome!   The cinnamon roll was ridiculous; the roll itself was insanely soft and melted in your mouth. The frosting was plentiful, but didn't overpower the cinnamon swirls. Truly a homemade dessert done right!   My girlfriend and I shared breakfast; a California egg white omelets and a side of biscuits and gravy. The omelet was delicious, fluffy eggs and all the fixing's; Cheddar Jack Cheese, sausage, pico de gallo, sour cream, topped with avocado. This dish was huge and a perfect meal for sharing.   The biscuits were, light, fluffy, and coated in a amazing white gravy. I would probably pour this gravy on pizza if I weren't afraid for my heart stopping shortly after. Ham, sausage, and maple syrup are the ingredients in the thick concoction and you definitely get every flavor in each bite, savory and salty. Amazing combo!   There service here is stellar and my coffee cup was never empty. Mr. Mama, you have my heart.

jucEtKYOmuJr1BtK1xdzqw.text: This is (literally) probably the best restaurant I've ever been to. The service is great & the food is even better. The owner took time to chat with us, such a genuine person. I came across this place on Yelp & I'm glad we decided to eat here before going back home to California. Definitely recommend eating here. & if you're not from the area, stop by before heading home.  The service and food deserve the 5 stars.

OoTvOR0-ykFZmEhXogqQGg.text: My last review for the Decatur location I gave these guys 5 stars. I was ecstatic when they moved to this location for it is about twice the size and the parking is more than plentiful. If there was a candidate for 6 stars this would be the place! Because if the old location is as good as it gets then this new location just made it even better!  Now as we made our way in the first time one sunday morning, there were people waiting to be seated. I asked what the wait time was and they said about 10 minutes. THEY LIED! But in a good way. After about 5 minutes we were seated with menus in hand.   I was kind of afraid that with the bigger size of the place that the great service that we have come to expect might have gone downhill a bit. Im happy to report that they are chugging right along! Service was spectacular! Like they never left the old location! What I love about the service is that they always seem to have plenty of servers running around. Not only do you have your main server, but other servers help out as well whether its picking up your empty plates, refills, or bringing out your order as soon as its done.  As for the food, if you refer to my last review it is still the same. These guys are mainly a breakfast place but you do have other options as well like burgers, sandwiches, wraps, subs, salads, etc. If you are really hungry I have to mention the Mama's Burger ($11.95). Two half pound beef patties, cheese, bacon, mushrooms, avocado and an onion ring. I thought I was really hungry when I ordered this but I was so wrong. It's basically like eating two burgers. Might as well cut it in half and share!  For you omelet lovers, I highly recommend getting the Cali Omelet ($8.50). It has cheddar jack cheese, sausage, pico de gallo, sour cream, and then topped with avocado. We always have them add bacon to it because bacon makes anything better. This meal comes complete with your choice of home fries or hash browns. I usually get hash browns for they cook it so crispy. You also get your choice of toast from sourdough, white, or wheat. I always get sourdough and they automatically butter it for you.  Some useful info. They used to have a 15 for 30 dollar Yelp deal but I did not see it last time we went but if it comes back you definitely want to take full advantage of it. What took its place is a free beverage with the purchase of an entree with check in. Their business hours are Monday thru Friday 6 am to 3 pm. Saturday and Sunday 7 am to 2 pm.   In closing, the drive is worth the trip here and you are not too far away from the strip. It's definitely a nice change of pace from those marked up so called fancy places.  Yelp 2015 Review #38 "Mr Mama got that good stuff!" 537 overall

I would Def recommend this place and advice you its worth waiting a few minutes for table.

8xyxOJQ5J73poODjIkZBfw.text: Hubby had steak and eggs that we delicious!!! Best has browns I've had!! Staff was ridiculously friendly checked on us often and went above and beyond! Will definitely be back!

2Sm30XXvapxNy6qZj18xLQ.text: Mr. Mama* himself will probably greet you as soon as you set foot in his restaurant. Everyone's friendly here and you'll feel right at home at this lunch and breakfast joint.   *not sure if the man greeting you is actually Mr Mama

Qv2wE3XH6nmJgblPa3w4sw.text: We stopped here after reading the reviews and it does not disappoint. Though they are known for their chicken and gravy (maybe some other specialties?) we just wanted some simple breakfast. Buttermilk pancakes huge and very good. Simple eggs. Bacon. Sausage. All standard and good. Wouldn't say they are better than any other good breakfast joint. Kind of divey. Open floor-table seating.  Feels like a cafeteria. Quick service. Super friendly staff. I think there is always a wait. Because of its popularity. So give yourself some time.  Wouldn't call it great and wouldn't  go out of my way to go back. It was all around good.

uhyIrU55A3YN8LqQVDBNBg.text: Amazing service or amazing food?  What brings people back and inspires diners to share a restaurant tip with friends and complete strangers?  It's the service.  Sure, the food has to be good, but it's the hospitality that will bring people back time and again.  Mr. Momas is amazing.  The attention to detail emanates from the owner to the staff and, ultimately, to the dining experience.  We felt welcomed from the moment we entered until the moment we left.    With that said, I am happy we will be in town  for a couple of more days so we can go back!!

fJzBXYGL-tfmD47XjEMhag.text: Really well priced good food...you may want to call for a reservation as it was a 20 minute wait when we got there.  Coffee was good and strong and the omelettes where huge 4 eggs that included hash browns and toast.

ZfJd2KAony3bPdI9POp41g.text: I've been here twice now for breakfast. Portions are huge and affordable. It's always packed. Staff is always nice.

BV0wxD5EtGfaMlJ4rZeipA.text: Good food, I had biscuits and gravy. I love when the biscuits are grilled.  Bobby had a Denver omelet and hash browns cooked nice and crispy like he likes them.

sj-OYNrMZFumY7Zrh6cLYg.text: Tired of the sticker shock and plethora of food on the strip, decided to go local.  Restaurant is a bit off strip, but ABSOLUTELY WORTH IT!!  Short story: large portions and fabulous food!   The deets: The food was excellent! Nice large cuts of bacon cooked to crunchy perfection. I had eggs over medium and BF had over easy-both cooked exactly as asked. Pancakes the size of the plate and delicious. Side of home fries were great-crunchy outside and soft insides-salivating just thinking about it.   Did a to-go order for lunch and WOW! Ordered mamma's sandwich with a side salad and it fed both of us.   Service was friendly and unpretentious. Restaurant has a homey feeling-nice after the glitz and hangover feeling of the strip.   Will visit again when we return.

Y9Yre3iwSpDdoO43DOR9Lw.text: Amazing.  We accidentally went to the old location on Decatur but quickly found the right one.  All the staff was so darn friendly.  I had the cinnamon bun and biscuits & gravy.  The gravy was good...but kinda weird...the sausage was pink!  It was cooked but it was pink.  Husband got Jenna's wrap and really liked it.  I think the manager came over and asked us how our meal was.  So friendly and food was good...not too expensive.  I'd go back here.

FWLQMsyA7vv-Xx7URcbdcQ.text: It was our first time here, hoping to get our 6 year old and 3 year old fed some good breakfast before we start our day. Went in and it was busy, my husband asked 1 of 3 ladies standing at the front register how long the wait was, 20 minutes, not too long. The customers who were there before us got seated. As we waited another customer, by himself, came in, put his name in and got seated at a 4 top before us in less that 3 minutes!!!!  Whaaattt?!?! And mind you, that table was open prior to him coming in. Why would seat a single customer before a family with 2 young children, who was there first?!?!  As we walked out, the employee that took our name asked us to please return cause they have a table ready for us in the CORNER!!! REALLY LADY?!?

KMcQN3yzfWLDUXQooziuPg.text: I decide to try this place out because of their rating and was not disappointed! Even though the restaurant was very busy I was served with in ten minutes of being seated. The food was delicious and the entire staff worked together fluidly to make sure that the patrons where taken care of. Will definitely be visiting Mr. Mamas again in the near future!

CkfjKZo_-TQP8y8KSsiOrA.text: Awesome service, all the waiters are super friendly and quicl turnaround time,it is worth the wait,

oLwat5p6TbYDUIYHLEGtuw.text: Ate Here for the first time from long beach california and it is the best friendly breakfast place we've ever been to!!! I wish we had nice places like this in california. The owner and waitresses are the best!!!! The food is fantastic. Chicken fried steak and pancakes are huge!!!! And very tasty!!!! I would definitely look forward to coming back everytime we visit vegas. Looking forward to move here soon as well.....

PSxbwUr_Nn21J7to1cmH6A.text: Great breakfast/brunch place with a nice family feel. We make a point of coming here on our annual trip to Vegas, and the hostess remembered us from our last visit a year ago!  The owner checks in on food quality & making sure everything is ok with your meal. The new location feels more spacious and makes for easier grouping of tables for groups of 6-8.  Menu has a fair amount of variety, but not so much that it's overwhelming. They're pretty good with special requests too.  Portion sizes are just right. If you're still hungry, get a cinnamon roll to go.

FgwbiuehX7h4WH5gLd-EpA.text: Came to this place based on yelp reviews.... Yelp never lets you down!  First, the service was amazing..... We got there and even though it was very busy we were greeted at the door by the owner Nick and seated within 10 minutes.  The breakfast was prepared perfectly!   Scrambled eggs, home fries and bacon!  I had to try the pancakes that everyone raves about and they did  not disappoint... Fluffy and very big!  I am going to come back for lunch!  The owner is very proud of his business and should be.  He treats everyone kindly and makes sure that they have a wonderful experience.

6C4BFccVI56yLZD3M2oWnQ.text: This is by far the best traditional breakfast spot in the valley.  If your looking for a real good homemade breakfast - well look no further. First off the Staff here are courteous and friendly. The owner here couldn't be anymore welcoming. He treats every customer as if your family - he has a warm appreciated attitude. Anytime I have family and friends come from out of town I send them directly to Mr. Mamas for breakfast.  I have been coming here for years and they have yet to disappoint :)

BobvEYGtQtz-z9UsGDJFSg.text: Just ate here this morning at the new location. One of the best breakfasts we've had here in Vegas and definitely the best value!  The sausage gravy biscuits were great and the Cali omelette was very good. Our service was very friendly, quick and welcoming.   Don't forget to ask for a cinnamon bun! Delicious and perfect with a cup of coffee.

uzAOMpWoAG-iB3vhSRTPDg.text: Service is perfection! EVERYONE is so welcoming from the moment you walk thru the door!   The food was so tasty I got the Greek omelette and my boyfriend got the chicken fried steak and eggs YUMMY!!! we also got the French toast, best French toast EVER!   The owner was so nice he personally greeted everyone at their tables and since we were in town for the week he gave us some suggestions on where to go for dinner and drinks.   This is our new breakfast spot in Las Vegas! What a great experience thank you Mr. Mamas every restaurant needs to come here and take notes on how to run their business.

8iQJcoH5jWhP0XrGT_zjzA.text: Just visited yesterday. It was a group of 6. We were told it would be a 40 minute wait but we only waited about 20 minutes. I ordered a Cali omelet. And it was sooo delicious. The price was very inexpensive. Service was also great. I will be back next time we come to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Deliciousness!!!

-DyPgd0QXmswxnPqScT2nw.text: Me and my boyfriend love to come here! The food is great and the staff is very personable!  Can't say enough good things about this great family restaurant. Sometimes we wish they were open for dinner!

6Nk2_mKfHrm1d9E8vd2fVw.text: The service was friendly and the food was good. If you are in the area it is a fine place to stop but not worth making a special trip to visit.

KEurXMBEhhYLQPMpdgdkLg.text: Everything was perfect! I ordered the Spanish omelette and my boyfriend the Steak and eggs, both dishes were very tasty. Can't wait to come back and try the famous cinnamon roll!!!

RK2v3F1lrYsmznxhZs56_A.text: Without a doubt, our favorite breakfast spot in LV. Can't be any better. New location is awesome. Lots more space and the same great prices. Nick (Mr. Mama) is a gem. California Omelette still leads the way here

jlD0JEX-yRYbeYyFHHKKCQ.text: I have only given a few five stars, ever, and this small, off the strip restaurant is great.  First, be prepared for the owner to meet you at the door and welcome you, get you seated, and share a story or two if you are interested.  While in Vegas for three days I had breakfast here twice and both times the quality of service and food was excellent.  This is excellent prepared home cooking, in a clean well managed restaurant.  Generous portions, fast and friendly service and it seemed like everyone working there was upbeat, friendly and efficient.  The prices I felt were reasonable based on the quality and quantity of the food.  If you want to experience some local (outside the casino) good food in a great atmosphere go have breakfast at Mr Mamas, you will not be disappointed.

KQw5rNqeG72Tt2J80GnzLw.text: It was just as good as before. I love the teamwork of the staff. Everybody is on it and you get whatever you need asap.

sF2LK8DE6CzM6C04o6eP2A.text: First time here a couple of weeks ago , my husband and I go out to eat quite often we were kind of getting tired of the same old spots I googled and this place came up, it was very good, kind of a long wait but the waitress stopped by our table and said they had a mix up in the kitchen fine no big deal we understand but overall cute place the food was good and very  friendly staff  we might be back who knows. So many spots to try its endless here

cUvGnKZJdaSIMT_UCHLP1w.text: Bobby Flay, watch out! These people make omelets that will rival any chef. From the initial greeting to an always smiling waitstaff I am always made to feel welcome.   Mr Mama said to me"I consider my only competition to be my four walls. If I take care of people inside, they'll want to return."  He's so right. I've been here three days in a row.

go683piT0TTJIEHStuZViQ.text: It's always good. They use very fresh ingredients. Big fan of the omelets, the tuna, and the salads. The beef soup is not too great, but it might be me. Only suggestion I have is that they need to strip and wax their tile floors, they look dirty. I only notice because I used to do that type of work about 20 years ago so I always look at floors now.

FEePMi-NfFz-qtHI8XDTFg.text: Good breakfast and nice service. But not a very family friendly atmosphere. We usually go to Black Bear Diner for breakfast, but decided to try this place based off the reviews. Much prefer the atmosphere at Black Bear, as well as the fresh squeezed orange juice and sweet cream pancakes. My husband usually gets lunch, and he said Mr. Mamas has a better Rueben thank Black Bear, but still not as good as Goodwhich. Good, but not great. We will be sticking with Blackbear, as nothing particularly stands out here.

jH65kZHVwoedCVsXrVbU4A.text: Legit spot!! If you're in Vegas and don't mind driving the 5 minute away from the strip, this is the spot to go to. The greeter was cool and very helpful/informative. Our waitress Jazmine, was very attentive to our table! Give this place a shot, I'm so glad I did!

Dm-wrPkHaC9ll5BglfXC0g.text: Excellent service!  The Spanish Omelet is so delicious!  We were welcomed by Shawn!  He is so nice!  He also took a an awesome picture of our table!  Our waitress Lourdes is the best!!  Delicious food and excellent service!  Will definitely come back again!!  Thanks again Shawn!

UTFqFiy_Mq3RAOcFqnoYLw.text: If you're looking for excellent service, great home style cooking and reasonable prices check out Mr Mama's. My Husby and I have made Sunday brrakfast here a weekly tradition and we are always greeted by the owner with a big smile. The food is consistent and delicious. Go check it out and try the biscuits and grace and the onion rings!

ZFUxm2DiOsvx_bz9SiqBmQ.text: The cornbeef hash was great! Servings were just right. The wait time on a Sunday seem to be pretty long, so get there early! Good service overall.

_k-gBCbC45mEpy5yg7HHmQ.text: Love this place! My family and I went a Group of 10, they were so accommodating and friendly. Mr. Momma was so nice and very attentive since we had to wait about 30 minutes for a table large enough for our group! Loved it and highly encourage it! Portions are pretty large, so you can share!

tvu7jaF7utaxVX6UDl7vpg.text: Found this place the first week I moved here from CA.I was greeted by owner Nick,who instantly treated me as family.The food is simple,fresh American fare.It is done to perfection!All the girls who work there,care you stopped by.There are lots of place here in LV..but none like this.From Daughter,Jenna to Abby,Julie, you are taken care of,something lacking nowadays at other places.Having eaten there breakfast and lunch,I can find no fault.They are attentive,but do not rush you out.Nick,floats around and really talks with everyone!I love this place.Please try it,you will love it as I do!

WAtXDCysFaYnzun4MTCOjQ.text: Decided to try here with the good reviews.  Sunday morning and the place was hopping.  Forty minute wait to get a table.  Lenore, our waitress was marvelous, great service with a smile.  I had the ham steak and eggs, food was delicious and as ordered but I guess I'm spoiled with the casino food, the ham was about three ounces with no bone and priced at over ten dollars.  My wife had eggs Benedict with sausage.  The sausage was good, but the eggs were over cooked and had to be sent back.  On their return the yolks were still hard, seems poaching eggs was not working today.  Also the hollindaise sauce was bland, bland, bland!

6SbJT5Z-tictKlpMI0B21w.text: Pleasantly surprised! The staff is beyond friendly, making great recommendations. You can tell this isn't a place that skimps by their heavy silverware and generous portions. Even their bacon is thick and some of the best I've had in years. Hats off to Mr. Mamas!

yLE8Rxswj8WSQVzq-3iSRg.text: Excellent standard breakfast fare. They have short order cooks & attentive wait staff. Food was fresh & not over greased. It's not a fancy establishment, but it gets the job done at the right price.

IZVC19aNxqB4eREl8fqpzA.text: Came here for the first time & the food was really good! Other than waiting to order because our server was taking care of a larger party, the service was great! The owners & manager was on top of things & the manager came around and greeted us for small talk. I had the veggie omelet with toast and hash browns & that omelet was the best veggie omelet I've ever had!  It is a smaller restaurant, so I would assume that there will be a wait to be seated majority of the time because of its higher reviews. I would definitely recommend this place to others. The prices are affordable and the portions are hefty!

5cxsa60DWO6TId4b9qCfTA.text: Nice family atmosphere; food was really good and well priced. Server was excellent! Host was quite entertaining although he may wanna throttle back a tad.

G0umQ7o0J9g4IdYYHcY0lA.text: A bunch of nothing. Let me first start by saying I am not easily impressed and being from the south when I hear Mama I immediately think "Big Mama." This wasn't Big Mama or her sister. They offered decent portion sizes at a reasonable price. I had steak, eggs, and shredded hashbrowns. But, to me it left a lot to be desired. My steak had a bland taste to it (Big Mama wasn't in the kitchen), the eggs were nothing special and they slapped a slice of cheese on my shredded hashbrowns. I also had one of their famous cinnamon rolls....dough with frosting and cinnamon (lots of cinnamon).  All of that said, my crew was satisfied. They had pancakes and enjoyed them.  The owner was extremely nice. If I judged the restaurant on hospitality alone, I'd give them five plus. Top notch customer service, I just expected more flavor.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MXFj5JMvh5tf1aZC6ielFg.text: Stopped in for lunch just now, ordered The Manhattan Burger, a bacon cheeseburger on toasted sourdough. The burger was cooked perfectly, the atmosphere was fantastic, Kat was a great host. The restaurant was full the whole time and people kept coming in the whole time we were there. Our lunch was cooked perfectly and delivered in no time, I would recommend checking out Mr. Mama's for your dining pleasure. And tell em Slim sent ya.

T3s3CBOAVVI1rk0rl3sKIg.text: Mr. Mamas used to be my go-to place always had good breakfast the last few times I've been in there the breakfast was terrible I ordered just a basic breakfast two eggs over medium bacon hash browns and toast and they don't understand that black people we know when we getting cheap ass food I know for a fact when the eggs yolk is light yellow that's a cheap egg when the egg yolk is yellow you getting a decent egg so I know I'm getting a cheap ass food I would never come back to this place again I asked for hash browns it was soaking in grease and undercook ever since the dad who owns the place is no longer there the service of the food went downhill don't waste your hardworking money to come and eat this type of food you can be better off eating at McDonald's.

npVyrV77Hb3ZpRxvcCBkHQ.text: Stopped by based upon the reviews, and was not disappointed.   The owner greeted all of the guests in the waiting area, then checked up on all of us during our meal.  Service was a throwback to a kinder day.  The food was great.  Zero complaints, and we'd visit again in a heartbeat.  As others have stated, it's a popular place... so a wait may be necessary to get seated... but it's worth it.  Prices are very reasonable as well.

p20iJe4LainY8tRKaIiTfw.text: I had a great experience at Mr. Mamas! The service was outstanding. Roneshia and Alex were professional, knowledgeable, and extremely courteous. I appreciated Mr. Mama (Nick) stopping at our table to introduce himself and to provide assistance as needed. Next time that I am in Vegas, I will definitely come back to Mr. Mamas!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hot Chocolate
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Biscuit with Gravy
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon Roll

CfaplGgzE4vzrnWjYoLjpw.text: This place is AWESOME.... come with plenty of time as it gets PACKED!... and how could it not be, their food is so tasty! Their service is one of the best we have ever received! The owner makes his rounds and talks to every customer...h makes you feel very appreciated for choosing his restaurant.  They have great specials during the weekends an if you ever have a chance of trying their fried French toast you will not be disappointed!!!

Wi5Tz8UwXtwHklJ5XQPExg.text: Perfect simple breakfast. We came here straight from the airport about 10am. There was a 30 minute wait for 2. The service was extremely friendly. They let us put our luggage behind the counter for safe keeping. I had the egg sandwich on Texas toast with tator tots and my husband had the Greek wrap. My egg sandwich was sooo delicious. It didn't have fancy and spectacular ingredients. But it was expertly prepared. The bread, the eggs, the cheese, all melted together and in my mouth. My husband loved his Greek wrap as well. And the tator tots were some of the best I've ever had. If you're looking for a cheap breakfast that is sure to be delicious, this is the place.

uUiiLgUgHhcc-6neipg6hw.text: Service: Excellent Food: amazing!!! Had the chicken fried steak, OMG!!! Is as best as I can describe it. Perfectly cooked meat and eggs, I wanted to have a side of French toast but no way, too much food on that plate.  Ambiance: clean and organized even though there seemed to be 1,000 people in there.  MUST TRY!!!

Ugcupa37rN0EQorNpiiHjA.text: Wanted breakfast where locals hangout. Found this gem off Yelp. They stayed wait was 15 to 30, got a seat 10 min. Food was excellent, service was perfect. Reminded me of the cheers TV show, manager cam by to make sure food was perfect. Jenna was the best server. I tend not do Kudos , but this is the best place I've had breakfast in long, long time. Recommend big parties and breakfast wothe fam.

gGJ3jOjisc8wSgfnuRAycw.text: Went to this place for the first time with my husband. Place was clean. Service staff was nice and efficient. Food came out in a timely matter. Servers here use a tablet to put in orders so food orders are shot to the kitchen as soon as you order for faster wait times. I personally had the corn beef. Personally.. This dish was good.. But I've had better. The potatoes were amazing! Still worth 4 stars. Husband had the country fried steak and had absolutely no complaints. Coffee was however plain coffee.. Nothing special. Overall, this place is a must go for breakfast. They are fast and very affordable for the amount of you get. Definitely will return.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corn beef
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Country fried steak

tosmHXvdn2CJ_gByMB1qVg.text: There was already a wait when we got to this restaurant in a strip mall around 930 Friday morning. It is obviously a local favorite. The menu offers lots of choices at reasonable prices. Our server Jose was quick and attentive. Portions are large and the food is delicious.  The pancakes which are large, fluffy, light with fruit filling and topped with freshly picked strawberries were very good. Ditto the French toast with eggs and sausage. The veggie omelet was made with lots of vegetables. My ribeye steak (tender and well seasoned) and eggs was also very satisfying. It was a wonderful breakfast for all.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pcjuEHjvtIIkVHNsiJUqBg.text: When you go there you are automatically greeted by everyone, a lot of men seating you, serving you beverages and also taking your orders. I love it...food was good, but what made the whe experience great was the atmosphere and the friendliness of the staff. We met one of the owners as we exited , he held the door open for us, he told us a little bit of history about himself too.  I definitely will be coming back whenever I'm in town

2f0GOgTIwlPU9Md8-VkCVQ.text: When in Vegas I love finding new places to try for breakfast. As I yelped search for breakfast places I found Mr. Mamas with nice reviews and a lot of raving reviews for their top selling Chicken Fried Steak. I like to consider myself as a CFS connoisseur so before even looking at the menu, I knew what I was ordering.   Hospitality and friendliness of staff is a five star rating, but unfortunately I can't base it only on that. My wife ordered steak and eggs and I , the chicken fried steak. I was not completely wow'd by the food, but it was still worth the four stars. I feel the steak was a bit too thin and the CFS a bit bland, but the country gravy with bacon, sausage, and maple syrup adds to the flavor of the CFS. The portions are of good proportions.   To locals, I recommend this place but they do get busy. To the tourists, I say come here instead of the mediocre breakfast buffets where your food sits in food steamers. You will get full and you'll spend less.   To Mr. mamas, keep up your excellent practice of interacting with your patrons, because even high end restaurants lack in getting personal with their guests.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. CFS (Chicken Fried Steak)
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and Eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Side Orders/ Beverages

7BFs9bgsx5_ikSGrjV7ebw.text: If you need some cheering-up in your life with a side of good breakfast food, Mr. Mamas is the place to go. I can't even think of a time where the positive demeanor of a restaurant staff raised my spirits up. Everybody is very friendly here, especially the owner. It's something you don't experience in a lot of establishments these days.   I would say the food here is an extension of that family oriented nature of this place. I ordered the simple stuff. Two eggs, scrambled, with a side of home fries, and wheat toast. All of it was a taste of comfort.   The scrambled eggs and home fries were nicely seasoned, so it didn't even require any condiments to to be added. And I love butter on my toast. They spread the perfect amount of it here.  Even with such a simple plate, the portions were generous and left me full and satisfied. I'll surely be back whenever I'm in the mood to go out to get some home-style breakfast food!

F0LIRp9FRtlT3Gz_omG2wg.text: Food is hot, fresh, delicious, & served quickly. There were no servers standing around chit chatting. Everyone worked continuously to ensure that there was no waiting. The service was fast & super friendly. The reviews are True. This is our new fave breakfast spot!

nhds8CrfF21pib0TlG3Zbw.text: Wait appeared long but they still got us in quickly on a Sunday morning.  All food was delicious. We will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon roll.  Had to fight the kid off to eat it lol

0vA-loz90IoLapk5PM7nNA.text: No lie, this place was a dining experience!  This place is fantastic!  I went in expecting very little and what I left with was a full belly and a happy smile.  These guys made good food and have EXCEPTIONAL service.  We will be back every time we are in Las Vegas  Atmosphere is that of a busy diner.  Food is delicious without being pretentious and expensive  Service is the best I have had in years

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Xmz-6hSe92K1SrUeciagqQ.text: Nothing short of delicious and filling! Big portion sizes but I fan easily finish 3 pancakes! The staff is very friendly and caring, Mr. Mama himself is very polite and always wants to make sure that you have the best experience in his restaurant! Thanks for all that you do and thank you for all of the amazing breakfast platters I've had with y'all!

DbSUa9VNLLpi4n6QM13Psw.text: Another amazing breakfast at Mr Mamas! Triple chocolate pancake special was awesome. As was the triple meat omelet!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned beef hash and eggs. Very nice!

-j8q8RqWnLx-sF2cC3EMpg.text: Excellent service and the food was great. Wasn't here long as we were in a hurry but you can easily see it's a well run restaurant.

GsEEXS5qUAEW4MDcdeXRbQ.text: This has become my favorite breakfast place. The staff, Alex especially, is so accommodating and friendly. The food is so flavorful, the best biscuits and gravy I have ever tasted and the restuarant itself is immaculate. Highly recommended!

WvwZVxxQubqc9_O_q4bfNQ.text: I'm from Virginia and came here because of the reviews.  Service was excellent and food was even better.  Staff was very friendly.   You can't go wrong here.

z0S_zVvT7U971dwz6OMU-g.text: A beautiful little restaurant with an interesting history behind it.  My waitress Denise was very nice and gave me a little story behind Mr. Mamas. It is Greek as well as its owner and the owner before.   I got their famous chicken fried steak with a side of onion and peppers. This is AWESOME! Denise gave me a sample of their gravy and it is to die for.  Free wifi, very clean, and the decor does look Greek. I thought it looked familiar. Fabulous place! I would like to come here everyday.   Oh and one of the hostess held the door open for me which was nice!  Awesome place for excellent service and food.   Please support this place!   No I'm not endorsed or paid to say that LOL

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hSao42TyHKsJFlTw1mpA0g.text: A solid choice for breakfast and lunch (or brunch if that's your thing). Large portions, friendly staff, and (most importantly) good food!  This place is very busy, and for good reason: the food is good, the atmosphere is homey, and the prices are very reasonable. When we recently visited the owner was at the door, talking with a patron as they exited. He then turned to us, and guided us to our table which was being cleaned. From there, our server just continued the chain, and we were attended to with tea and coffee never getting empty.  Date had the patty melt (very, very good) and I had the Cali omelette based upon Yelp recommendations. The hive mind was useful: the Cali omelette was indeed something to try and I would recommend it to others. Bonus points they have sour dough toast here, and use real butter on it!  If you're in town visiting and want a nice place to have breakfast or brunch, or maybe you live in the area, you should swing by and give this place a go. It's got ample parking (always helpful in Vegas), and you'll fill up your belly without busting your wallet.

xkHguFfOdZ6ZzUTveUrArw.text: AMAZING customer service - pair that with the great foods and it's a must breakfast spot!   As a business owner I was truly impressed with the over-the-top friendly atmosphere and helpful staff here. It made me feel like I was in a 5-star fine-dining restaurant- really that good! Loved the food, loved the service, A+++!!!

JAWylfsh6wvMjwMG0nF-Gg.text: For breakfast/brunch aficionados--Mr. Mamas' is it.  Even if you're married to a guy who hates eggs, like I am.  The menu offers plenty of fresh breakfast options, the restaurant is flexible with customizing/modifying ingredients to your liking, and it's not all breakfast.  If I were a local, I would be here weekly.  Sadly, since I am not, Mr. Mama's has become a MUST visit when we're in the area and a place to recommend to friends.  SERVICE +The staff is friendly-super chill. On a four day trip, we ate here twice.  On our second visit the hostess remembered us- little things go a long way.   +Table service- very attentive without being overbearing.  Your coffee cup will not go unfilled, they have a specific person who only does drinks, used plates are immediately removed.  For a casual unassuming place, the quality of service was a pleasant surprise.    FOOD +AMAZING  This is definitely my favorite breakfast spot in the US.  Their website boasts how they "put a smile on your face"-- they do.  You'll want to work your way through the menu.    2 Eggs and Toast $4.50  (5 STARS) +Eggs cooked to your preference, select from 5 different types of toast (sourdough for me), fresh home fries are also included (add peppers and/or jalapenos for my fellow spice lovers)    Pancakes  (5 STARS) +Order a single, short stacks (2), stacks (3), pancakes (2)  Buttery, fluffy, light, warm, delectable, perfection  Cinnamon Roll  (4.5 STARS) +It does not disappoint.  Cinnamon rolls are freshly made, served on the small plate, airy, light... My husband LOVED it.  He particularly appreciated how the cinnamon roll wasn't too dense.   French Toast (5 STARS) +Choose from a plethora of options-1, 2, 3 with bacon, sausage, ham, etc.    I want to try the: +Breakfast burritos +Omelets (they're huge-fit the plate) served with sides +I'm eying the BLT and Mamas Sandwich (Turkey, Bacon, Avocado, Pepperjack cheese- select your bread)  What I wish: +That they had fresh juices... just a thought! ;o)  PRICE Pricing is reasonable. It's also nice to get away from the Strip tourist traps and buffets.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Single pancake, home fries w/jalapeños, side of bacon, side of grits
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Make Your Own Omelet (4 eggs): feta, tomatoes, jalapeños. Served with home fries and toast
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon Roll

Smo4EbMk_UdFJIojeiFE5A.text: First time we went was for Mother's Day breakfast and obvious was going to be a long wait (why not this place is soo good) but we waited less than quoted time and we loved it. Took family that was in town to breakfast and they loved it, portions, flavor, service and staff were awesome. I would recommend going here, especially since I work in the same industry I say its amazing to dine to be at such a great ambiance while being taken care of. Service is quick and dishes are yumm. =) Definitely recommend!!!.

K4IMd6PwUX7eIsvQKajsNA.text: Some of the best food & CUSTOMER SERVICE I've experienced in Vegas in a while! The staff was amazing, owner was walking around helping everyone. Prices are good & quality was great. One of the best French dips I've had . I will return & recommend this place to everyone.

KdwUQvUl5iIirrKIQznSZA.text: Excellent service, staff was amazing. Food was delicious!  Place was jumping too, great place to eat

qNviOi3fjsqcWOemU7huTw.text: I was greeted by a friendly and professional host (I forgot his name). The food came quickly and it was fresh. The cinnamon rolls were warm and are made in house. They were made with the perfect amount of cinnamon and glaze. I also ordered Mama's French toast with eggs and bacon. Portions were just enough and the eggs were made to order. I will definitely come back when I'm in the area.

Y9SuuHGwcH9VNre2GNJt5w.text: Excellent service and great food.  I ordered the veggie omelette and tasted home made.

JvDo8DGybYM6WyTuf0cKDA.text: What a great place !!! The food was not good!! It was DELICIOUS our first time here we waited about 30 minutes cause the place is very popular great service clean place very professional John took some cool pics !!! One of those places makes you want to come back again for sure  A++++ great job guys

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zep6O2vYByT0tjdaMIZ65g.text: Breakfast exactly as it should be, and a great way to fuel up before a long day. Seems like a fun place to work as well.

Fot0pXMVE0eyZYslVm72Bw.text: I think the greatest thing about this place is the people working here and the owner. Once again if you treat your customers well and make them feel welcomed then you can have mediocre food and still maintain a great customer base for some people dont always need or search for good food they rather prefer great service. Lets get to the food  Cinnamon Roll (3/5)- The Infamous Cinnamon Roll did dissapoint. I was expecting something out of this world but in the end it tasted like a sweet hawaiian roll with cinnamon and frosting if you know what i mean. It didnt knock my socks off. I personally wouldnt recccomend it.  *New ITEM* Corned Beef Hash And eggs w/Toast- (4/5)- The owner personally came over after this dish came out and said its homemade with Dill and seasonings added for the unique flavor. they made it crispy just the way a corn beef hash is supposed to be. it wasnt mushy at all. The only thing is I would really have to be in the mood for this dish so its not on the radar for something i would order again here for which i have had better.  Chicken Fried Steak n Eggs w/toast- (4/5)- Another dish which was made unique for their gravy. their sausage gravy had a very good flavor to it. i think if i were to compare it to something it would be italian sausage added to their country gravy it gave it a spicyness to it. This dish was my favorite but a very big portion which for the price was awesome. i even had leftovers because i couldnt finish it and for me i usually have no problem finishing my dish.   BTW i usually dont order hash browns over country potatoes but when you eat here they make a great hashbrown and i made that mistake when i ate here.   Overall a solid meal and i have no problem coming back for a bite. Keep it up Mr.Mamas.

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. chicken fried steak
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. corn beef hash

HTSTGIeOi9KhR3ESY6tn8A.text: I like breakfast. And this place did not impress. The gravy on your biscuits and gravy and country fried steak... lolz. I almost feel like if there was a gravy religion this would be considered blasphemy... id prefer a False prophet because at least that tastes good. Your potato chips... yes potato chips, I know they are called something else but that is what they are except... no salt... no pepper... no special seasonings. Heres a fried potato round. Enjoy? The eggs were alright, nothing that made me say hey these are a delicious.com. These are more likely to appear on diy.com. ' There is just nothing here that made me say wow. It seems like a nice establishment and it has a great staff but the food just made me a little sad... like rudolph being shunned by santa sad. THE VERDICT: so here is my conspiracy theory... they werent satisfied with there 4.5 star rating so they moved so they could get back up to 5. I realize that my opinion is very much the minority... but I stand by it. PS its really out of the way from the city. Wow... im getting more and more blown away by all the 5 stars... but hey its vegas people are intoxicated so... it makes sense.

Ll5qhGyKw9PwpsgQhsDB6g.text: Jasmine is great. The coffee is tasty. The portions are big! Breakfast is my favorite meal and this place knows what they're doing! They even ask you how you like your bacon cooked. Love this little place. Come hungry!

7lSLS-hWJTJkmHNS3x1z9A.text: Seriously delicious food!! My family and i had the greek omelette, chicken fried steak, and mr mamas simple breakfast. All dishes were presented great, tasted amazing and portion size was great! Service was outstanding from every single worker!! Thank you!

bBiXLd3n3bx8Qy9pXZUzvw.text: Yummy breakfast classics for very reasonable prices! Will be a Vegas staple for us. We had the Mama's French Toast and a custom omelet with pancakes. Portions are large and staff is very friendly. Lovely place.

8llDvBZcZU-tDJ8LyriQFQ.text: Found this place while searching for a breakfast spot online and it did not disappoint. From entrance to exit the staff was awesome. Everyone enjoyed their food. And can I just say those were the most delicious sausage patties I have ever had. Just be forewarned the portions are pretty big. We had leftovers galore. I will say I wish they had a children's menu but never the less now we know for next time. OJ was so fresh and service was quick. Plus they have wifi.

hiQq26nZgsNI76Olw5-Mzw.text: Got up early for a boxing class and stopped here for post workout breakfast.  No issues with substitutions.  I ordered the veggie omelet: subbed egg whites.  Rather than potato, I subbed fruit.  Ordered a pancake to go along with it.  Everything was cooked very well.  My coffee cup was always full.  Staff was friendly.  Prices were fair.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Y-ftyC4hryZVL9y8jy465w.text: We were in the area on a Saturday morning and decided we needed a hearty breakfast meal. A quick yelping and we landed on Mr. Mamas. 2000+ reviews and pushing 4.5 stars? That was solid enough for us.  Overall Mr. Mamas wasn't hard to find, but the place is busy. There were people waiting outside and inside. We gave our names and were seated in about 15 mins. Not bad. The inside is nice and the lady/hostess who was seating us was personable and easy going. Our server was also good. Quick with the water refills and quick on taking our orders.  We glanced around at the other tables and the food portions looked pretty good which was good because we were going to embark on a long day of doing nothing but watching Netflix on the couch, playing games on our phones, and fall asleep on the couch (all boilerplate Saturday activities).  So here's what we ordered and what we thought:  Steak and Eggs: Steak was cooked medium and came out medium. Tasted fine. Eggs tasted good also (overhard). Denver Omelette: Good size. Tasted good. One thing we wished for was a "works"-kind of omelette that had everything such as sausage, bacon, bell peppers, three kinds of cheese, ham, onions and mushrooms topped with avocado. Yes, we could've added each one of those individually to the Denver, but it would've added like 6+ bucks more. We kind of wished there was already one of these on the menu since we didn't really want to add FULL portions of each additional topping in, but more like having more variety then be charged like 12 bucks or something. Oh well, not the end of the world. Mamas Stack: Pancakes are very large. Eggs (basted - it's like sunnyside up, but they cook the top a little with oil to make it less slimy). Bacon (thick cut kind). This is a solid choice if you're feeling like I did and just wanted standard issue breakfast food that you know and recognize.  Everything tasted fine and as you'd expect, but nothing really outstanding, but more importantly, nothing disappointing. Mr. Mamas is a good choice if you're in the area. Personally I'd go to Peg's Glorified Ham and Eggs since I like they they have Hawaiian options and Skillets and the menu is slightly more toward my taste buds.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Denver Omelette.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mamas Stack - Pancakes are large. Bacon is thick cut!! Eggs are basted.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and Eggs. Eggs are overhard.

Ldz7tX0OOG5iEmaM5A3jzQ.text: Wow...   Great first time experience at Mr Mamas... and that line outside as we drove by, there's a reason for it. Don't be intimidated by the long line of guests waiting to dine in, believe me, their solid 4-1/2 Star rating speaks for itself so if you have the patience to wait... please wait.   We wanted to dine somewhere where we didn't have to pay for parking and avoid more walking inside casinos just to get to the dining place... in other words, not on The Strip. Found Mr Mamas on Yelp, it was about 9 miles from where we were staying.   Got there and we put our name on the waitlist. Was told that there was a 20-min wait for our party of 7. Not too bad. Shortly after our name was called and we were led to our table. Denise was our server and she was friendly and sweet. Soon after we placed our orders our food was served. I ordered the Mamas Short Stack (2 pancakes, 2 eggs, and I chose bacon). Oh man... I usually eat my pancakes last but after my first bite of the large, fluffy, made-from-scratch, buttermilk pancake I couldn't stop eating it. So delicious! Also, the menu didn't say how many strips of bacon came with the meal (but I expected the usual 2 skinny strips)... I got 5 slices and they were large strips! I'm telling you, usually this traditional breakfast doesn't fill me up even with two slices of white toast but I couldn't even finish my meal. So darn yummy!   My brother can't stop raving about the onion rings. You see, his Swiss Mushroom Burger came with onion rings already (choice from five others) but he liked it so much he ordered an extra side of more onion rings. He said that the 1/2-lb meat on his burger was fresh, not frozen... and he knows a thing or two about burgers living in Stuttgart Germany! I'd like to go on with what the rest of my family's experiences were with their orders but this review will be too long. Let's just say all 3 kids approved... and they're picky eaters.  Great staff! And one last thing... "Mr Mamas" came to our table and chatted with our party for a bit while we waited for our food. He did this to all his guests. Very friendly and humble person. He greeted everyone making sure his guests were okay... and I also happened to see him clearing out dirty dishes from tables once in a while. As I caught him supervising the dining area I came up to him and thanked him for a lovely brunch and mentioned why I can see that his restaurant was "loved" by Yelp and local customers. His first response was, "Thank you, I am blessed." Awesome! Will gladly come back the next time we're in town :)  Review #1064

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 07.04.18  Bacon Cheese Burger
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 07.04.18 Mamas Short Stack
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 07.04.18  Mamas Short Stack

hHjfQc3GDefCVbiTmBLzhw.text: Only tried the cinnamon rolls and took it to go. It was the right amount of sweetness, but it wasn't as ooey gooey as I'd hope it would be. The dough wasn't chewy like most cinnamon rolls I've tasted. They top the cinnamon roll with a dust of cinnamon. It's strong but it's a nice added hint. I prefer Cinnabon (the food chain) over theirs.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon rolls! 3/5 stars.

K4Y7yu5_SMt9TJregwxGtg.text: Was in the area on business and decided I was a little hungry. Checked my Yelp to find a good place to eat that was close by. At 4.5 stars and only a mile away, Mr Mama's was the logical choice.  I ordered the cheeseburger with extra crispy hash browns. The burger was as advertised being medium-well. It's moist and flavorful. Beware of the red onions - they are so strong you'll not have intimate contact for a week...  My friend had the ham & cheese omelette. He reported that it was moist and that he definitely enjoyed the meal.  Not sure who is "Alex" but every 2-3 minutes some staff member would call out his name across the restaurant. After the first couple of times it became quite annoying. That having been said, we wondered if the staff was playing a new form of "Marco Polo".

YpqoyxE_dK5mahQglDDBcA.text: Can't pass up a brunch spot with over 2k reviews and 4.5 stars!  Cali Omelet ($10.75): Served alongside potatoes and toast but I upgraded the toast to a pancake for $2 to $3 more. The omelet was stuffed with pico de gallo, sausages, cheddar jack cheese, sour cream and topped with sliced avocados. Portions are decently sized for the price - can't get any better than that in Vegas.   The gentlemen host is friendly and funny. He will come out and YELL names to ensure its heard - especially if you decide to sit in your car close by to wait (our party of 5 waited roughly 45 minutes on a Saturday afternoon). Just make sure your car windows are down =)

_Rspz7lOVekkxmtqKFcR_w.text: First time and we fall in love with this place. Great Food Great Atmosphere  Great Guest service   Overall, Great Job Guys!  We'll come back next time we're in Las Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Good service.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Just breakfast!

6auB8-fkK2HEnGUik0OQ2w.text: WOW!! one of the very best places I been to since I moved to Vegas 5 months ago. I came here on a friends recommendation and boy they did not disappoint. FYI! this place gets busy so be prepared to wait awhile but trust me the wait is worth it. me and a guest waited about 45 minutes due to the high volume but was well taken care of when we finally sat. the owners are very active and even graced us with a free cinnamon roll as payment for the wait. all the staff looked excited and made us feel part of the family, not once did my cup go empty.  I had the special vanilla bean pancakes and my taste buds went to the moon. the chief had it on the menu for that day but hopefully I can have it when I return. thank you guys for showing me a good time with good food. I hope you all try this place and enjoy as much as I did.

KvctF3bDX5NU5CYj5VJx9w.text: Very good breakfast!  The home fries were amazing.  The hostess went out of her way to make everyone feel welcome.

BU7ZmQHqGMpAg5cewzG1pQ.text: If you want comfort food in a home setting this is the place! Really good down home heavy food. Left satisfied and full! Definitely going back!

EkYO2UWiTbzhzRWYJRZjRw.text: Great food and service! Worth the drive off the strip!!  Great biscuits and gravy!, even gave us a sample to seal the deal!  Reasonable prices and big portions!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1rKsxN9_-Nrpd-asQO4rDA.text: Very good service. Food not so flavorful but it was good. No complaints. It's hard to mess up breakfast.

4PFR2GwECOZjHBKOpIbzgw.text: I absolutely loves this little "home-like" restaurant.  I was greeted by the manager holding the door for me and was quickly sat.   My server quickly got me my cup of coffee that my inner self was just screaming for, and I was blown away at how good the coffee actually tasted. You can tell they put some care in their coffee, and I really appreciate that. Not to mention, it was piping hot every time!   My Greek Omelet was very tasty and fruit was very fresh.   I particularly loved the atmosphere that all the servers and manager created by being very personable and making sure everyone was truly happy with their breakfast.   It almost felt as if the entire team was one big family taking care of the family restaurant.   I loved it!

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eECh9x2to-w0vVsEGatBRA.text: This place gets the stars for hospitality. Walked in and found out we had a 35 minute wait. Since the reviews I read were all great we decided to wait. Well it was worth it. All of the staff here are super courteous. As we ate the owner himself, Mr. Mamas, came out to talk to us. He was very involved, observant and talkative. We got to have a nice little conversation with him about the name and the restaurant. The food was your typical diner food, we ordered breakfast- I had the eggs Benedict and they were good. Price was not bad at all. This place makes you feel super comfortable and welcomed with how the staff treat you. Will definitely be back when I visit Vegas again.
