-E-bF1CjYSJWGQaWnB1bXw.text: Yelp has don't it again! Mr. Mamas was great! The service was great. They were busy and my food was out quick my coffee cup was never empty, and the server was friendly. She recommended the chicken fried steak and she twisted my arm so I tried the cinnamon role. Both were great! Lots of food it comes with three eggs and choice of toast or pancakes. This is the spot for a big cafe style breakfast and down-to-earth feel.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon roll

wKgLm9TjBVzWa1v2yDRtQQ.text: Okay so when i first walked up i was a little nervous because not being from Vegas every new food play we try typically is just lacking one thing or another.   This is not one of those places. From the first introduction to who I'll assume was the manager or owner, because he was soooo attentive, caring and accommodating so you'd think it was his own, Shawn was the best restaurateur i have ever met and I've eaten at so really swanky places across america. Then as we were seated our waitress was there to greet us and although i don't remember her name, she was as equally accommodating as Shawn. I loved how everyone worked together and was polite like they actually love their job and those who patronize their establishment. The customer service is five stars alone.   Food: after consulting with the waitress and Shawn about what to eat i decided on the chicken fried steak, the kids of course wanted different variations of bacon eggs pancakes or French toast, my brother in law had a burger, and my sister in law exactly the same thing as me.  The chicken fried steak was BOMB. The gravy was the perfect amount of flavor and perfect consistency. The eggs were nice and fluffy, and the home fries had the perfect amount of crunch and seasoning. The batter on the chicken fried steak stayed crunchy with the gravy on it! I'd order it again and recommend it.  I also snuck little bites of the kids bacon. It was perfectly cooked. The pancakes were hot, fluffy and HUGE. All i needed was one. (And i can eat) my brother in law loved his burger. It was also HUGE. Even shit as simple as the coffee had flavor and was fresh.   I would tell anyone who is looking to find a nice inexpensive and delicious breakfast without having to sacrifice one or the other, This is your go to place!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My baby can&#39;t eat much table food but he was all smiles seeing everything arrive
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Full house

5RxD20IOIVV3EhVNpC9fpw.text: Been coming here for several years now, it's always busy but as the Mr Mamas himself said it there is a reason why people wait!  The cinnamon roll is a must to start, my favorite is the country fried steak and the pancakes are delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sunday&#39;s crowd!

aN0oob1cxjhNSwdNYJX_tw.text: We were seated immediately and The food came out very quickly although the restaurant was very busy .  I ordered a 3 stack of pancakes , and they were HUGE . I was unable to finish it .  The food was very good

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Country fried steak , veggie wrap , pancakes , and French toast

OooVlhn4I6ZFlZ67NW61Xw.text: My husband truly enjoyed his breakfast here.  The serving sizes are huge and the taste is above average.  The service is excellent.  From the owner to the staff.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Front door

qniXB0kEZEp5KpycMq3YJg.text: Their French toast is delicious!! The service is great. The wait sometimes can be yucky but you just hope people will leave so you move up in the line .

tCsD6YjVETc23TeM3sOelQ.text: I love this place, food good employees even better. They are the most friendliest bunch of people in Vegas. We visir every time we come to Vegas, wish it was one in Cali. Sean yelling is the funniest thing to me, you will not miss your place in line with the vocals of this guy. The first time we came it was hot & a lot of people was waiting. We decided to sit in our car with the music on. Sean yelled my name, my husband & I laughted so hard and fell in love.  Our own group gets larger and lager each time and they have no problem with accommodating us. If you have a larger group & larger appetites come visit.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sean and I

Z0U5eOBSyZi11YUvBI2D2g.text: We came here on a Sunday morning about 9:30ish and we just missed the rush of crowd that came after.  We got seated right away and a server took our drink and food orders right after.  We ordered the french toast with bacon, short stack pancakes (2 pancakes) with chocolate chips (additional $0.50) with whipped cream and chocolate syrup and a country fried steak made with their homemade gravy with crispy hash browns, eggs and white toast. We also ordered a coffee that comes with FREE refills!  Our food came in a timely manner and it was delicious!   The hash browns were crunchy. The country fried steak with their homemade gravy was tasty. The pancakes were a bit too sweet for me, but my kids loved it! The french toast was good, crunchy on the edges soft in the middle.   Would I come here again? Absolutely!!!   *tip**  Go fairly early on the weekend otherwise expect a wait of about half an hour or so.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast with bacon
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Country fried steak with homemade gravy, crispy hashbrowns and eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

pVG6DUzvT14yOplVNrxdzA.text: We hit Mr. Mamas for a late breakfast. Based off of the healthy crowd I was looking forward to a great meal. The staff were super friendly and very attentive.  The coffee tastes kinda funky. Not bad... it's just a little bitter. The food was decent. The Mushroom Swiss Burger has a great soft bun, lacked any seasoning. I had to apply a fair amount of salt to flavor it up. The fries were Greek fries. They have a different flavor, a little heavy on oil and rosemary.   The breakfast food was better, they have some fantastic sauces they use on the chicken fried steak and eggs Benedict. These were a flavorful interpretation on the norms.  Check out Mr. Mamas if you are in the area. You may be pleasantly surprised.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mushroom Swiss Burger
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict

Fa1ZOAxGAu4N4SY5bq-6Tw.text: We're waking up at Rio, it's Christmas Eve, and we are hungry.  As you might suspect, we consult Yelp, and, again, we are so happy we did.  There are over 2,200 review of this place and they are averaging 4.5 stars and after our meal there, it's easy to understand why.  The room was practically empty upon arrival, it was early, and everybody working there greeted us with a smile.  The manager even came over and shared a home made piece of fudge with us.....loved it.  Now, this is in a strip mall, and it was about a ten minute drive from Rio, and easy to find in the sunrise twilight using our cell directions provided by Yelp.  The food was good.  I had the 'Greek Omelet' and my wife ordered eggs benedict in a rather unique fashion.  She asked for the English muffin to be replaced with additional sauteed vegetables and the chef did a great job of taking care of her request.  Friendly attentive staff and good food is always a great recipe.  Thanks again to Yelp, never would have been here without it.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The fudge the manager shared with us.

0LD0ZhO-jHe1j0izAdfnGw.text: After a weekend of full of copious amounts of alcohol with very little oxygen, we needed some breakfast before we made the long drive back to Phoenix. On a Sunday morning at 11am in Vegas though, finding breakfast is incredibly difficult. Finally we decided to bite the bullet and wait the 30 minutes to try Mama's and we were so glad that we did!  Situated in a large strip mall, Mr Mamas doesn't seem like much, but once you see the line wrapping around the outside you quickly see that people love this place. The waiting area was super small and the dining area is massive, you just see the wait staff and host bustling about like a well oiled machine. Clearly they're used to these types of rushes and they were well prepared.   We waited for our table longer than it took us to order and pay but that was understandable when they were still seating people! The menu is all breakfast and lunch options, each sounding better than the last, hearty and delicious. My boyfriend tried the tuna melt and thought it was one of the best he'd ever had, and I got the club sandwich that must have put a butcher's kids through college with how piled high with meat it was. Both were fantastic, service was friendly and quick.   Plenty of room for large groups though likely difficult to get in if its really busy. A bit loud but thats gonna happen when there's so many people, and despite being so busy it didn't feel cramped at all once we were sat.  I sincerely wish they would open a Phoenix location :p

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 20 minutes to close and the place is STILL packed

trzrJmFcBglFtnqQTCXaCQ.text: Love this place the egg Benedict was so delicious. I'm so glad I came to eat here and the service was excellent. They guy at door was awesome greeted us as soon as we walked up to restaurant. We will definitely come back

6TSyoe6_E9qwUrQUlzZEsg.text: Went there on A Sunday about 10am. Line out the door. No surprise considering the previous reviewers showing the same photos of long lines.  We were told it would be about 15-30 wait and it was right on. They had an excellent floor manager that was orchestrating he flow of tables to be cleaned, restructured, etc.   He even provided extra chairs to some young ladies that had kiddos in their arms.  When seated they promptly took our drink orders. After that, the food order, and before an hour as up, we were out of there.  It was tasty and my kids loved their pancakes.  My favorite thing was that the place was loud so my kids could have their usual high pitched giggles and conversation without us feeling like we were standing out or disturbing other customers.  Would highly recommend others (especially families) to try this place out.

Ltw9uP7uE-O1j9RMe2WXfw.text: Excelente please for breakfast , a little far from the strip but it's worth, my family and me enjoy our breakfast, food is good , service excellent, we wait a while because it gets full very fast but it's worth thumbs up for all you guys that work there

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Main entrance

d7SPJKgYzmJGq5mKFkANjg.text: Mr Mamas never fails to provide great service and food. I say service first because they consistently go out of their way to not only provide the baseline level of good service but also make sure you know they appreciate you coming in. Having said that, their food is always excellent. I got the chicken fried steak and eggs and my wife goes between the ham and cheese sandwich or an omelette. Definitely worth the wait!

mlPatXJzNYJA3hRptVosew.text: I YELPED Mr Mamas last Saturday for a group of us that spent the weekend... the food looked delicious and it had high star points so I suggested it to the group... when we walked in and sat down I had already enjoyed my breakfast because the staff was so welcoming and attentive I know I was already going to have a great experience! Then when I ordered I had the option of crispy bacon or regular and crispy hash browns or regular... SOLD! my new favorite spot in Vegas

SK3XcH0WWT6WVgP5YtgBJw.text: Thanks to the favorable Yelp reviews, we came here for breakfast.  Both of us ordered the Mamas Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs. Krystal, our waitress. explained the difference between Home Fries and hash browns to me, and noted that their country gravy is made with bacon, sausage and a touch of maple syrup.  She offered me a taste before placing my order. I declined, since it sounded tasty from her description.  Hubby's order came with an English muffin, while I chose the biscuit, using some of the ample portion of country gravy instead of jam. My scrambled eggs were perfect: not overly cooked like some lesser restaurants serve.  The hostess and several other employees (in addition to Krystal) checked to make sure we were doing okay throughout the meal. I appreciated their attentiveness.  We enjoyed a pleasant meal and felt most welcomed.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mr Mamas Restaurant
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mamas chicken fried steak and eggs. So big, I had the rest for breakfast the next day!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mr Mamas&#39; extensive menu

DAXITugSZW5LSpFxJ6BjCg.text: Make sure you get here early to avoid the wait! (Though it's worth the wait)  I've been here twice with my girlfriend, this place has not come close to disappointing us.  Both times we were greeted and served by very helpful people at the restaurant.  There's even a nice gentleman who walks around and asks if you'd like him to take a photo for you (with your own cell phone).  The second time we went here we got seated in a corner behind the cash register.. and even then we still got excellent service!  Now to the food.. the home fries are delicious!  If your food comes with an option of hash browns or home fries, get the home fries!  They are so good.. lightly crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, with some sort of seasoning that makes it taste delicious.  I ordered my usual steak and eggs and my girlfriend ordered her eggs benedict.  Everything was on point.  My steak had so much flavor from the outer edges all the way to the center.  My girlfriend's eggs benedict was savory in every bite.    I'm only disappointed that we couldn't bring any leftovers home.. because we ate it all!  We'll be back again!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak &amp; Eggs

hGLPyJDPSMO57LNWJMqVUg.text: Awesome food, just get there early and make sure you give them your name and they write it down correctly. My name got skipped due to wrong spelling and could not understand the writing, luckily I knew who was in front of me and behind for table. After questioning the host got it corrected right away. They sat us down fast and the service was impeccable came with a free cinnamon roll for the mistake the host did. Waitress was so attentive. Food was so good, "it was worth the wait". My wife and I shared the omelet and French toast. Big portions. We took an Uber from New York. Got there with 10 min.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hs1Zp6i5oWfAvdpRUAe1mw.text: Excellent menu, would of liked some homemade salsa w/ my Omelette,  but the Cholula did the trick Beats Dennys & Ihops by Miles

YHM4c4cWe2qeLfnQ4yElsQ.text: Love the food the chicken fry steak and eggs was delicious  the service was Great Also the coffee was the best in the west!!!

UEt0JRS5I7od-E0mOi6epQ.text: This was the most unexpected experience I've had in a very long time. The service is AMAZING. Such a warm atmosphere. There's nothing bad I can say

MAzN4X9dLIFxW9xYH5PguQ.text: A slight wait in line is the normal.   Trust me its worth the time.    All the workers are respectful towards the staff management and most of all you as the customer.   The cafe is spotless, with clean floors walls and most of all clean MENUS.    The food has great taste and still you can spice it up your way. So many other restraints and cafe's in town over dose with spices .   Great value and generous portion size, ask for a to go box is the Norm. And great coffee.  A real hidden gem just a few minutes from the strip.   If only they had a dinner menu !

Q9A5-lo6PjJ5ZUw8pMIGtA.text: Excellent service and portions. I had the corned beef and hash along with side biscuit and gravy. The gravy is from scratch and has excellent balance in its flavor. The place was busy with 50 patrons but the staff was there and some. No worries with service.

Xr1k1sxmOQ1E8x9gUdgROw.text: WOW! This place deserves five stars! From the moment we walked in we were immediately greeted and sat. The guy that greeted us seems to keep things going by checking to see which tables are open and keeping the flow going as getting patrons seated. We ordered the French toast and we were not disappointed. The toast was thick and dusted with cinnamon and powdered sugar and tasted so good. The entire staff is on their A game. It's very apparent that teamwork is fostered here as they all seemed to work together and were constantly  communicating with each other. The yelp 4.5 stars is what brought us in and with almost 3k reviews thought we couldn't go wrong. Thanks for a great breakfast and amazing hospitality~

eClhY-NXjfb-Jt4hA3SUeA.text: Excellent breakfast place. Got me my steak and eggs. Price is decent and the food is awesome. Waits not too long either

GyPWGFQ4zYtxnoZxAG6nGg.text: Mr Mamas has a wait but didn't take long to get a table. Service was good and fast. Breakfast was American comfort food which was good.  Wasn't wowed but wasn't disappointed either.  Great neighbor place to grab breakfast.

9PHTi5Jth4ZaV5m1t7As3Q.text: Wow! So incredibly happy we stopped here! The food was amazing, French toast was absolutely delicious!!! On top of that, they have the most friendly staff of any place I've been. They worked as a team refilling drinks and taking plates and serving food. Everything was fresh and yummy. Don't miss this opportunity- thanks for the great experience!

bQl42xRPcjE2k4Jiy0GnIg.text: For what you pay for, you get a generous portion of delicious food! My friends opt'd for the chicken fried steak, but I went for my go to, the tuna melt!  The tuna melt was delicious! I always want to order this homey dish everytime I feel the nostalgia....I'd say come a bit early because wait times can be long if you come during peak dining hours.

wPWhVXenGoXZVKLvkE7UUA.text: My boyfriend and I drove into Vegas early on a Friday morning. We had time to kill so we figured may as well grab some coffee and breakfast-- Mr Mamas was perfect for it.  Meal was good, coffee was good, service was fantastic. Mr Mamas himself came tableside to greet us. I personally enjoy when owners come out and greet their customers. It shows that we as customers are valued! My 2 cents...

F71pFow0uFlDxr6ocgvDGg.text: Wow! Just delicious food! It's the normal all American breakfast but this place adds extras to the meals! For example we had homefries, we were just expecting fried potatoes nothing else. They add chopped up tomatoes pepper and onions to these homefries!   The service is impeccable as well! If you're looking for a delicious breakfast come here!!!!

HWlTxcLZdajTu5sxIq2zLA.text: We chose to come here for breakfast on a Sunday morning and we did call ahead of time to make sure the wait time would not be too bad. There are no reservations at this restaurant. This place fills up fast because it is fantastic. The restaurant is simple and it has quite a few tables but is not huge. The service is very friendly and very efficient. The breakfast choices are fast and there is a lot to choose from. All the choices are delicious. The pancakes here are fantastic. My omelette which was a vegetable omelette was delicious. It came with toast and I chose the house potatoes although hashbrowns are available. You can request egg whites only. The coffee is delicious. The prices are extremely reasonable and we were blown away by how affordable this place is.  If you want friendly service with great food, either for breakfast or lunch, this is the right place to do it.

nn_HKoHOmYCKGEdMrqYkxQ.text: I pass by here daily going home from dropping my son off at school with my two year old daughter and just decided to eat here today, very randomly. Didn't even need to open the door-service so attentive they saw me carrying my daughter and opened the door for me and we were immediately sat.  I was torn between traditional Eggs Benedict or a chilli cheese omelette. I decided on the Eggs Benedict eggs easy-it came out perfectly. My daughter's ONE pancake was cooked as Micky Mouse and it was HUGE for the price.   I definitely recommend and will be back to try other great options on the menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My 2 year olds 1 pancake they made as Mickey Mouse-one pancake is HUGE.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Already half eaten cooked perfectly eggs Benedict

iWvc0EbUYx0XA3KVku4V1A.text: The food was amazing!  We had a little bit of everything for breakfast (pancakes, eggs, corn beef hash and chili cheese fries).  Our server Ryan was fantastic.

ccmI0Nsk-h2gyBJghwFong.text: Had never been here before and a friend had just seen it on yelp decided to stop by and check it out . We were greeted as soon as we got to the door and seated right away it was semi busy but not to bad. Our waitress came right away took out drink orders and came back soon after to take our orders. I ordered the French toast with a side of strawberries. My friend got the chili omelette and my other friend got the pancakes and steak and eggs .four food arrived within 10 min all hot and fresh . My French toast was so good I didn't even need syrup my bacon was good perfect and I ate every last drop lol . My friend said the omelette was good and something he never seen and same with steak and eggs. All around a good breakfast spot and we will be back for sure. I have to add they were super friendly and gave great customer service !!!!

X5tIVcAFqRslksYwdGWBBA.text: I had a very negative experience overall. This place is terrible diner food. Greasy and poor quality. The service was terrible. I can't believe they've been given good reviews. I can recommend much better diners. Try Jamms instead.

7U_6QS-BMoUzad8yQppa4A.text: AMAZING! The food here was the bomb. So we're not from around here, and we usually look on Yelp to help us find places to eat while we're traveling, sometimes even when we're home. There was three of us on this trip. But let me just tell you, this place is everything more than five stars!   Our order Chicken fried steak, over easy eggs, biscuit, gravy, home style potatoes. W/ slice of orange. & a Dr Pepper. French toast, ham, scrambled eggs w/chesse, w/ slice of orange. & orange juice. Like I said there was three of us, with two orders it filled us up, and left overs.  And the gravy is so good!!!! You might need extra.  We ordered the chicken fried steak because it was recommended, and it lived up to its expectations. The French toast, had a tad bit much of cinnamon but we still ate it because it was cooked so lightly and perfectly.   Our waitress, was so friendly and nice, asked friendly questions after taking our orders, and told us to take our time after she collected our plates.   This looks like a place that wouldn't be as packed from the outside shopping center, but I think all the cars were for this place.   I would recommend this to anyone looking for a home style breakfast, with the right portion sizes.  Absolutely delicious. And away from the strip with the right prices.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

cT3JIeVZfk1RsaY1NWjBXA.text: Great food at a reasonable price, only one thing that kept him from a five star would be the one hr Wait to get a seat. Definitely the place to go though

Aiyz3xfoJxfrWXr60aOpDQ.text: Delicious food and great customer service experience. My whole family loved it, we ordered omelletes, pancakes and country fried steak. Food is reasonably priced and the wait was not too long. It is imo the best breakfast place in L.V.

yjq0wXKL0s-wu95I4ljgxQ.text: great service  great ingredients decent service   the mamas burger was exquisite.  not many people in there when i was there.   the ranch was amazing.   lost a star because they didn't bring the ranch out with the food. and because they charge for it.   18 dollar total for a burger and drink. kind of pricey to be honest

qh_pYIVCc8rlGZfvuDJqLQ.text: I would have rated this higher had I not been seated next to the coffee and tea station.  Parked right next to it was the table washing cart.  I watched over and over as busers wrung out wet table rags, squirting dirty water next to an open pitcher of tea that waitresses used to refill drinks.   Prices were comparable to similar diner type restaurants.  Food was ok, but pancakes are better at IHOP, Denny's, and Cracker Barrel.

QeTfhyWJZ_W5UoPNWQ5IEQ.text: Fantastic diner experience the chatter hustle bustle clanking dish from the kitchen and a burger with the sweet essence of char, fantastic beef flavor. The staff is amazing

Ms1kk0X762cHlLXkehoNTg.text: Wow, what a little goldmine this restaurant is! Service is stellar from the host all the way to the bussers. They keep the tables clean, the food is fresh and the portions are generous with a beautiful presentation. I had the Spanish Omelet and my husband had the Chicken Fried Steak. Both were so delicious. The manager Kat greeted us after we were sat and made us feel like we were guests in her own home. Jenna was a sweet and attentive server. Thank you, Yelp, for this great find!

1vYU_KJzAjqmckYBDJpEaQ.text: We arrived fairly early on a Sunday morning and the place wasn't quite full, and were seated immediately. Service was fast & friendly, the food was awesome - I had a fantastic omelet. My pals all enjoyed their meals too. As we were leaving, the rush hour had begun - there was a metric buttload of people waiting outside. Not surprised - this place is great and we'll definitely be back next time we're in town.

l7nQNQ6llfnMUdbHcc_LUw.text: BEST breakfast I've ever had. My boyfriend and I are visiting from L.A and found this spot through Yelp. We couldn't pass on a place with so many good reviews. The staff is very welcoming and friendly they make sure you have everything you need. The food was AMAZING! We definitely recommend the chicken fried steak so BOMB! This will be our go to breakfast spot when we come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Ku6M8YOa1LN-Vou2cmrdTg.text: As soon as you walk in the manager greats you and the owner walks around thanking everyone couldn't ask for a better place to have breakfast with my family. Love that they are constantly moving people in and out you don't wait much. I am for sure coming back for more and the food is great with 1plate you can feed two.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_muXp5RpsoqLZtPTdCETjQ.text: I live for Sunday breakfast and Mr Mamas was SPOT ON!! Wish I could pick up Mr Mamas and take it back with me to Cali. Owner Nick was AWESOME! He greeted every table and chatted with them as if he were their fam. The food was GREAT! I have a thing with eggs and they gotta be cooked all the way. Our waitress Denisse was so sweet, made the notation and checked in on me to make sure my omelet was cooked right. She checked in on us all the time and filled up coffees without it getting passed the halfway mark. Seriously one of the best places breakfast spots I have been to. Thank you for a great meal and we will MOST DEFINITELY BE BACK IN A FEW WEEKS FOR BREAKFAST!!

i99-CwmgNMlLLkcPhmu5uw.text: Even though i was told this place was just ok i had to try it because I know Mr. Mamas is highly rated on yelp.   Service - 3  stars  As soon as we arrived we saw their was a wait. My initial thought was we might as well wait by the time we drive somewhere else and wait it will be the same amount of time.  Upon walking in we were not greeted however we were Aggressively asked if we wanted our name on the list, a little taken back we said yes and she said "I don't want to tell you a time , maybe 30 minutes , it's 12:05" we noticed right after , the unfriendly ness of the host and almost considered just leaving but we went with the flow and took in the experience.  Secondly the other Host who was obnoxiously calling names of guests across the parking lot like a mad man  sure scared  my friends along with the father and young son that were waiting a couple stores down. Not to mention he came out and asked us our name and then laughed after he said "oh you guys are at the bottom haha sorry."  Probably not the best thing to say to people patiently waiting outside of your establishment.  Thirdly the other gentleman who was dropping food off to tables .....not our waitress (who by the way was very nice and attentive)   There is no need to shout out what we ordered and aggressively drop the plate on our table. Manners and being kind and polite can truly go a long way . At this point we did not care what the food was going to taste like. The people I was with truly felt intimidated. I hope the reason behind all of the aggressiveness perhaps could have been due to how busy they might have been.   3 1/2 Stars  Food Quality  I ordered the biscuits and gravy which I enjoyed.  No complaints. If you need a little kick for your biscuits and gravy you might want to add some pepper or Cholula the sausage in the gravy isn't on the spicy side which was good for me. My eggs were cooked just right.   The veggie omelette we ordered was very watery if you order it I would recommended ordering it well done!   I'm sorry we didn't enjoy the vibe and the food was just ok , i was really excited after all the pictures on yelp !  this place may Be for some folks but it just didn't do it for  us. I probably won't be back if I do it will be with the dudes !

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

I371sehi0iSPoxN2WUbQrQ.text: What an awesome place. It's yummy food, not way fancy but good portions. Only serves breakfast and lunch and closes around 2-3 pm. Promises to be one of my fave when visiting  Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

XfdnVUa_XgFplcgNNvzYnQ.text: I stumbled across this place while visiting my dad and figured I'd give it a try. I ordered their veggie omelette, turned it into a  egg white scramble with added avocado and also added a ice mocha coffee. Everything was amazing. Most dish come with potatoes but I substituted my potatoes for fruit. The good was amazing and so was the service. I will be back!!

2H5VBG21mnbaK01eK-ROnA.text: When you are in LV, you really need to stop into this place. Other than the food was amazing, the staff was just as great! Friendly faces and a strong attention to detail is what you will receive here. An affordable price for such top quality food. Thank you to Mr. Mama's for making our experience exceptional. We will be back tomorrow for breakfast!!

HT8p_zITHgwoBLoC7_2xCA.text: I'm sorry, but the food did not live up to the hype. The service was great!! But the breakfast definitely fell short of expectations based on previous reviews. I had the corned beef hash, it was gritty. and salty and shredded, unfortunately it only earned three bites. At least the scrambled eggs were good :-) The cinnamon roll was fluffy but nothing more to gush about, very light on a very thin icing. I would not go out of your way to check out. Slightly sub par and deserving of only 2 stars.

GXzhCGaWrqZNGfGi4mNi3g.text: Great place! While I got my car taken care of in the shop, I decided to go take a walk for breakfast. I got to this place easily and was greeted with a welcoming smile and got sat immediately. My server was very nice and knowledgeable. I got coffee and decided to order the veggie wrap with hash browns. The wrap comes with eggs in it and to my pleasant surprise, the hash browns were actually inside the wrap, which was fantastic. I got some salsa with my wrap and I ordered Pico de Gallo as well. That was actually not to my liking so I'm glad I asked for it on the side. My server, Claudia, kept filling my coffee exactly when I needed and always with a smile. When I was about to leave (around 9am) there was already a wait list. They were so nice that even when I left they asked me how it was and they hoped to see me again. They will surely see me again!

A2g9o42ygbd-0uGZFTIKPQ.text: Fantastic. Great food. Hot coffee, perfect portions. Fun to watch the staff work together. Will definitely be back when in Vegas. Waiter Alex was great.

RIdeGJPPYMdcx8EyQdqHyQ.text: When walking in it was really confusing on where to go or who to talk to put  your name down, there was a large crowd in front of the entrance and the employees were gathered talking amongst themselves off to the side. I approached them and said hello excuse me. I did not get a response, it seems maybe no one heard me then, finally an older woman acknowledged me and put my name down. There was about a 30 minute wait. When we sat down we received really great service. Breakfast food was what you expect for breakfast. Nothing was OMG-AMAZING but nothing was bad. It was just average. If I was basing this review on the service I received after sitting down, it would be 5 stars but taking into consideration the average food and first impressions, three stars seems about right.

Byt8RG5TMocJdV-okfb_EQ.text: Very good real diner breakfast food! Got the mushroom cheese omelette Excellent Customer service as well! Highly recommend!

_NmhtkB28dt4OXbOc0UWdw.text: My fiancee came by for breakfast during our recent Vegas trip. The wait was pretty long but the food made up for it. Everything came out quickly and the staff was attentive.

UN7LMVIsrHlkyzC8qOA2gg.text: We found this establishment a few trips ago via Yelp. We like eating at local places off the beaten path. Mr. Mamas does not disappoint.  First off, they get BUSY! They are worth it, I promise, just be patient.   Now, we always close out our trip here for breakfast. It keeps us full all the way back to Cali. The staff is friendly, efficient and all business. They make sure you're taken care of. The food is always hot, fresh and consistent. I usually get an omelette or breakfast burrito. I love hash browns and they are ALWAYS done perfect. Crispy on the outside, soft underneath. Prices are on par and and actually a bargain for what you get.   I don't know what I'm saddened by more, my trip is over or I have to wait a few months for awesome breakfast. Thanks for keeping us fed well guys!

sCUwjbkIQgNBe8HmICDiWg.text: Coming back just to have a convo with the owner because this guy is freakin awesome! Any owner who takes the time to get to know his customers deserves recognition. The food was great regardless, but the simple fact that he was so personable and came to our table constantly makes it that much better.

JgbMaNjTuoMM2g2P1b0ZkA.text: The food here is absolutely delicious but the service is what really stood out. Great job for making each and every customer feel wanted and welcome. It not easy to do when it is so crowded but you guys did a fantastic job. Well done!

Gh16HGhB7eGWY6YR6tc5bw.text: Started off with a bit of a wait, but well worth it. We ordered the Cali omelet, Mama's Chicken Fried Steak, and the Tuna Sandwich and all were delicious.  Service was attentive and kind. If you're adventurous and looking for good food, you found your spot!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mama&#39;s chicken fried steak, Cali Omelet, and the tuna.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qzE4quWd1LSaVkyjzrV09w.text: The BEST service we've had in the month we've been in Vegas... Great food as well. Very busy but we didn't even have to wait long

1yBfqqTjBJ2iLApeLrzmKg.text: Came here with my parents for brunch on Christmas Eve. The owner (maybe manager?) here displays such an affection for and commitment to his customers - it stands out and almost cannot go unnoticed. We were greeted as soon as walked in and to the right of us were a slew of other customers waiting to be seated. "Is it just the three of you?... The wait is going to be around 15 minutes, but most likely shorter, is that okay?" YES. He answered my question without me even asking, and we were seated in less than ten minutes. BROWNIE POINTSSS  The portions are generous- we ordered the Eggs Benedict Florentine, the Chicken Fried Steak w/ gravy and Eggs, and a side of pancakes to share among the three of us and could not finish. The servers are on point and so polite.  What a great dining experience!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

C3agbLz7H30mssr2myqFCw.text: Best breakfast place in Vegas , this place is a must stop if your  in Vegas. Great prices, great service and great food, portions as always fresh and delicious. Highly recommended

6sgANPCGrlmNjpJrXphlpw.text: Jenna was our waitress and was extremely professional and was just all around perfect. The food was great! Recommend it

g8rbejOIuYD8chJtBUPrmg.text: My boyfriend had been dying to try Mr Mamas after all the stellar reviews, praises, and high ratings. However, I'm not a breakfast type of person. I eat breakfast foods now and then but I'm not totally crazy about it like some are. I do appreciate a good omelet though.    My boyfriend and I decided to go on a Sunday for lunch about an hour before they closed. When we got there, the whole place was packed but luckily, people were getting ready to leave. And we weren't the only ones that were coming in too. There was a couple before us and a couple of people after us as well. This just goes to show that Mr Mamas consistently has customers through the day.   My boyfriend and I decided to share the Spanish Omelet with ham, 1 slice of French Toast, and a greek yogurt parfait.   When our Spanish omelet came, I was a little confused. I could've sworn that I ordered it with ham but instead of ham, there was bacon. Granted, it was close to closing time so there might have been a mistake here or there with the kitchen rushing the orders out. I didn't say anything bout the mishap only because I didn't want to wait for it to be redone so we stuck it through. I mean, I guess bacon is sort of like ham...they're both pork. *Shrugs.* There were also hash browns that came with the omelet and we had specifically requested well done hash browns. I like my hash browns crispy on the outside and warm goodness on the inside. The hash browns did not look as well done as the pictures we've seen but it was still good nonetheless. It was probably some of the best hash browns I've had in Vegas.   I love how Mr Mamas allows you to order pancakes and French toast by the slices. I don't like pancakes but if my friend or boyfriend does, they can order just a slice or two since I won't help them eat it. As for French toast, I like them but I don't like them enough to gobble a whole order. I haven't had French toast in ages and I've almost forgotten what they taste like. French toast holds a comforting place in my heart -- I used to make them with my uncle when I was a young girl. Unfortunately, Mr Mamas does run short for their French toast. It doesn't quite bring about the comfort feelings but it is still good -- just not something I would order again. It seemed a little plain to me. I might enjoy it more if it had options for whip cream and strawberries.   Their greek yogurt parfait was beautiful and possibly my favorite order of the day. It was loaded with mixed berries and granola. It was the perfect healthy breakfast -- can't really go wrong with that!   Overall, Mr Mamas, to me, was good but not the best. Perhaps I walked in with super high expectations and with that, it's hard to satisfy me. Nothing here gave me a huge surprise and nothing made me crave for more. One of the bonus things about Mr Mamas is that it is not pricey .. definitely great to dine with a family! :)

rplv_njewPSaWnrBvkhF0g.text: First time customer. We went here for brunch and it was busy out the door. I knew that was a good sign.  We were greeted by the owner at the door and the staff were busy working but not too busy to ask how everything thing was going and were also taking photos for their guests. Very casual and friendly. The FOOD was EXCELLENT! I ordered the Greek omelette, a bowl of chili, poached eggs, and Mama's French toast. Food was simple and tasted fresh. You can tell from the ambiance that it is an enjoyable family friendly experience. I will definitely be back!!!

AJBKDMPef_HTvNI9lEnBsw.text: The reviews were on point about customer service. Opened the door and welcomed us upon arrival. Mr. Mama was super friendly. Even offered to call a taxi for us after we finished up.  Excellent food, big potions. Defiantly a top place to eat breakfast at. We got here around 6:30am and no crowds then.

Fjdeg_tDmdxuoc656uV1nQ.text: Excellent food, excellent service, clean dining area and clean bathrooms = clean kitchen.   Will make this a regular stop when in LV.

vdP0XPdC1CN9U1WYheNK-w.text: Found me a new breakfast place the food is delicious and the employees are so nice and friendly had the biscuits and gravy should have ordered the small but it was so good and had to get the cinnamon roll to go save dessert for later this place is so packed people wait outside so expect to wait but worth the wait there fast

vBDo1AzXfFQg4kDKCQydGQ.text: BREAKFAST TIME!  Price: Look to spend about $10 per item.  Parking: large lot  Food: Portions are HUGE. Pancakes are fluffy and large. I would order the omelet again (+$1.50 for egg whites). I would NOT order the corned beef hash again.  Notes: Family friendly vibe.

If5FesmB_mEoKyEZ9iIYQQ.text: Me and my Wife eat here every weekend and its phenomenal!!! Everything is great here especially the service

xa9LaftvnXj25sQ6V6ouFQ.text: Mr. mama comes from a Greek diner background. Awesome spot for breakfast, been many times since they were located about a mile away from where they currently are.  Highly recommend their corn beef hash or omelettes, good, especially Greek omelette. They offer an option for just a few cents extra to do their home fries with peppers and onions. Soooo delicious!  Their coffee is also better than average.

SD5gMlhJBIn88VHjzDcf2w.text: Excellent breakfast. The hash browns were the best I've ever had. The service was fantastic and we were seated immediately.

0UcPs7cZbEzr5DlCqHCUeQ.text: Mr Mamas is an excellent place for breakfast and lunch!  You can't miss the sign driving by as it stands out from the other businesses in the plaza.  I've tried the gravy, which is their specialty and I must say it is delicious.  I would like to try to chicken fried steak with gravy and eggs next time I visit Mr Mamas, it looks amazing.  On my last visit I had Mr Mamas French toast which included two large pieces of French toast cut in half accompanied by eggs and three crispy pieces of bacon which you can substitute with ham or sausage.  Excellent portion of food for the pricing and I almost finished the entire meal except for a quarter slice of French toast.  The French toast is not as battery as some places I've had but is very tasty with hints of cinnamon powder.  The atmosphere is a bit noisy as it's one large room of tables kind of close to each other but the food and service distract you from the rowdiness.  Top choice in Vegas for breakfast and lunch!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

2KDkJFUODY2ZcHCBBTyyMA.text: Go for the food, not for the experience. Slow and inattentive staff.  tl;dr  Our party of 2 arrived at 11:40am and were seated fairly quickly.  We didn't have to wait in line, but it seemed like they were about to hit max capacity.  The seats were still wet from them wiping it down and neglecting to dry the seat with a fresh towel afterwards.    It took a good 5 minutes for our server to come to us to take our drink and food order. Our server seemed really distracted by her cell phone. At first I just assumed that they took orders on a device, but half way through our order she took out a notepad? Anywho, I ordered a eggs benedict and my friend ordered a swiss mushroom burger.   And then we waited...and waited.....and waited... I finally flagged down our server at 12:20pm and asked where our food was.  She said that the eggs took a long time (really?) and that it's coming soon.  We finally got our breakfast food at 12:25pm - 40 mins after we arrived at the restaurant. Our server didn't even seem to realize that it took so long, and obviously no apology was even offered.  The only reason that I'm giving a 2 stars is because the food was delicious! But I would probably not return due to the excessive long wait and inattentive staff.  Our check arrived promptly when we were finished and they collected it fairly promptly as well. And then we waited.....and waited.....and waited. It took another 5 mins before they got my change back to me.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Restaurant interior

eDQ20eYtvKdm07fXlFgnzg.text: I enjoy this place for breakfast when I'm in the area.  There are lots of people waiting and helping to serve the food, so the service is always quick and friendly.  The food is nothing crazy, normal breakfast options, but I haven't had any complaints for sure.  It's not a place I would make a special trip out to, but if you are in the area for breakfast, I would highly recommend giving it a try.

FR96JoFadqjvNDADZlW1GQ.text: Long wait on a Sunday, but soooo worth the wait! Food was delicious and extremely filling... we had the chicken fried steak (yummy), mushroom omelette (yummy), breakfast burrito (yummy), and pancakes (didn't like them much, you could taste the flour).... the customer service was beyond awesome! Will definitely be back whenever we are in Vegas!

7EtEV8i7w0DQPQXH1Iniog.text: This was the best chicken fried steak I've ever had!  The service was excellent. It was a very busy day when we arrived but they got us seated within ten minutes.  The owner was present and very welcoming and funny!  I highly recommend this restaurant for breakfast or lunch!

BmarLdXe8sBZITSIJZPAzw.text: So glad we chose to try this place out. I was getting tired of going to the same spot whenever Friends or Family is in town. Went onto Trip Advisor and read the reviews, because a good friend of ours highly recommended this restaurant. We waited for a bit, but it's worth it. Can't wait to go back again and try different dishes with my whole Family.   Our hostess was friendly and happy, which is very inviting..People kept coming and it was a bit busy and food took a bit longer than expected, but it was yummy. Portions are very shareable. Only downfall was, nobody came by to refill our beverages. Hash browns extra crispy was a plus as well.   Date of Visit: July 15, 2017

nu_mEzQr7kxekFfZWO6zZw.text: Great place very busy will be back all the stuff we ordered was made fresh. I like that they use ordering at the table but they could use Nowait to Managment the wait list

t9_RPJQFyZJT5LaJ_HOi5g.text: This place was delicious! The food was great portions, and the prices were just right, Derrick & Shawn are the nicest!  We will definitely be back! 10 stars not 5!!!!! The pancakes & cinnamon roll was awesome! We felt welcomed and can't wait to be back in Vegas to visit Mr.Mamas again!!!

BVPghyD53X5JApQpgxA5hg.text: Had to try a restaurant with over 2000 reviews that retained 4.5 stars, and it lived up to the hype. Getting off the hustle and bustle if the strip was nice. The food was solid. We enjoyed pancakes, eggs, omelettes, and a burger, which pleased everybody in our group. We we're greated warmly, and despite the short wait were seated quickly . Our server, Jenna, took our order and got us food efficiently and kindly. Our cups were never empty. She also showed us the tag and explained the charges, which I thought was nice, thorough touch. Everything was clean including the peeks I got into the kitchen. If I was going to be picky, I'd say the bathroom could have been cleaner, but I'd be being pretty pick. Great stop on our trip!

HEK0A_DkffnA-08cCDPtlA.text: Solid food, great service, very reasonably priced. Even Mr. Mama himself came to our table to ask how everything was and to thank us for our business. I love that you can order single pancakes & French toast. Omelettes are 4 eggs and only cost about $10-15. Great breakfast; I will return!

gPUCoRaPtoENR_AvHV2kGA.text: Just left from having a late breakfast at Mr Mamas and ohhhhh my goodness. We are so stuffed and so satisfied with the food and service.   We ordered the Chicken fried steak and eggs and the regular steak and eggs with a side of biscuits and gravy. Everything tastes absolutely delicious! Even the coffee was great. Our waitress Jenna was super friendly, as was everyone else working there.   I highly recommend this place. This will definitely be my go to place next time I'm in town!!

bTXOK32iQs3suTNdbkn5gA.text: This used to be our go to place going there for breakfast on Saturdays and on occasion, for lunch during the work week.  But on two separate occasions, found the demeanor of the owner unprofessional.  On one occasion we went for breakfast and always thought it was nice he would come round and talk to his customers, but bringing politics into it and bashing the president was awkward.  We thought it was a one off day but went there for lunch.  We found their chef had left which made me realize that their tuna was not up to par and lo and behold he stops at our table and starts with the politics.  When we go out for  meal, we want to eat and enjoy our meal and not to be made uncomfortable by talking of a topic that should not be talked about with customers.  It totally put us off and we don't go there anymore.

5z8EslKlwnjEE-JdUi3ZeA.text: I loved the at-home, down to earth vibe of this restaurant. My boyfriend and I ate here while visiting Vegas on a very busy Saturday morning and while the wait to be seated took about 35 mins (totally understandable), the food and the service more than made up for it! Our waitress was so friendly and attentive and the kitchen prepared our meals within 10 minutes of us sitting down.  The biscuits and gravy were amazing! They make their gravy with bits of bacon, sausage and maple syrup.  It's fantastic! Definitely give it a try when you visit Mr. Mama's!

NPij9o76PZB9cXG9_JTExQ.text: When I land in Vegas in the morning. This is where I go first before checking into my hotel. Best breakfast in town

5vrtueeS5dlRvj5Au1ltAg.text: Great for breakfast, lots of seating, friendly service.  Can't speak for the lunch menu but had the Cali omelette and was quite good.  Everything tasted fresh.

6WdBOzI-AHua0NGPSgc6ZA.text: Awesome waitress. Amazing omelette best I have ever had it was so fluffy. Hash brown were good. Cinnamon roll not as good as I would like. Salsa good but they charge for it. Sour dough toast was not flavorful. Very clean nice atmosphere.  Owner says hi to u and they are nice to their staff it seems. We went early u can tell they probably get real busy like most good places to eat.

iWjzQpJ4orpZJfZKxOdVaA.text: Came here Super Bowl sunday with my siblings. This was on our food list to try this vacation. I actually called in advanceand asked how long the wait was. The lady who picked up the call was very friendly and told me there wasn't a wait at the moment but could change any time. We got to the restaurant around 9ish and were seated right away.   Our server was Jac (Jackie) who was really attentive and nice! We asked what were recommended and favorites-chicken fried steak, eggs benedict, eggs florentine was her fave, and the omelettes. My brother and I shared the Chicken Fried Steak and my 2 sisters shared the Eggs Benedict with a side of Bacon. Food came out in a timely manner and was delicious. The bacon was also crispy just the way I like it. The hollandaise sauce on there was the right amount too.   The restaurant was clean, had TVs available (at that time it was on ESPN i think covering NFL stuff which was awesome) and the staff was really friendly!   When we left they were starting to get busy. So helpful tip would be to call ahead to know what you may expect on the wait!  I regret not trying the cinnamon roll or the french toast so that would be next on my list when I come to Vegas again!

I ordered the mama short stack which consists of 2 huge fluffy delicious pancakes...bacon that was perfectly crispy and eggs cooked your way.  Me and the boy shared...it was more than enough. We beat the crowd so it made the experience better!! Visit this place..it will cure any hangover...it's off the strip with ample parking!

ixtuUO2UX6D1HXevT613Ww.text: Stopped by this place for breakfast due to the high yelp ratings.   After having breakfast here I have to say this place is just okay. I ordered the biscuits with gravy along with hash browns. Gravy was over seasoned with pepper and the hash brown tasted undercooked. For the prices they charge $9.75 for biscuits and gravy along with hash browns it was underwhelming. I've tasted better breakfast elsewhere with lower prices. The staff was friendly and so was the manager. The place was very clean and quaint. It does tend to get busy from 9-11am.   Average tasting food. Would I recommend? Probably not.

I1KWtJAIB-SCyRSspzYoIw.text: Delicious great food and fast service even on a busy day the manager was awesome and the chef even came out and said hello that was a really nice touch. I see why I came and they have great reviews I will definitely be Back!

Their gravy was delicious, and portions are huge.  We didn't eat until around 5:00pm after eating there.  It's you're typical breakfast place they have biscuits and gravy, omelettes, steak and eggs, pancakes etc.  Prices are extremely reasonable as well.

It's a great atmosphere and they make you feel like family they are so friendly and welcoming to everyone that walks through the door .

1SXn9AedxAOl3G-6Ni-PwA.text: My wife and I split the Eggs Benedict Florentine and French Toast. Both were done spot on. The French Toast was NOT overcooked, which happens too often, and the Eggs Benedict was perfect. We'll be back when we are in town the next time!

Bl2ewqQFmNqmpHK4LLJBzQ.text: We came in again today, they said the  wait was close to 30 we got seated sooner. It was worth the wait.   Today we ordered the mamas stack, chicken fried steak and build your own omelette.   The staff is friendly and quick. The food was cooked just the way we ordered it.   The portions are big and although it's super busy I never felt rushed to leave. The owner is super nice and goes around the tables to ask people about their food and their experience.   Jazmin our server was very attentive and I would definitely come eat here again.

gXBxIKfsUsv6aoJsswffaA.text: Try it for yourself. You won't regret it. Best service I've had in ANY restaurant and the food is amazing. Staff really keeps this place running. TRY IT! (Drive from LA for them)

9bvhxX4aMbhl5DnkA1IjuQ.text: We made a stop here after arriving in Vegas early morning. We were accommodated regularly since we had a bigger party of 14 people, it's not far from the airport and it's located in a plaza so it also has good parking.   Food: 4/5 I got the chicken fried steak and it was soooooooo good! They have homemade gravy and it was one of the best ones I've had yet, I got a side of eggs and they were well done as well as their potatoes. If you get their potatoes stick to their cube potatoes, they had a crunch yet they were soft in the inside. Only reason I'm giving this a four is because my boyfriend got the steak with eggs & the steak was not good. It came out looking thin & was chewy. If you come here stay to the more popular options (chicken fried steak, eggs Benedict) I also have to compliment them on their pancake, it is huge! And their toast was the perfect amount of buttery. They do serve huge portions so I would also recommend sharing if you both don't have a big appetite.   Staff/Customer Service: They are definitely open, honest & genuine. Since we had a big party they let us know if it was okay to serve the two couples that got there before us. They wanted us to feel appreciated and I have to applaud to that. Many restaurants lack communication and at mr.mamas they treat you like family.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

UWnwGXvGlW3BPBLIZ-LhaA.text: Have to give Ro (sorry if misspelled) the nice young lady who held the phone, take out orders, register, & whatever else came her way down. Like I told her most people do not tip when they order for togo but unless you've been in the restaurant business and or any job where tips matter they will never get it. Hopefully the good make up for the bad.  The food that we had was worth the wait! I loved the honesty & friendliness of all the staff there.  The coffee was not as strong as we'd like but still delicious. I had eggs benedict & bacon as the meat with the hollandaise sauce on the side. My husband had the best chicken fried steak & eggs ever and he let me try and I AGREE!
