We enjoyed pancakes, sausage, bacon, eggs...all my breakfast needs were met.  Not fancy, and just what I needed.

Oz-eTcloMaurYGtEubETFA.text: This is how it's done! Very good food, great value, and excellent service from entry to exit.   Mr. Mamas lived up their reputation.

MRg0bYnQC8JD1ElGoUy6Dw.text: We love it here!   Fairly close to the house, excellent service, friendly staff, delicious food and very good coffee.  Definitely worth the wait!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

s_F1oI4vys9FLzehpiBeRg.text: Mr. Mamas is the type of restaurant I search for in Vegas. There's nothing like a ma and pa greasy spoon. The staff was incredibly attentive and helpful. I ordered a grilled ham and cheese sandwich on Texas toast and man it was delicious. The melt was perfect and actually one of the best sandwiches I've ever had. I have to be honest I really enjoy the name as well too.

m3XF_UJvrg3fjLc5Hyicrg.text: The food was absolutely amazing. It was everything i expected. I hax the eggs benidict with sausage... AMAZING. It was my first time eating eggs benidict and im hooked! We also got the steak amd eggs. The steak was fatty but thats ok because we like the fat :) Our server Alex was so sweet. He was attentive and on top of everything. Needless to say the food was delicious i cant wait to go back.

50stixc83gtfYXnHQ7Faww.text: One of the most friendly restaurants I've ever been to.  Food was very good we had breakfast and is priced very reasonably.

W9pJViwsWm14PrbWNzXleA.text: First of all the food was so bomb! We came from the strip just to eat some amazing breakfast. I was definitely impressed. This place has great reviews for a reason. When we walked in we were greeted by a nice lady at the front and a very nice man. We gave our name and waited roughly 10 minutes, which I was totally fine waiting. We did order quite a bit of food and we totally underestimated the portion sizes cuz they are huge. I will def come back on my next trip to Vegas.   And their hot chocolate is sooooo delicious

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BN_1zgPSpN0MMKVGRL2h7g.text: Great for the hangover munchies. It gets busy as hell though so call ahead and make a reservation if you can. I'm giving it 4 stars because where as everything was delicious and exactly what I expected I was told it would be a 30 minute wait, but that turned into hour and 15 minutes.

M0CzoFC7kEKrrhJAEHwmog.text: We come here every time we are in Vegas or passing through Nevada. The food is delicious  The services is for the most part great ...  Why only 3 stars in such a high rated establishment? Well I went to use to restroom before we left and my 12 year old waited at the table.. she's a pretty slow eater... when I got out of the table a saw two people at the table. As I approached one of the gentleman cleared all her dishes. I asked if she was done... she said a solid five people asked to clear her plates and she felt rushed. I get they want that high turn around and there is a long wait. I am respectful of that. But I am also a paying customer and do not feel our meal should be rushed.

iOIm-ZzAlu-m-faKpbOJ-A.text: The food is delicious. Everything is made heartily: nice large plates full of delicious food, and the customer service to boot! This place is a must try for breakfast, and the lunch is great as well! They open early, at 06:00 too so if you want to come in early or before work, it's possible!!   The workers are nice, down to earth, really accomodating. I had the pleasure of meeting the owner and it's a feel-at-home service from the start. I would DEFINITELY recommend at least one visit to try it for yourself!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ooops! Ate the food before posting! Big portions, amazing customer service, great prices, amazing taste. Worth it!!

E6hd5dCD6a3CdnF8R7iMBg.text: This restaurant is number one in Vegas for a reason - excellent food and amazing customer service. We waited for about 20 minutes and it was completely worth it. The owner o'clock so around and engages with his customers. All the staff are super attentive and want to ensure the best experience. I had the Cali omelet and my husband had the chicken fried steak, which was amazing! Food is fresh, the restaurant is so clean and overall an amazing experience. Wish we were here longer so we could go back.

t_7uwrHfWkwiwuxhWBeciw.text: This place was packed when we arrived, but their level of service immediately impressed. The hostess kept time for how long it took to seat guests and everyone hustled together to clear tables quickly.   I ordered corn beef hash and eggs and substituted pancakes for the potatoes/toast. The food was great, but the staff is what makes me want to come back. The owner is friendly, taking the time to greet every single table. Not only that, he worked alongside his team, even remarking to one of the guests that his title is "Head Dishwasher" or "Head Busboy", and his actions showed it.   I'm looking forward to coming back someday!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0Hx03_ZaWDgcoiBFZ6LBmg.text: Wow, wow, wow! Mr Mamas is that down home, mom and pop breakfast joint that I have been searching high and low for! I had to drive 30 minutes to get there, but it was worth it. I went with a fellow Yelp friend. We waited around 20 minutes to be seated. The crew is a very nice and enthusiastic bunch. You can tell that they are happy to be there which is awesome to see! They had a Saint Patrick's Day special going on that came with a corned beef hash eggs benedict and choice of hash browns/home fries with a deep fried cinnamon roll, which is what my friend ordered. Yes, you read that correctly. Deep. Fried. Cinnamon. Roll. It was amazing, crunchy, and the kind of sugar rush I needed for the early afternoon. They even dressed it up with a drizzle of green icing for a festive touch. I ordered a French toast breakfast with eggs and sausage. They let me add strawberries and whipped cream for an additional $1. Everything was delicious. Breakfast food is my favorite comfort food and man, does this place do it justice not just with the food, but with their friendly atmosphere as well. Very impressed.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sausage and eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast. Strawberries and whipped cream for $1 more

Y2Vodmga2Ac2Rl17Xy4ljg.text: Where do I start!  My family and I had to wait 30 mins. It didn't feel long. This place is incredible when it comes to customer service. From the host to the servers, their service was impeccable. They are accommodating and friendly. The cinnamon roll is a must. Absolutely delicious!  I ordered the chicken Caesar salad. The chicken breast was hot and grilled.  The dressing is thick and tasty. The salad was enough for two people.  The fries are delicious. I loved them. No crispy coating. I hate that. Please keep the fries the same. They refill your drink without asking. They clear the plates without asking. They are open from 6am - 3:00pm Monday- Friday. 7:00-3:00 on Saturday/Sunday. A must visit when you come to Vegas!!! Located in the shopping center on Jones and Russell. Close to the Orleans casino. When people are willing to wait, the food is good.

cJr9XD8TiXSMsWNFmwgpcw.text: My friend and I came here for brunch on Sunday when we were in Vegas.  We were starving and wanted to stay away from the crowds on the strip.  We got here around 10:30 and the place was packed.  We were quoted a wait of an hour, but it ended up being closer to 30 minutes.  Our waitress was very friendly and attentive.  The menu is extensive so everyone should be able to find something they want to eat here.  My friend and I ordered the same thing - coffee, a cali omelette, and a cinnamon roll.  The omelettes are huge and made with 4 eggs.  They also come with hash browns or crispy potatoes and either toast or a pancake.  I opted for the hash browns and pancake.  The omelette was tasty and included sausage, cheese, avocado, and pico (I ordered it without sour cream).  The hash browns were well cooked - crispy on the outside but not overdone.  The pancake was tasty but nothing special.  The cinnamon roll was tasty but a tiny bit dry.  I would still recommending getting one though.  It seems based on the reviews here that most people order one.  The prices were pretty reasonable given the quantity and quality of the food.  For everything that we ordered, our bills were only around $20 each before tip.  I would definitely recommend checking this place out if you're in the area.

VychjQfghx4XXpWZ9-6yRg.text: Gave this place a try since so many good reviews. Food is good and place is cool. Don't get me wrong but it's just an average place to grab some food. Don't see the hype. But fair prices and good food so they get a good review

ybV6jYaNucnymAmi4skvnQ.text: Skip the hotel buffet and swing by Mr Mamas. We arrived about 9:15 am for breakfast and immediately greeted by a pleasant gentleman who opened the door for us. We may have arrived at the perfect time since there was no wait, we were seated right away. The 5 people that tended to our table provided excellent service. Definitely great team work at Mr Mamas. We ordered the Mama's breakfast burrito, Mamas Stack pancake breakfast, and a breakfast wrap "Marty's Wrap"... It had eggs, potatoes, bacon, pepper jack cheese, tomato and AVOCADO!! Everything was super delicious. The coffee was spot on good and my cup was never empty. I would definitely return to Mr Mamas again and suggest you pay them a visit too.  By the way, the hot cakes were HUGE!!  ENJOY!

Ocy6h5ba1ijPAEjKO9HE-A.text: FANTASTIC! Not only was the food delicious but the service ( Jose) was top notch! Our group ordered the breakfast burrito, Pancakes (HUGE), breakfast egg sandwich and corned beef and hash. All meals were large portions and the corned beef was homemade.  We all left with a smile and a full belly.  We will be back!

Ez9pPshvrs_kmMjgg0AcNA.text: I'm going to go with a 4 and a half Star... Found this nice little restaurant on yelp and decided to check it out. When we arrived it was packed with one table left open.  The hostess was very friendly and seated us right away and welcomed us.  The waiter came over and he was super friendly and efficient.  Our breakfast came out quick fresh and hot so kudos to the chefs. The manager came over and asked us how our meal was, which was nice.  I took one star away was because for whatever reason, we kind of felt rushed. Maybe because we were seated by the front door. Not sure why but we felt like we had to hurry.  Other than that... an amazing place to get some really good breakfast with friendly people.  Will recommend. Two thumbs up.

Tn1dhZQmZLP1ml_jJ1eSOw.text: Great food and the price is not bad at all.  We received GREAT customer service from our waiter Lourdes, but the rest of the staff is also very friendly, and professional.  We didn't wait long at all to get our food.  This place is SUPER busy, but well worth the wait.  Also very clean restaurant, only down side was the tables are a little small, and we couldn't fit all of our plates (family of four).  We'll definitely re-visit when in Vegas.  Food was very YUMMY!  FYI:  Pancakes are HUGE!! Not your average "Denny's" or other diner sizes.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pancakes

YK_fniRheQNFbgYjg0zslA.text: Found on Yelp.  Food was amazing.  Large portions ...we have a to go bag!  The cinnamon roll melts in your mouths. Best I've ever had!  Eggs perfect!  Yummy bacon and pancakes too!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The pancakes are huge!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sourdough Toast
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs and Bacon

V2Qc6leWUOGBlTABnC6LdQ.text: A unique breakfast experience! Nowhere else you can get your breakfast made and served by all men with a rough demeanor dressed in very cute aprons and chefs hats with delicate ruffles! Very good slightly comical vibe and 50s dinner decor. Great food!

QfariH841IqivYE7P3dcAg.text: Great breakfast spot off the strip! The hospitality and service were both great but the food was awesome! They had tasty specials... best bang for your buck. We went there twice, we liked it so much while there.

pKy7hfQvXUBwOHX4l98Wtg.text: MR MAMAS is the absolute  *B*E*S*T*   BREAKFAST LOCATION IN THE LAS VEGAS AREA...  Make sure to go to their ***NEW LOCATION*** one light West on Russell Rd/Jones Blvd!  I have eaten there dozens of times, traveling all the way from Henderson.  Well worth the 15 minute drive.  Great food, great service, and great prices!

rG8a6RipXRfh1qXOfwuYjA.text: I had the clam chowder and eggs Benedict florentine. I was a little skeptical about the clam chowder being from the east coast and all. It was delicious! The eggs Benedict was plated nicely and was also good. Service was quick and friendly. Home fries were thinly sliced that had a nice crisp to it. Delicious as well! We waited 30 minutes and the prices were fair.

MJvsN3d_uO2hBopoNY2fJQ.text: Delicious breakfast! You might want to expect a little wait because this place is popular. We had the Mamas pancakes and biscuits with sausage gravy! Not a single complaint!

LOZgmFOIbjV-g0fZ0cKeCg.text: I go here all the time. I've gotten an omelet every time and it's delicious. The service is always great with a friendly staff and fast orders on the food. A good classic breakfast place with tasty and solid dishes.

F35C31gn5_jJEN-splZOkg.text: If you've been here before, you already know; if you haven't, you need to find out. Every time I come here I am pleasantly greeted at the door and made to feel I am welcome! That's just the beginning. Once you get seated, the waitresses are very attentive (without being overly doing it). The food, consistently amazing! In fact, this is one of my favorite places when it comes to consistency. I know what to expect when I order: how the toast will be, how the texture of scrambled eggs will be, how mouth watering the bacon is... Everything I've tried here is always yummy! Definitely one of the good places around town! Thanks Mr. Mama for this wonderful gem!

wTum10gFl3HzTg1Tchzb6A.text: The best food we ever had in Vegas. We took an extra detour just to get here for breakfast and we weren't disappointed. The french toast was light and tasty and the omelette was absolutely delicious. The owner also has a lot of stories to tell!

JMtm9mY00-g_HZ8Xp_wh7w.text: Best breakfast in Vegas!!!!!! Friendly, fast service. Excellent food!! Hash browns were perfect. I wish we would have found this sooner into our trip.

GgglL8vnoTDWCFgsoBSAVQ.text: We left the hotel to go to a local place simply because we were tired of buffet food and wanted a pipping hot breakfast. We came to this place based on the reviews. We did not have to wait for a table, but we did have to wait for our food for what felt like an eternity. Was the wait worth it? NO! The food was cold when it arrived AND we noticed a table that came AFTER us get their food first. On top of all that, the check was put on the table when we started eating; what if we wanted to order something else! Take your money elsewhere. I have had better pancakes and eggs.

1JuxCJDOSpDEdjlx7rNm0Q.text: Great place to head to for breakfast on the way out of Vegas -- or really, just for any reason.  Everything we ordered was top drawer; fresh, delicious, and hearty portions for very reasonable prices.   Staff is excellent too; they even open the door for you.  We're going to make this place our regular stop!

ixnRp7oTnR8BgTU1aUubqA.text: Have the breakfast burrito! It is enough for two & has everything (eggs, potatoes, sausages & cheese)! It is a meal in itself! Love the ample parking & the super friendly host. A good place for breakfast on a Sunday. Be prepared for a wait, but so worth it! Oh, yeah, don't forget the cinnamon rolls, made here everyday!

FLJxeBvlaYEYw-cJeMF82g.text: This place is a breakfast and lunch place only - closes at 3pm. We stopped here for lunch one weekday. We arrived around 12:30 or so. The seating and service were quick.  We ate burgers and sandwiches. The Mr Mamas burger is huge -- (2) 1/2 lb patties. The Mr Mamas sandwich is turkey, bacon, avocado is also quite large, like all their sandwiches. For light eaters, you can split one and do fine. The give you the choice of fries, rings or salad -- we tried all and were all good, especially the side salad. I think I would try their omelettes the next time -- they look amazing. Can't go wrong with Mr Mamas.

pNe_4H7SuL8eeKukoO88Ww.text: Yelp got this one right good coffee and a great breakfast. Place was very busy and far away from the Vegas tourist traps.

prQOL9BLA2oPXyZJvOJauQ.text: Came to Vegas for Memorial Day weekend. After yelping a few breakfast spots we came across Mr. Mamas and I gotta say it was worth it. I highly recommend coming here, the staff is great, very friendly and attentive. The food is just AMAZING, you gotta try their cinnamon roll it is hot and fresh! Our waitress offered us a sample of their bacon, sausage and maple syrup gravy it was delicious. This place will definitely be our go to breakfast spot when in town!!

CI1qO55aHpnxf4PblJixmA.text: Found this place on Yelp two days ago and we already had to bring the rest of the family in. 9am on a Saturday morning with no wait, we were greeted enthusiastically by at least 5 people when we walked through the door and 3 people teamed up to get our party of 7 sat. It was refreshing being somewhere that these folks obviously want to be and enjoy their jobs. The food came out timely, refills constantly happened throughout the meal and we were regularly checked in on.  I don't even know where to start on the food. FANTASTIC!  This is a place I will definitely come back to when I am back in town and deserves a 10 star rating!

nCbSnJE5Or0EIBBq0l6Q9g.text: Have been here mutiple in the past 2 months! Amazing food, coffee, service, just absolutely incredible. I've yet to find another place where the owner is there almost every time I walk in, and on top of that he actually stops at your table, asks you how your doing, makes sure the food is to your liking, and thanks you for your business. I just can't say enough about this great breakfast & lunch establishment!!! 5 stars every time!!!

nuR0YXZ9ZwRBE2rkkGM3lw.text: Omg!!! This place is amazing!!! Amazing food, amazing customer service!! If you're In Vegas I totally recommend this place!!

lxf2kYvjJKroVkrltZKcGQ.text: THE best breakfast anywhere in the US not just Vegas. You can't go wrong with any item on the menu. The friendliest owner and staff. We make it a point to have breakfast there each time we are in Vegas.

vIEuF29YWzqIgCHaiSuV6Q.text: We just ate here for breakfast and it was awesome! Great staff! Great food! Being from New Orleans it's hard to find good food away from home but Mr Mamas has so much to offer on the menu and they don't hold back on flavor! The owner was so friendly and gave us great tips on how to enjoy this city!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. A fruit cup! Very fresh!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict Florentine

dk6XWmbpsn7GvinhLOj5Zg.text: You really can't beat this place for a quality breakfast in this part of town. The Cali omelet was fantastic. The pancakes are made light and fluffy. Even the toast was made right, with the right amount of butter. The service was outstanding, and so was the value. Just realize that this place is well known, and on the small side, so get there early if you don't want a long wait for a table.

V4xkfTkFDjKUfznejUsXPw.text: Best breakfast spot in Vegas, hands down. This is our second time and did not disappoint. A must try!!

k1abT7YhQYi3OthZ0XPpCg.text: Starting the day off right.  No six pound breakfast burritos, 24 inch pancakes, or ghost pepper infused syrup challenges. Just really great breakfast food served by the friendliest staff.  We're talking crispy hash browns, perfectly poached eggs atop toasted English muffins with a dollop of rich, not to tart hollandaise sauce, fluffy made from scratch pancakes, flaky on the outside moist on the inside biscuits, and hand pulled, spice flavor packed corned beef hash.  An everyday cup of Joe to wash it down. Nothing fancy but everything correct.  Service is exceptionally friendly. Not over-the-top but comfortable and welcoming.  Off Strip pricing.  Straightforward, solid, zero complaints. An excellent choice for breakfast off the Strip.

s6u9Jpduc9A7PBvCW3l--A.text: Thank you Yelpers, so glad we came here for breakfast. The hubby and I ordered lots of food but every single thing was good. We're talking like 6 or 7 things (counting sides). Will definitely return when we're back in town.

q3HMQ37vHRCKUSNhvJwaJA.text: We came here Friday before Labor Day for breakfast. The place didn't look fantastic y at all but it was full. I imagined why. The food was great. And the service too. All portions were big and the prices were very good. I was impressed by the Chicken Fried Steak and eggs. It was a huge meal and the taste was fantastic. It was way much better than any popular diner like Denny's or even IHOP. We will come again for sure.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs

Jmo129DlZSXVSbETJbnyLg.text: Friendly welcoming service, perfectly cooked breakfast, spotless interior - yummy, clean and friendly - with vintage photosfrom their family businesses on Rt 66. Totally recommend. Only things that could improve is real maple syrup and real butter but who has that anymore, any way.

1GY7C6OpLrthKcUYKfxLSg.text: The best breakfast and lunch place in Vegas!   5 stars *****  Service is top notch! Sean, Mr. Eds wife, Denise (i think that's her name) are really friendly and professional. .   We ordered the following :  - Corn beef hash   - French dip sandwich   EXCELLENT!  I wish they had this in San Diego and Temecula.   We will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8tM8cP9UG-gA1_tCwewmTQ.text: Staff is always polite and they accommodate large parties with ease. The French toast is lite and fluffy, fresh cinnamon rolls are delicious, pancakes are large fluffy and good as well. Hash browns are made to perfection and they have no issues making them crispy the way I prefer them. A good breakfast/brunch spot which has been consistent over multiple visits.

UtarbQ5Q3BNTCmgZh9zj1Q.text: Food was ok, larger is not always better. Had the cinnamon roll and hubby had pancakes. The pancakes was tastier than the roll.  I give it a 4 because service was great and it looks like a program they might be running for teenagers. I think it's great what this establishment is doing for the teens!

6xCWiBeq_86SA6DjjHbd8w.text: My girlfriend and I wanted to eat somewhere calm away from the strip, so we came here after some quick searching.  While we waited for a table to open up, the host Shawn entertained everyone with quips and jokes while calling out names to be seated. Our server Jenna was very attentive and friendly, making us feel right at home.  Oh, and also, the food was delicious, way better than you should be getting at this price. My girlfriend had the biscuits and sausage gravy (also contains bacon and a hint of maple syrup, yum). I got the cali omelette. Both were generous portions and quite tasty.  We'll definitely return on our next trip up.

sc3JZ9LUwmzJiMiFVKQgHQ.text: The atmosphere is lively and the service is great. They make you feel like friends they've known forever. The food was delicious and well, I love breakfast food, but that breakfast burrito was a winner for me.

zcOVwH0-UGoxOn3SfQoxgA.text: Great service overall. Was greeted with an open door. Owner was present and introduced himself which wasn't expected at all and the staff was very tentative. If you know me you know how big I am on customer service and this staff knocked it out of the park. Thanks for being awesome and I know it was genuine because nobody looked out of place or uncomfortable. I'll definitely be back and will recommend this place to others.

U42cA4Yh1dkr3xmmvxk6cQ.text: AmaZing service by each wait staff.  Delicious food!  Fried steak and eggs were the BOMB!!!  Worth every penny and every bite.  Will be back again!!!

ebTh0yckUwYAMy1fOk6x5Q.text: Came in with my husband for lunch and impressed by the speed, never had to ask for a rush on anything and the selections were good and more importantly tasted great! Pleasantly surprised by the ability to give our CC to our server at the table and it never left our sight so there's no issues with fraud which after having CC info stolen at restaurants in the past a huge perk! Fast friendly service, great food and atmosphere reminded me of when we used to hit up local diners in NYC, so kind of homey for us in a transplant kind of way. Also, fruit was super fresh and not weird tasting like it had been sitting or sprayed with anything. Will be back here before/after appts and in the future for lunch with hubs when we have the chance now and then.

UQ3u5njKOyIZy6agatW8Ng.text: A Thursday morning and a 15 minute wait. I take that as a good sign that they have that kind of business in the middle of the week. After ordering I talked with Mr. Mama himself and then my food was there. Huge portions of comfort food.

Lpg7s1KPoCVS32UB7NV5hQ.text: Great customer service my food is always so good every time I pick it up they have it ready in the door always open because there's someone there to open it keep it up guys I love the breakfast burrito is very good

sRbsAPd-YBkZTDjPBH5NxQ.text: I was completely blown away by the food, service and staff at Mr. Mamas. It is clear why they receive such great reviews. You feel like family from the moment you walk through the door.   They were very busy and we had to wait 25 mins to be seated, which was not a problem. Once we sat down, we were immediately greeted by a staff member who took our drink order. A couple minutes later we met our server. Our food came out rather quickly and trust me it did not disappoint!! My omelet was fluffy and delicious. My boyfriend ordered the country fried steak... the crunch on that steak was perfect!   Some of the best customer service I have EVER experienced. At one point my boyfriend dropped his fork and at least 4 workers were there to remedy the situation. My coffee never went cold. The conversation with multiple employees was effortless. I am more than impressed with this place.   Trust me it is my new spot and I will be introducing it to my family and friends. Amazing job Mr. Mamas!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Country Fried Steak w/ scrambled eggs and hash browns. Crispy, tender and flavorful.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali Omelet w/ home fries... Delicious!

HKR1zlwNy8HLm0zOGYHOLQ.text: Read about this place on Yelp and decided to try it out. The first thing I noticed was their customer service. We visited this place twice and both times, a staff member opened the door for us and greeted us with a smile.  There was a wait with locals which is always a good sign but we were seated quickly.  I tried their biscuits and gravy and I was told it is made with sausage , bacon, and a touch of maple...and it was awesome.  My husband's bacon was really good..meaty and not greasy and his hash browns were super crisp..u can also have sauteed peppers added on top....overall a very solid breakfast at a reasonable price....we will definitely be back....10+ for food, cleanliness and service!

6flgM-SGzr9PhlCOAyAdMQ.text: Nick and his team are great, best breakfast or lunch in Vegas!  Can not say enough about this place a must go everytime I'm in Vegas!!!

2EKw8qBcZ2r6QiFDGDfJOQ.text: I visited Mr. Mama's after it was recommended by a colleague and I am so glad we decided to dine there. Upon arrival, there was about a 45 minute wait but it was well worth it. The restaurant definitely gives you "mom and pop" vibes but that's what I loved most...you felt like you were right at home. It's about a 5 minute drive from the Palms so you'd definitely need to Uber or Cab it. I had the blackened steak and eggs and it was delicious. Oh, and the service was great too!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

t4P3eyXkbWEENU92SDqLqA.text: This place was excellent. Service and food were wonderful. The helpings were large and  not to expensive. We had the pancakes, French toast, eggs, sausage, bacon and home fries, all this for only $36. Everything was delicious. Pancakes were huge. You only need one. We will definitely come back and tell our family about this place. A most visit for sure!

mxM4xPgQ69zBrOcF7DGvUw.text: In Las Vegas breakfast is a staple and can be found for ALL DAY DINING just about anywhere you look. But not everyone can do it up quite like Mr Mamas can.  This is the perfect divey breakfast spot located off the strip , in a strip mall, where locals and visitors-in-the-know go to eat. Wait time is slight but front of the house has got it skillfully covered as they move tables, and people, to get you in, feed, and out the door in a timely manner. They offer all your basics that you'll want to see on an all day breakfast menu and skip the upscale and fancy touches. This is basic corn beef hash that's grated not shredded. Big egg omelets with the WHITE and YELLOW parts. Get my drift? Come on in, grab a seat and chow down!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Inside mamas
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. They have daily specials
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside signage

UVsnlabZzqGi371lW3H08w.text: First things first, customer service is amazing here! They opened the door for us, made sure to check on us every once in a while, and even offered to pack up our leftovers with to-go condiments and utensils. They're definitely doing something right and their reviews prove it.   Their portions are pretty big! My sister and I both ordered the country friend steak (with THREE eggs, let me tell you!) and I still have leftovers! Their gravy definitely stands out from other country fried steaks because it has sausage and maple bacon bits in there! The only thing I missed out on is this cinnamon roll I keep hearing about. Definitely will try that next time I'm in the area!

1Vzw2BLjb3Wdz4XZKPsmtA.text: This place serves up tasty meals and honestly warms your heart watching the staff work together to ensure no customer waits longer than they have to, no glass sits empty, and everyone has the best experience. We checked in on a Sunday morning while visiting Vegas and they estimated a 45 minute wait. We didn't have to wait that long and when my husband thanked their manager (a woman who works the entire dining room floor making sure it runs smoothly), she appreciated his kind words and exclaimed "get that man a cinnamon roll!"  To our surprise, a fresh cinnamon roll was delivered within 1-2 minutes. The service was unparalleled. The food was very delicious. My husband had chicken fried steak, we sampled a cup of chili that makes me wish I could order it from my home in California. The French toast was decent, but I don't think it was anything extraordinary compared to other breakfast places.   Overall, we loved our visit and will bookmark this place to return to on our next Vegas visit!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon roll that I&#39;d gladly buy, but the host treated us to for our patience and kindness

Vex_XyWBs9cb7lSxezzf0Q.text: Clearly, this is the place to be off-off the strip. I mean, we were departing soon and had enough of the Vegas parking lots and parking tickets and remembering space numbers. We didn't want to fight crowds and wait an hour. We just needed some food to fuel the day.  Well, we showed up and it was super busy! Monday after July 4th and everybody and their cousin was online for this spot and I can see why. We waited and were rather entertained by the (owner, likely) man with the plan. He took names, helped people understand the real time wait, which was legit. He even said to a couple, as they shuttered at the hour wait time "you can get back in your car, drive all over town and an hour later, maybe find a table. Or you can just wait and chill." They waited and they didn't chill. HAHA.  Our waitress is clearly a star and I wish WISH I could remember her name. She was fast, knew the entire menu inside and out and also, had some advice on the specials. I was not sure if I should get the corned beef hash or not, considering I had it at Mon Ami the day before, so she went and got a sample so I could try it and. That's exceptional, above and beyond service in my book!  Considering how busy they were, the food came out fast and it was cooked well. Over medium eggs were in fact, over medium. Well, strike that. Mine were and my wife had a messy slightly under cooked egg. Not the end of the world.   Pancakes were fluffy and not doughy, flavorful AND the server wipes the syrup bottle each time, before they bring it to the table. (That's a management hack right there) The space was clean, well managed, servers were communicating very well. Our table was next to the kitchen and I could see the servers discussing orders with the cooks and making sure everything was correct, BEFORE it hit the table. That's another start in the management portfolio folks. Attention to detail, at a diner a burger joint or a fine dining spot, is commendable.   LOVE this spot and will be back next time we are in town.

gYDzwK5wlF4Y70AB-sk4WA.text: This is one of our must go to places to eat breakfast when we are in Las Vegas. Nick and his staff are super nice, friendly and make you feel at home. They accommodated our party of 14 without excessive wait time. The food is great. The portions are big enough to share. And the smiles are beyond compare. Here are a few of the dishes we enjoyed.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TeEqxT5oQjRA_fXmNWfdLw.text: I have to say after about a 30 35 minute wait that the service was actually pretty decent. If I had to judge the place on overall definitely four stars. The server seemed a little bit overwhelmed by the volume but was still attentive. Very charismatic and professional. The food was great portions and very delicious. The French toast was about what I expected but the taste was superb. I think they should have tried to combined things so we didn't have so many plates but other than that I thoroughly enjoyed the atmosphere and the food.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy

FhWYaDaTKZYKEWXTsUfzJQ.text: There were groups of people waiting to be seated outside. We almost turned right around and left but decided we'd see how long the wait was. 20 minutes! We decided to wait, because if people were willing to wait in 100 degree weather then they must be doing something right inside. Boy am I glad we waited! I ordered the Eggs Benedict with my choice of Canadian bacon which was tasty, but my friend ordered the chicken fried steak that I had a few bites of and it was DELICIOUS! I will be coming back just for that next time! I also ordered orange juice which was very good, I believe it's fresh squeezed. And I ordered a side of hash browns. I love that they ask if you want it crispy cause I love crunchy hash browns. It was cooked to perfection. Service was great too.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mamas chicken fried steak and over easy eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict with traditional Canadian bacon

_UNo-tCEy7PcffPdfnQsmw.text: Wow! We decided to go to a place away from the strip and into the city and boy am I glad we did!   This place was AMAZING! The costumer service was over the top and I'm thankful for that! I'm a stickler for customer service! It's what keeps people going back time and time again! I can't remember the name of our server but she was amazing! The hostess was amazing and we even got a visit from the owner as he was "table touching"! Every time, we'll be back! The food was so amazing ; as great as the customer service! Thank you guys so much fle proving us with a great visit and great food!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

H5XCkkXwTTofhjSspNcz_g.text: Mr Mamas is a fantastic example of taking something totally uncomplicated (breakfast food) and making it incredible. I can't even BELIEVE how tasty the food was. I had an eggs Benedict with bacon, and my boyfriend the biscuits and sausage gravy. Phenomenal. They were smothered in the perfect amount of hollandaise and gravy, and had the best crunch of the muffins and biscuits. I finished my plate so fast it may as well have been an Olympic record. Even the Orange juice tasted freshly squeezed and oh so cold. Even if you're not crazy hungover, this is THE place to get breakfast off the strip. The service was friendly and efficient too, with only a 20 minute wait on a Friday morning. The owner himself came out to say hello too and make everyone feel welcome and ask how the food was. Little touches like that just can't be beat.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. We cleaned our plates within minutes.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict with bacon and hash browns, biscuits and sausage gravy with tater tots. Plus, freshly squeezed orange juice!

K4iUwhURfKwGKg3xeB01aA.text: I had the Phili Cheesesteak and Rings.  Delicious.  Family ordered omelette and 2 egg breakfast. Service was fast and courteous with very good food.   In and out in less than an hour on a Sunday morning.   Well run operation.   Would definitely recommend.   Only flaw was the omelette did not have the sausage ordered.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Phili Cheesesteak &amp; Rings

aIkeKxD2bV3MeQ-b8Tc2Gg.text: Every time we go to Vegas, we always have to drop by here and have a taste of their delicious breakfast. My main fave is this Steak & Egg!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak &amp; Egg

1Nnccp2ep_fF7gvlsYFFVA.text: The NICEST people ever work here. Like...every single person was extremely nice. Our server was Ryan, and he was fantastic. Very attentive and friendly. I ordered a basic dish--2 fried eggs with hash browns and toast. Didn't expect it to be anything more than what I'd get at Waffle House, but it was!!! Idk what about it made this dish so yummy, but I cleaned my plate. It was delicious!!! Now I know why Mr. Mamas has such amazing reviews. Everyone should stop by.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. It is located in a random strip.

-8YRvo7so_xY9z3rIrN0yw.text: This breakfast and lunch place was packed at 10:30 am. The woman at the door gives a realistic time expectation ("less than 30 sweetie"). They got through the line quickly and efficiently. They managed the chaos really well.   I asked for two recommendations and went with the corn beef hash, with peppers and onions plus a large OJ. The bill was $17.59 with tax. It was very good. Tons of flavor and good portions. If I lived here, it would become a regular spot.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menus

dgpYIQsrGEDs1Pa4HiQVJw.text: Right off the bat I knew Mr. Mamas would be good. It's Greek owned just like all Diners should be! My REAL corned beef hash was like none other in Las Vegas, which you may think is odd, but it's a feat to get it right. Served with my choice of scrambled eggs, their version of home fries and a Thomas's English Muffin, not a generic English muffin. No bagels on the menu, but oh well. Las Vegas isn't a bread city and most commercially provided bread isn't great. I was very impressed with the attentive staff and constantly filled coffee cup. Even on a Thursday afternoon there was a line out the door, so they're doing something right.

2BZj2Sq-3eayp8-Yl8qVsA.text: Awesome breakfast! Very polite, service was great. Very clean, I even saw one guy cleaning the menus.... you don't see that often , will be back often!

EtsPGDI6J-aBes-2s1eKhg.text: We didn't want to eat buffet and wanted to drive back home before traffic hits. We Google for brunch and this place came out as #1 on yelp. We decided to give it a try.  We got there and there was a wait. We waited about 15-20 mins..  I ordered French toast ($12?). Husband ordered steak and eggs ($13) and asked for medium rare. The steak was perfectly cooked.. I tried a piece. It was juicy and well seasoned.  French toast was okay... Nothing special..

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast with sausage and over medium eggs. Strawberries on the side.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and egg with wheat bread. Steak was medium rare.

EUz_tmQwkislyZsNoABamA.text: I got the Eggs Benedict with Turkey Bacon (just ask for it), and I would have taken a picture except when they set it down, I started devouring it!  It was very good and the Hollandaise was very tasty. Perfectly cooked eggs and muffin underneath it was nice and crunchy. The potatoes, I was little surprised because I thought they were gonna' have peppers with them but they were just the potatoes, nothing thrilling but good as well. The French Toast as you can see was delicious you have to ask for butter...so don't forget. Over all, pretty delicious breakfast and I'm pretty particular about my Eggs Benedict.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DMQavGJtI2TGCC3wTD3jSw.text: This was an amazing surprise for me. In a day where it seems businesses care less and less for customer service, this place absolutely killed it!!! I admit, at first when I arrived there, the gentleman calling names was a little intimidating ha ha ha!!! He was yelling names and setting deadlines but he was great with everyone waiting and really sold the business by working with people to get them in, assuring us the wait was worth it. And he was right!!!  Inside, we sat at our table. We had to wait a little bit of time but it was understandable as they were full!!! But our waitress came to the table, apologized for the wait, and gave us a free freshly made Cinnamon Bun!!! (Amazing and delicious!!) We said the wait was not long at all but she insisted and we were floored with her kindness and great customer service. The owner came to our table and mentioned it was his daughter and she would take good care of us!   I really fell in love with this place for the service. The owner was kind, made a genuine compliment to us, and made us feel at home. Everyone had genuinely great customer service!! Nothing fake, actual people that care about the customer and want to give you the best service possible. I couldn't believe how amazing the service was!!  And to top it off, the food was delicious! I had Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs and it was a perfect portion with a delicious homemade taste. And the pancakes are to die for!!! I'm craving them as I write this!! They were fluffy and just the perfect size. One you bite into that with butter and syrup, there is no going back!!! I was so impressed with this restaurant.  I can't say enough about this place, it was truly an amazing experience and will now be my go to breakfast spot every time I visit Las Vegas. The people and food are amazing, this is a must-go and could possible be my favorite breakfast restaurant!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak, Sausage Cheddar Cheese Omelette, and a short stack of Pancakes!!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing buttermilk pancakes!!!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Freshly made Cinnamon Bun!!

5JTrADuYtFvH7AqUjB3mgA.text: Great service! Sunday party of 3 took about 30 minutes.  But the food came out fast and it was pretty good, not the best but it was good ! Missing our side of pancakes in the picture and they were very good !

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali omelet chicken fried steak and Mickey Mouse pancake! Good! ( missing our side of pancakes and bacon )

Xy3ZquDWqRhn-p3aFpUrxg.text: This is the first time I have ever wanted to leave a 5 star plus, or even a 6 star rating.   Upon arrival, the door was opened for us by the owner. Our server Roneshia sat us, gave us the run down, and left to get our drinks. Kat, the manager, dropped by to tell us "we serve big food. You can probably get away with ordering one meal for your kids and splitting it." Who does that? An honest business does that.   Roneshia was prompt, attentive, friendly and a wonderful server. As I told her as we were leaving, she provided the best service we'd ever had.   The food was great. It was indeed big, and even splitting one meal two ways between two kids, there was some extra left for dad.   The owner dropped by and asked where we were from. He was so incredibly friendly, and shared that he'd spent some time in our neck of the woods. He didn't do this to just our table. He asked every single table in there where they were from, and it felt genuine.   After we'd finished eating, he dropped by again to ask "was everything good?" and I told him no. He immediately asked, "what could we have done better?" With a big smile I said nothing, because it was OUTSTANDING. I appreciate that he was soliciting feedback from every table. This is an owner that is out front, involved in the day to day operations, and is serious about customer care.   We will absolutely be back on our next trip. I defy you to find better service- anywhere. You won't. Six stars. They've earned it.

7iudLOCIB1YPl_nh3FUCVQ.text: THIS PLACE IS BOMB came on my bday and they gave me a free cianmmon roll everyone us nice! and funnyour food was soooooo good as well wish i lived here!! would be my #1 breakfast spot fr!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

twS0u-GMtAqz-KEagnVSYQ.text: Breakfast place with dependable quality. Often very busy though. I've only eaten there a couple of times, but it's always eggcellent.

iZQ8nSKW2Cc3BwaK8u-l2g.text: Came here with a group during our Vegas Vacay for brunch and they spotted us approaching and held the door open. Accommodated our group to a table within moments of arriving. Great hospitality great food. Very satisfied.

JjKGitWyLdL6OO4pqZ7lHA.text: So we came here after reading all the reviews on yelp. I must say we waited a long time as a family of 5 but Mr Mamas did not disappoint! The prices were phenomenal, portions huge, delicious food, and great service. I'm so happy we stopped and had brunch. My husband had steak and eggs, while I had the country fried steak. We both had a pancake on the side. The pancakes are as big as a regular sized dinner plate, they are buttery fluffy and filling. Eating brunch here kept us full for the day. I ordered a big breakfast of 3 pancakes, 3 eggs, and bacon for my kids and was able to easily split it 3 ways and they had leftovers. My country fried steak hit the spot as I was missing living in the NC at the moment. We will be dinning here again if we stop in Vegas.

e8p8_-SZoVgE-6nFOPf_nw.text: Super customer service. Nice clean restaurant, no need for fancy decor.  We didn't order anything out of the ordinary. I got the Mr. Mama Short Stack, came with 2 eggs, meat of choice (BACON!), and 2 pancakes; and not little pancakes, big pancakes for less than $8. Doug got the Steak and Eggs; small rib eye steak with 2 eggs, potatoes and toast for $10. We both liked our food and I feel like the prices are cheaper than many breakfast joints in town. We did buy the Yelp deal which is a kick ass offer. We had a couple of friends with us that got a Breakfast Sandwich and the Biscuits and Gravy (they add maple syrup to their gravy, interesting!), unfortunately weren't as pleased with their food as we were. Me and my husband would definitely go back and try it again.

XiPD103_GGFmajvBkdirOA.text: The owner of the place is an amazing guy! This entire place makes you feel like family and the food is great! Their customer service is phenomenal!! It's just an all around great place to be and have breakfast at!  Thank you !!!

iFSuy1V-tskMfp17sBOh-w.text: THEE BEST chicken-fried steak I've ever had.  So tender that I didn't need a knife to cut it.  Breading was crispy & the gravy was outstanding.  I asked for extra crispy hash browns & that was exactly what I git. It was perfect.  Mr. Mama came by to thank us for eating there & to see if everything was alright.  Our waitress was very friendly & gave us great suggestions on what to order when we told her that this is our 1st time there.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BVFn3gBilUclJChjVNGTBQ.text: Lots of great dishes for breakfast, I had Mama's French toast & it was very tasty! Friendly & fast service!

kVd8kptX3bM71_Y0QAtN_w.text: I am buying into the hype! My husband and I like to start our generally hectic days by having breakfast together. Tired of our usual joints, we decided to see what all the hype is about at Mr. Mamas. We were pleased to see plenty of parking and a spacious restaurant. Most of the tables were filled, but we were able to snag a seat without any wait. The menu is to the point with some very intriguing and traditional selections. The menu does appear to be Greek inspired which I thought was a fun twist on a breakfast joint.  The coffee was consistently refilled and the service was spot on. The owner was out and about mingling and chatting with the patrons.   I opted for the Jenna Wrap while my husband went with a more traditional chicken fried steak and hash browns. We also had a side of gyro meat. My wrap consisted of over hard egg, avocado, cilantro, jalapeno, salsa, sour cream, & cheddar cheese. It was a perfect, light blend of ingredients to get my morning started.  The chicken fried steak was perfectly prepared and the gravy wasn't too overwhelming. It was the perfect balance of unhealthy but delicious goodness. The gyro meat was also a hit.   Price point is pretty standard for s breakfast joint but with superior good and service.

hGC_f8xGqpkzIE9MhCoMMg.text: All the positive reviews are 1000% True. The cinnamon rolls are amazing. The coffee is incredible!  The best part is probably the service. Everyone is kind, personable, and welcoming. They are proud of the resturaunt. They enjoy working there and it comes across.   I came in with a large party, which can be a pain to sit but they took care of us. I ordered a veggie omelet with hash browns and a side of bacon. It was amazing!   My recommendation is to start with a cinnamon roll and coffee as soon as you sit down, so you can nosh while you peruse the menu. Otherwise you'll be too full to eat it at the end of the meal because they give you just that much food.

IsElknhQDDmMfD3etNOH4Q.text: I love the service here!  How did the waitress know I wanted a cup of ice???  How did she know I wanted extra crispy hashbrowns???  The food isn't half bad either.  How can you say no to the maple bacon sausage gravy? =d  The new location is a lot bigger than their original location and the wait time is much shorter now =)

3izyaRaN_NMVNCZeaV0O-A.text: Love this place. Quick & simple. Went here a few months ago while their was a lot of people in town for a basket ball tournament. The wait was well worth it. Its a husband & wife both working close to the owner. The lady manages the front of the house while her husband runs the kitchen. I've recommended several of my own customers to try this place out.

jQqOlMQCAWX7e7tSrEl-Tw.text: Whenever I come into Vegas I always go to Mr. Mamas for breakfast. Best breakfast and service hands down! The omelettes are amazing.

YlAGyEVDzKB9Uz4_IujUgA.text: This place was packed on friday in the afternoon.  Luckily we got in just when the crowd was slowing down.  I ordered the breakfast burrito and it was delicious!  They take some time to make your order, but thats how you know they make it fresh and cooked properly.  Mr mama himself comes out to greet and check on every customer which is nice.  This place will be on my bookmarks!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast burrito with a yummy mild salsa!

8nyfKxYZRR_WRHfN6JobWA.text: This place had amazing food and very friendly staff.   The cinnamon roll was great as well as the omelettes.  This is must eat!

2_5hC7y2LxN-lFzVddgBaA.text: Good food, and they were very accommodating of the fact that my girlfriend and I are gluten free. Very nice of them to upscale the toast to fruit without charging us, and even the owner was on deck. I'm not sure how gluten-free-friendly lunch and dinner would be, but if it proves itself, that would make for the fifth star.

Z8qSsPqcQf-xORCgQUexHQ.text: Great place for a good hearty breakfast.  Had the Eggs Benedict and was very happy along with the French Toast.  Man....the French Toast is really good. Waiters/waitresses are really great and the owner is a real gem.  Talked to him about his heritage as a 2nd generation Greek/American and how he ended up with the restaurant.  Great people, great food, you could do a lot worse than this place.  Definitely coming back again.

Cj7ZWNgOF-NU5oZJ5IY1ww.text: Probably the best breakfast I have eaten in a long time. We drove 20 minutes from the strip to avoid the chaos and discovered a real gem in the desert. You may have a little wait as this little secret is not so secret anymore. Don't leave! The wait is worth it. Owner greats everyone and even gave our two boys a free cinnamon roll! Food is fantastic, staff is friendly, quick and on it! You won't find this service anywhere else in Vegas!!

RcA-jsYoh51eLzKXazbwnQ.text: This breakfast place not only has the best friendly service in a modest family dining space, the food is spot on. I don't think I have ever had better prepared eggs, hashbrowns and toast in my life.  It was the perfect meal before driving back home. Will definitely return!

FAXgIIOdkh8u5nW-6Tzueg.text: Omelette was tasty, but the avocado was brown and old, and they got my order wrong. Thanks.

99P1WOo10NTVHhsEsCmq5Q.text: Manager Shaun goes ABOVE and beyond to please the customers!  (As do all the employees). This place is a must visit when you're in Vegas.  Awesome food, amazing people and a fun friendly environment.   P.s., Shaun is a world-renowned "elevated" iPhone photographer. His pics are impeccable!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Above &#39;N Beyond!

qMMKIeMdaO_826dnvoCEPQ.text: Definitely will be coming back! I can't express enough about how great their customer service is. My wife and I were greeted with smiles and hospitality as soon as we stepped through the door. Our waitress Lourdes is so sweet; she never stopped checking up on us, even though they are super busy here. The place is packed and I can see why. Awesome service, awesome food. I even noticed the manager coming up to a few tables and just greeted the customers. I didn't get a chance to talk to him but that's pretty cool.   My wife ordered the corned beef hash and I ordered the western omelette. It was hard to choose what to order cuz a lot of their menu items sound delicious. We'll definitely come back when we get a chance.

IWl5KGpOQMu8rSBUOWknrQ.text: Was greeted with an opened door when walking up to restaurant. The staff is very friendly and seem to love what they do. Food was fantastic, love the gravy. Nice Mom and Pops spot.

msruo1M-XhVR0RIv9Nju7w.text: Been coming here for a year or so.   Always great breakfasts and food.   Great atmosphere.   Caring staff.   Today's service by Jose rivalled that of five star strip restaurant.   Keep up the great work.

ys8dk7SqzomHSijs7qI0BQ.text: Great breakfast place! They opened the door for us when we arrived. Server was very nice. His name was Jose. He gave us options for no butter on toast and sugar free syrup which I greatly appreciated. We forgot to take pictures of the food. We ordered the veggie omelette, steak and eggs, and a single pancake. Everything was delicious. Ultimately the great service will bring us back.

qF-VT_uQVvwVyYOXBtULcQ.text: The food here is absolutely excellent! You can tell the employees take pride in what they do. Everyone was very kind and attentive. Great atmosphere, clean and delicious. California omelette and chicken fried steak with home fries are a must! Will definitely be back!

agXb9cGniqwljNDLO6gotQ.text: I enjoyed my dinning experience at Mr mama's. The owner operator visited our table and took the time to explain how the restaurant got its name and which items on the menu were his favorites. The chicken fried steak was superb!

ZdSJIvhvqA37vpLbTeYF2Q.text: Let me first start off by saying we love Mr. Mamas and we try to stop by every time we visit Vegas. For what ever reason, my chicken fried steak today was dry and lacked flavor. It definitely didn't taste fresh at all. It was as if they pre fried it and just refried it when the order came in. The crust was hard too. We definitely didn't enjoy our breakfast today...very disappointed. But the service was very good so thank you for that.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak &amp; Eggs

56duWsqTazBBeuQhyvo8_g.text: Been half dozen times, to me 4-4.5 star. I think it is over hyped but I like this place a lot so rating little high myself.   I'm pretty sure I can update this review to 5 stars later because the managers care, read the reviews, respond, and hopefully will try to improve.   The service is great, 5 stars! You're quickly seated and brought drinks. Take orders real fast and come back around to check in and offer ice tea refills often. The owner/s seem like great people from the little we've spoke. They're always working, when owners are there often and care the business does good! The owners opened the door for me with smiles and hand shakes today. The server came around often, tended to few special requests, nice and interactive, and been their years. Even the cashier lady asked how I was mid meal 2 of the visits at least. It's very great to see they train all employees to work together.   Overall the food is pretty good but left much to be desired sadly to say. After reading the reviews you just expect more of a wow factor.  They're good about cooking eggs just how you ask and special requests are nicely addressed.   Food has good presentation and just right portions so you do not need to get to go containers often, nothing real huge and wasteful which I like.   Ice tea is perfect. 5 star  Biggest problem is the soup, never changes and is so boring and confusing. Chicken noodle is just okay, could be way better. The other soup is just a broth, no tiny chunks even! It's tasty and could be good if they added stuff to chew on, changed them daily, made fresh with lots of care. This would be an easy important fix. 2 star  I think most of the menu is overall bland and could be improved. I hope they will take these criticism and actually do that maybe so I'm being picky in thorough. The menu has only simple offerings with not enough flavor, take more shots and try to truly earn the hype.   Potatoes were okay but for the hype you'd expect fresh cut amazing with lots of extra flavor but they charge .50c more to get tiny amount of onions and peppers tossed over the average home fries. I've had so many amazing breakfast taters that I know they could improve this easy and hope they do. 2 star  Benedict was cooked good and muffin was soft and easy to cut but could be bit better. Sauce was little odd and came with too much, thankfully they have their own plate so it doesn't get on other things. It was pretty good, cooked well, olives were good, but with little touch up it could be better and earn the hype. 4.2 star  Breakfast burrito was small and didn't come with potatoes I believe, maybe they changed it but if not they need to. They give little too much potatoes in other meals but none on the side on the burrito because it has them in the burrito. It's already small, this is not good value and not worth the hype. 2.5 stars  So to recap I'd say service is 5 star, but food is a frustrating 3 at best.  Managers willingness to be there to work means they're likely to improve. They'll read and respond to this review which is great to see. Problem is they don't need too improve so worried they won't. I mean they haven't for years, same soup and menu, boring decor. Had the soup been changed today or potatoes I'd of have 5 star but no changes. Please take a shot mamas and truly try to earn the hype and a real 5 star! I'd love to update the review and will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great service, gave me a big tea to go.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Florentine Eggs Benedict with spinach, tomato, and poached eggs done just right to your request. Olives are good, asked for extra. 4.2 stars
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lots of potatoes! Added onion and pepper for .50c. These were good.

BUfz-b2Zx-NKhJ4nkoQK5g.text: Chewy pancakes, def a box mix and not the "made from scratch" the menu describes, had to use a steak knife to cut it up, eggs bland, bacon...meh, Coffee...mediocre at best even after adding a ton of sugar and creamer, toes was good but mostly cold like they prepared a batch and had it sitting and waiting to go out. . After the reviews I'm curious about not only what this place produces but the tastebuds that grace this place with their presence.  All in all, won't return as there is a sea of b-fast places to eat fat for the $50+ we paid that are out of this world. Also overheard a conversation between the staff and a lady saying,"oh I know, eat and get out, eat and get out." In response to a similar comment made by another staff member. Def not the quality or experience I would expect from a bad 4.5 star rating.

v_yZOmxU11FEZm6pHSg0Mw.text: really great - fast, friendly, efficient, and clean - like a well oiled military operation. 10/10 would eat there again.

Gx26Oood7K-818VEUVwv7Q.text: This place has EXCELLENT service and food. Our family was visiting Las Vegas and looked for a place to grab brunch. I found Mr Mamas, and it looked like a decent place so we went.  I loved how as soon as we got to the restaurant, they made us smile. Before I even opened the door, a guy greeted us opening the door for us. Started us off on a great day.   I ordered the French Toast(2) and a Cinnamon Roll. Others ordered the Veggie Omelet, Country Fried Steak w/ Eggs, and Steak and eggs.  The Cinnamon Roll came out first and it was gone in a jiffy. It tasted homemade, fresh, and OMG amazing. Loved it. The French Toast was also really good, tasted like quality French toast. Next the omelets. Well first of all they were HUGE and they tasted savory and fresh, just how omelets should be.   Overall quality food and loved the quick service. Definitely recommend for people that love traditional American breakfast/brunch.

DqASGyyZo6NUCEPDIsG-BQ.text: I was in Vegas with my mom and daughter and wanted to get some good breakfast away from the strip. I looked up some places and Mr Mamas kept popping up. There was a wait when we arrived, but they move fast and we were seated quickly. The service was friendly in that down home, diner kind of way which I love. I don't need to be doted on- I just need my food and coffee filled and they did that. Food was DELICIOUS and my daughter claims it was the best French toast she's ever had. We will definitely come back anytime were in Vegas.

sobR6g8DWHirwWcvGm_w6w.text: Good helpings great service great people   It's always nice to see the owner giving a warm welcome and gracious good byes as well as inviting you to return!  I've eaten here since it opened on Decatur in a place with a 1/3 If the tables and the owner hasn't changed he understands the importance of taking the time be personally interested in customer satisfaction

lDPJ7G8-ArK2-dMEFeyvsw.text: The staff is always delivering amazing service. When i'm in town I go here every morning! Thank you for all that you do!

PHmyvjjOjramMXS3EoNQLA.text: I decided to randomly choose a restaurant on yelp to eat there for my birthday. This restaurant came up first and I do not regret it. As soon as I got there I was welcomed at the door, not only that but the customer service was great, friendly smiles, attentive waiter, and employees looked happy. It was hard to choose a meal, I went with the chicken fried steak, it was delicious, but I needed a nap after. The waiter Juan/Jose, can't remember his name, he was very nice and brought me a fresh cinnabon for my birthday.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak! Yum!

Zy-IEBYQzV4PlDLJMN2Vzg.text: Mr Mama's is such a great little place to go eat. The food is yummy but more importantly the service is wonderful. Our waitress was on top of everything, poured more coffee, fresh drinks when needed cleared plates when done etc.  It was very evident that they have excellent management. Would definitely eat here again if I'm in Vegas.

AVRH9C5leKO9QseSsI5AFw.text: The place was nice and clean. Service was great and the food was good. The chicken fried steak was excellent and my scrambled eggs were scrambled perfectly. The food could have been a bit hotter because the CFS was warm and the rest of the food was between cold and warm. But, the food was still really tasty. The bacon was the best food item though and was cooked really perfect the way I wanted it. I've never had bacon cooked that perfect in a restaurant before. It was the best food item I ordered right next to the cinnamon roll at the end. I will try going again another day.

zDCKr5mNhvPP7ACeZt0-_A.text: First time and was very impressed. The staff was over the top attentive and friendly. Ordered the chicken fried steak, French toast with berries. The blackberries were large and very fresh and sweet. Husband liked the chicken fried steak and thought the gravy could have had more salty flavor enhancement but did enjoy the dish, he loved the home fried potatoes with peppers. Pricing was reasonable especially compared to the costly Las Vegas Strip dining and the food was good quality.

zbxYqMk8b2JOKbQzUMnmUQ.text: The Country fried steak was excellent the waitress Lordes  was very helpful. The kitchen manager Ed was super polite and nice and asked me to try out their new biscuits and gravy which was Terrific. Great place for breakfast!!!

r7BrEFDioIQJG6hlXVsOVw.text: Awesome place! Super friendly staff! The owner was on the floor cleaning tables. To me, this speaks volumes!! GREAT food!! Thank you!!

itQMDHzUyMjOiHoHAbr6Ng.text: Customer service here is phenomenal:) definitely my favorite breakfast joint! They make you feel so welcomed and there is never a problem with my order

lsa9rhj-NB4y_mtKYkh5ug.text: I have found the greatest spot for breakfast. Portions are very good and the flavor is great. Staff is very attentative and friendly.

kGxVq3kTPPmXW1rfScuvjQ.text: OMG !!!! I love this place! I came here for breakfast and was so happy I did. We were greeted by a nice gentleman who opened the door for us. The employees were genuine in their hospitality. This is a rare thing now a days. I want to thank all of the employees for giving us excellent customer service along with great food yummy . Men and my family are still talking about it!!!!

fSl9ZR9TA-G8jGPQ3CmC8A.text: The breakfast here is bomb.... i came for 3 days straight.... and tried different things every time.... also the customer service was on point super friendly and very helpful... my food was hot and my cups always filled...

vKNO10o6BNfJqBGI80PzEQ.text: Yummy Breakfast, worth the drive from the Strip. Hubby had the corned beef hash; and it truly was homemade and great. I tried the Cali omelet, very yummy, loved the pico and the avocado, at 4 eggs it's was way more than I could eat, so I brought the left overs back and it was enough for our breakfast the next day.  Prices; much better than the strip. Both had home fries they reminded me of perfectly done French fries, just bite size. Wait; was told 20 minutes, were seated in less than 10. Portions; very generous  My only reason for not giving 5 stars was that my hubby witnessed an interaction between someone in back (appeared to be owner) and a waitress, he wasn't very nice in the way he spoke to her and when she came out of the back area she was not smiling, this bothered us. We own a business and always treated all our employees with dignity & love, it bothers us to see someone treated rudely.    Not sure we'll return but it's a maybe right now.

RSziaC6ENBiDidEcJZatcQ.text: Very good food and service.  Pancakes, bacon, eggs, etc were all very good. They weren't as good as a few of my favorite places in CA and Nev, but do rank fairly high.

4ziH2CdmMF8hO8Yi3QBcVQ.text: Best diner style food in Las Vegas period.  Sure, the service may be a little slow and it may be in a smaller strip mall off of the strip, but the food is too good to pass up.  If you are a sucker for diner styled food, think hearty breakfast with pancakes, country fried steak, eggs, and corned beef hash, Mamas has it all.  Ample seating and no frills service.  The food is really awesome, and the portions for each entree are probably enough to feed two people.

cHSm69ZmcZDJ1UC1JiqHAg.text: Great food, service was fast and friendly. The owner meets you at the door and check on you to make sure everything is to your liking.Highly recommend this restaurant!!

c9hdyFBAi_a1onNuxp2wjg.text: The food was great, just as advertised.  Nick (Mr Mama) was extremely hospitable. We will come back here every time.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. ...the two of us finished the whole thing!

qjIYPsUoI-SXsuaSGs9qIA.text: This place has the best service, food and pricing in the area I think. Every time we are in Vegas this place is a must have... EXCEPTIONAL!!!!

_ZIWTiSMJYjtZoD95HzvoA.text: One of the best breakfast in las vegas. They just change location, now is a bigger place and well attend by the owner. Please keep the good service and quality of food. Thanks.

nQpRIE63VsnHykcKkt2GDQ.text: The food was delicious and they had great customer service. Our waitress Lourdes was awesome. There was a bit of a wait to be seated, but it was worth it.

LRxP-43_d64AzHVFfmz4vA.text: I've eaten from here three times now. Always bring the food home cuz I live close by. French toast is thick, large sausage patties, delish! The western omelette is flavorful and hash browns are crunchy as I like them. Friendly service, order is always ready for pick up within 10 min. Definitely recommend trying Mr. Mamas

4nB4Czo9WW1dCLNEpXV2PQ.text: This review is not about the food but just about the customer service and issues with prices. I looked up the website so I could see the menu and place an order for pick up. When I arrived everything was more expensive then the online price by $.5-1. When I went back to point this out I was told that the menus they have in store show the new prices. This is really not acceptable as it is the restaurants responsibility to keep there menu prices online up to date. I would have expected them to offer to refund the difference but instead I was given excuses about how they moved a year ago and sometimes it's hard to change the menu online.

nxHdB2btF1k420AHmVcZxA.text: Had a chance to visit this place today. When you see ratings this high you have no choice but to try it. Being sick of casino food we decided to try it. Everything exceeded my expectations.  The owner works the front like a seasoned vet. Energetic and ready to please. So many employees working like a well oiled machine everyone helping each other.      The food was amazing. IT really tasted fresh. It seems more and more restaurants are beginning to have that artificial taste with cheese and eggs but not Mr Mama's. I ordered a Spanish omelette. Eggs were fluffy, cheese and spinach tasted great, was covered with fresh avocado. The hash browns were crispy and full of flavor. To top it off the coffee was great. Not like that burnt crap you get at every diner.    Bottom line I just straight loved this place. This will be my stop every time I visit Vegas!

8WdXqw1KMnfeVACNbILJNA.text: Best place I've ever been, the food is extremely amazing, the staff is so friendly and the owner is always talking and taking care of his customers. You need to come over and try their Cali Omelet and the French Toast love them!!!!!!!!! I don't know what else i can say because there's no words to describe how amazing this place is. That's why is my favorite place in Vegas!!!!!

m1RdRKkBZujKg4_xl9eB0Q.text: Love their new location.  And love that I can get great corned beef hash extra crispy.  Hash, hash browns and eggs all perfectly cooked to my liking.  Husband had the egg breakfast sandwich with Canadian bacon, which he said was great! And we shared a half order of biscuits & gravy which is always awesome.  Fabulous customer service and atmosphere.  A favorite when we are in town.

Iynn4R4VA4jvyQ0rMm2IWg.text: Unmatched Excellence...Don't miss out on this Home away from Home.  Very Sincerely and Respectfully,
