sfgt34FWvqZkiDGcO9KGZg.text: The first thing I can say is they made me feel welcome. The food was very good and reasonably priced. The staff was friendly and helpful I would recommend this restaurant if you are in Las Vegas.  We were visiting from Kansas City, Missouri and we will come back here to eat.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qPJDOVGCQCaDfBecQ72gnQ.text: Was wanting to try something like a little family owned style breakfast place, and this was perfect. Very quick service for a Saturday morning. Friendly staff, and of course the more important part - delicious food! Will definitely l be back here.

TxFq0aE0_2kR1VD0aFRiig.text: Must visit for breakfast when in Las Vegas. Gets packed so plan for 30 minute wait. Everyone is super friendly and place is well run so the tables turnover quickly.  It's far off the strip, you need to taxi or Uber. Cannot walk. It's straight down from Mandalay Bay, about 1 mile off strip.  We had an omelette and pancake stack.  The omelette is large (4 eggs) and was delicious, I highly recommend. The pancakes are home made and gigantic. No joke, the full stack of 3 pancakes was over 2 inch's thick and larger then the plate. My son is 17 and always finishes his meal, he could not finish.  Must order.  Only downside on pancakes is the come plane - no option for banana or chocolate chips on menu.  This is a MUST visit while in Vegas.  Very reasonable prices compared to the breakfast places on the strip. Your food bill savings offset the taxi fare.   Again - not to be missed.

RJlmyr-d_L9Z-AggEcy0mA.text: Yep, Yelp brought us here and did not disappoint! The food is great! And cheap! Yummy pancakes, eggs, hash browns, and bacon. My husband and I ate a feast with 2 coffees for ~$20. On top of the food and prices, it is really a great atmosphere. All the workers are so sweet and you can see them all really helping each other out. The owner was constantly making rounds thanking guests and helping the staff. He has really created an awesome restaurant!

LmQV0-gu5l2k9MuUEJdi1Q.text: Papi & I got the veggie omelet Witt PJ chz & mamas sandwich no avocado. Delicious!  Excellent customer service family atmosphere!  Home cooked food!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Papi &amp; I got the veggie omelet Witt PJ chz &amp; mamas sandwich no avocado. Delicious!

f6VS3sjh5Y2VHgGs-ppk4Q.text: Most reasonably priced breakfast in Vegas. Service is above and beyond. I'm in Vegas at least 3 times a year and will be back on every trip.

JFJezDlHa3vqAV2sNSx5QQ.text: My son was graduating and wanted to go for breakfast afterwards. Didn't want to go to any of the overrated places. So I turned to Yelp and found Mr Mama's. Decided I would give it a try. Had a party of 10 and this place was fantastic. The service was spot on. Everyone helped out. Not just my table but everyone's. From a party of 2 to a party of 10 everyone seemed to get the same warm welcome and great service. The owner Nick (by form of a loud announcement which was awesome) congratulated my son on his graduation and "bestowed upon him" a cinnamon roll  (which was delicious).   Now to the good stuff--THE FOOD. Every single thing that we got was delicious. Now with 10 people we got to try a lot of dishes. The gravy-out of this world. It has bacon and sausage-nuff said. My mom had a lunch plate with onion rings on it (I stole one when she wasn't looking ) best one I've had in a long time. I had the chicken fried steak and it was probably the best one I have ever had here in Vegas. Everyone else loved the food as well.   Thanks Mr Mama from this Mama for making my sons meal a great one!

P-FcVWRALl2Pj07z07lCoQ.text: This place has awesome customer service and great foods. We had a group of 16 during the middle of the morning rush and we were accommodated without issue. Every employee was helpful and had a great attitude. The food came out promptly and all together. All the orders were correct and they even took a group picture of us. By the end our visit our whole family was smiling. Thank you Mr. Mamas from the Penn- Morris Family!!!

7iUX9UlSA3Z1xMtiikPkDw.text: When I first moved to Las Vegas, I was looking for a good breakfast place and tried Mr Mamas first.  I'm pretty sure I ate here for about 7 of the first 12 days I was here.  It was amazing every time!  The staff and owner are super friendly!  It is easily the best breakfast place I've tried!  BUT...  I felt it was only fair to give the other places around Vegas a try.  I know that the food in this city can be incredible.  My girlfriend and I went to Baby Stacks and Egg Works and although they were good, nothing compared to Mr Mamas.  For me personally, it is hands down easily the best!!

xgzdF922Z0hVnnAXusSzLw.text: We made a quick stop at Mr. Mama's for breakfast on our way to Utah, it was a great decision! I would describe this place as simple,  tasty, down-to-earth, & well-priced. I got the mushroom & cheese omelet with hash browns, and my wife got the Armando wrap. A solid meal all around.

YcBPntPWbCJ0YLYK-oLq-A.text: Great local breakfast spot, with very good food. Our waitress reccomended the corned beef hash, it was the best hash I've ever had. The owner is a friendly guy and greets and make it a habit to talk to every customer.

gp2eJX0t6DTn6GOtOqD_hQ.text: I'm here in Vegas for some meetings at a local casino. Since it's a longer trip, I brought my 81 year mother with me.  I'm a breakfast person and looked up Yelp for a highly rated breakfast place. Man did I hit the jackpot with Mr. Mamas! See what I did there... this is Vegas after all! Okay enough of my cheesiness... I take ratings seriously and even though I had to spend $50 in cabs, I wanted to check it out.   First impression, I the taxi pulls up and Nik, the owner, opens the door and says,     "Welcome! We've been waiting for you!" This guy is like a cousin that you actually want to see at family reunions. He was so sweet to my mom which I loved. Then our waitress was bilingual so that was an added bonus, bc my mom could speak to her more comfortably. But so far I haven't even mentioned how amaze balls the food was! I've include pictures of our incredibly flavorful omelettes. So generous with the avocado! But I gobbled up the french toast before I could take a picture. Did I mention I have a bit of an appetite?   Anyway, the food was delectable and the service was completely delightful. Yelpers you didn't fail me. This place deserves the 5 stars!

BpOlHxZkEqXs24yqcYXBJw.text: Cannot say enough about this place. While visiting from Chicago I found Mr. Mamas on yelp and decided to give it a try based on the reviews. I am so glad I did. The food was plentiful and by far the best breakfast my husband and I have had. He is a big guy and could not finish the turkey bacon and full stack of pancakes because the pancakes were so huge! I opted for the Cali omelette and 1 pancake (opted for this instead of toast). The owner even came out and spoke with us. This restaurant makes you feel like family. We made this our breakfast spot for our stay. Whenever we are in town they will have our business.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yum yum yummy. Get in my tummy!

Definitely a new favorite breakfast spot!

pnu5m3j4JakgUP4dHMO0cw.text: Awesome service, food and staff!! Try to eat here at least twice a month and keep thinking somethings going to change.....and it doesn't!! And it looks like it shows....cuz each time I come here, the wait gets longer and longer!  Great place!!

72KRaGXVC6xsc3kJF6bVFQ.text: A must eat in Vegas we go every time , they make the most of the space and make you feel like family

ei8HBYW-LqhLhFay0_4ysQ.text: Happy Food, Happy Dude!    That should be everybody's motto. I'm one happy dude when I'm served good food with great service. It's no secret.  Mr. Mamas is a very popular spot in Las Vegas for breakfast.  There's usually a wait because the whole town loves this place.  Mr. Mamas is not just a local favorite, tourist and travelers come here too.  You'll even count the amount of cars with California, Arizona, and Utah license plates in the parking lot. The Manager stated that over 65% of their customers during the weekend come from California.  That's amazing considering that Mr. Mamas is not even on the strip.    I first experienced Mr. Mamas a couple of years ago and what sticks out the most is their excellent customer service.  Based on the Yelp reviews, I'm not the only person that mentions the A++ service here.  There hasn't been one time, not one, when I ever touched the door.  Someone from Mr. Mamas, usually the Manager Shawn, opens the door as I walk in and walk out.  Shawn leads by example and his enthusiasm towards his customers is also duplicated by the employees here.  It's guaranteed at Mr. Mamas that you will be welcomed on the way in, checked on during your meal, and greeted on the way out. And if you're getting coffee, don't worry about staying caffeinated.  They are like ninjas here and will top off your cup without you even noticing.  Ordering is simple and fast.  Getting your food is even faster.  But don't let their speediness discourage you from staying and chilling out.  Mr. Mamas encourages you to enjoy your meal at your pace and will never rush you.  I really can't say enough about the customer service at Mr. Mamas.  Their commitment to their guest is as good as it gets.   As for the food, I don't get too creative when I have breakfast. I'll usually stick to their eggs, bacon, toast, more eggs, and maybe a breakfast steak.  Every once in a while, I'll get their oatmeal or a short stack when my body craves it.  By the way, their hash browns extra crispy is dangerously good.  Bottom line, the food has always been awesome.  When the service is great, the food tends to taste even better.  Overall, I know what I'm going to get when it comes to Mr. Mamas and that's a good All-American breakfast with a side of excellent customer service. Thank You!  2017 Yelp Review #60

AnCQ1ovZc8OM7wt2cyR3KQ.text: Definitely great for couples to large groups. This is a classic American diner style restaurant where all the staff welcomes and talks to you! 326KZkPrXc_pJzpHW4_bbg.text: Lordy Lordy my best discovery this visit Mr Mamas!  Don't waste your time on the strip take a short drive to Mr Mamas so worth it.  There was a short 20 minute wait on a Sunday morning but it went by quickly.  We were seated and the friendliest waitress Jazmin came right away to help us got our drinks quickly and then to the breakfast. We ordered chicken fried steak and corned beef hash.  Omg the gravy has sausage and bacon and the steak was a crispy piece of deliciousness.  Not to dry and the gravy was bursting with flavor.  Then best of all on my home fries they let you decide if you want peppers and onions or not my dreams came True I hate picking all that stuff out.  Corned beef hash was scrumptious not too salty and not a ton of potatoes with scrambled eggs it hit the spot.  Must try when in Vegas!!!!

cvsaVdERYA1n5G1uP1RMzA.text: YESSSS, now this is a breakfast spot.  This was one of the best meals we had while visiting Las Vegas! Our server appeared immediately, filled our coffee cups (which by the way, was never empty), and proceeded to take our order.  I ordered the eggs, bacon, hashbrowns and rye toast, my husband ordered an omelette.  Our food arrived a very short time later, and we couldn't have been happier.  Everything was DELICIOUS!!!   The owner was making the rounds, making small talk and checking on customers.  The portions were generous and priced just right!   Mr. Mamas, you ROCK!!!

PCHmljnWiOjXjlY2KVp58A.text: Breakfast was so good we returned for lunch the next day.  Pros: Service was prompt, friendly and the right amount of attentiveness both visits. PERFECTLY seasoned hash browns and steak! Would return for that alone.   Fluffy yummy pancakes the size of your plate.  1 is plenty!   Large portions.  Onion rings were also good.  Negatives:   None!  We weren't as excited about our lunch items as we were our breakfast.  Had hot pastrami and a taco salad.  It was all good, just not as exciting as our breakfast had been.  It's probably that our bar had been set so high after our first visit there.  Would definitely return for breakfast.

GjN2PzJJOwDYCMe0TxEZNg.text: Best place to come and worth the wait. This place beats anything on he strip. Come here everytime we visit Las Vegas and will continue to bring friends and family.

zzgOwaIcgKVZv_PT_UvkGw.text: Don't come to this place.  I was excited to try this place as it has some good reviews. I live 5 min away, and heard about it.   We entered and waited 20 min to be seated.  I asked the host how much longer will the wait be, and instead of him being polite, he said we should be patient and that we should wait more. I asked him how many people are in front of us and he started getting irritated and angry.  The people I was with said the wait is too long. Some got there before me and waited even longer.  The host came back and instead of saying something nice became super rude and then he said they are not going to seat us and that they refuse us service.   This is the worst restaurant experience I have had in Vegas and I've lived here for 10 years now.  Not to mention the place looks horrible inside. It smelled bad and the tables and chairs are the old and cheap ones.   I can't comment on the food as we didn't try it. But the service is not something you would wanna experience, or at least the service we got from the host. That guy should be fired.  Stay away.

6KO4kfLkK7dh7aHfXIjvyQ.text: Ok as a True son of the south I have had my share of great biscuits and gravy. In fact I believe that I can say that if there was a doctorate program for southern cooking I would easily be a professor of B&G. That being said Mr. Mamas is proof that Nevada will compete with the pretentious Dixieland enclaves and has a chance to be competitive.   Imagine ripples of perfectly gray silky gravy with bits of smokey-bacon, sage-smoked sausage and maple syrup. Then add pepper to give it that perfect balance.  Combine that with the crunchy textured outside shell of a biscuit cut in twain with each fluffy pillow drenched in the gravy sipping up the good stuff with gusto.  Next time I need a hand soaking up some unmentionable bender I had on the strip I'm going to Mamas for some TLC.

Will definitely return !

Ok guys nothing is better when the manager sends u a thank you note for coming to his place!!! That means he (or she) really cares about the food they serve and customer service. This is my fav spot to come to when I am in Vegas. When you are here give it a try, you will be happy you did!!!   Love life and eat your way though it.!!!!!! Peace!!!!

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Other items

cKu5WVcLYV_8twmB7KDDyg.text: A quick Uber ride off the strip provided us with one of the best breakfasts I've had in a while. Excellent service and flawless food, Mr. Mamas was every bit worth the Uber fees.  I ordered the Corned Beef Hash topped with scrambled eggs and a side of home style fries and an additional side of bacon.  The eggs were pretty standard but the Corned Beef hash was out of this world good as were the super crispy yet not greasy "fries" or cubed potatoes.  The only thing that could have made breakfast any better would have been a Bloody Mary.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned Beef hash with home style fries - the bar at which all other breakfast will compare.

XHqp9EYbSb_XO7hFZkneyA.text: Plan on waiting at least 45 minutes for a party of two, but the wait is worth it. The service was top notch with food quality on point. The staff genuinely cares about their guests. Reasonable pricing with ample portions. A very neat no frills interior makes for a homey experience. The way off the strip is well worth it with this little gem.

dTMYfUyi8kmHAClxvoU4Cg.text: There is a long wait, but that's justified considering the impeccable service & quality comfort food for breakfast.  We had a huge party of 9 but were seated in about 30 min.  Staff was incredibly efficient & attentive to our needs especially with 3 kids in the group.  Food was satisfying for breakfast - corned beef, poached eggs, toast, pancakes, bacon, hash browns.  The owner even provided a french toast sample while we waited.  My Ma would have loved to order it if only it was officially on the menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned beef, poached eggs, country potatoes, toast, bacon, &amp; burger

xpwqxW2pZ0NExAnehPOZxQ.text: I don't give a lot of 5 star reviews but this place has got the formula right:  Good food at a great price with incredible service.   There is a reason that this place is packed when you go.   If you are seeking a traditional American breakfast in Las Vegas then your search is over.  This is the place to go.

K35Z11Ec3VuNBkJ445H4YA.text: Six ppl in our party on Sunday morning, was told 20-30 min wait and was seated in 20 min. Staff was super friendly, food was delicious and service was excellent!! Will definitely come back next time I'm in Las Vegas

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nucDVm761gJr90XbcCqaUg.text: The wake was about 35 minutes for a party of seven. The wait was well worth it. The service was on point and very quick. We actually were able to get to waitresses to assist us. The food was delicious definitely fill this up and then some. I would definitely come again. They were able to split our checks up individually which was a great addition to their service

ueyEWrRW55BRn5mwVvOmYw.text: Great portions for the price. My husband had the chicken fried steak. I had the burrito. Super filling, thanks for starting my day right!

GByAHZqA_H2S__9zje4sEA.text: Check this place out about 2 weeks ago when taking a family trip out to Las Vegas. We were heading back to San Diego and wanted breakfast. I pull up my trusty Yelp app and this one came up.  They got really good review so figure we check it out.   When we got there, there was a little wait 20-30mins. Not to mention it was really way out from the strip but was on the way leaving Las Vegas so it workout for us. 25mins later we were able to get a table for 5. The restaurant looks like a older style diner but with some newer vibe. I like it. Very family originated feel which I like.  Food wise, good portion, fresh, has variety of options from breakfast to lunch and dinner. The wait staff was attentive. I'm liking this place. For coming here the first time, not bad, will come out and try it again next time we are in Las Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lunch cheese hamburger with fries
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast meat omelette with hash-brown
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast egg and cheese sandwich with fries

KrhD7b9V_o3_p7yLyqOvOA.text: I haven't even gotten my food yet and I'm leaving this 5star review.  I showed up on a relatively busy Friday morning.  I'm new to Vegas and this was the first restaurant to pop up in my google search.    As the hostess takes my name, she tells me that the wait is supposed to be 30 minutes but she can see if we can get me seated quicker since I'm by myself.  Sure enough the manager (I assume) let's me know that the seating will probably be 15-20 minutes.  I'm like perfect!  No rush.  I honestly didn't mind having to wait 30 minutes.  I probably only waited about 7-10 minutes.  As they walked me to my seat, two employees greeted me and thanked me for coming in.  When I sat down, I saw the manager compliment a family as they left the restaurant.  I'm so glad I came here today.

Fdf4KjVzwCbNvgM86I2b-w.text: Awesome service awesome food , it's like moms cooking .. I really recommend this place to anyone wanting a great breakfast or lunch

C2StbCrDm-JQpKMl0GUSsQ.text: Big portions low prices :) my mom took me here for breakfast & I got the chicken fried steak sooooooooooo good! Love the housemade gravy too. Even on a busy day seating didn't take too long & service was on point!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Ma8n50lveeRLhaaPvVj6vA.text: Nestled in a strip mall, you'd never assume Mr Mamas was such a breakfast institution and one of the top rated yelp restaurants in the nation!   Nothing but big portions, solid/friendly service, quality ingredients and taste, budget friendly prices, and overall great dining experience. Expect long lines and a wait but that comes with the territory of being a local favorite combined with tourist attraction.  I really appreciated the all around terrific service we received. Multiple servers attended to our large group of 8 people. When we tried taking a group photo, a gentlemen (maybe the manager?) stepped up and offered to take it for us. He stood on a chair to get an aerial view so it would capture not only our large group, but all the food on the table. Kudos for going the extra mile.  Food portions are GENEROUS. Omelettes contain 4 eggs!! :O Your doctor may not like your cholesterol levels afterwards but your wallet and tummy sure will. I don't think you can go wrong with any of the menu items. Mr Mamas takes great care in preparing dishes that don't skimp on ingredients.   Overall this is a very solid breakfast spot that won't let you down. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the menu offerings are largely your standard to-be-expected type of dishes. There isn't anything "unique" or "special" per se. You go to Mr Mamas for traditional fare in a friendly and welcoming environment. You don't go for a gourmet experience. And that's just fine with me. :)

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Part of mamas stack (pancakes on another plate)

PrfVu2gJyU4lkfqegFoCgg.text: Amazing food with exceptional service. The server and hosts go above beyond. Will be back every time I'm in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast with fresh strawberries, bacon and eggs.

MApj0GmHUPg6Rd031oWYGQ.text: The wait is worth it! If people are willing to wait close to an hour for a table then it means the food is great. Shawn and the lady that takes the names down are awesome!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious

fq2tGFWe_ymgSAbMxyNbeg.text: Even though there was a 20 min wait the service was exemplary. Pancakes where huge ( not as good as I thought but they did the job ).  Truly great team a busy Sunday and even took a photo of us without us asking.   Recommende

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LgG2nu5qQ0G75W8UztJvwQ.text: Great breakfast joint. Nothing fancy, just great food and fantastic service. Breakfast is fresh and tasty, the coffee is good too! We went in on a busy weekend. We were seated promptly and well attended. They are fast, efficient and delicious! Will return!.....probably every time I'm in Vegas!

9oYKFdFmPbfR9MBhLT-myQ.text: So glad I found this place Yelp!! So straight to the point, GREAT breakfast food, great prices, and HUGE portions. What I wasn't expecting was the owner that stands at the door and greets everyone coming in. In between he walks around to every table and starts a little conversation with all his patrons. I don't think I've been to many businesses lately that cared that much about their customers experience. Thank You Mr. Mamas!!!   Btw their sausage gravy is one of a kind!!

tRLSh_e7RKVhF-r85qpzBw.text: A simple and yet friendly environment that makes you feel at home from the entrance of the building until they seat you! Whenever I come, I am greeted by staff with welcoming arms. I ordered the eggs Benedict because I was fascinated by the term "poached" eggs! They were delicious. The portions are very well for the pricing and the staff always checked in. I had the pleasure to meet the owner and even at my job since I worked at the bank they business banks with. The owner is incredibly nice and very humbling. I am glad I had the pleasure to learn much more about the company inside the restaurant and outside the restaurant. Thank you for making me feel welcome in your family-styled restaurant!

sduSZdLv4FE2MqCOCTyjRA.text: People: Amazing and super helpful Food quality: homemade...what more can you ask for? Food quantity: huge! Cost: reasonable for the amount of food you get Facility: very clean and restrooms are good enough

hgpmgH1BTDjD9eP42XhQ-Q.text: Even though breakfast seems easy, everyone can't do it!!! But Mr Mamas delivers again . Upon first walking in you will notice a friendly atmosphere that is very diner like and you will be greeted by extremely nice employees, they even open the door for you. This place is hopping all the time so be prepared for a little wait but the food is well worth it  So I ordered the chicken fried steak with hash browns, eggs, and a biscuit and it was the only meal I ate today lol. It was truly enough food for 2 people and it only cost $13 which was well worth it. The chicken fried steak come with a homemade gravy that has sausage and bacon in it and let me tell you it's amazing, the texture and taste are spot on. So after ordering we received our food within like 5 minutes which was insane and almost made me wonder if it was fresh but after tasting I knew it was just made so kudos to the kitchen for the prompt service . This place checks all categories for a breakfast joint- fantastic food, huge portions, great value, fast service, lots of options , and it's clean with a friendly staff.  I must say the only thing I would change is that I can tell they are trying to turn customers so after we ate we were kinda rushed along in a nice way so they can get the next person in. I completely understand where they are coming from , however , sometimes after I channel my inner fat boy I like to sit for a few minutes until after my I-'tis manifests lol

rZURhQKZhgxD91Z7WKghxQ.text: My wife and I were in town for our wedding anniversary.  We decided to check this place out.  Food was great and the staff were excellent. Our waitress gave us a free cinnamon roll for our special occasion.  We will definitely return.

0l1lRtBNMmdLnNmEtNXEJg.text: We give this place a two thumbs up!  Excellent service with great breakfast to enjoy! The coffee was delicious. This was our first time here last month. We spend our 17th wedding anniversary and Mother's day weekend in Vegas. If you're ever in town for just a weekend, this place is not too far from the strip and you won't be disappointed!

6fh4XgAI9nmycD9VO5qZug.text: Staff was so welcoming. Our server was kind enough to recommend us some menu items since it was our first time here. She even let me sample the gravy so help make my decision. I had the chicken fried steak and eggs and it was so good! Husband had the pancakes and the portions were huge and very filling! I definitely recommend! Come with an appetite!

F8ttaZJbHIeEydlSLJCO0A.text: Such an amazing breakfast spot...stumbled upon this place after a friend and I had a long drive back to Vegas from AZ. The staff was very inviting and informative about the dishes. The short rib hash is everything

xRpt0syJSxKbkApGfxJTXQ.text: Found this place by looking at reviews and everyone was right. This place is outstanding. The food was amazing and the service was great! 8cmweC5KuoVamL8GQ8sYdw.text: What a great place! Everyone was so helpful, friendly, great service and Shawn the manager was welcoming, chatted it up with us, etc. food was good too! My hubs had the country fried steak and i had the French Toast! Would definitely good back!

siMapaTjcrg7U5UGlqsnsA.text: The food was good....  but the service really makes this place stand out.  Waiter and manager (owner?) both were pleasantly attentive and truly seemed happy that we were there.    This family diner serves breakfast and lunch, and is a nice break from the touristy restaurants on the strip.  We did a yelp search, took a drive, and had a great meal.

Yx569Mg3rYeL3hakHsrqMQ.text: Great place with great food and staff! Menu is great and definitely reasonable and affordable. Lots of options, and staff notes allergies and special requests well. Lots of free parking in the area. Cash or card. Nice bathrooms. They were packed as hell on a weekday, but the service was great!! They were organized with getting everyone seated. Food came out quick and was cooked great. And the portions were decent!! Highly recommend! =)

wFPm0YA8DoSRGGX7FYsLKA.text: We are from CA, stopped to eat before heading home.  We did have to wait, that was a good sign that this restaurant was good.  This place has EXCELLENT Customer service.   Food was great.  I recommend it.  We will be back.

r_ETpJKGKEiXQsckzXYXxg.text: There's is a bit of a wait as always due to the high popularity of this fine restaurant. But the wait is very short. The service is I impeccable. And the food can't be BEAT!!! It's been almost 6 years and I come EVERYTIME I'm in Vegas. This is a must see in your to do list for Vegas. Your stomach and taste buds will thank you!!!

d3r2Vy6ZVPgPXxDo0BUI6A.text: After hearing all the raves from fellow Yelpers and a friend about this place, I just couldn't resist taking my nom squad to this joint. And I'm totally glad I did that because all of us loved it. A buddy and I split our orders of country fried steak and eggs and The Stack and I'm salivating as I'm typing this. I guess I'm just addicted to fried food since I can't get enough of that crunchy scrumptious country fried meat soaked in egg yolk (insert drooling face here). The buttery stack of golden pancakes also had me doing the tippy toe dance on the inside with each bite that I took. Everything was simply amazing. Others of us in the group ordered breakfast burrito, omelettes, and a bunch of other orders that I can't recall. I didn't get to try their dishes but everyone were satisfied with their dishes.   Those who have found this place disappointing must've either A) went there on an off-day for the chef, or B) discovered a much better gem that I've yet to venture to (share some info!). As for me and the squad, we left happily rounder than when we entered. I'm glad to mark down another off-the-strip Vegas foodies gem!

bncwE2MDUh5GybHI5iD3kA.text: Love this place!! Great home cooked food and the customer service is outstanding. The owner is the sweetest gentlemen who welcomes and thanks every customer. Had a wonderful experience.

41WXuyxfo1CFE0XwDwKAYQ.text: Great place to have breakfast! You have to get country chicken with eggs!!!!  :-) Delicious!

VewYMxlAPRX_21c5sZE9mQ.text: Went to Mr Mama's for a team members birthday. Our team of 11 in attendance.There is no opportunity to call in advance so we arrived and checked in. The team advises that arrive time was 11:48 am - apparently the log time was 11:53 am - basically 5 minute difference. Advised that the wait would be about 30 minutes. Numerous customers arrived after our team, and were seated. The person who greets customers (later identifying himself as the owner) asked if we all had to sit together and we said yes.  He then said that they were waiting for three tables to open up and that the customers seated at the tables had finished eating and they were waiting for them to get up.  He then motioned to the area. I looked at that section and all but 1 table had customers seated and eating.  We were still being patient. Finally, I called the owner over at 12:22 pm to inquire about progress and he became confrontational saying that we "were patient with him he would be accommodating, if not, he would not be accommodating".  He proceeded to berate me in front of customers and my team.  I advised my team that they could stay, but I was leaving.  The owner approached a team member and asked how many in the party.  My team member commented that he was rude to her boss.  The owner then turned and directed his staff to "break the tables apart" (which were still only two).  The remaining team had no choice but to leave.  Not good customer service by any stretch of the imagination.   Will never go back - any of the 11 of us.

m4g3SqIRHXXsY0o-ymT6ow.text: I came to their old location on Decatur long ago. Great service. Great food. Wonderful service. I recently went to their current location on Jones and Russell. Yes people, it is possible that a place can get better from near perfect. The last location was narrow and tight, but still cozy. New location opened up a bit and the service is wonderful as always. The best part of the whole place is Nick the crown and jewel of Mr.Mamas. Say "hello" he will be glad you did :) 5-Stars!

OaIq6CdhxyLWgaV1hoQpBQ.text: Highly recommended, especially if you're a visitor to Sin City and looking for a breakfast/lunch place not too far away from the expensive casino restaurants. Delicious quality food, good portions, reasonable prices, staff is superb, excellent service, family atmosphere kid friendly menu, and basically no complaints. I will definitely make it a point to go back to Mr. Mama's next time we visit Vegas.

uUJU_kUQjPXv9a5Ps8bBjA.text: Hands down the best breakfast in Las Vegas! Had to take a taxi to get here but well worth it! Very friendly staff and enthusiastic Owner greeting everyone at the door. Had the French Toast and it was unbelievable! So Yummy!

qJWen6PaTOZYeIuog_odmg.text: Absolutely wonderful. Even before we walked into the door it was 5 star service.  They opened the door for us and already had a table being setup. There was 6 of us.  They were very accommoding. The owner, I assume, was very inviting and a great manager. It was like we were the only people in there, though we weren't.  It was quite busy. When we ordered not only was everything correct and tastey. It came out quickly, fresh, and warm. It was nice hearing the manager be involved with his staff, helping corrdinate the flowing customers coming into the restaurant. His staff was wonderful, never an empty cup of coffee or a dirty plate left. Honestly no complaints. Our bill between 6 people was so reasonable. Very well priced for great quality of food.

8_bmgO9lCQgMJjy9eqeg2A.text: Food was great. Portions could be slightly bigger, but the quality made up for it. Nice staff. The restroom was clean.  It has an automatic foam soap dispenser which was was nice. It also had an automatic paper towel dispenser. I actually had to use the women's restroom because someone was in the men's. It is a single use restroom anyway so it wasn't weird. In conclusion, great restaurant, great restroom. I had the corned beef.

X7cKgywNLYhXSggco0Oouw.text: Best place for breakfast! Love the food and service is top class too!!! I am a regular for life!  Oh did I say their french toast is a must try!

yuaKMZOHdnwujYvpce0_-A.text: This place is awesome! Had the Deuces Wild (two pancakes and two eggs). So perfect! We also met Mr. Mama, himself. What a delightful man. I told him he reminded me of the Ghost of Christmas Present for A Christmas Carol. "COME IN!! And know me better, man!" He treats this place like an extension of his own home. The staff was a delight as well. Top notch place that I hope everyone visits while in Vegas. We have an 8 hr drive ahead of us. They sent us on our way with a to-go coffee and smiles, putting us in the perfect mood.

iSUyPpJRWJOe3pWFuqN4zw.text: Food was amazing and the service was the best! Three of us ate delicious food for less than $30! Employees were welcoming and food came out so quickly! I will definitely be returning! Thank you guys for helping my girls and I through our hangover!

FpetHgKnNr86mS78zHQlOw.text: I am surprised that this place has as high of a rating as it does. Unless everyone was rating based on the service alone and not the food. Everyone was very nice and friendly opened the door both coming and going asked about our experience and genuinely seemed to care that we had a good experience but for me and my party of 3 the food and presentation was mediocre at best, bland, plain, tasted like warmed freezer good. Two of us got the biscuits and gravy with the potatoes and the third a bacon and cheddar omelet. There are much better options near by.

m71n1XaXKxc1PCdsJY6ZXA.text: Everyone is extremely nice! The owner came by the table twice and seemed vey genuine. We ordered omelets and they came out great. to note they had cholula on the table- a breakfast must!  our food came out extremely fast also even though there was a good number of tables in the restaurant.

NdyfQMwgWZ0nkwJWQDVTVA.text: Really great breakfast with huge portions. The staff is great and the food is delicious. The atmosphere is very homie. I would frequent this place.

1W10_BbkT-tl8FF_bN-ESw.text: Awesome! We eat breakfast here every time we are in Vegas. For $6.95, you can get two eggs and two large pancakes that are the very best. The cheese omelet with hash browns and toast is only $7.95! Very friendly owner and staff.  Worth the visit

ROH-xaP1qLE4-UI91bRSCg.text: Make sure you stop by!! This is a hidden neighborhood GEM!! I would suggest anything from the breakfast menu.. I wish they were Open Later in the Day.. Maybe offer delivery service in the near future?  Great Staff and great Food!!!

BAJmZRcyAV5p_z34qpBslg.text: First time here today and was blown away with the friendly service and delicious food! Very attentive service from start to finish and very accommodating since we had little ones. We had the chicken fried steak with gravy and eggs, corned beef hash, and eggs and bacon for our twin toddlers. Everything was cooked exactly right. We love breakfast/brunch and have been around to many restaurants and this one is one of the best!!

8DopKq1v-M4kZ4bCv_pehg.text: The old location seemed better, even though it was smaller it felt more like home cookin. Good place though, staff could be a little more friendly.

Vm42DKyNWluunsNW21vIOw.text: Friendly staff! Loved the omelet and hash browns,  but, the grits were not so great. They weren't seasoned at all. Definitely a friendly and sociable environment.

gH_ovdIfyGrBZnM53wbVzQ.text: With the help of Yelp we found this place. We ate there Sept. 14-15, 2016. We were greeted at the door by the manager seated quickly and we had excellent service  and excellent hot food. My water and coffee glass were always full.  The experience was so good we went the next day for breakfast.  They were really busy we had to wait maybe 5-7minutes at most. Because of the high volume the service wasn't as great as it was the day before but it was good.  The first time I had French toast, eggs, and bacon.  The second day I had the steak and eggs. My husband had the three meat omelette both days because he liked it so much.  I wish every place gave such great service. I highly recommend eating there.

4kuUeA_117NB9A8x9iuXSw.text: Here for a business trip and yelped Mr. Mamas . It was good and hot breakfast with a lot of taste .  I Will have breakfast here again for sure .. hidden gem for sure .

wm6YM5qamerNym4Dm8SuvQ.text: I'm very pleased that I finally got a chance to dine here. The many great reviews weren't misleading and Mr Mama's didn't disappoint. We are usually not in the Enterprise area, but had an early morning appointment at the Subaru dealership.   I'm not surprised that there wasn't much of a wait at 830 AM on a Monday morning. We were seated immediately and our drink order was promptly taken and delivered. Our server was polite and to the point-- I always appreciate that. Especially early in the morning. Quickly browsing through the fairly extensive menu, we went with the Chicken Fried Steak and Homemade Corned Beef & Hash. I swear, in the blink of an eye, large plates of food magically appeared before our eyes. Sides of sourdough toast and a fresh biscuit were delivered shortly after.   Heavier breakfast aren't a regular thing for me, but I had no issues overfilling myself with my corned beef hash, home fries and over easy eggs. The corned beef was great and clearly not Hormel from a can. An extremely nice change. The meat to potato to egg ratio was spot on for me. I polished the plate and still managed to eat my biscuit, which was generously dolloped with some really tasty sausage gravy off of my forever +1's chicken fried steak. Next time, I'll ask if they can give me a small side of it so I don't need to share. My guy can eat and he just didn't have it in him to finish his last few bites. Very surprising, but he gave me the rest to finish off because it was so good and didn't want to let it go to waste. I didn't complain. His chicken fried steak wasn't too heavily breaded and overly greasy. His sunny side up eggs were perfect. Hot sauce was already waiting at the table.  Our early morning feast came out to around $35 with tax and not including tip. You definitely get what you pay for here and I can pretty much guarantee you won't leave hungry. I would happily stop in again next time I'm in the area.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Homemade corned beef hash and eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak with hash browns and sunny side up eggs

Mr78guW5qDXKfK7DJAMWUA.text: This is a breakfast and brunch place. This place is hopping! Obviously a local fave.    Came for Breakfast. We were told it would be a 15 minute wait. Really it was only 5 mins. Once inside it's noisy and staff is everywhere. Very friendly and welcoming quick service despite a couple of large groups.   The food itself was good and tasted fresh.  We had the Denver omelette. It was tasty with hash browns and wheat toast. The half order of biscuits and gravy come with 1 egg or potatoes. We chose the egg. Plenty of good to fill you up perfectly.   The menu has lots of options including build your own.   We will definitely stop by here again.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Half order Biscuits and gravy with 1 egg
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Denver omelette

H_Lcv0QF5JshgM8nuRVS5g.text: This place is AMAZING!!! If you are in Vegas and are looking for a brunch spot, come here and enjoy this food!!    My friends and I came here for brunch on Labor Day. There were a lot of ppl waiting but the management at this place handles their business and cleared tables line no other. A group would leave, table would be cleaned, and the next group would get seated ASAP. We waited for no more than 30 minutes.   The service was absolutely fantastic. The waiters were very patient. The lady at the door assigning groups to tables was so friendly and made sure we were good and happy.   The FOOD!!! Honestly some of the best brunch I have ever had. I got the chicken fried steak. This came with gravy, choice of eggs any style, toast, and potatoes any style. I was able to substitute the toast for a pancake. The gravy was unbelievable!! It was so good, I asked for another bowl on the side. The eggs I got fried hard. Good! Can't go wrong with eggs. I got hash brown potatoes. They were also really good. Can't go wrong with those either. The waiter asked if I wanted them crispy and that's how I had it. The pancake was very good. They make it from scratch! The chicken fried steak was amazing. Well seasoned and packed with flavor. Eating it with the gravy, unmatched. The perfect brunch meal!!!!  What makes this place even better are the prices! The prices are so good for the portions you get. The strip rips you off but this place, every dollar spent is worth it and you are also supporting a mom&pop restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak w/ eggs and hash brown
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Buttermilk pancake

2UlBrhdcHK_Walx_BkVRTw.text: The service here really is as good as it gets. The staff is super friendly and they even have someone at the door just to hold it open for you. I tend to go just after opening so I can say much for how busy it gets at peak times. I always order the mama burger. It's huge and so juicy I need no convincing that it's made from fresh meat. Even after I pull the onion rings out of the burger, I take a second to plan on how I'll bite into it because it's just so big. On top of that, the produce always tastes crazy fresh. If you must have breakfast food,  you can't go wrong with the eggs benedict. The eggs are never overcooked, the English muffin is perfectly toasted and doesn't get too soggy. I've been told to be weary of Hollandaise sauce at diners as it's often premade and sits in a fridge until needed but it's so good at Mamas that I'm never suspicious of what I'm eating.

j2_qb3DNqRflnrnlHcLu2A.text: It was pretty busy, but only about a twenty minute wait. The inside is very clean, the establishment was very well staffed. The waiter informed us that  The gravy had sausage, bacon, and maple syrup. He offered a sample prior to placing order, but who needs to sample something that has bacon and syrup in it? So I ordered the biscuits and gravy to trt the gravy! But it was not as I expected. The biscuit was more like a cornbread muffin. The gravy was just ok, it was just a lot going on.   Ordered a cinnamon roll as well and it was delish, simple and yummy. Icing isn't too sweet, just right and gooey. It was cooked to perfection. The cinnamon roll had ground  cinnamon on it. I said I was only gonna have a bite but took 3 to get all the flavors analyzed!!! HaHa!  We ordered the chicken steak, and it was ok. The gravy doesn't really enhance the flavor, in my opinion. The eggs were scrambled to perfection. The waiter asked if I wanted the hash browns crispy which is awesome, I didn't have to ask. Overall I rate the meal at solid B. The short stack of pancakes were decent. Definitely worth getting again, Solid A.

S6Y4kickblxGjbgB969Wzw.text: This place is always busy but, they seem to seat you pretty quick. They are very welcoming when you enter & appreciative that you chose Mr. Mamas as your dining choice.   I've been here a few times now & all servers were friendly & my food was good. It's definitely a go to if you're in the area.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali Omelette sub sausage for bacon!

45h8hapwasc5IEQuGUMRlw.text: Sheer happiness!  I think I just ate the best breakfast burrito in my life. The pico made it superb.  My GF friend broke her diet and cheated with the pancakes.  She said, "these are so worth it!"  Portions are a bit excessive so don't be afraid to share.  A short stack of two could have been a perfect side for four.  Our wait was  less than 15 min at 10:30 on a Friday. They are only open for breakfast and lunch.

E2kgHHulxksxEKWdbYzcLQ.text: First time coming here after hearing a lot of good things.  We came in, waited about 20 minutes and were seated.    Tyler was our sever and he was great.  He was on top of our orders and took care of the drinks quickly.   The food was great!   I really enjoyed my corned beef and hash.  My wife loved her veggie wrap.  The prices were great too.    We will def be back

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

SCa4Zj2MKQ78wxxWveHegw.text: This place was super friendly and welcoming. The staff sat us quickly and then our server came to us instantly. He was kind and patient. The food was reasonably priced ($6-$12). Our food came out just on time and it was delicious. I tried the eggs benedict Florentine with over easy. It was flavorful. It came with a side you could choose. There isn't really anything I can say negative about the experience or restaurant. I recommend for breakfast!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Buttermilk pancakes
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs and hash browns
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict Florentine

dB_qsyqlVNFV1RUy7xp8Hg.text: We got the French toast with blackberries and strawberries and the chicken fried steak and eggs. The french toast was fluffy and light and with the berries, it was perfect. The chicken fried steak gravy made it. We devoured our food. It is a small, local spot that should definitely be given a try.   What made it even better was our waiter Tyler. He explained everything so well and asked us things we weren't used to being asked, like if we wanted our bacon cooked as is or crispy, or if we wanted lemon with our water. It was nice and he was so attentive. We even told the cashier that, as well as the gentleman up front. He was so personable and such a great waiter. Our drinks were never empty.

521QxGm5zpzQLYde_iu0og.text: I go to Las Vegas once or twice a year for work and to attend a convention at Mandalay Bay. I stumbled across this place a few years ago and now this place is a must stop breakfast place whenever I am in Las Vegas.  The staff is always extremely polite and friendly from the very moment you walk in the door. The coffee is hot and plentiful. And the food is on point!  For me, I love chicken fried steak and was told on my first visit that this place makes a good one. On that, you know I ordered it. Well...they do make a good one and that's all I order every year!  The breading isn't too thick, it has a good crust, the steak itself isn't a cheap cut so it isn't all fat and gristle. And the gravy is homemade and delicious!  See you next year!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak.  Homemade gravy with bacon and sausage.

6wY37o-MoCa49ARkIgslYw.text: Found this place searching through yelp and reviews looked awesome. So we randomly went for brunch, we got there and it was pretty crowded for 11am on a Friday. We only waited for about 15-20 minutes like they said. The tall bald guy, I am guessing is the manager? He was absolutely nice, knew how to take care of his customers.   We got seated, they asked for our drink order right away and our waitress was nice. We both got the French toast, was very delicious. Syrup was super fresh we loved the food.  Prices were good, we will definitely go back when we are in the area. Lots of tourists as well which was pretty cool to see. Great place, great food!   Definitely recommend :)

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast with fruit
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast

hmamHMtpsjRX35mswd480g.text: The first thing that stuck out to me about this place is the service. They are so attentive and quick! Upon walking in, we were immediately greeted and asked how our day was. We were quickly seated and our waitress was quick with our drink orders. We placed our orders and I would estimate probably 15 minutes later we got our food. While they were quick, we didn't feel rushed or anything like that. I got the steak and eggs while my boyfriend got the chicken fried steak. Both were delicious and satisfied our cravings. The only thing I wasn't a fan was the veggie soup. It was way too salty! Prices were reasonable for the amount you get. I've passed by this place a few times before on weekends and always see a line out the door. So keep that in mind if you decide to go on a weekend!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and eggs, chicken fried steak, and veggie soup
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu cover

blFLqWRqzsLmrzmAimTo_A.text: Was there with a group, some of my Vegas Keto Fam! They were able to take all our complicated special orders (cuz Keto), and the food was delicious! Fresh avocado , perfectly over-medium eggs, and the fruit i asked for in place of Hash browns/toast was all the Low-Carb fruit: strawberries  and Blackberries!!! None of the cheap melons & grapes!! I have a pic of my food on my other cell phone (i have a work cell & personal cell). I'll upload later!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0F-ISjgpHz29E_s-3FECYg.text: Had breakfast here 9.4.19.  Was off strip... one of my friend's go to places.  Have to admit, it was really good.  Prices and portions are very reasonable.  I have added this to my list of affordable breakfast options.  I return next month and will probably visit here for breakfast again.

9IPN2RQVTIQKWJ6A2hXzxQ.text: Really solid breakfast spot off the strip. The owner runs the waitlist so if you're late, be warned you'll be scolded. I like it though cuz I've worked in a restaurant for so many years and have hated when people walk off and disappear.   The entire staff was SOOO friendly and attentive; they treat you like family :).  Food was DELICIOUS especially after a night of fun. Portions are huge and reasonably priced.  Need to come back !

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eTJ7OuYyJsdlC1vD95hGOg.text: Found this place through yelp & w/so many positive reviews, I decided to stop in for a late breakfast before we hit the road. We came in around noon on a Thursday. We we're immediately greeted when we walked in. Place was packed & several people waiting. We waited about 15 mins, not bad for a group of 5.   Nick (owner) came by our table to introduce himself & answer any questions we might have. Gave us a little back story of his family in the restaurant business & was just a pleasure to speak with him. Great customer service from the entire staff. Never had to wait for a refill either. We will definitely come back on our next visit to Vegas & try their lunch.   5 stars for these reasons: - GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE #1 - Dining area & tables were very clean - Good Food  - Good Portions  - Good Prices - Cinnamon rolls

xmqBYOdUbS25vgiAfKODLg.text: Much better second time.  Only thing that I still thought was quite 100 was the chicken fried steak.  Gravy was fine, but the meat or breading was too heavy on either flour or whatever mixed in.  Almost like a meatloaf consistency.  Service was the best service I've ever had at any restaurant.

gEuttobBjNoZFU7iVa6-Dg.text: MMM SOO GOOD. Mr mamas is my go to spot for when I want a really delicious and satisfying brunch. We usually wait 30-45 minutes before being seated, but all the better to build up a Healthy appetite for their generous portions. I highly recommend trying out their pancakes and biscuits & gravy...all the while noting that I've never been disappointed by their food. Be sure to ask about their daily specials! Everything comes to the table right when it's ready and it doesn't take too long. Servers are also very friendly and helpful. The crowds outside do not lie, their food is delicious. You will not regret trying Mr. Mamas.

qnAKdohK9e-xO8mvT_MA5A.text: Our server was Deneese, friendly gal, good knowledge of the menu and also gave me good substitution options. All staff members checked up on us to make sure we were ok.Portions are huge ! Dislikes: No one had name tags and for the price of the orange juice I wish it was freshly squeezed. I still love this place and will continue to recommend this place.

OiKQwGqkewUt5mhkOu2wNA.text: This is my new favourite breakfast food place I've ever been to in my life(?). The wait wasn't too bad/staff was really great communicating about the wait status.  The pancakes are so thick and I got a cinnamon roll and it was also probably the most beautiful and good cinnamon roll of my life also.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Green tea with lemon

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast

4SXB86M-QReV8E-tfWPOAw.text: From The moment I walked in,I was greeted with great customer service.The food was flavorful,served in a timely manner,and good sized portions.If your in the mood for some homemade food,great price and clean environment,this is the place for you.

gRXxlWBzGZblnLi8mUak4A.text: I love a good breakfast place.  Mr Mamas reviews looked good so off we went.  If you're staying on the Strip, it's a good drive to Mr. Mamas.    Once there, you;re warmly greeted and the door is held open for you.  Who does that anymore?  Server came right away asking for coffee or drinks.  Menu has a good selection so we opted to share an omelet.  The omelet and hash browns were OK, nothing spectacular.  Prices are reasonable.  But what sets Mr Mamas apart is their great service.

g-MYoQKgWFNBc85QQyge3Q.text: Our new breakfast place !!!  Went twice in 4 days  best food ever ... best service ever and thank you Kat for being your beautiful self !!! You are an amazing and wonderful human being !!! When in Vegas EAT HERE !!!!

9tesNW-LUKVMinBcbRagrw.text: Non-stop service!  Warmly welcomed and service is so important to me. I had the eggs benedict and my guy had the sausage and biscuits with gravy. Both dishes lacked flavor unfortunately. Used to the downhome southern flaky biscuit and creamy flavorful sausage gravy and while this was ok- I believe it missed the mark. Also the hollandaise was bland but the egg was poached nicely. Would love to make this my #1 breakfast spot but the flavors have to improve. Might come again and try something else.

LG38oczvbGdTIM5h5alYIg.text: We always stop by for breakfast whenever we're in the NV area.  Great restaurant overall; everything we had were great at reasonable price, service has always been impeccable.

3BLvvbgT1kZwCQie3vBiKA.text: This place deserves 4.5 stars. And if I go again, maybe it will be a 5 star. I came with a large group early in the morning (it opens at 6am) to have a sort of business meets pleasure aka eat good food, talk work.  The service is really 5 star! Really the best. The owner came out and talked with us. Super nice guy, he gave us a history of the restaurant, explained he wanted us to have a great time and to let him know if we needed anything. The food was prompt, coffees constantly filled.   The food:  1. Short stack of the best pancakes, large light and fluffy! So good! With eggs over easy, and fruit. Mine was great 5/5 2. Eggs Benedict very heavy on the sauce, hash browns nothing to wow 4/5 3. Breakfast wraps: their torilla game is lacking. Not very good, wouldn't recommend  4. I think the chicken fried steak (I didn't try it) but my friend said it was "exceptional."   Will I come back? Ya sure great price, great food. But only if I'm already going to spring valley area since its like a 25 min drive from my house. It would be my go-to if I was closer

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Short stack + eggs and fruit

ctd8etwZXyZAS1EL-GTGTA.text: Looking for a breakfast joint off the strip? This place is your best option for those entering/leaving Vegas!  I ordered the Eggs Benedict Florentine and it got me the itis. Hashbrows were the right amount of crispiness. I find it unsatisfying when hash browns are soggy but these were on point! Ordered poached eggs over medium and the texture was so creamy and delicious. Everything tasted fresh and flavorful including the side of orange slices.   Customer service was great! The staff was nice and quick to serve.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict Florentine

YFGLf3_1P9FIRmj46lzIiA.text: I have been to Mr. Mama's twice now and I forgot to review this awesome place!! Both times I had the biscuits & gravy because it's SO DELISH! My Hubby & I went the 2nd time (1st time for him) and he was impressed! He's a Chef so he has a critic that's not the norm but he truly enjoyed it! Our service was a DREAM! The staff are incredibly heartfelt and you fell like you are at a family members' home eating. We will definitely be back!

1vULeMwA_A6XwrWOMTbFqg.text: This place has very nice employees. The western and cali omelette are really good! As well as their famous cinnamon bun!

hbmjl01INbUKKda2QIzrHA.text: Breakfast with co workers and it  was awesome.  I had the Greek omelette and it actually had feta cheese inside, and I even liked the pancakes. My first time here and I will be back.

j3nDmX9f15QH0cSL2Jk8fQ.text: On vacation in Las Vegas and my family stopped to eat breakfast here. I had the Eggs Benedict Florentine, pure deliciousness. We tried the pancakes too, fluffy perfection! I definitely recommend this for breakfast.

JRtOX9zUCb5NSLa3Wc4UTg.text: Best breakfast in town. Service was very good. Manager was on top of everything, owner is lucky to have her running the team. Food was hot, very tasty, and very fast service. A must stop for breakfast.

6C03RORp-GfwMSsg0Dr6OA.text: Great down home breakfast place. Servers were all very friendly with smiles all around. Food was really good. The eggs Benedict was perfectly cooked and the sauce was awesome.The corned beef was delicious,almost all meat not a lot of potato filler!

iZlkwqkvFLjrWdhrP42ing.text: Excellent service, good food, and nice variety. We found this place through Yelp and were not disappointed. They have corned beef hash on the menu and I asked the server whether it was homemade or out of a can; she asked if I wanted a sample and brought me a small plate of the homemade corned beef hash and it was delicious. The restaurant is in a shopping trip mall and very easy to find. When checking in, they said we would be seated in 15 minutes, but we got our table in less than five minutes. I will definitely come back again.
