BwEV9ZjaQ1AXQDhtyFSbsQ.text: Nicest people. Best food. Will make this a frequent stop every chance I get. The owner greeted us as we walked in and talk to us about our day, the wait staff was beyond attentive and the food was hot and delicious. I can't wait to come back and try some more

mA4cRhnuD7SuMuJCxwuW0Q.text: 5 star rated for good reason! Great food, my steak and eggs were delicious. The steak was grilled nicely and just how I ordered it. The wife had French toast and gave it a solid review. Good atmosphere, competent and friendly staff, and FAST service! What else can you ask for?

vXNtUjBDfN0TiDmzEMC8cQ.text: My family and I are visiting Vegas for the first time from Nashville, TN, and we couldn't be more pleased that we stumbled upon this place early in our trip. We've been to Mr. Mama's for breakfast 3 times during our 8 day visit, and hope to hit it one more time before we leave! There are 7 of us in our group, and not one of us has had anything but the best at Mr. Mama's. Fantastic service and delicious food! We're thinking of scheduling another vacation to Las Vegas, just so we can eat here again! Thanks for making us feel like family, Mr. Mama's!

oCDyq8BCQ5AVUmdTocfNuQ.text: Had a delicious breakfast here today when visiting Vegas. We tried the French toast, pancakes, bacon omelet and eggs. Very attentive service, great atmosphere, so accommodating and thankful. I hear the wait on the weekends isn't great but I'd wait. This is well well worth it. Come check out this breakfast and lunch spot for some cheap good eats to cure any hangover! Don't be surprised if you see the owner come over and give you a friendly handshake. He loves all his customers and it's clear he has great intentions to provide good service.

z6G2Cr5yNQVp7GpFgQN3xg.text: Solid little diner. Super friendly staff. Good food good prices made to order. Definitely worth a try.

PbXbcL99n3z8FzRZ10z-xA.text: We needed some food that wasn't on the strip at an end to a weekend in vegas. This place gave the perfect ambiance for the weary traveler!

0_YWR_peH3Sqa0p0sRo5KA.text: Amazing breakfasts! They moved to a new location on Jones. Much bigger, brighter and nicer. My all-time favorite breakfast place in Vegas! Get the Greek omelette...yum! Love the pancakes and hash browns too. Good quality bacon cooked right. Super nice owner and welcoming, friendly servers.

eRp0HzRx_sroPmckCHtXgA.text: I ordered the Western omelette with fries. I thought it was good but not amazing. The price is perfect though. I went by myself on a Saturday after noon and had to wait about 30 minutes to be seated. They do not have a counter area, they only have tables. The service is super friendly and fast. A very efficient business which is great given how many people were eating there on Saturday.   I liked the fries but will come back for the hashbrowns and the home fries. The burgers look soo appealing as well.   I will definitely come back!

8jGCV-aY_NInOgBEYEgw7g.text: GREAT customer service! Ate here with husband at 10:30 on Easter Monday. Warning! Pancakes are huge...diameter and thickness! Order conservatively! There seemed to be a great deal of care put into the operation!

pvkkrlDAthAbPS7e05k2sw.text: food is always good. Sad they moved even if they only moved 1 mile. Portions are good and anything MAMA style is good times.

f7eUKpmH09ZJ7C6q1oIWxQ.text: My girlfriend and I were at the tail end of our 5 days in Las Vegas and were mere hours away from having to depart for the airport. Tired of the overpriced, crowded, and often underwhelming Vegas food options on The Strip (near the Flamingo), we sought out something different. After only one google search we chose Mr. Mamas based on its high reviews and we could not have made a better choice.  After a 25 minute Uber ride in traffic we arrived at Mr. Mamas and were sat immediately (however we did hear that they get quite busy so I guess Monday at 1pm was our lucky time). We both ordered the Chicken Fired Steak and Eggs. Everything was amazing and for about $10 per meal the $15 Uber ride basically paid for itself...since our other options were expensive buffets or pricey breakfast locations with insane waiting times. The gravy is even made in house! Delicious.  The staff were some of the nicest people we met the entire time. Multiple people greeted us, asked how our meal was, and had great conversation and service.  This was the perfect end to our trip and made our 8 hour delayed flight worth every hour. If you are looking for more "affordable" food with friendly staff and amazing breakfast/lunch then Mr. Mamas is the place to go.

bkC2DWcvbckR1Kcciw0oIQ.text: Always a great time gere! The owner of this place is just an amazing guy! We went to his old location last year and just fell in love with the food. This new location is much bigger and the service is great. The only thing that made this place a 4 star rather than a 5 star was the unorganized staff, servers were standing around by the register acting like they were working,  talking crap about how they would rather be home cleaning than be here. (Our server: Julie C.) She kept complaining. Some of the girls were walking around with their cups making themselves drinks.  Overall great place and food. Definitely will come back next year when we do our annual mini getaway.

W-pZLG-tsXzyu1ldWS-bZA.text: I saw this place on yelp and read the great reviews. My family and I decided to try it and we were not disappointed. My husband loved his chicken fried steak. The rest of us got pancakes and they were delish! The staff was great and the owner came by and checked on us several times. So far the best meal we've had on this trip!!

dwn3-DpIn6tNVro14ZmW2A.text: Great taste and healthy too.  Been coming for years and I've never had an issue.  Quick go-to for lunch. Thanks guys!

NTwbwgBshSsJkbT1TDItZg.text: I can't think of anything bad to say about this place. It is 6 star. It is so well managed, the guy at the door is a friendly host, he gets you seated as fast as he can. The servers are polite freindly & fast. The food is severed quickly , hot and good size portions. Very reasonable  prices for vegas too. The coffee is the best!  There is free wifi.  They care for every aspect.  I Love this place can you tell?

lbvj76W9toggTVoxijBnsw.text: I had the omelette and home fries. I normally get hash browns, but I am glad I chose the home fries. They were all the perfect texture and seasoned well. Mr. Mama was greeting customers at the door and his commentary added to the great atmosphere.

_P30Oz8RP4LyyfeJw3iJqw.text: Really good spot for breakfast/lunch. Just had lunch with my family and we all liked it. Pretty busy but yet very fast service and good food.

kosrmtdw661FWyyESHBubQ.text: I had the mushroom Swiss burger and a side salad and it was amazing!!  We're definitely coming back!!

22jq9C8o180cBCZaJ-bjwA.text: Every time I come here I get the same thing the chicken fried steak which is truly amazing and by that I mean huge I typically have left overs but waaaiiiit there's more it microwaves well like I'm talkin still crispy but anywho the service is a meh but I don't care the owner is always there and very kind screw the servers just don't tip them if they wanna be a butthole not my problem more money in my pockets.

iG1Ifk3nveImY0s6dL4hrg.text: Came back and the owner was not barking orders at the door. He let the brunette waitress do her job, and she does fantastically at it. She manages the floor without yelling over customers heads. Keep it up!

xJrIenob0VmUMJK_HmQtug.text: This is a lovely gem in southwest Vegas.  When they say homemade, they mean it!   If you like poofy-fluffy pancakes, this is your Mecca! And they are huge! If you normally get a full-stack, get a short-stack... You've been warned!   Eggs Benny was quite tasty (tho the hollandaise could use more lemon)  The chicken fried steak is pretty darn good,  for not being made in Texas . But it was homemade-breaded in-house... So total kudos!   Hashbrowns seriously rock: crispy, flaky and tasty.   French toast was good, and if you do not very soft inside (the way my friend likes), then these are fabu!   The bacon was beautifully crisp and awesome... Sadly, none of us liked the sausage (kind limp and bland)   Finally... Customer service was 120% awesome!  Kat, one of the managers was super polite and helpful, and a genuinely lovely lady.  Lourdes, our server, was wonderfully attentive and accommodating.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Homemade chicken fried steak!

jO08UVAub1XJaNp2J2Vkgg.text: Love this diner!!  Super friendly staff, and the manager (owner?) came up to every table to make sure everything was alright, and greeted almost everyone at the door.  Food was hot, fresh, and delicious!  Had the albacore tuna melt on texas toast, with huge scoops of tuna.    Looks like everyone agrees that service here is top notch here!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Had the tuna melt special.  Must get it on texas toast!  Homemade ranch dressing is awesome.

zoyYt7Vap3yj_yJCXoSdYw.text: Excellent place for breakfast. This was my second time here. Tried eggs benedict and sausage breakfast burrito and both were made perfectly. Decor is simple but homey and very clean. I appreciate that there's a good distance between tables which increases your 'privacy'. The owner is an excellent professional with a proactive stand always finding ways to improve this place and deliver a premium service for the clients. Will definitely be back. Excellent place, in a quiet part of town.

2QCjxRye6JPq7W-nsnOIEQ.text: Best service I've been to in a while..food and servers was awesome...get here for a good breakfast...family feeling with the kids and outstanding service....come see Jenna and Shawn!!! Awesome peeps

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

RfU9F5Ft-fDCUSYtyV-K8g.text: Great place.  It felt like I was eating with family.  Owner and his employees were awesome and the food was great!  Go Blue!!!

I979yoVc-KgF0EeE2jaw6w.text: What a great place!  The most friendly staff, large portions at reasonable prices, and delicious traditional breakfast.  The French toast was awesome.

4JsBf4TnzXFoGXBdPext5Q.text: Let me tell you something....Mr Mama's earns every single one of those 5 stars! This is another example of why I love using Yelp! to find new places to check out!  I LOVE breakfast foods. No, really... I truly LOVE breakfast foods soo much. Omelettes, eggs, french toast, sausage, and on and on and on..so I had this place bookmarked for a while.  We walked in this morning and were instantly greeted with a "Happy 4th of July" greeting from Mr Mama himself! Wow! Ok..that was cool! The place was busy but we were still seated right away and our friendly waitress went over the specials of the day. There were so many items I wanted to try from the get go, but I decided on a classic fave of mine - steak and eggs! My friend got the same thing, so than we decided to split an order of french toast just to try something else out.  Service here is incredible! The waitress and owner were so friendly and personable! They were attentive without being intrusive. The service here was simply sheer perfection on this day!  ...and the food! Wow! Everything was cooked so fresh and tasted fantastic! I prefer my steaks medium rare and often time run into places that will overcook it. Not Mr Mama's! This steak was cooked to perfection and was seasoned beautifully! Even the hash browns were cooked just right! So frickin' tasty!  It is a 100% guarantee that I will be back here, and quite often, to try different menu items! The prices here are very fair and reasonable, but the food, and especially the service, are incredible!   Woohoo! As good as it gets!  5 stars!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Toast w/ steak and eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 1 French toast $2.90
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and eggs $10.00

lyOkGV9ENPVnPMQOimXXFQ.text: Service- 5 stars spectacular. These people are not messing around with making sure you're happy, got your water filled, and satisfied with your food. The GM was checking on everyone and saying hello. What a guy.   Corned beef hash- 4.5 stars. I've had better, but this is the best corned beef hash I've had in Vegas.   Country Fried Steak- 4 stars. I wasn't sold on the breading completely, but the steak inside was tender and moist. Great flavors. Comes with sausage gravy, which I wasn't a huge fan of, but it did the job. I got the hash browns on the side EXTRA CRISPY, and they gave me what I wanted. SO FREAKING GOOOD.   Buttermilk pancakes- 4 stars. Chewy, yummy, good stuff.   Eggs benedict- 4 stars. It's all in the hollandaise sauce. I've had better, but I'm super picky about my sauces so don't quote me. Go eat here and judge for yourself.   Overall, this is a great place for brekkie.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Country fried steak. Get in mah bellyyyyyyyyyyyyyy.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Short stack (2) buttermilk pancakes. Pretty yummy.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Side of French toast $1 up charge from regular toast.

hToMKcuT56bYjZFhoKxAew.text: We found this amazing spot while attending a dental conference.  It is very hard to impress my husband but this business did. The meals were generous and cooked to perfection.  The difference of this restaurant and the thousands of others in Las Vegas is the ownership and their amazing staff. The smiles are genuine and the service impeccable. We had Lourdes as our waitress and while she was visiting with us the others stepped up and delivered our meals without hesitation.  I observed this over and over throughout the meal. Job well done to this exceptional business. Detroit's loss is Las Vegas' gain. We'll be back!

jTeBeRRIo8nsMsr7ug2-HQ.text: Mr Mamas is literally down the street from my house and I'm a little mad at myself for not trying it earlier!   + Service was amazing. Friendly (but not overly so) employees from start to finish. They were fun to talk to and seemed to really enjoy their jobs.   + Best hash browns I've ever had in my life. They look so normal and unassuming but once you take a bite, it's like a little piece of crispy potato heaven.  + Great prices for what you get.  + You can substitute toast for 1 pancake at no extra charge! The pancake is also delicious and pretty large as well. I couldn't finish mine.  + As long as you walk in the door before closing (2pm on weekdays, 3pm on weekends), they will seat and serve you!  - The steak was too salty. It was tender though, so maybe it was just seasoned with a heavy-handed chef this time.   - I called ahead of time to make sure we were ok to come in pretty close to closing time. Whoever answered the phone did not sound friendly but maybe that's just me.  So far, I've only had the Cali omelet, steak and eggs, and pancakes, all of which were bomb. Even the coffee is pretty tasty for a drip variety! It's always good to leave a restaurant feeling jubilant thanks to delicious food and impeccable service. It was so good that the small negative notes don't even matter to me. Can't wait to go back soon!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali omelet with hash browns !

x7WSNGuINvs2T1lnR_3fmA.text: Mamas French Toast is excellent, fresh coffee and fantastic service from Crystal with a "K". Worth the drive from the casino's. The prices are very affordable. Families here with their kids.

9MAmpoTRF9iSHzKYirG-lg.text: Wow huge portions, great food, excellent service, great price point! The staff is friendly and very attentive! The owner(Mr. Mamma himself) came by our table to check in too! Looked like lots of locals and retirees frequent this spot! It definitely warrants a return visit !

bwYxmvBBV5of-LPZhCzzHA.text: Customer service was EXCELLENT.  The owner/manager ensured we enjoyed our meal & time there.  Our waitress was attentive but not annoying.  The food was really good - large portions & best of all - very affordable.  Definitely give this place a try!

ewp9utxxAXTs0vTvgmsHvw.text: The service is attentive, even though they were super busy.  I got the corned beef hash with roasted potatoes and eggs over medium.  It was delicious and really hit the spot.  My travel buddy got biscuits and gravy, which was my second choice.  Yes, I tasted some of it, and it was really good.  All that and some diner coffee left me more than satisfied.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Biscuits and gravy with scrambled eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned beef hash, eggs over medium, and home fries

sn7i8VSRbI0geFg__pjZLA.text: There is a wait during busy times, but the food is well worth it and the staff is pleasant. This is the new Vegas breakfast spot. I don't want to go anywhere else anymore.

iGD7T9zsDuR0RfFOtn2gxA.text: First time coming here... Found this place on Yelp... Its a bit of a drive from the strip (where we were staying) but totally worth it.. The food was great and the whole staff there was wonderful...when we visit Vegas again we'll definitely go back...  Oh and the food portions are big..

NjaabRkZGpoywjkCfkOgKw.text: Wanted to have breakfast outside of a hotel/casino. Party of six adults we ordered pancakes, French toast, corn beef hash, eggs and bacon, steak and eggs, country fried steak, and mushroom omelette. Okay so the person that ate the  Country fried steak- was  "alright, and the gravy was alright" Eggs and bacon- "very good, bacon delicious, and toast perfect!" Steak and eggs-"good" Omelette- "great!" Corn beef hash-"good, not excellent or great but good, a little gristly" So a basic breakfast house, but four stars for being clean, although it's packed, service is fast, very friendly environment. Would come back.

p8iNmnG-JeNgWaVU_sIDyg.text: Came in for brunch and tried pancakes and omelette. both were delicious and service was great too! Mr. Mamas is a very funny person and made eating there a very enjoyable experience!

mSVax5Eqsmud0MUgjHOcMA.text: Why do I give this place 5 stars you ask????  Well they are serving up high quality, reasonably priced food that tastes great.  Stopped by here for an early lunch with the hubs and was greeted at the door by 2 staff members.  Very friendly and welcoming.  We were given a choice of where we would like to sit and asked what we wanted to drink.  Moments later our waitress returned with our drinks and took our order with her phone.  Really cook concept!  I had an omelet that I asked to be converted into a scramble.  It was served with a choice of potato and toast.  The meal was huge and tasted great.  My scramble came with a half of an avocado!  Right on Mr. Mama!  This restaurant is in a strip mall not far from the 215.  Parking was a breeze and the food came out in good time.  One thing is for sure...we will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali scrambler

-EmAjsDwEetE47gFUyn6eg.text: Absolutely amazing! My husband and I live on the east side of town but had some errands to run on this side of town and wanted to try a place near by. Mr.Mamas DID NOT DISAPPOINT! Our server was Lourdes and she was absolutely amazing! Checking in on us making us feel welcome and giving out awesome recommendations. I got the Jenna Wrap and Lourdes said to add bacon with it and it was spot on. My husband had the country fried steak(everytime we try a new breakfast place he orders it and rates the place on well his dish is). He finished it and was impressed by the portion and deliciousness. Definitely willing to make the drive out here again just to eat.

tU9J35sPZP6D1WBaReY5tA.text: Great service and staff. The food is awesome. We arrived just before noon on a Saturday and was told that our group of 4 had about a 40 min wait. We almost left and glad we didn't. We only waited about 20 min. Our food service was fast. The our waitress accommodated my substitution without a problem. And to top it off we had our picture taken and didn't have to ask.

YzGrlHhWMFyhB6EbhGFlow.text: Best breakfast place ever!!!! Whenever I am in Vegas there are to certainties. One that I'll lose my money and Two that I will be at Mr. Mamas. This place is a nice little restaurant located a fair distance from the strip. The owner of this place treats every customer like gold. He is the nicest guy and always wants to make sure that everyone is having a great meal. The food is fresh and delicious. I highly recommend the Chili Cheese Omelet. I know it sounds strange, but its delicious. Great home style food!!! Keep it up Mr. Mamas!!!!

-7BHcRLbJ1_d_6EvzFZ6wg.text: Welcome was immediate and seating prompt. Pretty extensive menu, but went with the days special. When it came out, they messes up on both orders, which they quickly realized and apologized. They brought out new dishes, however the orders were wrong again, and not wanting to make a big deal of it, we paid the bill and left. Don't think we will go back.

_H9vp_tcbXZ8eyP40bpsuw.text: Had breakfast and selected the gyro -special of the day and French toast it was alright not great but not bad. The staff we're very nice, but the food lacked that great unique taste that make you want to tell youre friends to go check it out.

r0_76t6emQEyuaVT6J-SEQ.text: Awesome place, the owner is a really genuine, down to earth guy. We will be back, if not for the food, but for the service. However, the food was amazing too. Great, well portioned breakfast and the biscuits and gravy was the best my husband said he has ever had in his life and he's something of a biscuits and gravy connoisseur lol. Give this place a try, you won't regret it for a moment.

oaynEg42OAqpJQjpD9nfvg.text: Had such an amazing breakfast. Had the Mr. Mama's French Toast which was absolutely delicious! Jenna the manager was very kind and talked to us about the name and the business. Would recommend this place to anyone!!! A favorite in Vegas for breakfast!

R98wMAItlNYCS09egL-bYw.text: Services are so good! Workers are all so passionate and nice. Tried the Cali omelette and Marty wrap! Rich ingredients and not too salty! recommended! Such a homie restaurant, made my day!

WZzP0k5UR4PyUUMfmrQX8Q.text: Very good breakfast.  Be prepared to wait....our group of 9 waited 45 mins after arriving at noon.  Place seemed less crowded when we were finished eating but I believe it closes at 3.

0SJ7Qxzkb-Ng_4o0Hu4vDA.text: My mushroom omelette was fantastic! Loved this place, and I am from Chicago where you know good food!

qA2L0Ns5byENYjV8SDXm4w.text: Do it!! Don't even give it another thought!!! One of the best breakfast places I've ever been too. Food was phenomenally tasty and abundant.  Staff was so friendly too. YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!

qRHlMb_dPrVmfHblDnUm3Q.text: Very friendly local diner atmosphere. Greeted at door. Food was great portion for the price and excellent. Highly recommend.

yMyBtTmPjKrzelqddycmRw.text: Mr Mama's has amazing food and service! From the opening of our door to the little amount of time we waited for our food. Everyone is upbeat and so polite! And the food is great!

YnYHej6TrQFnprx-NaBvvA.text: Worth every minute of the 10 minute drive from the strip! Huge portions, great coffee and phenomenal staff. Omelettes are 4 egg and buttermilk pancakes fill the entire plate! There is usually a wait, but it's well managed.

roGcXGGVu2rgdvOZNvrFKg.text: We tried Mr. Mamas for breakfast, and it was spot on.  The omelette was delicious, with excellent ingredient proportions.  The pancakes were extremely fluffy.  We'll definitely return for breakfast.  Another time, we went for lunch, and we found the burger, fries and onion rings competent (good, but not special).  Both times, the service was outstanding.  We were amazed at how calm the staff remained through their efficient actions, even on a very busy Sunday.

5fPjCd2M_QJJkUsgcS-Kpg.text: Always our stop when we get  to Vegas! Great service great food...Thank you Mr mama. . Love from the San diegans.

DvF7yyMYMip8qLUVAtwu6Q.text: Really delicious. Charming establishment. Sorta pricy and not the largest portion. Ordered Philly cheese steak.

EYmFn86eq7XZD4RkOF4Zig.text: Good parking, large comfy restaurant, nice menu choices, friendly employees, but really just an Ok breakfast. I was expecting more after reading the reviews, but to me there was nothing special about it. Coffee served in small mugs, which was Ok only so long as the refills came frequently, and for the most part they did. French toast OK (when I drenched it in syrup), and the bacon was good. Home fries a little disappointing, pretty much square french fries--I should have upgraded with the peppers and onions add-on. Mushroom omelet also OK, but the mushroom pieces were not as big and plentiful as we've seen elsewhere. Absolutely nothing wrong, but no reason for me to return (except maybe to try a hamburger).

Ip9ekpwnK0COzdsjecoZDg.text: Great breakfast spot!  Ordered: Homemade Hash and Eggs, Hashbrowns, Marble Rye, Coffee Biscuits & Gravy, Hashbrowns, Sausage, Eggs  Everything was amazing. Seated pretty quick for how busy it was. Friendly staff, all around. Coffee was great, perfect start to the meal. Food came out quick. Every bite that we ate was more amazing than the last. It shows that they care about what comes out of that kitchen.  GO TO breakfast spot for us.

wQmiR8AOyVW7JvtpNllGIg.text: Not impressed and so disappointed after all the good reviews. The long wait was to be expected. We ordered a hash with a side order of biscuits and gravy and then just traditional bacon and eggs. There was a giant hair in the sausage gravy. Enough said. They refunded the meal and we went down the road to farmer boys.

UWv00RClPm0sJK-J7d22Wg.text: BEST PANCAKES IVE EVER HAD super fluffy and huge the cinnamon buns taste like crap though so don't recommend those

RqlTsoW86_RX_4PWq70eTQ.text: Customer service was top notch!! Food even better. Quick service with hot food that delivers on all levels! Our server Alex was very attentive and served us with an genuine smile!

9z594TD20dz4cMExID0AGg.text: Beyond outstanding service. Excellent food. Great prices. From the moment I walked in the door to the time I left I was welcomed like family or a long standing local. Friendly staff with great etiquette and attitude is frankly barely doing them justice but is the best way I could summarize them. The food too is excellent being made fresh and hot to order. I had the French toast with eggs and bacon: the French toast was quite good, the eggs perfectly over easy (as I ordered), and the bacon perfectly crispy and not greasy! Coffee was delicious and I highly recommend and the refills came before you even needed to ask. I will definitely be back again whenever I find myself back in Vegas! A locals gem indeed and well deserving of its stars and ratings.

Q1xS8uuqI3hRdF8UF54k6A.text: Omg is my first thought when it comes to this diner, the wait was very long but worth it. I had the chicken fried steak, my partner had the build your own omelette. I have to say that was the best chicken fried steak I've ever had. I'm sick  and my taste buds were exploding because the favor. My partner was so happy with his omelette. He said omg so good :) I am from out of town but will definitely be back tomorrow and future visits to Vegas. Thank you Cat, Shawn, Eileen for the good service.

u6f5xvzKBcIrDOtkwPug0w.text: Didn't know what to expect being our first time at Mr. Mamas.  This place was wonderful! Service was incredible.  Nice people all the way around.  Seems like a local family type place.  Food was amazing as well.  Eggs were moist and not dried out.  I had the veggie omelet, so yummy.  My son had the breakfast burrito and my husband the French toast combo.  Both of those dishes were tasty as well.  Our server was Jenna super sweet and helpful.  You must come to this place for breakfast! You will NOT be disappointed.

lDmZXvLWNIv7npM-0Vti0g.text: YES!! FINALLY! My first place in Vegas worthy of a FULL 5 stars! If I could give more, I would! This is how breakfast should be throughout the entire city! Came here off the reviews (thanks yelp!) and wasn't disappointed.  We walked in and were pleasantly greeted by the hostess. Our waitress was very friendly and helpful, gave me a sample of the gravy to try. So I got a mama's stack with eggs and sausage and my wife got eggs & turkey bacon with a single pancake.  First off, I must give this disclaimer, the pancakes are HUGE! Don't make the mistake I made and underrate them like I did. I could've easily filled up off a short stack. Not only are they big but they're fluffy as tasty. The eggs and sausage was great as well. Coffee tasted amazing! The waitress even gave us cups to go. This place has breakfast and Customer service to a T. Trust me, COME HERE for breakfast. You WON'T regret it.

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Turkey bacon, eggs and hash browns

OK8TeeLw2w9qUEK2YgnuCw.text: You know you're getting good service when the host spots you outside, a few feet away and opens the door for you. Everything was perfect. I really had a craving for waffles but those homemade pancakes were some of the best pancakes I've ever had.

zItIeMO-P1H4Wfedpeqfxw.text: I'm from Illinois and visit Las Vegas 2-3 times a year.  I always like to venture off the strip to see what hidden gems Las Vegas has to offer.  Mr. Mamas is the crown jewel!  I had the Italian beef sandwich and it was AMAZING!  Now, anyone familiar with the Chicago area knows of Portillo's. As much as I love Portillo's, I have to say Mr. Mamas has them beat!

X7fG5MqzFgSKcQnvSiVJwQ.text: Went here for my first time and the pancakes here are pretty tasty and really fluffy!! The service is EXCELLENT and the coffee is nice and mellow, not too strong!! It gets pretty busy on the weekend so get there early or you'll be waiting in line for at least a half hour. The only thing I would suggest is to have blue berries for blue berry pancakes but other than that, thumbs up!!

Yodv62MM55m16B_oO4jqfw.text: Great breakfast/brunch place off the beaten path. Frequented by locals, the portions are ample and the quality excellent.

8po8p4_kQE6Wk7morzlMIA.text: Visiting Vegas and tried this place based on yelp reviews.  Fast, friendly service.  Portions are huge.  We tried Cali omelette, mama's short stack, and cinnamon roll.  All delicious.  Krystal was a very attentive server.  Super friendly!   Definitely recommend for off site strip Vegas breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BhoZZmYNcLeCX9YAuv-4jA.text: Great selection, friendly staff, good portion sizes BUT just mediocre taste. I wouldn't drive off strip for this place again. We were visiting from CA.

ViMSoyj7CckRkHYZwVgrYA.text: Can't go wrong with anything you get here. Corned beef is ridiculous as well as the French toast. Service is excellent. Must try!

k3R3GoH-8A5Ud7mwfLYGeg.text: Amazing service. Best and fastest sit-down breakfast I have ever had at 2pm. Walked in an hour before closing and were seated immediately. I am gluten free so I ordered a Reuben sandwich with no bread, and on top of the side of hash browns that comes with it. our waitress Ro and the kitchen both made sure my special order came out perfectly. We barely had time to start drinking our coffee before all three of us at the table had our food. We stayed until closing and Ro made us feel welcome, saying don't worry about hurrying out. She even gave us tall to-go cups so we could take our coffee on the road. Would absolutely recommend for either morning or afternoon breakfast!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gluten Free PRO TIP: the Reuben comes with your choice of fries or hash browns. Ask for no bread, but the meat on top of the potatoes. Chug.

6iC1JFt4qwZZ0uHL9LfQ_Q.text: Third time here and still at the top of their game. Got chicken fried steak and eggs over easy. Yummy! Bro got corned beef hash that was excellent as well. Quick & friendly service. Will be back!

0-MNdyAEENDR7L-C2HDOPA.text: Why is this place so high on the star scale? I'm not ragging on this place or nothing. It's literally nothing special. I had the western omelette. I had an ice tea. I had the hash browns. ??? Am I missing something? Cause y'all seem to think this place is fucking great. What am I missing? It didn't taste 4.5 stars, I'm not a better man, my food understanding is still the same. I waited 10 mins. I liked the decor. Like this just seemed like a perfectly normal ass restaurant. WTF I am actually confused? What did y'all get? Was I supposed to get the pancakes?  I'm sorry if this is the pride of y'all town and shit but I just didn't care for this place. If I'm being honest I'll probably come back here, bc I'd forget I came here. Get back at me, what did I do wrong.  Update: Nick P. Thanks for taking the time to answer my question. That's cool that y'all are like a special place for friends and family. Y'all do make it seem like a comfortable ass place. Like I said only way I'll come here again is probably if I forget I came here and it is highly likely I will.

TvIcIuudL-zJulRhS2lQPw.text: Love love coming to this place for breakfast/brunch!  When I am in town.Very good food plus the owner and his staff services deserves an A+++. I will be back when I am in town.

khIl-7mThmam9HUlEXE9sw.text: First timer and this place was great!  Food was delicious and service was outstanding!  A must try!  I will definitely be back when I'm in town again!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

FojPknO4FfHskA_cPKTieQ.text: Great place for breakfast!! Recommended by my brother and didn't disappoint!! Friendly staff and appreciated the quick service. Claudia was efficient ,friendly, and courteous. The eggs Benedict was delicious. Will definitely return.  Update 2/1/19 Visited again for breakfast and the omelette was delicious. Had the vegetable and it had the perfect amount of vegetables.  What's more impressive is the friendly owner and staff. I too am all about customer service, and no matter how good the food is, quality of service can make or break you. This will definitely become one of our go to places when we visit Vegas!!

V2IO4l-ASfepbb8Tx1mmgg.text: Chose to come here for my birthday breakfast; and I am glad that I did. When we were walking up to the door an employee open the door welcoming us in and directing us straight to a table. It was busy so I was happy to be seated right away. Their menu has a large selection but we wanted a light breakfast so we ordered as soon as we were waited on. The veggie omelette with hash brown was delicious; not greasy. The half order of biscuit and gravy was good. I like for the biscuit to be fluffier than dense but the gravy with sausage was savory. As we finished our meal the owner Mr. Mama introduced himself and asked about our meals. I mentioned that it was a great birthday breakfast and he offered me a cinnamon roll. I declined because we were already full but he insisted and had it packed to go. It was delectable!!! Thank you so much for my gift and hospitality!!!! As for pricing, it was very reasonable. I would highly recommend; and I will be back on my next visit to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delectable Cinnamon Roll!!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The veggie omelette all egg white and hash brown with dry wheat toast, 1/2 order of biscuit, and a plate of egg whites.

vKq032qn45y_l-a9VS5iwA.text: Exactly what I was looking for after too much 'vegas'. Wanted a divey, off strip place to nurse hangovers and eat breakfast. Hit the nail on the head with this one. Looks to be a local dig. Will definitely remember this place for next time

hk0zN3cFxwpKZCx7RRnnxw.text: I am THRILLED to be writing this review. This place is more than a mom & pops place...it's the place you can go for ANY & every event in your life. For me...well I just came with my fiance for Saturday brunch. It's definitely located in a plaza where you would easily miss it if you weren't using SIRI to find it (as I've driven past this place several times myself). When you get there, you're more than likely going to see people gathered outside & even sitting inside waiting for a seat in their restaurant. WORRY NOT. The wait may be 20-25 minutes...but you'll enjoy EVERY minute of whatever you order off that menu. Suffer now & enjoy your meal like a champion. Haha! We took a moment during the wait to sneak a peak at the menu and decide what we wanted...and this is what we came up with: 1. Mama's Breakfast Burrito * skipped the meat...but added Pico De Gallo* THEY PUT IN AN ENTIRE AVOCADO IN THIS. I couldn't believe it -- that made this burrito 100% worth it & more. I usually don't eat burritos for breakfast, but I would damn sure well do it every day if it from this place. 2. French Toast (2) So like, I don't know why I thought 1 order of French toast wouldn't be enough & decided to order 2. Well, I guess I overestimated...and then ate half of this item in a few minutes worth. #GobbleGobble The French toast has a little kick of cinnamon to it & you put syrup & run it through some of the powdered sugar on the plate -- and you've got yourselves a mighty good sweet tooth satisfied. 3. Veggie Omelet Now this ones for the folks that can't go without eggs in the morning. Mr Mamas has a TON of options of what you can possibly do with eggs...so don't feel limited. Also, their house fries are bomb.com - so don't miss out on trying those. In terms of the service, it was EXCELLENT. We had people who called my fiance by name to ask how the food was, asked to take pictures if we wanted to, and made sure our drinks were never left empty. They make customer service at other places look mediocre! To say we will be back is an understatement - we will be back...over & over & over again.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The True meaning of happiness...a satisfied brunch xoxo

aCzSn-yIy9OAnAlqd4bnyw.text: We went here for breakfast and it was so pleasant. Your typical breakfast/brunch food but very delicious. The staff was PHENOMENAL, we were greeted personally by the owner and manager, our host was very quick and server was very attentive. The service was so good I would go back even if the food was great, but lucky for us it was ! Great Place !

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Short stack of pancakes
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scrambled eggs &amp; sausage

cOdoozeS_nkVDoBy2N7Xfg.text: Went to breakfast today with my daughter-  they still have the best breakfast!!  Thank you Mr. Mama!!

bYRfi3Dc8LAeUSx2Mn7e1g.text: Was in and out with 30 minutes, GREAT FOOD, Even better service! Get ready to tip this amazing staff :)

f1ph9Di0D--Uiwn3ijJj5w.text: we wanted a good breakfast off of the strip and this gem hit the spot! nice clean little family diner style setting with a couple of nice sized big screen tvs. i went with mamas french toast, scrambled eggs, and thick cut bacon. the french toast had cinnamon and powdered sugar. so good! my mom went with the breakfast burrito and loved it. my wife went with the egg & cheese sammich on marble rye with a side of home fries covered with peppers & onions. she too was happy. the owner came around talking to all the tables. service was great, coffee was good, food came out hot, and the place was clean. we will be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eKlLo_v_jm4sB5ziFyuvcA.text: Looking for a good, cheap breakfast joint with great customer service? Bookmark Mr. Mamas. I hopped off the plane looking for a good breakfast spot. The Yelp reviews averaged 4.5 stars so I gave it a try and Yelpers didn't steer me wrong.  Customer service was above par from the get go. As we were walking up to the door, the host (and I think manager) opened the door for us and gave us a warm greeting. He told us to sit wherever we wanted. It didn't take long for someone to come over with water and offer any check to see if we wanted any other drinks. We also didn't wait very long for our food to be served to us.   In all honesty, the food wasn't spectacular. The pancakes, although they were generously sized, were kind of dry so I had to drench them in syrup. The eggs and everything else were standard but what I think made the experience so great was the fantastic customer service. Not bad Mr. Mamas, not bad.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

VrT38lFSejAwJpTfPSbJAA.text: Excellent!  My wife had ham with eggs over easy.  I had prime rib with scrambled eggs.  For our sides, we each had home fries and sourdough toast.  Everything was great.

95Nf4H_vzy1FvuehivDF-Q.text: What an incredibly friendly place! We were in Vegas visiting and found this place through yelp (thank you yelpers!) and the reviews were spot on. The staff is always checking in on you, not just once like in 98% of restaurants, but multiple times (not in annoying way) to ensure your coffee cup is always full and available for any questions or requests.   I'm an observer and love to people watch and let me tell you, I can't remember the last time I witnessed such courtesy and team work between staff members. They communicated well with each other and just seemed to genuinely enjoy being there. Loved that!  The atmosphere is very friendly and the food was good. The owner (at least that's who I think it was) made his way around tables chit-chatting with customers. He seemed genuine.  All in all, I enjoyed the food and my time there

mpx633JNYtJUIRZFDLdPOQ.text: Awesome service. Great food. My wife and I had Jasmine this morning for breakfast. She was amazing. The same manager that was running the door a year ago was still opening the door for guests coming in. Most fine dining establishments can't even pull that off!  Overall awesome spot.

ex3k68OA-DS-1kNL0tiuwA.text: 1st time visiting from California. Good and service was excellent. Will definitely return. Everyone left very full and satisfied. Get there early to avoid the wait, but it is well worth the wait.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yidQAKh9KU6Dpsz2bcs0Hw.text: Outstanding place!!!!  Short wait, busy place but the staff has it all down pat. Once seated, we were served quickly. The restaurant was clean and well managed. Great service, we all had excellent breakfasts!!!  Go there

DyT-vonujLTCVVfoI4zkwQ.text: Had to check the place out just for the name and we were happy we did.  The owner greeted us with great customer service welcoming, and we soon found out he too was from Michigan, lol.  And no it has nothing to do with my review!  Party of 4 seated pretty quick even with a wait! We were waited on quickly by a young fella who was married to daughter of owner, lol! We ordered a western omelet, strawberry French toast, half biscuits and gravy, and scrambled with sausage and hash browns. There were no complaints and everyone enjoyed their breakfast.  I was a little confused by the sweet biscuits for my sausage gravy? Never had anything like that. Texture and everything about the biscuits were good but sweetness just didn't do it for me.  Would we go back?  Definitely. Oh, and when we were leaving at 10:30am, the line was out the door!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Table full of good breakfast food!

ZsywMsAM6X3brvqel9uYqQ.text: Came to visit Vegas and wanted to eat the local places and not the stuff I can eat everyday in Houston.  This place was delicious!  Had to wait about an hour, but it was defiantly worth the wait.  I would Recommend the country friend steak and potatoes!   The owner Mr. Momma came out and spoke with us and all of the tables around us and he was awesome!

vb48xtel5n5Wf94wEsuFrQ.text: Best place in Town,  not far from hotels and breakfasts super delicious, and affordable,  safe money came early because tend to be full after 9am..

WMZUt_LE7XxpjnDVibsjiQ.text: Food good.  Service good. Host????  The best tatted, bald, mean looking dude ever.  The host had me at hello.  And when I ordered a cappuccino. He almost crapped his pants.  Lol. You just have to go try.  Foods really good.  Service and front of the house staff amazing.  My server was skilled!!!!

5BivAtbLjSbAQLtd9YQM_g.text: This place is the real deal! The food and service was so good we had to come back a second day. Glad we did, had Mamma's Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs, I know not the healthiest right but dam it was good! My party also had the breakfast burrito and was excellent. Yesterday we all had the Corn Beef and Hash, awesome too. A very clean place in a newer strip mall. Highly recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

a4SRqeLneaMhpzlzxhAeIw.text: Amazing customer service, food was very delicious but coffee was very weak so I had to stop somewhere else after for more coffee. Also there was a line for the restrooms almost the entire time I sat eating. Not a pleasant sight to see while eating. Restaurant was clean, I'm a fast eater and I hate waiting on waiters but here our waiter was on it!

_EHCvYvxt5E5yO03XdNmMw.text: This is my second time to eat here and I am still impressed by the staff and service. Our group was seated by Shawn who was Awesome and waited on by Crystal who gave Great Service. The orders were corn beef and hash and chilli omelet. What can I say delicious and nothing leftover. It is Amazing to know that despite the high prices for meals on the Vegas Strip you can find a place that is a fixture to the city and reasonably priced.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corn beef and hash
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilli omelet

hlHI8yl8rMMKEJq_hUev4A.text: Off the charts, 10star customer service. They opened the door to greet us, their employees are constantly checking on the customers. I was blown away to receive 10star customer service. We tried their special deep fried French toast, topped with fresh strawberries/raspberries, 2eggs made to order, 2nd dish homemade corn beef hash 2 eggs made to order on a bed of potatoe fries. These dishes were off the charts cooked perfectly, excellent, excellent French toast not sweet at all, corn beef hash not salty, portions were large, my husband shared our dishes. It is located in a strip mall, very clean & safe location. The inside of their restaurant is very clean, that serves breakfast & lunch. We will be back.

Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Deep fried French toast topped with fresh strawberries and raspberries, whip cream &amp; syrup

fxb2kCc80EkqjeHiftdTaw.text: Great service, walked in there were like three families ahead of us and they told us it was gonna be a 15 min wait, we didn't even wait that long. Food was really good. Not a fan of their french toast tho but everything else was good.

N47ZKPwFsGL9CR3KERtShQ.text: Best place for breakfast, brunch, lunch, you name it! Not only is every dish so perfectly delicious, but the way you are treated in there is priceless. The owners are always there and they are super friendly and care about their restaurant. You can tell that they love what they do and they love to make their customers happy! My husband and I always go to Vegas every year and there isn't a time we haven't stopped by Mr. Mamas!

QhDSqjRccQ6cDm9lmdtEJg.text: no disclosure for extra charge for onions on home fries.  Nickel and dime. Place needs to change policy of gouging customers.  Onions are always included at other establishments.  Total turn off, even though food/service was good.

2rjxZ_2O1u79jkstM7EYJQ.text: Discovered this place on Yelp, took 15 minutes from the strip - best breakfast in Vegas, period. This will be our new spot when in town. Friendly, amazing service and food was outstanding.

cxnJRY07sEvOaWMO2sRslw.text: Love this place!  Been here several times and never a problem. All the staff is courteous and treats you like family!

Sw5X6wh4N2n3yYhm7XboSA.text: This place has it figured out. From the Super friendly hostess that complemented my wife's dress to the server, customer service is top notch. The food is also excellent. Monday morning at 10:30 and still packed. I wish more business owners would figure out how to really believe in their product!

txj-nu22n3q6sl85B1A7Sg.text: I loves me some breakfast anytime of the day!  And Mr. Mama's delivered!   Had the pleasure of ordering the California omelet with hash browns, my father ordered the steak and eggs, and my kids had the french toast. I loved every bit of it!! Omelet was huge and hash browns were crunchy and fresh the way all hash browns should be! My father's steak was juicy and cooked to perfection.   Service was great but, the wait to sit was kind of a long wait! The waiter was very apologetic and sincere about it. I guess when it's great food you should expect it to be busy so we did not mind at all. One of the best breakfast I have had!!! Definitely worth the visit!

JcM_trg59CyyIqdZvx5jvQ.text: Mr mama's and their staff gave exceptionally great customer service. They were on top of it! It's too bad I didn't get our waitress' name because she was superb as well. All I know is that she was from Mexico, has fair skin and was gentle with us throughout our whole breakfast experience there. Just wanted to give her a shoutout. And thank you to Mr mama! Mahalo from the couple from Hawaii.

bd17NMpbjKnUeKkopBEL6A.text: Great place, amazing steak and eggs, great staff! My cup never got empty and the manager came around to make sure we were having a good time. Will definitely return!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Xe6tuFws6Jv4vqIPiFjj-A.text: Worth the drive, not only for the prices which are reasonable but for the amount of food you get at this place. I found this little gem based on Yelp reviews, and I was not disappointed since sometimes reviews can led to a place being overrated.  I ordered the 1/2 order of biscuits and gravy and it certainly was plenty.  The coffee refills were endless and I appreciate the staff letting us know our food was delayed instead of ignoring our table which servers tend to do.  Decent size pancakes, omelettes and overall good value. Order light which means share with others

8Bqovuj7lrDVZ8NCDepfSA.text: This place is one of our favorite breakfast places in Vegas. The customer service is always on point. Staff is always super friendly and the food is consistently delicious. Shawn is always super friendly and makes your experience there very enjoyable. Love that the owner is there most of the time and makes sure to welcome you and thank you for coming in. Kat is one of the fabulous and upbeat personalities that you will get to hopefully interact with - Great spot - Highly recommend!

k8PX_ambMiwGZShF2JsiaA.text: Ok...today is my birthday! I woke up craving steak, eggs, bacon, potatoes, biscuits and gravy! Omg...first of all...i think there's bacon in this scrumptious a$$ gravy...AND maple syrup....steak and eggs are delicious! Service is fantastic!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

H1H2KUV4TQunok1JcX6ZvA.text: First experience and certainly won't be my last.  The owner greets/seats you upon arrival which is a nice touch and unheard of in any chain establishment.  They offer a good selection of homey breakfast foods as well as burgers, salads and sandwiches. Funny enough, I came for the cinnamon roll and it certainly didn't disappoint!    Staff was friendly and attentive, food was good and decently priced making this a neighborhood joint that I can enjoy a breakfast at anytime!

5zVfCpFdu8cOT7X5TIE3uw.text: This was a great place warm atmosphere friendly staff great food the manager runs tight ship

2NnfhujH3XLqfpBBTv60nA.text: From the very beginning of walking into this place, I was surprised by their service. They opened the doors for us... Not just one door, but both! Lol I felt ROYAL LOL!    I've been wanting to try this place for a while since the reviews were high and everyone seems to have only good things to say. I ordered the chicken fried steak and it was SO good! It wasn't mediocre either. Something about their gravy made the flavor with the fried chicken perfect to the pallet. My food was so good when my husband wanted to try it, he wanted more! (DANG! Eat your own food!)    Service was quick and we didn't have to wait to be seated. May I add that all the condiments are already on the table so you don't have to ask the server for anything maybe except for a refill on your drink. Anyway, I can understand why this place is loved by so many. The staff is so awesome and friendly, I feel like I'm eating a meal at home. I will always come back to this place. THANKS MR. MAMAS!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak on point!

ShvNDgp3EsY_zJdr-sIafw.text: I wish I could have taken a picture of the food to show all of you Yelpers out there what it looked like. I had the biscuits and gravy with eggs. It didn't know what hit it. The gravy is homemade sausage, bacon with a hint of maple syrup. I killed it.  The atmosphere is great and the wait staff is excellent. I love trying out the mom and pops restaurants because you can actually get that little extra slice of love we are all looking for. If you are looking for a nice place to eat I would suggest coming to Mr. Mamas you won't be sorry.

rYxyf7CaTeZp4QKIIoWHZw.text: Perfect diner breakfast! Wonderful French toast, biscuits and gravy, good quality bacon and perfect hash browns!

lPU9Ot3O8mk-BM0erYSGLw.text: Great food big portions. Customer service is execellent. We will definitely come back when we are in town.

mQIo84bF_8oTYx_43gAexw.text: Great service and food was gooooood.  It reminded us what restaurant service is all about. The owner was super nice and the staff was great. We ordered french toast was great, pancakes on point, eggs Benedict was good and the greek omelette was okay but once i added the homemade salsa it was on point. That maybe because I love sauces but everything else was good.   It felt like going to a families house to eat very warm and friendly place. I will be going back
