-N2VjjkPqZ9bCZ6HwxPW7A.text: My boyfriend and I love this place ! Every time we have breakfast here we leave HAPPY & FULL !   The food and service is awesome ! We love the new location . We we're glad they didn't move too far from us .

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The pancakes are amazing ! So fluffy !

RYXNP5kguxxHZoEeEQroJA.text: Came here for the first time...can't say enough good things...it was very busy but our table was ready in 10 min, we barely sat down when they came and told us about specials they brought our drinks and a cinnamon roll (homemade) Amazing! Our food literally took 7 min and all the staff was so pleasant made sure our drinks were full...best service EVER!!!!! Definitely will be returning

BB4WieLkFf8uZ_YFq27gVg.text: One of the best, tastiest breakfasts I've had in a long time.  And the prices are hard to beat!  Beat the Vegas crowds and get seated fast and served by some of the friendliest people in town.  (0 minute wait at 8:45am on a Sunday).  The Corned Beef Hash & Eggs made from scratch will not disappoint, and the breakfast burrito will fill you up.  This place is on my top 10 for breakfast no question.

TcUuoO9_OlyHCEvjUEZALQ.text: Great portions, HUGE pancakes, great staff. I got 2 pancakes with scrambled eggs and ham. Like I said... the pancakes are enormous. They still manage to be cooked perfectly and were tasty. The eggs were cooked nicely and the ham was delicious. All the portions were great.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Huge portions. Gigantic fluffy pancakes.

J-ueeMaDeN7piwQLbdxvnQ.text: Found my new breakfast spot for when I'm in Las Vegas. Very friendly staff. Quick service. Food was out fast and it was delicious. I had pancakes, which were huge, eggs and sausage patties. Highly recommended. Next time I'm town I want to try the chicken fried steak. People around me ordered it and it looked so good.

ONHvazQrG1biKPcJfaJgxw.text: Best pancakes ever... fluffy yet chewy. Chicken fried steak was awesome. Friendly and very fast service. Definitely will visit again before heading back home.

UD-P74vzLKl1RccbkrRR8Q.text: This place was so delicious I loved how diverse it was and how friendly staff were our waitress was so nice and always checking up on us thanks guy for a delicious breakfast

2-ibvHl6YdmLPfZws9qFhA.text: Basic breakfast place. Staff works together and the service shows. Good eats, good coffee and even better prices. This place was a gem.

-WuTSYoMLxheOaJ5VspbxA.text: We come here every time we go to Las Vegas. On this trip, I was disappointed at the anemic, small portion of corned beef hash for over $11. Just normal and did not taste home made as it claimed. French toast was ok and fluffy. Just average for this trip, Thanksgiving 2017.

SFC8L2gHsraRTAsusOdTJw.text: I loved this place! We didn't realize that we went in right before closing but everyone was still super nice and I didn't notice they closed until I saw the closing time on yelp. Most people will "make sure" you know it's closing time. Those a-holes. But this place was super friendly and nice even though they almost closed.  The service was friendly and super fast. They even gave us a complimentary cinnamon roll to apologize for the long wait. (I didn't even think it was long. Seriously it wasn't) but can't refuse a few cinnamon roll.  Got the eggs benedicts florintine with their house fries and the Mamas burrito. Both were delicious.  Then the end came and the price was even better!  Come check this place out for sure!

V24BxmipoEz7A_ukfd6jSg.text: I love it. The staff is always super nice and the food is amazing. It's walking distance from my house which is amazing.  I would recommend it to anyone who loves a great meal at amazing prices.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nOU1n9OqxMJR1RzsVuky4g.text: Mr. Mamas is a can't miss breakfast spot!!!  I've forgotten just how delicious a deep-fried steak smothered in gravy can taste like when its on point. The thinly pounded steak was breaded perfectly and had the right amount of crisp. The thick gravy just put everything together, made my stomach happy. I opted not to get the toast, instead I received one big pancake.  I felt the price was reasonable considering the quality was outstanding and the portions was big.     The service is excellent, the staff are nice people and they took care of me.  I'll definitely be visiting Mr. Mamas again!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Fried Steak with Scrambled Eggs and Hash Browns. Yum!

IapR1TYzN1uYcrNfqQc0XA.text: This has to be my #1 place to go for Breakfast or lunch! They have one of the friendliest staff in the food world.  Their food is amazing! I've never had a complain about their service. Try for yourself

lAnf3CAEOs4czTEoRFPDqQ.text: Arrived in Vegas... looked for a place to grab breakfast and chose Mr. Mamas. First, someone opened the door and greeted us, walked us to our table and chatted with us about our home town hockey team.... very cool! Now on to the food- DELICIOUS! And before we could ask our waitress offered drinks to go.... fantastic service! Thanks for having us!

QbaGeR2a7vL7lkUZ15-jjg.text: Stopped by on my first day in Vegas. The staff greeted us immediately and even held the door for me and my friend! We had a variety of breakfast foods and every single thing was delicious! It also came out in about 5 minutes after ordering. Keep in mind this was a week day, I'm sure it is busier on the weekends!

zjTuBHEkRVl3OEfdvso_ug.text: Great food and hospitality!   The food was very tasty and in generous portions.   We had the french toast with fresh strawberries and the chicken fried steak.  In a city where there's so much focus on The Strip restaurants it was really nice to be able to take a short drive and get some delicious, simply done food.    The hospitality was a total level up, with a gentleman opening the door as we arrived and thanking us as we departed.  Our waitress was attentive and on top of everything.  It's a rarity to experience this level of sincerity in most places, but it's definitely alive and well here.  Thank you!

zvjRH5ACjbXxBTR3aM5vvw.text: Longest wait ever, but so worth it!! After reading the reviews I had to come here and see how great this place is.   Our service was excellent. Even though the place was full capacity, our drinks were always full, and plenty of times someone came by to make sure everything was good.   We ordered biscuits and gravy, a side of ham, an omelet, and French toast. Everything was delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

2NSSZb9Sr5ndIRljyufsMA.text: Best chicken noodle soup I've had in my life!! Everything was at a great low price and servings were fairly big. Environment was great and so was the customer service. All around amazing place!

xf947x27nxfDIMW0TJPWog.text: This is such a welcoming and homey type of restaurant. We were immediately greeted by all the staff and seated promptly. Our waitress, Eileen, was very attentive and helpful when helping us decide our order and had a pleasant attitude. As for the food, the fresh toast was amazing as were their home fries. Definitely a good place to come back to!

r0r9e9hp-7xOYayP_kcmbg.text: Wow!  The food is good but the service is great. I was amazed to see everyone with a smile and always checking on us to see if we are doing fine. We are coming back for sure.  Me. Mama's - please keep this formula. It definitely works.

uw08DKIfJtykHPHpsFvGhA.text: Amazing spot! The chicken fried steak and biscuits and gravy are not over-salted they are scratch-made which was awesome. Staff greeted us and the door and service was great. Def recommend.

Pr0Gfmpygx1Wj2a5K6hvbg.text: The more I come to Vegas, the more I realize the best places are off the strip.  This little gem has awesome food, hearty portions and big on welcoming atmosphere.  Came here with my hubs and boys for breakfast before heading back home.  The boys split a small stack with eggs and ham.  The pancakes are HUGE, ham steak very tasty (8 yo ate the whole thing minus my taste) and eggs enough for my 6 and 8 yo.  The hubs had the four egg omelet with cheese and ham.  Big and filling.  I had the French Toast, eggs and bacon.  The French Toast was really good topped with cinnamon and powdered sugar.  Over easy eggs cooked perfect and delicious, crispy bacon.  The drinks were constantly topped off.  I saw their chicken fried steak and had already decided that would be at my table our next stop here.  I must say, the staff here is amazing.  Our server, Kathy, was very sweet and attentive.  They have their business down pat with an abundance of employees hustling to get the food out quick and hot.  Plates removed promptly and everyone very friendly.  The gentleman taking names at the front appeared to be Mr. Mama himself.  LOL Very nice and friendly to all.  Thank you for a delicious breakfast to end our fun stay in Sin City.  We will definitely see you again!

rcI_gKelTemXtLWcoKq5vw.text: Good food. Will be back!!! Greeted at the door was a great surprise. Kind waiters and bus boys checked up on us at the right time.

_x-zPyWGsSG7-JZVONEEyA.text: Love that the staff here learns your name when your a regular and is friendly and jokes with you freely. Breakfast and linch options are good portions, reasonably priced and just flat out good food. Only wish it was closer to home for me :)

AFDG8L55DtcBtshomT0IYw.text: Great place! Great service, Great food. You may need to wait but totally worth it. I tried the Mama's short stack, puffy pancakes with eggs and sausage, good stuff. We also ordered a side of hash browns also pretty good. Excellent value will come back for sure. The place is simple but clean and the staff super friendly.

Ij36SXRtPVUtEoSK_42PCg.text: The food is cooked to perfection. Homemade corned beef hash is amazing. The pancakes are so fluffy and the biscuit and gravy are the best. The service is outstanding. The owner is so welcoming. It's a great place to get away from the strip.

9pHwfxAa_c5HdQBgkvhalg.text: Just as good as people say it is. Warm welcome throught he door and great service throughout the meal. Ordered eggs benedict, swiss mushroom burger, and the countryfried steak. We also got fries, hashbrowns, and toast. Absolutely everything was delicious. It was breakfast but everything was much more savory and tasty than your average breakfast food items. Used the groupon $15 for $30 and the bill came to about $36 total for 2 people (1 other person in my group just ordered fries and orange juicce). Very affordable, very tasty, very worth it.

em9ZOepzVwWOwdyrlex9OQ.text: I ate there today for the first time. We were greeted by the owner and seated right away! The servers are friendly and efficient. The food was fresh and cooked exactly the way we ordered it! It came quick and was still hot. The pancakes are delicious and are as big as the plates they are served on. Coffee was great and the sausage tastes homemade. My friend dropped her credit card on the floor and the owner. Brought it out to the car!  I love this place and will be going back for lunch!!

y6jKncX4rZu0bHr2khwNqA.text: Went here twice on a business trip.   Fast friendly service. Tasty food done quick and fresh.  Great prices for Las Vegas.

jHK8WWymiiVxIGsDiQPWxw.text: This place lived up to their yelp reviews.  My husband got the country fried steak and eggs (which was amazing) and I got the Marty wrap (fresh ingredients).  the kitchen computers went down so it took a minute for us to get our food, but who cares the food and service was great (shit happens).

dG19_HQoLspjpkWLWF--ng.text: My Hubby is a buttermilk pancake fan and these got his thumbs up approval.He also had the Chili omelet and it had homemade Chile that evidently they have been make for years.It was really good as I couldn't resist on taking a bite.  I like that I can build my own omelet and yes they have eggs whites.Had a bite of my daughters turkey bacon and cooked to perfection Service was great and most importantly the food. Next trip back we will be there.

pVJQI4JEnnwA024bF2JGYw.text: My husband and I ate here four out of six mornings while visiting the area. We tried several breakfast dishes and if I lived in Vegas this would our regular spot. The service was great! They get busy, so get there early or be patient. The eggs benedict is one of the best Ive had. We took a cinnamon roll to go for late snack and it was the real deal, like my Grandmas. The owner was very pleasant and you could tell he cared about his business and his employees.

fFUecXRgVO7m5_iWxfhTHA.text: We stopped in for breakfast before heading to airport and so glad we did!  Great food, great people and wonderful service!  We will definitely be back when we come back to Vegas. Special thanks to Jasmine and the cool dude at the door.

uciLq-yane7fm4O8rnQo8g.text: Good food fast pace turning table and food fast. Nice people! Good prices nice to find mom and pop places to eat

AAdmK6DIPeU3WyHPlNRESg.text: Food was really good. Worth the wait on a Saturday morning. The Marty wrap was sooooog good. Definitely coming back to their place. The owner is super nice and comes around telling the coolest stories.

uSqDMm6OqgwZCC0pmefdYA.text: Consistently the best breakfast spot in town.  The owners will make you feel like family, the staff clearly take great pride in their food and service, and now they have an even bigger location so the wait times aren't quite so crazy.  You'll love it, I promise!

3o2abtdifY2PsYiiSOHdLQ.text: Its amazing!! When in Vegas my husband and I HAVE to eat here at least twice! The staff and owner are genuinely nice. The food is delicious really no matter what you order will be delicious with generous portions. Order a bowl of chili and put it on everything you order it's soooooo good!

-uftF6USZzLorvOiqRE6bQ.text: Friendly, caring service.  The team makes you feel at home.  The food excellent!  My husband and I are addicted to their fluffy pancakes and their Cali omelet scrambled.  The home fries with peppers and onions YUM!  if you want great food, awesome service at a fair price check out Mr. Mama's.  Breakfast or lunch this is the place!  You too will be a raving fan.

MeR7yBACPfyO9mm1t89Tiw.text: Place was packed which is a good sign. Food was good, fresh and service was great. Had pancakes, bacon and eggs. Cooked perfectly and the bacon was awesome. The owner took the time to come over and greet us personally. You can tell he really enjoys his work and is a great guy.

eldv8nL3wpVFj7jAxHLZqQ.text: We were looking for a locals place for breakfast and found the perfect place. The owner greets you by opening the door and comes by your table to make sure everything is fine. My hubby and I shared an omelet and it was fabulous. We will definitely be back!

oClZYw6k-3xVIp8o8yxMTQ.text: New, bigger location, same quality food and service.  Love coming here, get my fill, and will skip my next meal due to not being hungry.  Worth finding.

ml9LP3fEcYEPxMePKO4dSg.text: Good food, great service.Our to go place for breakfast or lunch when in town. Good daily specials. Owner is really nice and his daughter Jenna is a darling. Wonderful staff. So get off the strip with all the hoopla about which chef restaurant you are going to eat at for a very pricey meal. Come on support your local family run business.

_HlrDHV_5uScMnO6BeBgRA.text: We were visiting from Santa Monica and as we left Vegas after a nice weekend we stopped here at the request of our nephew, who had eaten there the day before. We were seated and while waiting to order my wife had some liquid spilled on her; total accident no ones fault but the staff went out if their way to apologize and compensate for the incident. We received a complimentary cinnamon roll and a couple muffins. The food was excellent, we had pancakes hashbrowns and all of our food was great! Cannot recommend this place enough!!

H-sBDUwjH4d7pStJ5yvSHw.text: Go to this place!!! Their service is fantastic great people great food.   Alex was my waiter and he gave excellent recommendations look for him!

4fXO1AvT3ev77X1KTUjeEA.text: What everyone said - get the fresh hot and frosting covered cinnamon roll! Mmm  I got the chicken fried steak and eggs , and of course we couldn't forget the extra side of bacon.  Each item was cooked to perfection, from the batter, the seasoning, and frying.   What really shines about this place is the service ! The host and the servers look a little rough on he outside with their tattoos and buffness, but they were seriously some of the nicest and most genuine people I have ever had the pleasure of being served by!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak and eggs and you can&#39;t forget the side of bacon!
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon roll. Worth every calorie !

KSpWKdcFlq1qJjSSfc5tPA.text: This is my favorite breakfast place in Vegas! It's not close to my house, so I don't visit too often but I love it! Every single time I have been there, the owner walks around and asks how everything is. He seems like such a nice guy! This adds a nice touch to the already great place! I like the new location, it is way bigger! Since this place is always busy, that's important because no one likes to wait, especially for breakfast.  So far I have tried the french toast, eggs and bacon. Delicious! The french toast is absolutely perfect. I took my nephew when he was in town visiting and he had the pancakes. They were so big! He said they were yummy and he wants to go back during his next visit.  This is a great place for locals and tourists. It's really close to the strip and affordable, so if you have a rental car, you should go! Even if you have to take a taxi, I would still recommend going. You will probably still pay less with the taxi fair than if you had breakfast in your hotel.

5Od9ORC2T4M9qPlRIdoW9w.text: My boyfriend and I stopped here for brunch before we went to the outlet. We found this restaurant on Yelp! I wanted steak and my boyfriend wanted a sandwich and they had just that, and more! There's great service from the minute you step outside the doorstep and through your whole dining experience! I think the owners work there too, you can tell since they ask you how your meal is. This really shows dedication to their restaurant. Not the mention, the portions are huge and generous! Definitely recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and eggs, club sandwich with onion rings

ywofzpAFjdCS_d-8aeuB0w.text: Great staff and food. Portions not too oversizes, just right. Go early because there is a wait.

fOy9RzIYm2qP97SWIKXNWA.text: I love Biscuits and Gravy. I make pretty good biscuits and gravy. But the gravy here is stellar! Portions are generous and prices are reasonable. It is very busy, but our waitress was great. This is worth your few minutes drive off the strip. We will be back next time we are in Vegas.

W12G8Q7w2mWNeC-k5awEDA.text: We were looking for a way to feed two hungry boys without breaking the bank while visiting Vegas. I kept reading reviews of how wonderful Mr Mama's was. So on the day we had a car rental, we decided to give it a try. This place is so yummy. The kids were full for hours, which is really hard to do. The staff is super informed and really take care of you. And Mr Mama is on hand to make sure guests are taken care of and to tell great stories. Highly recommended.

qPMm5dQ1_9UC4FiA_chVbA.text: We stopped by on our way out of town and they made us feel like we were home already. Great food and even greater people and service. My family will be stopping every time we come to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

pCL8L9PUz8LsRwYsMSNIBg.text: I  visited this restaurant only based on their Yelp reviews as I was in Las Vegas for 3 days only.  Luckily my family wasn't in a hurry to go anywhere as there was a long wait.  The restaurant ambience was so-so but the service was impeccable!  Friendly servers but what was more interesting to watch was the bussers - they work their tails off!  I ordered the Cali omelet - so tasty and such large portions.  Left the restaurant very full. I was glad that I found this place on Yelp.

UqxbO80AgS2oOam9wlcmJA.text: Always looking to Yelp to find great places to eat. Yelp did not let us down on this gem! WoW...walking up to the front door, the door flew open & we were greeted by an enthusiastic Good Morning by a very down to earth man. He could pass for a Texan!! The place was packed with about 6 people waiting. We were told about 15 minute wait. Less than 5 minutes we were seated. Alex was our waiter. He was attentive, fast & very nice. The food arrived quickly, hot & huge portions. The price was affordable. Later, I found out the man who greeted us at the door is the owner. He was very involved & made his way around the restaurant making sure everything was good. By the time we left, the outside sidewalk was full of folks waiting to dine. So glad we found this spot & looking to visit again next time we are in town! Thank you!

cORhcl0tMOhbDDB8zug1CQ.text: Great food, good customer service, and the food came out really fast. And decently priced for being in Vegas.

EuEx7FwDGePbwMt2s-nD7A.text: I came to visit Nevada with some of my family and we were trying to find a food joint where we could have a quality breakfast before we head back home. We were extremely surprised when we got to the diner and were greeted with excellent service. The main man at the door was very vocal and kind with a wait time and a hand shake. The service was faster than I've ever seen before. It was clear that the diner had regulars because people would walk in and the main man in the front would know who they were. I've never been so impressed with how amazing the service was. But I will definitely recommend and come back when I have the time!

XiSwkvX54edOfrYvzKRyJw.text: This place is so great I just cant believe we've never seen it before. The pancakes are almost as big as the plate the come on. I had the Eggs Benedict Florentine were so fresh and creamy. They also have these deliciously heavenly biscuits and gravy. I order half of a half order just to try them. The gravy has sausage, bacon and maple syrup!!! Hubby had Soup and Salad with a cup of Beef Vegetable soup that tasted just like the one make at home. His Greek Salad was brimming with Feta and Kalimata olives and came with the most delicious pieces of garlic toast. All in all I think this place is our new 'go to breakfast place' in Vegas.

kZ1otk5uxRYjQHYb7fK0Kw.text: The hype is True, this is a great place to eat. There is a line because the owner cares about how he runs his business. I wish other restaurants would put forth the effort Mr mom does.

rd4WBYSBn3KTrIikeVNsvA.text: I hunt for french toast and fried chicken all the time when I am not dieting. This restaurant really satisfies. Not too dry and not too moist for the french toast they served. The crispy chicken is delish and will make me come back every time I am in LV. Bit long of a wait but definitely worth it if you are in town.

g6e2KqBNhH7dPJZDJSjdzg.text: Excellent food and service! Food came super fast and Mr.Mama himself greeted us at our table!

P_d5f_stdt-hEmJRV7uwkQ.text: Great breakfast spot off and away from the strip. It's a popular one though. We had a wait but I also came in with 7 adults. Their service was amazing from host to waitress to busses. They took our group photo multiple times for us and their meal was good and filling.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Half Order of the chicken fried steak, scramble eggs, country potatoes with sautéed Peppers &amp; onions.

XTkNmEBDYO_Uu44l9LD81Q.text: This restaurant is family fantastic. The portions are massive and myself and two kids were able to share a big mamas breakfast, three pancakes, eggs, and bacon. I added on sauteed veggies and homefries and they were both well seasoned! Our server went above and beyond, filling up my daughters sippy cup, making menu recommendations, and assisting with packing leftovers.

9fGrTkrFr6cp5MH39qdBMA.text: Had Father's Day breakfast.  Ordered Biscuits and Gravy.  It wasn't very good.  Others had food that was good, but nothing special.  I may try again some day.

gP6hcEyHOpvqVCEFhEHvuA.text: I got the me mamas French toast and a side  of grits the staff was friendly the food was delicious and their service was outstanding came from out of town will definitely be back for more next time

FZkm8TptGEkx4jU5BZ-6-w.text: Came as a party of 8. Of course there was a line already on top of a 30-40 min wait. But it was worth it! Five star service! The hostess makes every effort to get people in efficiently. Even though we waited exactly 40 min, she offered us a free cinnamon roll for our patience. They even adjusted the feet on our table before we were seated because it was wobbly. The owner (I'm guessing he's the owner) offered to take our picture and stood on a chair to make sure he has a good angle. These little details really made the experience aside from the delicious food. My husband and I shared a rib eye steak and eggs and a Spanish omelette. I would come back for the steak alone! Everyone in our party was pleased with the food and impressed with the service. Thanks for the recommendation, Yelp.

VqrXfUTUI2n5wlZt5gf2MA.text: Great food and service. Thanks for letting us try the gravy out!  Would definitely come back here!!

HvID0qZLtY0S_C02eAf5AQ.text: This place really surprised me! I had ordered the eggs Benedict Florentine and girlfriend ordered eggs Benedict avocado and both were delicious, the hollandaise on top was creamy and flavorful. They even asked us how we wanted our eggs poached, which was a first for us as most places just do their thing. The order came with a side of hash browns which i ordered extra crispy with peppers on top . The staff was very attentive and always seemed to come right when we needed refills!  When we were all done and ready to go they even offered us to go cups for our coffee, now that's good customer service! We will definitely be back!

O28US6c-OLDFHzarqNPPjw.text: Great service. Great food. Great for your buck. I just love everything about this place. We ordered steak and egg and country fried steak. It was best country fried steak I ever ate. I highly recommend this place to others. You must try country gravy. So good~

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

tNPW7FFy-bTxW5KkSfeOQA.text: Good place to eat! Big portions, wait is about 30-40 minutes.  The staff is friendly and they offered free samples of fried cinnamon rolls

l7ID-NVP3ZUKeFYWDa7qJQ.text: Great service, friendly staff and A-OK food! We came on a Saturday or Sunday morning and it was extremely crowded (30-45 minute wait) but we were eager to give this place a try so we patiently waited, staff moved quickly and provided great customer service/accommodating and food came quickly once we were seated.   I will say, after reading the reviews you do expect more of a wow factor and sadly to say I was not blown away by the food. Was it good? Yes! Would I go again? Yes! Is it something to rave about/super great? Not really.

O4gtnk4Eb_hawv4igGTeWQ.text: I am in process of relocating to Las Vegas and wanted a good place for breakfast located off the strip.   My buddy and I yelped and found this place with 4.5 stars and over 2600 reviews so figured we had to give it a shot.   The staff was very friendly and paid attention to our order and needs.  IE I ordered a Diet Pepsi with lemon and when the waitress brought a refill she included a lemon with out me asking.  Most restaurants I need to remind or ask for another lemon.  They checked on us regularly to make sure everything was ok.   The food was good,  I had strawberry French toast and my buddy a breakfast burrito.  The food tasted great and fresh.  For the price I wish the portions were a little bigger and for the breakfast burrito it would of been nice to grill it or make it stand out some how from a standard breakfast burrito.   Once I relocate to Vegas I would definitely repeat and bring guests with me to eat here.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

M5mD-KWI-UxpKgxVP3bDWg.text: We had breakfast here the service was quick friendly welcoming the food was delicious quickly served and one enjoy the food a lot of high-quality items would definitely be visiting again if we're in the Las Vegas area I would recommend this location the owner was very gracious came over and thanked us personally for coming to his establishment that was a nice touch to the visit

3PYX-OXDt_zmcCWiOfkCOw.text: Ate here based on Yelp reviews and I was not disappointed. Bottomless ice coffee was delicious and they made me a to go cup. Pancakes were tasty and the service was awesome. Had more than enough staff to quickly service all customers.

SCB4WBOtwrVsJSiRgS7gqQ.text: Great breakfast. Their pick de Gallo was home made with fresh jalapenos. Even with out of season tomato great.  Eggs as ordered. Attentive service proud of their product. Rightly so

HZi5j4cqTlsJmIacgq5Hig.text: Excellent service all around. Food was turned around quickly and accurately. Had the eggs Benedict Florentine and the holandaise was great. The hash browns were perfectly cooked. My boss had the country potatoes that were ok. Nothing special. Can't wait to try the gravy next time and I'll probably give this place the extra star!

Kygcijnld9FB1_zVrhzm7w.text: Went for breakfast, 45 minute wait. Hate to admit but with the price and long wait it wasn't worth it. Where the high rating for this place comes from is beyond me. I have to wonder if reviewers have the right place.  I had 2 eggs and ham, hash browns and toast. Wifey had the chili. We both had coffee. My eggs were cooked well. The hash browns were crispy on the outside (nice) but mushy and overcooked on the inside (yuk). Toast is, well, toast; nothing special. The ham was what you would expect, a canned ham warmed on the grill.  My wife's chili was just okay. She thought it tasted a bit like canned ingredients.  Coffee was okay. Reminded both of us of McD's.  The restaurant atmosphere is nothing special at all. Very minimal effort went into creating this space. I was expecting much better.  Service was quick and friendly, but no where near the level you read in most of the reviews.  A side note: the to wonderful patron who brought their "emotional support poodle" with pink hair: really? Everyone knows.

lG9MyWKWcwZOreodlIbFAg.text: Breakfast was deliciously good. Omg them home fries with bell peppers and onion were fantastic, crunchy and perfectly seasoned. The staff was wonderful too, will definitely come back again.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nLERX5x30SqHtfCtgwe8dQ.text: The greatest service!  They rush to the door to open it and quickly greet you! Veggie omelet and French toast highly recommended!  Bacon sooo delicious.  Definitely a hidden jewel. Even had great customers that joined in singing happy birthday and paying for our table thanking my father for his service!

L4fSo0HfkQg8zvtIOfWnYw.text: Overall I would rate my experience 9/10. Great customer service and great food. I ordered the veggie omelet and mamas pancakes. I selected the home fries with my omelet; they were seasoned very well. The only thing that would have made the meal better would have been having warm syrup.. Alex was great! Thank you

Kc6fVqtRYZymz9YxL3BcDQ.text: Pancakes are ginormous. Hash browns be them small, were crisp and delicious. The eggs were soft and yummy. French toast is just the same. The wait time was annoying but for good reason, this little spot is totally worth the wait!

Yq9SjcJBPzDjoVE7DDjCCg.text: Excellent food and excellent service!!! They greet you at the door when you walk-in and everyone is friendly. I love the pancakes!!

K7Mncpen8R-15wYXuIxepg.text: Unfortunately, the food looked better than it tasted. Pancakes tasted like plastic and were too chewy. On the other hand, Eggs Benedict and hash browns were great.

QAJZ6PnTb8uWaajHmJGkBA.text: As we were walking up to the door, the owner opened the door for us and made us feel like we were walking up to a family members house. Every table in the house was full, but we were lucky enough to not have to wait more than 3 minutes. Their coffee is freshly ground before every pot, and although they were busy, the waitress never let my cup be empty. We ordered a little of everything. I got their chili cheese omelette with their house made chili, and it was perfect! Their home fries are very tasty as well. The biscuits and gravy are some of the best I've ever had. Their gravy is a little thick, but it's so flavorful. They use bacon and sausage, and a little maple syrup. They even let us sample the gravy before we ordered. This is definitely a required stop when I go to Vegas now!!!

4Rbu5wuA-xSIpyL29pI7IQ.text: I was looking for a place to grab a quick bite, just to kill some time before work. After a Google search, Mr. Mamas popped up, and was within a mile. So I stopped in. It's sad, I must say, that this level of customer service and human interaction are not the norm. Before I could even ENTER the establishment, I was greeted at the door by Kat (I hope I got that right - in hindsight she deserved to be remembered) with a tremendous smile and a heart-felt greeting. I was promptly seated. My server came over in very short time (Roneisha, I believe), who very kind, professional, and spoke to me directly (eye contact carries weight). Food was delicious (nothing fancy - oatmeal and two hard-scrambled eggs), but the SERVICE...almost finished with my meal (I am not at all opposed to dining alone), a gentleman approached and asked about the experience so far. Mr. Mama himself. So kind, so engaging, along with the staff (others asked about my experience, as well, and if they could do anything more). I will definitely be returning. I dont typically write these, but this was absolutely worthy of the effort. Even in leaving, well-wishes and confirmation of a positive experience. Breakfast was affordable, but the human decency, the warm interactions, they genuine concern, the KINDNESS: priceless, and hard to find. Here's a place. If there WAS a downside, its that Mr. Mama is a Michigan man (Go Bucks!), but I cant find it in my heart to hold that against him. Wonderful experience in a time where my soul benefitted from that visit tremendously.

pOoKEtxvXnKGRB3tVgfQ-w.text: We drive across town just to eat at Mr. Mamas! The food here is excellent, the staff and owner are friendly and attentive. This is just the perfect spot for breakfast! Whether you are a local or just visiting from out of town you owe it to yourself to come in and try Mr. Mamas. I will post pictures next time but the food looked too good to even pause and snap a quick pic. Everything is prepared fresh, I love the gravy, they give you a disclaimer since it's made sweet but it is delicious. I paired it with the biscuits and they were excellent. Soft, fresh, not dry melt in your mouth bread! We will definitely back and have been spreading the word for this place. Also love the new bigger location, a little further for us but definitely worth the trip!

hBz_jZNThBs2gngneFkQZA.text: We were in town for a College Softball tournament at UNLV, heard about this place and even though we were tight on time, we woke up early to come out here.  Did not disappoint!  Everything was amazing.  The owner comes around to the tables and personally greets you, amazing service, amazing food and an amazing prices.    We will be back before we leave town and we will be back any time we come back in town.

bucoS4AXk7e5WOLfVvMtVQ.text: I arrived about 9 am and it was pretty quiet-at 9:30 this place was bustling.  The staff is friendly and attentive.  Food came quickly after ordering. I had steak and eggs-my last meat for awhile. Although the steak was thin it was cooked medium rare as I requested. Hash browns were better than most places - brown and crispy outside and soft but not over cooked inside. Coffee was decent and the vanilla creamer raised the flavor level. Prices are very good and servings are more than adequate.  The dining room is spacious and would accommodate a small group breakfast easily.  I'll return soon and try the pancakes-they look delicious.   I returned to try the pancakes. They did not disappoint-they were large, very light, fluffy, tasty and a beautiful golden brown.  So good.

5PwZaMcw4MC8--a_CGf_GA.text: Wonderful food and great service. Would definitely come back here, we had five people in our group and everyone loved their breakfast and it came out FAST!

Rn7Z0Jw_L1_UXXycXSlzaA.text: This place has the best customer service I've ever experienced. Denise was our server and she made sure that we had everything we needed. She offered things that I didn't have to ask and I didn't think of asking for at the moment but I would have later if she didn't ask... like butter for my French toast, splitting the bill with my friend, more water, and if everything was fine. Workers here all looked happy and they were all very helpful. As soon as a table left, they worked in teams to clean out the tables (my friend remarked that  she felt like she was in the game like diner dash). They were swift without being distracting to other customers. The food was remarkable as well! French toast wasn't soggy neither was it too sweet... You get a lot for your money and a pleasant experience... You'll want to come back... I know I do.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mama&#39;s French toast

lrkBBgbjluPLuujQ6H8jzg.text: Talk about customer service! everyone we encountered here was so nice and helpful. It was so refreshing to have such great service. The food was so good! Large portions. I had the french toast and it was delicious! You need to try this place, you wont regret it!

kGOGGtPuwJHoheU04QgCdw.text: Mr. Mamas is the best little place in town! It's so cute and the food is so good! You can't beat the price either! I definitely recommend!!!

x7JiyEfOJNL2ci2ec0IcxA.text: This place was very busy, but very efficient. The food was fresh and tasted great. A lot of traditional breakfast items done right and some unique wraps and omelets. I had the greek omelet and my friend had a breakfast plate with pancakes (tasted those and they were traditional and fluffy!).. The home fries were good, and I recommend adding the peppers and onions, of course. The staff was very friendly and on point. We even had a few different employees check on us throughout breakfast. Coffee and water refills were always available when we needed them. It's a large restaurant with many tables to accommodate how busy they are. The cinnamon rolls looked awesome!! We didn't notice those until we saw another table get them, next time :) Prices are reasonable as well.

Wl8qkJCcu8c-YhWNuTpG3g.text: My wife and I went here for breakfast.  The atmosphere was very friendly.  Sean (sp?) greeted us at the door and was very friendly.  As we walked in, we immediately noticed the busy, bustling staff.  They were very friendly and very helpful.   The food was amazing.  I had the Mamas Stack of 3 pancakes.  They came out on a plate and look like a cake!  I requested poached eggs.  Not only were the eggs correctly poached, but they were not all wet.   My wife had the steak and eggs, and it was excellent as well.  P.S. Kudos to Mr Mamas for offering turkey bacon.

TeL7-uVnBdm75mKp137PNw.text: A break fast only place usually exist cause it's good or it's the only place open.  The omelette is good but should contain more cheese.  Hash browns were meh. Rye bread was tasty and same for French toast.  Not bad at all and affordable price. Easy parking too. A

XEs1bo7vYcjSO4GItka8kQ.text: This was an inexpensive, polite, fast, professional, friendly restaurant with many servers (which reduced the waiting). The floor was open, there were three or four cooks (which increased the speed of the order).     I enjoyed the experience and I recommend the low cost (slightly out of the way) breakfast.

vyPC0Cx7ROqvvWKFMCZl_g.text: What can you say when you're made to feel at home before you are called for table? It's breakfast. They serve fresh, hearty portions of real food from the heart. The service is super friendly and attentive. Doggie bags by request. Thanks, Be. Mama!

bdj1s4MeVNUSrFeG6VNIYQ.text: Excellent breakfast. Fast friendly service coffee cup or water glass never gets close to empty .  Had omelette & it was great .  Came with home frys with peppers & onions

c4q6WdjDu5ca_K9HMdXtog.text: Not only is the food absolutely amazing!!!! This place is the MOST friendly, comforting and heart-warming establishment:) Highly recommend this stop to fill your tummy and warm your soul!

YuIvCzlVOV9SbCsb5rR42Q.text: We were looking for a place off of the strip, and found this place. Service was amazing. Our glasses were always full, the entire staff was very attentive and extremely personable!  We all got the Mama's Short Stack with scrambled eggs & bacon. Best pancakes ever!  I highly recommend this place!

Y3CniOd0miH48G5RZW340g.text: Never been here before...1st impressions.. after walking in the door, it was easy to notice that it was very clean, inviting and friendly. Staff was very friendly, greeted us as soon as we walked in the door, and every one of them had a smile on their face. It showed they enjoyed working there.  Abby, our waitress is a sweetheart. She seated us, offered menu ideas, since this was our first time there, and was just a delight.  Food was prompt, hot and delicious.  I had the Cali Omelette and Susie had scrambled eggs and pancakes. Both suburb!  Thank you Abby for making our Sunday morning breakfast such a delight, and thank you Mr. Mammas, for a delicious meal!  We'll be back!

-AUd-vMK9v5pPHqLCCVhvg.text: Went there on a Sunday late morning. The wait was about 25 minutes. The food was very good, portions were big, staff was very friendly, and most importantly the prices were what they should be! If you have a car, I recommend coming here for breakfast or brunch and you'll save yourself a fortune compared to the strip, then you can parlay that savings ;)

lOZkg9UPFKq-X2Vr6yB75A.text: I always come here when were in Vegas. One of the highlights of oue trip. Great service and the food is always fresh tasting. Thanks again from The Oronaz, Riverside Cali.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie Omelette, yummy..
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken soup, great flavor.

T2SLpxvLF6PDitAWmWuUHQ.text: Every time we come to Vegas we make time for Mr Mamas!!!! We never have had a bad meal here!  The biscuits and gravy are to die for!  The gravy is different and yummy.  Walk don't run!!!!

kfogD17ZmIWEBXzFDJ9eMw.text: This is one of those feel good places where you get awesome food and amazing service. Not once have I had bad service or a single complaint. the breakfast is superb and portion sizes are great; definitely come hungry! The owner and manager always come table to table to make sure everything is good. Can't go wrong with coming here for breakfast

JgWWV-o3jWj7Z-whA4yUiA.text: One of the best breakfast spot in the area. We loved everything we ordered. The only thing I disappointed French toast comes without fruits. Otherwise, everything was on spot.

y_5qQRUGBW3wVlBgW0gdwg.text: We went on a random Tuesday morning. Our waitress was so nice we wanted to take her back to NYC!  She gave us a taste of the hash to make sure we liked it. The food was awesome, fresh, and tasty. I had French toast with blueberries instead of strawberries and my companion had the hash. It was a bit off the Strip and well worth the $9 Lyft ride. Every staff member was super nice.  I think I gave the biggest tip as a % ever. Can't wait to go back.

v2GpczO5wXDwv-YA8DIzwQ.text: Another excellent breakfast at Mr Mamas   We eat here every time we come to Las Vegas.  The service is excellent and the food is hot and delicious

jMqVkp_DZDsao2NbVZz_UA.text: Wow!! Just go!! My family and I went for breakfast while in town and was not disappointed. It was very busy but we only had to wait for a few minutes. The staff was very friendly, hard working, and genuine. The food was great, filling, and affordable!!

ptj6UWjEhZQInlogulPZKA.text: First time here and I've got to say, BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!! The food was more than enough and the staff is super friendly. Our waiter met all our needs, always checked on us to refill our drinks. I'm bummed that I forgot his name, I think it's Ken?! Anywho, The prices are reasonable, so worth every penny. Got the Mama's French Toast, the hubby got the Country Fried Steak, and WOW, so good! Happy belly! You got to try this place out! Bigger parties, the wait isnt too long. They will do their best to accommodate you quickly.

CjoLjPl02FrwcQ9-KPi7Vw.text: Good portions, price is definitely not $ though. More like $$$. Food was great.  $2 extra for syrup, $1 extra for onions and peppers.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

fMTrYfMXilF_fPY06tQl5w.text: My family was satisfied by the meal we had here today. We arrived just before noon and were advised of a 30 minute wait time. It was near that for us, a few minutes more, but it was worth it...even with a 5-year-old! The staff were all extremely friendly. The group ordered omelets, the Philly sandwich, and French toast with bacon. We also shared a cinnamon roll. The cinnamon roll was out of this world. It was moist, finger licking good, and absolutely fresh. The bacon and the bread everything had with it were of great quality. There was nothing left to take home, and we were fully satisfied with the experience.

UnHcPQN_vEBdiQAGMJR-iA.text: How can these country fried potatoes be this good  My friend from Dallas and I, went to this restaurant for brunch. It was packed! But the wait went by fast. They have plenty of seating in this restaurant. It's a very open concept with the tables and chairs. The staff was very friendly; they were always smiling!  We got seated and waters were brought out immediately. Our waittresss gave us time to look at the menu. She went through and gave her recommendations as well.  I ordered the eggs benedict with canadian bacon and my friend ordered 2 pancakes, 2 Eggs with country fried potatoes.   Our orders came out quickly. We were ready to eat so very happy about the service at Mr. Mamas. I requested extra crispy hashbrowns and they got it perfectly. The eggs benedicts were classically made; the hollandaise sauce was perfect. The portions were huge as well.   My friend enjoyed his meal and I had to help him finish because of how big the portions were. The pancakes were fluffy and buttery YUM!   And of course, the country fried potatoes, my goodness that was a pandemonium of flavors; my taste buds were having a party! Our waitress was so friendly and made sure she didn't just grab plates!! She asked before grabbing anything.   I gave this place a five because they stayed True to what they offered. This place is meant to be classic breakfast food and they do it well!

ngWhn5bf1pJjKnegkbm3FA.text: Okay Yelp...suggestions you should have Beyond the Stars for places like this.  We have the pleasure of visiting Mr. Mamas twice a year and they NEVER disappoint actually they get better! I tried the grits last time... y'all can cook.  We have one more visit this year... see y'all soon... thank you!

aUEoDkwzPw3hsfHK2M0mcg.text: First time here and the wait was worth it.  Food and service amazing will be back soon!

Zh8VFJeDpMq_jfFYvwmaYA.text: We were first timers and saw a long line outside of ppl waiting, but for me that was a plus. Ppl don't wait in long lines for good food. The food was delicious and came out fast, Jenna was our server and she was very friendly. This place is a must for breakfast and lunch, with awesome service!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. So good it&#39;s gone

XTV9ltgLQWq4s8WvQ1s70w.text: Came with a group of about 10 girls for brunch. It's not too far from the strip so it was a short drive. Make sure you are not in a rush because the wait was very long (45 min to 1 hr). The food was great and the waitress was personable. I ordered a Cali Omelette with hash browns and wheat toast along with a cup of coffee. The portions are huge so I only ate half and took the rest home. I would come back as long as I don't have anything planned immediately after. I would have given 5 stars if they take reservations.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cali Omelette with hash browns, wheat toast

vUnYhXO6PgYp8-N43apIww.text: I come to Vegas pretty regularly to visit family and one of my favorite activities is searching out good places to eat while I'm here. This is a real find. I like a good breakfast and Mr. Mamas does it right. I've never had corned beef hash this good. The restaurant is clean and well organized, the wait staff is as courteous and professional as I've seen, and the owner is a wonderful character with a huge heart for his customers. It can get very crowded with a substantial wait as the morning progresses, as it is extremely popular. There's a reason for that, of course, it's a great place to eat with good food and good prices. I highly recommend.

GO33wy05Xj11bLiCJDn4sQ.text: This place has gotten incredibly popular since the last time I went. So, expect a wait time. However, one thing I really admired was that the hostess was fantastic at calling people's names. She was very thorough. She would loudly repeat the guest's name multiple times inside the restaurant and then proceed outside doing the same thing. There was no way you would miss hearing your name.   Anyways, Mr Mamas definitely lives up to their standard of making people feel like they're at home. Every employee that we encountered was friendly. Our server was very attentive and made sure our coffees, waters, and soda never reached halfway.    The food was delicious and exceptionally large portions. You are definitely getting your money's worth. I ordered the country fried steak, which had a great steak to gravy ratio. The steak wasn't drenched in gravy, but it also wasn't significantly lacking some. I would definitely put this place as one of my top places to get a country fried steak considering that is the main dish I order at any other breakfast spot.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Side of bacon
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak &amp; Eggs
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Country fried steak

_BbXPc-XUZeX3ZPCw0KS3w.text: Came out on a budget, I was considering buffets but everything is overpriced. $40 for a decent buffet but at most all you really need to be full is two plates.  Mr. Mama's is way better than the over priced buffets. Everything here is delicious. Everything is cooked fresh unlike the buffets. For $10 or $15 you can get a full plate, you'll leaved as stuffed as you would at a buffet. If I am ever again in vegas I'll make sure I come back here.

1y1gws0f3T2T9vFHLIlFCQ.text: First time visiting. I had ordered French Toast and sausage but after hearing our waitress describe the sausage gravy on the chicken fried steak to my friend, switched to the biscuits and gravy. Great choice. Food was delicious and the bill not bad for such a big meal. Don't stay on the strip for food, venture out and see what else Vegas has to offer :-)

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Biscuits and Gravy plus Chicken Fried Steak

-K1il3NEyy4kUFmrkZ4SwA.text: I was really surprised at how much I ended up liking this place. It's been in my bookmarks for a while and I finally ended up going last Saturday morning around 8am. There wasn't a wait at the time, but by the time we were leaving at around 9:30am, there was much more people waiting outside. I appreciate how the employees opened the door for us as we walked in. I noticed that they tried to do that for every customer, which is a nice gesture. There are not any outlandish dishes here, everything is pretty simple breakfast/brunch food. I ordered the corn beef hash and eggs and my friend ordered the chicken fried steak and eggs. We also had to try their cinnamon roll, which is one of the things that this restaurant is known for. Our food came out so fast, I think it took us longer to order than to wait for our food. Lol. I LOVED my corn beef hash and eggs, my favorite part about it was the hash browns, which I always order extra crispy. Their cinnamon roll is alright - it's soft and not too sweet, but nothing beats Cinnabon cinnamon rolls to me. Haha. Overall, their service is impressive - they have a lot of employees working so there is always someone to help us.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon Roll
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corn Beef Hash and Eggs

0m4uCbtmB9R3e5amHj6tmw.text: Impressed! The food was really good and service was excellent. We were greeted at the door and seated promptly. No waiting! Staff was very friendly And attentive. Will be coming back for sure!

x_Moe_rvq17sFMU8nKmpzA.text: Delicious food, friendly staff, nice and easy wait. The Greek omelette was so flavorful and the cinnamon roll was perfect for sharing with friends. Next time I'm in Vegas I will definitely return!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon roll (huge!)

pP-o42eqtuGyKnVk7X7fXQ.text: The Good: the coffee is good (perfectly mild), the scrambled eggs are good and for once in my going out to breakfast life they were NOT greasy! (it's a freaking miracle)... and although they are usually very busy, they seem to get you in pretty quickly and the food does not take to long once you order. Staff is very friendly.   The not so Good: the pancakes are rubbery (which usually means super high in gluten) so I'll be ordering the french toast next time. The oatmeal is very basic, probably wouldn't order again.   Overall, I definitely recommend trying this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scrambled eggs... surprisingly not Greasy.
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scrambled eggs, pancakes, oatmeal and coffee.

UfdXPl9DXE1UItkjVC4b1A.text: Probably one of the best brunch place that I've been to in a long time.   The food is just your typical traditional American style breakfast, but it is definitely delicious, cooked to perfection with great service and staffing.   Definitely felt catered to and definitely had great dining experience!   I'm very picky about my breakfast, and this is definitely the new spot!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Biscuits and gravy, hash browns, and partly eaten French toast m -So Good!

DUKVXP51eRy6WEgrq8fhoQ.text: First time here. The downside for me was this place is very small and everyone sits very close to each other. It's very loud and I wouldn't recommend for small children. The good news is the food is VERY good. Best pancakes I have had in a long time. They are not stingy with their portions! The staff was very friendly and efficient. I would want to go back and try other menu items!

ULYWXF0cJrfDaCZsA4kfiA.text: Chicken fried steak and breakfast burrito is bomb!!! Will definitely come back all the way from North Vegas! Super yum, can't wait to try the rest of the menu  and staff is wonderful, feels homey and Kat the manager came around tables, just made it a great experience. Food tastes homemade, it's busy but worth the wait

5KfUwSYRqCSovLEn0lY0Kw.text: I LOVE this place!! Who knew you could find such friendly, cheap, great food in Vegas? The food is delicious, and the entire place has a family friendly vibe. They even let us sample the chicken fried steak and corned beef when we were stuck! Seriously, love this place. We'll be back!!

jM-mjnHM1Sl8C31ljgI19w.text: Food is not what it used to be, I should have gone to another breakfast place. People are nice but the food was soggy and cold..the steak was grey, hash browns wet and cold, but the eggs were ok if you like cold eggs.

51TG6ZChAAlw0lcsSGLlZg.text: Theres something special about this place. We were greeted at the door nicely and sat at our table... this place is simple.. simple wooden chairs, simple wooden tables with simple menus. The staff was continuously friendly.   Vegetarian options are available. The food came out plated as best an egg sandwich could be. The breakfast wrap was tight and full. Everything was delicious.  The owner came out and chatted with I believe every table there.. very friendly, high energy and as positive as can be.  Customer service can really bump a review, which is exactly what this place has done.  Impressive.

Came in on a Sunday with a little wait as it is, rightfully, a popular spot. Food was out quick, however there wasn't a "churn and burn" feel...it was very welcoming. This may be my new go-to spot for breakfast.

55E7wklnBfzdQTL_csB2-g.text: I look forward to my next visit. This place is so awesome, but plan on waiting if you don't come early. FYI Totally worth the wait!

7gQRm3K54KnrXDLRjstJJA.text: I love Mr Mamas. It's like a second home! The main thing that keeps me coming back is the service. The staff is like a family here and whenever you come in, it's like you're having breakfast at your aunts house or something lol. The food is good too! My favorite is the chicken fried steak and everything else I've had here is really yummy.   They serve traditional, American breakfast dishes and make everything very well. Highly recommend

1LvuEHKDhG-tYj57yqzQtw.text: Very good food service was great will definitely be making this my new breakfast spot

HOLnGdG_4lDFlT6MMKWrPA.text: First things first... THE CINNAMON ROLLS! Oh my god. Perfection. I don't think Ive ever had better! The food was really great too, but the Cinnamon rolls! Lol. Def worth the wait if there is one. Ive been a few times and once I was lucky enough to be seated immediately. Wish they were open all day because I'd for-sure visit for an omelette and a cinnamon roll for dinner!

8G7aaJnCef8Y8AJe1rV_rQ.text: Start off with a cinnamon roll as a breakfast appetizer. Weeeeeee Vegas! Steak and eggs was solid. The home fries are kinda borring even with grilled onions and peppers. If these were more exciting that would get them to 5 stars. The Patty  melt was a classic patty melt on rye with crisp fries. The Greek salad w/chicken is quite a bargain and a pretty fun.   This place is well run the servers are super attentive, there's one bathroom stall so it's a wait. Solid food, good prices.
