qwTdoCwi4OkuvK7dlIH9bg.text: What I loved about this place is that everyone is sooooo friendly and welcoming - literally!!! They sure make you feel right at home. My friend ordered the steak plate for breakfast and I ordered the mamas short stack. Our entire meal was good, but not something we'd order again. We did in fact order the cinnamon roll, but I wish I would of told them to bring it after we were finished with our breakfast, because by the time we ate it it was cold.

vEcad4G4uzRyU-rZpyJ2CA.text: We came here because the food looked delicious. We will be back because the service was superb. Crystal was our server and she anticipated every need.  The rest of the staff pitched in to make sure we were well taken care of. Great breakfast option. The French Toast is perfect!

Pphy8r282E_At6tirLNrJg.text: We were in Vegas early morning and we wanted breakfast but didn't want the usual franchise spots. I searched Yelp and this place came up, the reviews were good so we decided to give it a try.  It's in a shopping strip center not too noticable unless you are looking. I was getting the kids out of the car and this gentlemen opened the restaurant door and greeted me before I even made it to the sidewalk, asked how many were in our party and got our table ready.   We were seated right when we walked in and I noticed so was everyone else entering the restaurant. They were slightly busy, especially for a Thursday. You can tell this is a local favorite.   Our server claudia came over to for our drink order right away. The menu had plenty of options for breakfast and lunch. I ordered the eggs Benedict florentine and my 2 kids shared a breakfast plate (eggs, sausage,  and pancakes). The food was delicious and fresh. I'm so glad we stopped in and I will definitely be coming back.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict Florentine

WDn3u-jrVx__ZUeSkiNMew.text: Our 1st impression was great. Greeted at the door, friendly fast service to get seated. The menu was ok, I expected a little more from a restaurant that has a 5 star rating.  Our server was attentive and professional. Now for the food review. I ordered the Corned Beef Hash.  It looked like your typical canned corned beef hash. The menu reads homemade. I believe them but it did not look appealing at all.  I ordered the biscuit which was dry like sawdust. I will be posting a photo of the Biscuit.  The tater tots were very typical. Nothing out of the ordinary.  Basically a run of the mill cafe.  I am amazed at how many people love the place. If not for the great service I would think differently

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

F3GBhRTAg6CEQl6UQi3LHA.text: OMG! What a gem. This place has amazing food and service. Get off the strip and go eat real food that is reasonably priced. The staff is super friendly and attentive and the restaurant is clean.  We had the Cali Omelette and we shared the special Fried Cinnamon Rolls with caramel sauce. AMAZING!! No, FREAKING AMAZING.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

opWvkrP-7S5X_wZG8i_6PA.text: This is a great breakfast spot with great food and awesome service. We had a party of 6 and between all of us we tried the scramble, pancakes, corn beef hash, pancakes and coffee.   The pros: the corn beef hash is awesome. You can get it as a side even though it's not listed as a side. I could have just eaten this with an over easy egg and been in breakfast bliss. The service is awesome. We had a 40 minute wait and when we got our table, we were greeted enthusiastically by the manager (owner?): a guy that looks like dad from porn stars--I had to look a couple times to make sure it wasn't him. And then they assigned two servers to get our beverage and food a going!  Good work  The cons: be prepared to wait. And the servings are not all that big. In my opinion.   Must eat place off Vegas.

irJMtYbRAfTVdXyE3s_78g.text: The service is so great and everyone is friendly. The food was very fresh specifically the veggie omelet. The portions are huge too. A place to definitely visit for breakfast!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie omelet and the chicken fried steak

3ra6CdPgunNfROTlC5rDdw.text: I was also excited to eat here for breakfast. It was busy for breakfast and the wait was about 15 minutes. After being seated, I was in the mood for pancakes, bacon, and eggs. I placed my order and in the meantime watched the business owner (I assume) cheerfully greet everyone. The food was ready fairly quickly, as should be expected with breakfast. My pancakes were huge, heavy, and thick. If you love hearty cakes then come here and order up. I was definitely full after eating all my food. Nothing spectacular here, but do expect warm friendly service when you visit.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pancakes, eggs, and turkey bacon
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burger and fries

AMibRJmRtecJKqN25-3B0g.text: We are from Los Angeles and eat out plenty. This is the first place that is not the norm. Incredible staff, welcoming, warm, caring and polite.  Amazed at the level of service and politeness. Definitely ... Highly recommend.

TU9PH2IZRYY3YltIHIKixQ.text: This is my second visit to Mr. Mamas. We are from NC the service and the way they run this restaurant is exceptional. The food is really yummy as well. If you get a chance to meet Mr. Mamas he is a really nice guy!! I would HIGHLY recommend this restaurant!!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict, Home Fries, Steak and eggs!!!

MvGJ_NKGjWFQWpgaRLmm1A.text: This place was awesome for breakfast, I knew it would be good based on Yelp and the fact that when we arrived there was a line out the door. We went on a Monday before driving back to the greater LA area. I enjoyed talking to the owner and also our waitress. The food is great and it felt nice to eat at a mom and pop shop away from the strip

iGk9MBOkqlXNLKgXpePgjg.text: Incredibly fast and friendly service...literally got our food less then 5 minutes. Food was delicious and can say the overall experience was pleasant. Great quick & good breakfast joint to dine and go about your day.

9AvqMHH8yJAVJw_CJhtqzQ.text: This place is great! You definitely get the bang for your buck. The owner himself came to our table and greeted us. The customer service here is above and beyond. I hardly ever write reviews but since I'm in a food coma I thought I'd leave a review while digesting my food. I will be back.

uoiCeB8B2dJAv6MZIqKE-g.text: I am really on the fence with how to rate Mr. Mamas.  My server was wonderful, food was ok but I had such a bad experience this was my first and last visit.    The main issue was the manager on duty was very rude and unprofessional.  When our food was brought one order of toast was missing.  The 2 young men who brought our food said "OK. Is that everything?"  I started to say "I think we are missing a toast but..."  When I was cut off and yelled at by the manager (who was not involved at all with bringing our food) "They can only carry so much at a time!!"  I was shocked.  I was speaking very nicely and if he had let me finish was going to say "but if they haven't made it we don't need it"  There are no kids menus here so both of my girls (under 10) ordered adult meals which I knew they could not eat and we could not take with us as we were not going home for several hours.  My server rushed over and apologized profusely for him.  I then asked is that the owner?  Still shocked and she said no he is a manager.  I told her I feel sorry for her if he treats customers like that I can't imagine how he treats employees.  I then got to hear him yell at several employees throughout my meal.  Keep in mind we were there early.  There was no wait at this point.  He is yelling at employees to clear tables and in a rude way, not just like he is hustling.  I would be more understanding if there was a wait and employees were slacking off but that was not the case.  I was not the only customer looking every time he yelled at someone.  Oh and our toast came out 10 min later so it wasn't that "they couldn't carry it"  I told a couple friends about my experience and they both automatically knew who I was talking about and said they heard him yelling on their visits.    Food was good.  Basic diner food.  Nothing amazing but a solid breakfast.  I had the ABC omelette special.  They were very skimpy with the avocado, there was 4 paper thin slices.  I wish I had taken pics but I was so shocked by the manager that was forgotten. One daughter had bacon and eggs, the other one pancake and a side of sausage.  We all had drinks.  Total for myself and 2 kids (including tip) was just under $50.  Not worth it in my opinion.  The staff other than the manager were very nice.   Two other employees came over during our meal and apologized for the manager.  Our server apologized again several times throughout our meal and also brought us a cinnamon roll on the house.  They are the reason I am giving this a 3 star instead of a 1 star.

o9Rn-Fhr74gPpaFsSR92-Q.text: Excellent breakfast spot, fast service, great prices and definitely some of the best food in town!! Weekends are generally very busy, so definitely plan to wait a little.

1J9Am_fx2-7hjHDNN28qgA.text: A bit of a drive for us but ohh so worth it! The cinnamon roll so light and fluffy. The owner is very friendly and personable! The sausage gravy is great, love the garlic ranch. Hubby said the French toast was good.

LUS2wIzA-Gk4aDCFZzCzag.text: THE BEST MEAL EVER!!! Everything was excellent. The service, the introductions, the meals were exquisite. My other half is a chef and he admitted he couldn't do much better, which means a lot! This place could charge triple (could being the key word!) and I'd still leave a 40% tip! Great personalities in every department... THANK YOU MR. MAMMA'S!!

f5q_iRfRbhiasywNHuQGKQ.text: I have been working my way through all of the top rated breakfast establishments in Las Vegas (as rated by yelp) as so far, this is the best I have found.  Upon arriving, a friendly gentleman  came outside to greet us in the car park and welcome us in, once inside another gentleman (I believe the owner / proprietor)  welcomed us enthusiastically and we were quickly shown to a table.   Our drinks order was taken as soon as we were seated at our table, and the drinks were delivered very quickly after that. As soon as our drinks order had been taken care of, our waitress (yet another friendly and enthusiastic member of staff) introduced herself and took our orders.  Food arrived fairly quickly, was well presented and most importantly tasted great.  We had Denver omelets, and a side of French toast, and a side of sausage.   The sausage was the flat patty type, nothing spectacular, but good enough.   The French toast was very nice, well presented, nice tasting, not overdone on the flavour and served with warm maple syrup, very nice indeed.  Finally the Denver omelet was excellent! Really nice and tasty, cooked just right, looked really appetising and neatly presented. I had potatoes with mine, which I also opted to have with peppers and onions (which turned out to be a good choice) the peppers and onions were very finely chopped and worked great with the sliced potatoes, which were cooked as close to perfection as you are going to find.  Overall the food was really enjoyable, and left me wanting to return to try other items on the menu. (which I certainly will) The thing that really stands out however, is the service! Everyone was so enthusiastic and friendly, it certainly puts you in a positive mood. I would be surprised if you can find anywhere else in Vegas with service to the incredibly high standard of Mr Mama's, absolutely perfect service!  I purchased a Yelp coupon to use during this visit, and unfortunately I was unable to redeem the coupon as it was showing as invalid when staff tried to process it. Even though this was clearly not the fault of Mr Mama's, staff were apologetic and the owner even offered to effectively give us our meal for free. I could not accept this as the meal was so good and I purchased a second coupon on my phone, which did work fine, now I just need to resolve the issue with the first one with Yelp. This shows how staff are willing to go above and beyond to make sure customers are happy.   I look forward to visiting again and I would wholeheartedly recommend Mr Mama's to anyone!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Denver omelets with potatoes (one with onion and peppers on the potatoes), French toast with warm maple syrup and sausage patties. All great

jX_mIGwFS3QUjbCcYsh9FA.text: Great food with better service!  We even met Mr. Mamas on the way out. He's a funny guy with a great spirit. The pancakes are hella good!!!

Qg9MNPXVjIFE88cOGsqLFw.text: Probably the best service I have ever received. I felt so welcomed as soon as I walked through the doors. The staff were all super friendly and attentive. The food was amazing.

IHwz2bFQc3jLpCUReutGRA.text: Best breakfast off of the strip hands down. When this place says it gives you a home cookin feel, it most definitely does. The service was excellent, we got greeted by a cool friendly dude who had to handle the mass traffic. I went in there on a Monday like around 12 and it still took us 20 minutes to get sat. The locals rave about this place and it's packed so it's a good situation. Our server was real cool and attentive. I asked her what was the commotion about and she recommended the Mamas special which is the 2 pancakes, 2 eggs, 2 turkey bacon and hash browns for $10. So I'm all in. The food takes the normal 20 minutes to make and it comes out looking all outstanding. Fluffy buttermilk pancakes with the perfect texture and sweet taste. The eggs and hash browns were seasoned and garnished with great flavor. The turkey bacon was cooked perfectly to the point before it becomes overtly crispy. I ate everything in it's entirety. Great Customer Service all around and if you're a baseball fan you can talk all day with Mr. Mama himself about your team vs his Detroit Tigers. Good food and good peoples.

RKtlfJi_QG6GYSJadOIPpA.text: We came based on Yelp reviews.  We attempted to come here on a Saturday morning last year and the wait was over an hour and unfortunately didn't stay.  This year we came on a Friday and wait was 15 minutes.  But once we were seated, the service was extremely fast, servers/staff were attentive,  meals came out quick and hot!   Certainly worth the wait.  I had the eggs benedict with sausage and my husband had the French toast.   Both were delicious and very satisfying portions.

G3RhUY-pGx4VQw0plFsQIA.text: This place is such a little gem in Vegas! Ate here for breakfast on our way back home and everyone was so sweet. The food was out so quick and Kat even brought us complimentary deep fried French toast for waiting and omg it was delicious! And when we left a lovely man brought us a bunch of little Hershey's Kisses with out check. Definitely will be returning!

H-yr3lIkCUKpNfY3PpdDXQ.text: My new favorite spot for breakfast when I visit las vegas. Mamas French toast was amazing and delicious. The staff was friendly and fast even on a busy day will definitely come back.

4gxWjbe5v2__X9uaP5rA5A.text: SUPER friendly staff. Menu is as stacked as the pancakes. As we walked in, we noticed the giant portions and the giant stack of to-go containers stacked up near the kitchen and there seemed to be one on every table as well. Place is clean, well lit, and kid friendly. Giant HD TV's were tuned to ESPN and close captioning was on as well. Well done! Definitely recommend to out of town travelers. Worth the drive.

UBGviuwyZHcfq-4x4eeS6A.text: Was there just the other day with friends from Phoenix. Service is still great and the coffee just keeps coming. Nick runs a great spot and his staff are super also. Remind me of a Great Place in Syracuse NY where I was brought up. Keep it up Nick, your doing it well.

9bPdqjwdZulCzKgAfkIqYw.text: My family and I have been here quite a few times. The owner is a really nice guy who takes good care of his business. I wouldn't say their food is anything special that stands out about Mr. Mamas, but we keep going back because of the prices. Their prices are lower compared to other breakfast joints around.

70Qqc3cOq0DaYsAmvaWnnw.text: oh my gawd. the chocolate pancake i had was like chocolate therapy. though it was really filling i could not stop eating it. it was delicious. alll sorts of chocolate on it. there were chocolate chips and chocolate sauce. it also came with whipped cream. there were 2 buttermilk pancakes that were nice thick and fluffy. just the way pancakes should be. i highly reccomend this place as a brunch place. or breakfeast. but i gotta warn ya. you will  not be hungry for a while after you eat here. the food is very good. well done guys. will be back fosure.

HoI0ZndlHnI23XKkzUYBzQ.text: Awesome food expertly prepared quickly, friendly staff, and a wonderful owner who adds that personal touch missing from so many businesses today. Breakfast was so good that we are coming back for lunch on our next visit! I had the home fries with onions and peppers, my friend had the hash browns that had an extra herb spice she said was wonderful! Although the restaurant is full, customers are happy to wait for this amazing place! Don't miss out on this restaurant, it's THAT good! Thank you Mr. Mama for a terrific dining experience! Us transplanted Michiganders need to support one another! Yummy!!

OYJkjDz6cZBeU9sMghXWPQ.text: Excellent food!  The pictures of the food online do not do this place justice. Fresh tasting food!  Had the chicken fried steak. Felt so good after the meal. Claudia our server was so wonderful!   All of the staff come by and make sure you have what you want or need. This is a must on our list!

54Dimy6BoJQgJ7JQ_8JKSw.text: I just don't get the hype. Normal breakfast food, excellent service BUT all about the UPCHARGE. Want some salsa for your eggs, upcharge, want some peppers and onions added to your homefries, upcharge. Want some meat in your entree, plan on less than 1 ounce of it. But I'm sure you can request more for an upcharge LOL. Original pancake here I come. With so many over the top places to go, this place resonates way to plain Jane for me.

MaRu_edGynuhGfA8MqCklA.text: Stopped by for lunch with a few of my vendors. Tasty Philly Cheese Steak sandwich and a side Beef Soup aka dipping sauce... Waitress was very nice as well. We will be back to try a few more items on the menu..

It is the size of the water cup! He loved it and everything was made quick! Very impressed. When we come back to Vegas we will DEFINITELY be stopping here again! Our waitress was very friendly and quick! Loved it here!

_oWLDucG2hgX9YxnlE2i8A.text: Everytime I'm in Vegas I have to hit Mr. Mamas. Heard about the place a few years ago. It was originally near the time share I have. They are so welcoming and hospitable, you can't but feel like your one of the regulars.  The price is great, the service top notch, and the experience is priceless. Mr. Mamas is a must stop for breakfast and lunch. With all the choices in Vegas, make this place a must try.

c5UjOX4i6pNY6_BHTKV1hQ.text: Eh, it was OK will I come back....No.  Came here on a Sunday waited 15 minutes for a table totally expected. The Cali omelette was good, nothing amazing. gX9as1Iq38zV4dRlkj1z_w.text: Since this is off the strip i took a quick 10 min uber there. While the cinnamon roll was too sweet for me the pancakes were tasty and the eggs cooked perfectly.  But what really sets this place apart is the fantastic customer service. My server Alex was great and the manager/owner (not sure which) goes around and personally thanks everyone for coming and asked how your experience was  I went early in the morning around 7 am so there was no wait.

NCBdpp3CZ0UCQLsOZmbB3Q.text: We came here for breakfast on a Sunday at 830/900 they were busy but not busy where we had to wait a very long time. Their staff was attentive and very friendly. We were able to carry on a brief conversation with even the bus boy.   We started out with their cinnamon roll it was served warm not hot. Not your typical cinnamon roll as you can see it the picture it doesn't look like the traditional roll. Cinnamon flavor was good, and the cream cheese frosting was flavorful.   Husband got the chicken fried steak and he said he liked the flavor of the gravy a little bit of spice, just enough to give it a little something extra. He said his hash browns were cooked perfectly. Cleaned his plate.   I got the Spanish omelette. It was good but I like a ton of flavor so I added salsa and salt to mine. They didn't skimp out on the cheese which I enjoyed. I had homestyle potatoes with onion and peppers added and they were crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Delicious.   To end we had strawberry French toast (not pictured). They make it with Texas Bread so they are pretty good size pieces. The cinnamon flavor really popped. Had a good crust good without syrup as well. The whipped cream tasted like they make it fresh.   Overall good dining experience prices were decent, especially since my husband and I tend to eat for a family of 4.

UsNcHsJSAgMR1QQ5NFDHrA.text: Had the best chili here!! chicken fried steak and eggs benedits were ok. but I would come back for chilis but wouldnt wait 1 hr for it...

-zBypvCn0C5uwXhyW-zuBQ.text: Yelp 100 Challenge - 2018 #60  Delicious house potatoes and great customer service.   I stumbled upon Mr. Mamas after an orthodontist appointment and stopped in to try some breakfast .   The restaurant is attached to a shopping plaza off of Jones and there is plenty of open parking.   Waking up to the restaurants there is a nice gentleman who opens the door upon entering and exiting for all guest. This same gentleman takes your name and lets you know how long your wait will be. While I was waiting he asked how's your day. You can also get a menu to look over while you wait.  I only waited 3 minutes for my table to be cleaned because I came pretty early in the morning . The menu is a three tier menu and the food options are endless. You can honestly order anything here. I asked my amazing server for suggestions and told her what I wanted and she gave me a delicious combo meal.  I orders sausage, cheese an eggs, house potatoes and a cinnamon bun.   With a packed restaurant my food didn't take long to come out an it was delicious . The food was so delicious that I wanted to bring my fiance the next day for lunch so he could try.   Check it out for some yummy breakfast!!!! You want be disappointed

vGXAiqzCAqIeRLCLjwj8gQ.text: Exceptional customer service, the wait was worth the customer service! Meet w/ spoke to owner , incredible!! Food good tasty and great, warm and hot! Location out in a hidden area, but worth the travel. I can not express the hospitality of the entire staff!!! Comfortable sitting , overall a must visit to experience the food, hospitality and genuine real comfort food and politeness!

DXMVE4IZBMtdOnQ0BFc1dA.text: Best restaurant in the city! Food is always excellent and the service is the beat we have encountered EVER! Claudia is so great!! Thanks to everyone

AE62-asmBj8b9oCdtRmJhA.text: Super fast and friendly service. I was greeted and seated right away, my food came quickly and perfectly cooked very good quality. All of the wait staff was involved in helping, everyone had a kind word and thanks for coming. I'm just visiting in town for the next couple of weeks but I will definitely be back multiple times.

rIIms5bN1YhKDneFdTUtwQ.text: This place was recommend by a friend from work and she definitely knows her food, so my expectations were high, Mr mama's didn't disappoint me, I showed up some what early (for Vegas) probably around 8:30 am, and was sat right away, the server was very pleasant and welcoming, the food was excellent I enjoyed every single bite.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Benedict egg with hashbrowns and veggie omelet with their fries...mmmm, so tasty.

5T0Ro82BhlUhw7PluRfFZw.text: I been coming to Vegas regularly for over a decade and I have all my food spots laid out. Mr Mamas is on that list now. Nick the owner is the epitome of a great owner. He delivered a great life quote, " you ever cried while eating peanut butter?."  The answer is no obviously. Aside from the great team working here the food absolutely delivers. After a myriad of mediocre chicken fried steaks over the last few months. I decided to give the one here a shot and it was over the top good. Tender and flavorful. All the food was good though really.

MX3dNRe1XAtKCV3r13LAWA.text: First place I ate when I got into Vegas!! Breakfast was amazing. I had the Greek omelet if your into feta and spinach.  It was my sisters 30th so she got a cinnamon bun on the house.  The service was great the people were very friendly.  Again good food, good service.  Definitely worth it off the strip. It gets packed early.  Coffee interestingly was the best coffee I ever had.

ZnGYZVHYrQNVUYLfcClPUQ.text: We arrived just after 10 on a Wednesday. First thing I noticed was the very content staff, if not Happy. I like being around that energy. Less than 5 minute wait to be seated by Katherine a gracious, caring hostess.  Lourdes was our wonderful waitress. Very friendly chatting and consistent on checking in on us. Meals came quickly, prepared as requested (perfect soft scrambled eggs).  Nik, the owner, came out to greet the guests. My associate mentioned his turkey bacon came 'cold'. Nik wanted to 'make it right' (is that humanly possible? )  Everything else, eggs, hashbrowns, pancakes, and my pork bacon (yes, I'm bad like that) was good. Nothing extraordinary, just freshly prepared food at a fair price (two meals and coffee around $20)  Planning to go back if ever on that side of town... I want French toast...(yes, bad meets worse with me)  Will let you know how that goes!

snmp213FZT8U9MmPlWXnkw.text: First time here last week. Great service, yummy food! That's all one could ask for when it comes to dining out, right? Was in town staying at The Orleans for one of my last days in Vegas last week. Was in the mood for a breakfast burrito after dining at buffets day after day previously, so I got on yelp in search of breakfast diners. This one came up and I was very pleased. It was about 2.5 miles away from our hotel.   From the moment we were walking up, 2 young gentleman opened the doors for my family and I to walk in, I was like, wow, what a first good impression already.   We were immediately seated and shortly after we were greeted by our server who was awesome. She was friendly and attentive and I wish I remembered her name. But honestly, every last one of the employees we encountered was super friendly and nice. I think just the customer service alone was enough to make me want to come back again. It was a very welcoming environment.  I got a sausage breakfast burrito and my 6 yr old got a quesadilla and one pancake, the size of the plate.The portions were decent and the prices are reasonable. Definitely recommend this place.

Mgrgf9KEqio95jFoLAdxnw.text: So happy to enjoy brekkie here this morning! The staff was ahh-mazing! Our waitress, Eilene was fabo and so friendly. The owner or manager, don't know which one he is honestly, was someone that I could be lifelong friends with. He took our family's pic, was so personable and chit-chatted (both of us are Cali natives) and he reminded both my hubby and I of our bro-in-law, which was a good thing! The food was delicious and homey. Yum! The place gets super crowded with wait time of 45mins plus. We came at a lucky time, so we we're able to enjoy our meal from beginning to end without feeling rushed. We will see you again when we come back out for another mini-vacay!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken fried steak with the gravy mixed in with bacon and a little bit of syrup they make from scratch!

DIQZfE6kRAckSK6BuyoeZA.text: This IS the BEST restaurant in Vegas for breakfast and lunch!! Not only was the customer service PHENOMENAL- from the moment we stepped through the door until the time we left- the food was AWESOME and came out quickly. Our server was Jenna who was very friendly, happy and attentive and a GREAT server. We got omelettes, pancakes, and ham,  muffins and toast, and eggs over easy,-and we would have ordered more food to go if we weren't traveling on the road today. Not being able to eat at Mr. Mamas again is oonly regret to leaving Vegas. We LOVE your restaurant!!!

u-A9OT-D-ix2HZa6XCjtDg.text: Been to Mr. Mamas a number of times and the food, service, and management are always excellent!

7lW8_XBlc2vQcpTwAEFrwA.text: I honestly have no complaints. We did have to wait about 30 mins but it was Sunday so that's normal. But the service was great and the food was great. I had the french toast and it was good. The portion sizes were very large and reasonable prices. It's a great off the strip option. None of the fuss and all of the goodness. There's also parking. I'd recommend if you're in the area.

POaafSszPIbMVVwWgN8fyg.text: I like to try new places to eat out,  I had an opportunity on a Sunday morning to try Mr Mammas for breakfast. , had good reviews, i must say the reviews while good dont adequately describe Mr Mamas, every customer was met at the door and was promptly seated even though busy. Prompt attention given by the server,  I ordered a chile cheese omelet with hash browns. The food arrived quickly,  was hot, was cooked perfectly for me, toast was hot and buttered, hash browns just the perfect amount of crispy. I was by myself so I just watched the customers and staff, Staff worked like a well trained team, customers were eclectic and all happy with thier experience. I am not what could be referred to as a pleasant morning person, Mr Mamas simply made my day. we certainly make this a regular stop.

o0-K1m73U4MMjLTcsFTq5Q.text: The wait was worth it! The staff were so nice, the host guy is funny and the food was amazing! I ordered the chicken fried steak and a cinnamon roll, both of which I'd recommend. Everything was cooked to perfection. The chicken fried steak was crunchy, the gravy was rich and creamy. The cinnamon roll was so soft and warm. Oh, and the pancakes..yum! They were big and what I liked about them was how light and airy it was instead of dense and hard. I'm planning to come back 10/10 for sure. Just writing this review makes me hungry for more Mr. Mamas!

PTiD3us9v7GtX8N9Vv0RIQ.text: Found this place on Yelp, during our stay in Vegas from California. We were immediately greeted by staff that opened the door for us. Seated with no wait, our server was very nice and continuously checked on us and made sure we had everything. Coffee cup was never empty. Mr. Mama himself was there and interacted with every customer. Just very welcoming. Now as for the food it was amazing, couldn't find a thing wrong with it. We both had the Chicken fried steak breakfast. Good size portions, great price, awesome staff. This will  definitely be a regular place for us when we are here.

lOb3ykm7Xbqva1R6sub6gQ.text: Mr. Mamas: Las Vegas  Off the beaten path, Mr. Mamas great for breakfast, lunch, or just a quick bite. Hours of operation 6:00 a.m, to 3:00p.m. 1st time eating here. As we walked up to the restaurant, there was someone friendly who  had opened the door to welcome us in. The spacious set up of tables and friendly service made it comfortable. The servers were friendly, attentive, and diligent in assisting us. We would highly recommend this place. We shared the chicken fried steak. It was by far one of the best we've had. The server also brought us a small bowl of sausage gravy....delicious! They also separated our meal into two plates without an extra charge. All in all, we highly enjoyed our meal, and just the right portion as we were about to be in the car for four hours.   Military friendly: no extra discount

UCPBRpzReE25MTuYfvvlZg.text: I understand Mr. Mamas has very high ratings on yelp. So we decided to come try it out this morning.   The staff said the wait would be 30-40 minutes to get a table. After about 50 minutes my boyfriend walked back inside and asked if the table was ready and to the left there were 4 empty tables and she said just to pick which one we wanted to sit at.   We go ahead and sit down and the waitress immediately too our drink our.  However, as we waited for the drinks I was looking around and noticed a girl walked in and told Kat she is a Yelper. They sat her down and waited on her hand and foot and didn't even noticed we were at the next table. This really bothered me because everyone should be treated equal. Yes, you might have gave them "amazing" customer service but you lacked on a great chance to give that to another customer as well.    The staff was awesome at getting our food out quickly and man it was delicious!! The Pico De Gallo was to die for! My boyfriend didn't like the pancakes at all and he really upset about it. Especially because we waited so long and he saw me getting so upset about the customer service.   I guess next time I go in I should just say I Yelp and I'll get treated like a queen.

K_TJ8EF90yLfXhpVPQhZQw.text: Awesome place. Great food. But what is even greater is its customer service and teamwork.  While eating we noticed awesome teamwork of more than 20 staff members working together better than I have witnessed platoons in the military. Everyone had their assignment, I say assignment, not duty, because they carried out their tasks with awesome energy and commitment. I also noticed how they would shift over to help each other as needed and return to their position with pose. I was so impressed with this place we returned for a second day. It is highly recommended if you are in the Las Vegas area.

OEetNqBegkCO9lyIw3ORjQ.text: This is our family's go to spot for breakfast. We are greeted instantly and the customer service is always great.  It does get busy on the weekends but the food is delicious, so well worth the wait. The French toast is my all time favorite. :)

4Ow84xOG72zI6zKyrDchWw.text: This is the BEST place my husband and I have ever had breakfast at. The staff was very friendly and so was our server. Our server was very attentive and helpful she made sure we were satisfied with our food.  We did have to wait thirty minutes to get seated but it was well worth it. I highly recommend arriving early (like possibly 9:00 am) if you're planning on getting seated right away.  I got an omelet and I could taste every thing in it! If I lived near here I would come in all the time.

hBsYHRiDqK3wdim4Tp7wag.text: I went there with my elderly parents and son today and the staff and customer service level was impeccable. Waitstaff was friendly and attentive and hosts were more so they even help take a picture on top of a chair for a good angle. Additionally they help my slightly immobile mother to the car with me. Great place highly recommended. Food was great too

_SfohTKagoelB3iIm1LtNg.text: Loved this place! I kid you not, we walked in and were greeted and seated in less than 20 seconds. Amazing!! I loved the customer service! Our waitress was super sweet and was very attentive to our needs. This is a great place if you like to customize your food a bit more. I am a vegetarian and I requested no sausage in my omelette and our waitress offered other veggies to add more filler. There was also a man and woman who seemed to be going around asking if everything was going well for everyone and offering to take photos! I thought that was a great customer service trick they had going. I highly recommend if you're looking for a new breakfast place!

74anYu-b2TyBCjZhA5D0Gg.text: Well, am sure this place always has a wait... and it did today!  I was accidentally missed on the call out and when I went to desk, the manager was awesome in taking ownership of issue and got me seated ASAP. Not only did they apologize to no end but also covered my breakfast. That was great, but so was the food and service. Had the country fried steak with 3 eggs and hash browns. All were cooked very well and had great flavor. I had the homemade sausage gravy on side and ordered a biscuit as well. The biscuit was fantastic and really had a sweet flavor to itself but the gravy was perfect. Bacon, sausage and maple syrup. Will be back!!!

27BySujU6wzfOTqc9_gIlw.text: Wow! Amazing! The Service was phenomenal from the moment we walked in the door. The food was awesome. I had the Spanish omelette made with eggs whites (bikini season :)) so tasty. The avocado on top of the omelette was super fresh. Coffee was great. Thanks Mr. Mamas, we'll be back tomorrow or breakfast!

-ZetaNATP8g5lGIAVNN5vg.text: Stumbled upon this gem purely by accident. Wow am I glad I did. First the owner....wow...talk about old school customer service...thanks everyone for comin in...asks where yer from...engages with the whole house...his attitude extends down to the staff...the waitress was awesome...friendly...food comes out quick...had the chicken noodle soup...homemade and very tasty...had the philly cheese cause that's what they're known for...excellent...oh and when I asked the waitress what's better the fries or onion rings she said, "would you like half of each"....WHAT???!!!...restaurants don't do that these days...great experience...Mr Mama be proud of what you created

MdYlpMn-PzJuDaC5u_cONw.text: Best breakfast in Las Vegas. Leave the hotel and eat here. The owner guy runs a first class eatery. The omelettes are a must. Big Norm from downtown uptown Chiraq.  Chicago.

Yv6fzTE8ql0WKgdUW2EuZQ.text: This is our second time coming here and has been great both times we were here. Shawn is very friendly and makes you feel welcomed! He keeps it nice and cool inside with the outside tempature 110 plus it is great to enjoy your meal inside a nice cool place. It gets busy fast but don't worry it is worth the wait and both times we were sat quicker than we were told. Great place we will be back!

6oxtIOyaqgekt70AY74hlg.text: My favorite place in Vegas to have breakfast.  I have been going for years now.  Food is great along with the service.  Friendly staff and the owner always checks with everyone to see if it meets satisfaction of one's love of food.

galCHA-YlwA81rS_jzbVSA.text: Best breakfast bang for the buck in Vegas.  Wife and I ventured out here based on the reviews.  I had the chicken fried steak which was delicious. Service was good. Place is super busy and the staff takes pride in what they serve.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

csprOSd5yMrKd8MPZbAcdg.text: Food is always good & quick, their hostess/host/servers are amazing. HOWEVER, as a local who visits this place often & ever since their last location on Decatur, I feel bad for their employees.They treat their staff like robots pressuring them for top notch customer service, but fail to treat their employees as humans, especially in front of their customers. Most people don't recognize this because its a tourist based restaurant. As a regular, we sometimes sit and observe how their employees are treated. Door greeter (normally an older female or the owner) will greet people in and out, create small talk (which is repetitive & predictable at this point which I understand since their hosting tourists), we might as well put our answers on a recording because they dont ever recognize us. They talk down to their staff like they are children, or hollar across the room or scolding them in the corner; which I find unprofessional. Which could explain why some days their service is less wonderful than others.Their employees definitely work hard and are friendly, but they deserve more respect from their supervisors. It reminds me of the saying, "Customers do not come first, Employees come first. If you take care of  your employees, they will take care of the customers". Its one thing to show your customers appreciation for the business but its another when you forget who helps you run the business in the first place.

lIjU1sOG0O2Aq4A6T4V7CA.text: Place is excellent!!...amazing service!!..Denise our waitress awesome!!..welcoming environment!!..we come from Cali and we very highly recommwnded!!...food is so delish and to say they makw there own cinnamon roll buns!! 100%% satisfied!

zbG1k56IOXkQbFPaUFYF2w.text: We stopped in for brunch on Saturday and only had to Wait a short while but the host was so friendly and welcoming. I had the Marty wrap such was great and exactly what I wanted and expected, the Bf had the chicken fried steak and hash browns. Tons of food and it was all great! We even got our coffees to go! So great!

ZoInaOK-3BbvmN28pAV77g.text: Incredible find for breakfast! We came here just by chance and everyone loved it. I asked for the server to build a country Benedict, biscuit with sausage and a poached egg smothered in gravy. Usually it comes out weird, but they got it right on. The gravy has bacon, sausage and a hint of maple syrup in it. DELICIOUS!

ws9L-oVKEc5L7XNUuVrZ4g.text: We came to eat here because of Lourdes, one of your wonderful waitresses. We trust her recommendations because she has been our regular server for over 8 years. She recommended your place as a new breakfast/lunch place since she wasn't at our old place that we always visited when family was in town for the NASCAR weekend. Boy were we glad we came!! First impressions are everything! Busy but personal attention. Greeted like we're family, and that was before Shawn knew how we came to visit your place. Everyone was very nice! Our glasses were never empty. Food was amazing and the portions were a lot larger than anywhere we have ever been. My husband and family haven't stopped raving about the biscuits and gravy! Heaven on a fork...lol Great experience!

xQOALDrpkY4y7kD5l98tFg.text: If your passing by this small town I would definately recommend this place to grub at. Great service by our waitress Denise. Also Shaun the manager does a phenomenal job running this place with his strong management skills and amazing customer service. He really makes you feel good coming to have breakfast!

I84nVCeWQza0_rWTdBD37g.text: My kinda place. Easy to find. Greeted when I walked in. Good for family. Attentive staff. Simple menu. Food came out fast and hot made to order. Cute waitresses.   Saw the owner cleaning tables and doing the little things. Dude was concerned that a few of his tables weren't balanced and that needed to be addressed.   I'm in Vegas at least once a month. This will be on my short list for breakfast joints. This place needs to be featured as what's good in the community.   BRAVO!!!!

YgfhMTFMMNf47zLfEgAi_w.text: Absolutely loved this place!  We were there on our way back to Fresno! Very friendly and family oriented place. Food great, home made fresh and affordable!   Would def visit them again!  Ordered customized omelet and much more tasty food!  Thanks

OK_y-PPL1BZfIingBe5PYA.text: The best pancakes I've ever had. Whenever I order pancakes, I'm always let down by the time I get to the half-way point; pancake gets so soggy from the syrup. Not so at Mr. Mamas. Even drenched in syrup the amazing discs are still as fluffy as the first bite. Service was attentive, and Mr. Mama himself is there to make sure breakfast goes smoothly. The prices are extremely reasonable as well. Well done!  10/10 recommend this place.

6xoJd0W7H0umn-CRUiC4QA.text: Awesome breakfast place.  Their chicken fried steak is great...made in house not frozen and heated up like a lot of places.  The gravy is excellent and I love the fact they let you pass on the toast and will give you a huge pancake at no extra charge instead.  Service is always excellent and the guy at the front keeps everything running smoothly.

EqiItdGIoBDzUQgmVzadrg.text: Had breakfast there this morning with my husband and son. The food was amazing and the service was excellent!  They made you feel welcome and part of the family!  Definitely a new favorite place!

mTZsAfVI1ARse9YVdf-cQQ.text: We picked this place for breakfast due to the high rating. We found it to be ok, but not worthy of 4.5 stars. It's very average quality food, but priced fair and a pretty good wait staff. If you're looking for a cheap meal around the same quality as large chain restaurants then it's a good place to go. If you're looking for a really great quality breakfast or lunch then I'd recommend looking elsewhere.

nTO9bGSWhTReAOgJSVJJbw.text: First time visiting for me, second time for my husband. Food was terrific. The French toast was perfectly cooked, the corned beef hash was homemade and had a nice crust, as did the hash browns.  The only reason I subtracted a star is because the service was slow. It was about 7am, there were only 4 tables occupied, but we had to flag another server down for a coffee refill twice. Our server only checked back with us immediately after the meal was served and then was very distracted talking to other servers and being on the phone. Never spoke with her again until after we sat for about 10 minutes with our plates empty in front of us, then we were able to request the check. Because this is one big dining room, she could easily have seen our situation.  We will definitely be back, and in all fairness, I'll update my review at that time. This could have just been an unusual day. Still, I do recommend this place.

L9YIEht0idZ5qCvLFtyBSw.text: My husband took me here to eat breakfast for my birthday today after reading good reviews about it.  What a disappointment.  Our food came out cold and his medium rare steak was cooked well done.  Also, the fluffy pancakes he had read about were extremely heavy.  It might not have been so bad had our food come out hot or even warm.  But there is nothing worse than getting food that you can tell has been sitting for quite some time.  We definitely won't be visiting this place again.

vyHaNnAEDpkDQ2ovdOHf_Q.text: Tried this place for the first time. Drove to the wrong location first. 35 min wait was worth it. The reviews were right- the service is great. The owner is super friendly and makes you feel welcome. We got coffee, the Mama's Stack, and the Mama's short stack with hash browns. The coffee was good but not exceptional- but we truly liked the food. The hash browns were delicious, the pancakes had a great buttery flavor, eggs were cooked just right. The bacon and patties had a great flavor too. We liked the decor too- open and simple.

WUt-KwCtOM-hFQEheksmpA.text: Came here with a couple friends on one of their recommendations. I really wanted to like this place because breakfast is my favorite meal and Mr. Mamas is pretty close to me.   I had the California Omelet, which I turned into a "scramble" because I'm weird. It was pretty standard: scrambled eggs, some pico, some avocado, and cheese (I left out the sausage). The meal came with hash browns and toast. Also adopted a couple bites of a pancake along the way from the plate next to mine. The food wasn't bad, it just wasn't very memorable. Then again, my order was about as plain as possible, so maybe that was my fault.   The service was amazing though. There were more staff then customers when we walked in, and that held True until we left. I'm always impressed when owners/managers aren't afraid to overstaff, and it really makes a difference in the level of hospitality and the overall feeling of the place. Every single employee, including who I believe was the owner, was constantly looking around for a way to serve the customers. If I looked up from my plate or my conversation, someone would immediately walk over to see if I needed anything. They even asked if we wanted our picture taken.  Overall, a good experience. Prices were definitely reasonable, and the location had ample parking. I will be back to see if my next order matches the great service.

ijrvTd5TTUpvIDHKb5Vjcg.text: Read all the great reviews for breakfast so we decided to try it this trip. The owner greets you at the door and is very pleasant. I ordered the eggs Benedict with regular bacon (I'm not a fan of Canadian bacon) and it comes hash browns. The eggs came out over cooked and the owner walked over before I could even say anything and had them remake them. The serving is a regular size but I wasn't super full. My husband ordered the mamas short stack with scrambled eggs and sausage. I was still a little hungry so I ate some of his healthy serving of pancakes. We both had the iced coffee since it was the daily special and it was just the right combo of coffee and sweet. We even got some to go! Used the $15 for $30 yelp deal (which cannot be combined with the free drink FYI) and the total was under $23 so she got a great tip!

EaoEdMAjfmbmV4Dxgl4xbw.text: There is a reason why Mr. Mama's is the highest rated restaurant on Trip Advisor and Yelp for Las Vegas. Superb service from the host, waitstaff, expeditor to bussers. Food is excellent with our waitress suggesting substitutes for cheaper prices. We had the chicken fried steak and bacon, eggs and half order of biscuits with gravy. Some reviews say their gravy is bland but I'm from the south and know what white gravy is suppose to taste like. Mr. Mama's deserves their rating; best service despite the heavy crowd and excellent food.

Y4jCADEoTtpvNhDUOin0cQ.text: Usually don't eat breakfast, mostly coffee. Let's just say I barely drank my coffee. Excellent service. Food was A+

zmKIIx3eVxSW1sS0sHzw2w.text: A great local place to try for a homemade style breakfast. Located a few miles off Las Vegas strip and well worth the drive. Food is amazing and the workers are friendly. On weekends I recommend calling ahead to see about wait times as this place is no secret with the locals and can be busy at times.

B06LEdgX2fApx2fJKvFJ4w.text: Loved the owner, and the food was fresh and delicious. Ordered the French toast. Delicious. Mom had the garden salad boasting with fresh ingredients. Definitely coming back.

oScEyEOt1PUTF9rWGWYv3A.text: Big ups to the dude from san fernando valley that made us felt welcomed and taken care of. I forgot his name

ofyH_4B4xlmsSj7zrqwuVw.text: MAKE A RESERVATION! This restaurant is constantly busy so expect long wait times for walk ins. The wait is 100% worth it. With such kind staff and passionate chefs it's no wonder this place is booming.

cYNG_KolxusGbROeRH7Efw.text: The service is always great!! I'm just not impressed by they're food. I had corned beef hash & there wasn't anything special about it. Just literally meat chopped into tiny pieces. The "breakfast potato" are cubed potatoes instead of shredded (hash browns), nothing added at all.

P-jeGbXecrVAhSLBGj-Ljg.text: Great service, delicious food. About 10-15 away from the strip, but if you're looking for quality food and service it's worth the drive.   Once you're there expect a 20-30 min wait.  Every time I'm in Vegas, it's a "must-go".

QHuEVkYNnr7Ta1M2hO1Qyw.text: Really cute and small .... amazing cocktails I wish the price was a lil cheaper because its soo many bar tapas restaurants in Las vegas but still it's a pretty cool place to try !!!

6PM0OtGbf2vJ9R9Lg74dtw.text: Such a great family environment! The staff are all super friendly and attentive! They kept checking in on us while we were waiting for our food, and when it finally arrived they offered to take a picture of us! The food was beyond amazing!

ygeMmcjrLLMycoYAQFULyA.text: Great place to eat with awesome family atmosphere ! I came in 30 minutes before closing and didn't realize this until I looked at their closing time on google. They greeted me with a beautiful vibe. Mr mamas even greeted us and made sure we were happy and satisfied with our meals. The staff treat each other like family and I admire how nice and helpful they are to each other, which makes for the perfect family atmosphere. On top of that, the food is absolutely delicious and prices are normal, not jacked up 300% Vegas prices. Start your day here! Thanks again for the Birthday Cinnamon Bun! Mmmmm!

2PBG1oA5cGp36Ram66BUpQ.text: Although VERY good, the delicious breakfast takes a close second to the level of service by the wait staff. It really comes down to communication and helping to ensure you get exactly what you want; how you want it.   But it's more than that. If you listen, you will become keenly aware of the communication and quality assurance that is happening between the front and the back. Other restaurant owners should come learn from this simple and yet effective approach.   So come eat! I had the chicken fried steak and switched out the potatoes & toast for a biscuit and gravy.

VkRNwZWkQLkqeXLI-MFT_A.text: Was close to home so I checked it out and I was like wow this good tastes pretty good. I finished my whole plate and if I were fatter I would have ordered more.

yVbUd3XSYnJ9OuIDz2EsJg.text: We stopped for a quick brunch and shared the side of biscuits and gravy, the corned beef hash and the French toast. Everything was good but I think I still prefer Egg and I. I wanted to salt and pepper somme of the food. Big portions so you will definitely leave full. Come hungry!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States

3RIPdamTzMbp-aXH0vf_og.text: Mr. Mamas is an incredible place to eat. Not only is the food to die for but service is amazing. Our server Jose takes care of everything, my coffee cup never went empty. Plus Mr. Mama himself walks around greeting every table and all around it's a great place to eat.

8dak0Vj-SOKrqyQCihKwnQ.text: Decent joint located in the heart of Vegas. Large, spacious facility comprised of attentive staff. Large portions for a fair price. 3 stars because although the service was excellent, there was no "wow" factor. Food was average as well  No complaints though!

QO8HjLCA6QORPIguxrwMEQ.text: Reasonably priced for Vegas.  Shared a breakfast burrito and it was delicious!!   Really enjoyed it because with every bite I got a little bit of everything!!  It wasn't potato on one side, ham on another, eggs on the other side.  It was mixed very well!!  Easy place to find.  Me. Mama seated us himself and even opened the door for us!!  Very friendly atmosphere!!

gr4iQqi-mJjdoln2SGeUbA.text: Oh. My. Gosh. SO GOOD! we got tons of food for a great price and it was all so delicious. My husband got the mama stack, everything was amazing. We added blackberries to the pancakes which made it perfect. 5/5 for the pancakes I got the eggs Benedict floretine with no olives and added bacon holy cow... I couldn't stop eating it! So delicious!! 5/5 for that as well Then we shared a half order of biscuits and gravy, again, awesome. I'll give it a 4/5 though because it could have used a touch more gravy.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. It&#39;s crowded, a good sign
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. All of what we ordered
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hash browns

Sj5aEDvtjBiNYoBlx8TEng.text: Good service and nice atmosphere but the WORST chicken fried steak my husband and I have ever had!  And, my toast was burned and had to be returned.  Total waste of $30.  I'm surprised because the first time we were here it was very good.

NgRAjatdR8HGhqScj5NGkA.text: This place is consistently delicious with a friendly staff. The prices are well worth it. Be prepared to wait a bit because everyone wants to get it here, I had to beg/convince my brother in law to wait with me and he told me it was a great decision!

t8T-Jv2pa5bQiCgusrMrhQ.text: Great customer service! The 2 owners welcome every customers, who come in :) Tasty food with reasonable price! My favorite breakfast restuarant in Vegas... Lots of waitress and waiters ready to serve each customer with a smiling face and they are very approachable! If you want a good customer service, great food and reasonable price... you better try MR. MAMA'S BREAKFAST AND LUNCH!

JZpj5JBQvqi79GPcAtHUaQ.text: Ok just found a fantastic breakfast resturant. Not only good food but a very pleasent environment and staff. A well oiled machine of happiness. How refreashing

4jRvgbsHsyjx4iJ5eoKTWQ.text: Mr mamas is a great breakfast spot ! Great service and great food! Everything taste very good and the customer service is beyond good!

M_ONYRdkftDYH1DeQQoZXw.text: We were vacationing in Vegas  we are looking for breakfast place and vg We didn't want to go to strip because it can get very pricey so after looking at the internet  we came  accross this place . And it's excellent , 5 star service , it's well managed, very clean , very friendly  service and clean . I will stop here again when we visit Vegas again .. Good job !! Keep it up.

5wH0FK5-U5AluhU2QxdmpA.text: So .. It's 6:45 am and I'm HUNGRY! What is open now?!? Hey I've been wanting to try Mr. Mamas and they open at 7am. Perfect! As soon as my husband and I walked in we were greeted very warmly and told to sit anywhere we like. Right away I liked the feel of the place ( homey, clean and welcoming. ) we looked over the menu and I really like the fact you can have breakfast or lunch or both! I had a strange craving for chili at this hour but I wanted blueberry pancakes too.. Wtf why not both? Lol blueberry not on the menu but the will make it for you ( fresh plump blueberries too). Got short stack (2 huge) and side of bacon ( 3 thick and perfectly crisp) husband got chicken fried steak ( which he said was delicious ) and we shared a bowl of chili with the works. Everything came out so fast fresh and delicious. The service was exceptional and the owner even came around to each table to make sure all was well. I rarely give 5 stars but this place is doing it right. Can't wait to try other items on the menu. Try this place .. You and your tummy will leave happy and satisfied.

nTNOpH_Vawl4qZbakE0J4w.text: Super friendly staff and good homestyle cooking. They have Texas toast as a toast option! It was like hitting the jackpot. My buddy said the country fried steak was on point and he's a food snob. Hidden amongst businesses just like the gem that it is.

ey-Q70nAQ1UX1fC2E2dOwQ.text: I had the chicken fried steak. Man, it was pure deliciousness! Plates are about $10 and big serving size. Service is great; our waitress took care of us. Never felt rushed  even though they were busy. Would definitely come here again.

5iukBl_ZsQIWD4stg8xAig.text: Amazing homemade pancakes& the staff was extremely friendly and attentive... Def one of my favorite breakfast spots in Vegas!

eUglSEYHv4e8eAdqnusuBw.text: I'm so glad this place opened by me. I eat here almost everyday. Haven't had anything bad on this menu. Home cooked meals yummmmm!

2Bfqx-k4gTgkc9eObS5I5A.text: ...excellent breakfast place...the food was great and so was the service....ill definitely be a regular customer from now on....thanks yelp for the coupon as well.

47vwpjyE3-w4S7TAgu8QMQ.text: We have been looking for a breakfast spot that we really like and Mr Mama's is it!  Superb food, friendly staff and wallet pleasing prices!  Omelet was fantastic as was the biscuit and gravy order!  This will be our spot for breakfast now!  No need to look further!

k4m4NruTq_UDGQDLU5ApMg.text: Mr. Mama's in Las Vegas had the best chicken fried steak ever--so tender, but crispy outside!! Large servings, free refills on very good coffee. Everyone at the restaurant was very friendly and made it a great dining experience!!

cqMziOmWh-OQ2CSDT62y-Q.text: I believe that the owner of Mr. Mamas wrote the book on customer service. The staff treat you like royalty and the food is excellent. If you want a delicious affordable meal off the strip, Mr. Mamas is the place to go!

mqhEvDml4tp5XWrkV8eqAA.text: We like the pancake even though we are not a big fan of pancake.  The biscuit with gravy was excellent.  Great service !!!

wA5XN9QqyBmdrg1IXR2Gww.text: Amazing food, good prices, and exceptional customer service! Our new favorite breakfast spot!!

d8Sc0k2HLnCzTWC784I-Jg.text: We saw the 5 star reviews and knew we had to try it! Upon pulling up Mr. Mama himself greeted us and opened the door! He was super cheery and and introduced the hostess who showed us to our seat. Kathy S. was our waitress and she was perfect! Smiley and efficient. Our order was perfect even with our requests for customized omelets. Food was super delicious! The location isn't too far from the strip and I would drive here again and again just to support this business! Mr. Mama thanked us and said he appreciated us as we left! Such a great local business.

uxLcbkhJ8cXnyp04tR5jjQ.text: We eat at Mr Mamas every time we are in Las Vegas because the outstanding service, great food and reasonable prices!  This was our visit to the new larger location on Jones.  The owner greeted us warmly at the door as he has always done in the past. They are still packed, even with the extra seating. I ordered the French toast with scrambled eggs and bacon, my hubby ordered the avocado burger. Our kids ordered breakfast items. We split a huge cinnamon roll to start the meal off right. As we have come to expect, Mr Mamas does not disappoint! Pardon me while I loosen my belt a notch now.

JsNW5cXYMPq417aHoLrkHQ.text: I'm from the south and was amazed by the chicken fried steak and white gravy.  This place is the one that was the #1 ranked place in all of Vegas but moved a couple weeks ago and lost its ranking.  Price, quality of food, staff are all the same and this is a daily destination moving forward for me when in Vegas!

1mUhXV4Cw5vRdmwulEiXbQ.text: This place is so delicious!! Everything (and I mean everything) is soo good!! The servers also pride themselves in great service!

mHrJ73Kg31bGCpCCu98Thw.text: This is my third time here and I can honestly say their service and food has been very consistent.  While we were still in the parking lot the owner came out, greeted and opened the door for us, which was a very nice gesture.  As for the food, I always get the chicken fried steak and it is always delicious.  The batter is nice, crispy and adheres to the steak well.  The meat is also very tender.  The country style sausage gravy is creamy and has the perfect consistency with chunks of sausage.   It definitely tastes better than most of other breakfast joints.  My wife has tried their omelettes and they are always flavorful and fresh tasting.  Their prices are also a little cheaper than other breakfast places which is another plus and with their $15 for $30 yelp deal you can not beat it.  Will definitely be coming back here for breakfast.

rc7SWGj7RfjTsZvJmqK8jg.text: I'm from California and was here visiting my parents who live here. We went to Bass Pro and where looking for a place to grab a bite. This place did not disappoint. I had the Mommas sandwich. Kind of like a club but better. It was fantastic. I got it with hash browns and they were good as well. My mom got the french dip and my dad got a caesar salad and they loved it. Service was fantastic to. I cant recall the waitress name but she was on spot. Highly recommend this place and will definitely be coming back next time I visit.

fs3cn2cSl0jCUv-pq8wcpw.text: Everything was great. Greeted at the door. Service was good. Bacon was perfect.  Should add kids menu  Denisse was great!  Kitchen staff is entertaining   Definitely a great breakfast addition to this side of town.

_Zp6Z1T5HWWMZgopO0jd4A.text: Food was Delicious And fantastic service both days, really friendly place. Reasonable prices

86UI4nCGveNvNm8mSvQ09A.text: Although the service is heartwarming and memorable (and I most certainly will not hold it against the 1100+ liars who projected the greatness of the service onto the food), the food is not great. If you like overpriced, average breakfast food, then enjoy! However, if you're hoping for flavor and fair prices, then don't buy into this hype.

5CDofWjzxGCrSiIjXDjxBA.text: Was hoping this was a drag queen cafe, but sadly it wasn't. BUT, the food was delicious....a little off the strip, but worth the drive! Prices were fair and the food was plentiful. Will definitely be going back!

cvgnqI56T3NxUJQshieGYQ.text: Always great food. Always great service. Super friendly and accommodating. And YET AGAIN I forgot to take a picture bc I was so ready to taste everything!!!!

-oRjVkH4SjT-hxHE_y4AWg.text: The coffee was delicious, and they offer French vanilla creamer. My husband and I both got specials. I got the cinnamon pancakes, and my husband got the ABC (avocado, bacon, cheese) omelet. The pancakes were awesome. The cinnamon really added an extra sweetness and flavor when combined with syrup. The bacon was thick and baked. I loved the orange slice garnish on each plate. Always a nice touch. The staff was great at offering coffee warm ups.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Half eaten cinnamon cakes. Too much good stuff.

BM09nfZundRfvWdujLUjvw.text: Don't believe the hype! I'm a local who wanted to try something new. Read the reviews and thought this has to be good. Loooong wait which would be fine, but there were 6 empty tables. A group of 9 that arrived after us was seated and served drinks before my group of two. Hostess was running around talking to guests and servers, took several minutes just to flag her down. So I'm like ok - food is gonna be amazing right? Nope. Hubby sent home fries back cause they were cold and they brought a second one back cold. They tried to make it better by comp'ing part of my meal, but it was just too little too late.  This local will not be back.

gxtHTng3TeOzvcPf1v-aQQ.text: The staff there is great. Like everyone I came here because of the reviews looking for some delicious food. But after I was done I thought to myself what was so special about that? Anyways, the best why to describe it is like your average breakfast place with a long wait and outstanding service.

93HQk--P7OqheSG1SOXRYw.text: Fabulous service with a smile! Pancakes are light and flavorful, bacon is crispy with a smoky finish, their eggs and omelets are light and perfectly cooked. Condiments are properly cleaned. This is the cleanest, most friendly restaurant with food that is pure heaven in Las Vegas!

zG1ZKlikW-LAmVke84XKFw.text: Bustling diner style atmosphere at around 9:30-10am on a Sunday morning. Wait was about 15-20 minutes, and the people filing in after us (which were many) had a 25+ minute wait. Clean restaurant, efficient service (not overly interactive, but always kept our coffee full and took our order quickly). After seeing all the rave reviews on Yelp! we assumed it would be worth the 20 min drive from our hotel. Food was executed effectively and you get what you expect, decent size portions. We had a veggie omelette, the corned beef hash, and a cinnamon roll. My omelette was loaded with veggies, and husband's hash looked pretty good. The cinnamon roll, meh, not much icing and rather dry, although it looked nice on the plate. Was it worth the drive? Well the prices are exceptionally affordable for Vegas, so that's great. The food is worth what you pay for it, no complaints there. There is plenty of (free) parking. It's a good place. I don't know that we'd make the drive again since it was out of the way, but if you are nearer, go for it.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie omelette with home fries

OqfVJe1jjqJkl_egt9jNeA.text: Friendly atmosphere... great food and prompt service! Can't beat the prices as well! We will be coming back here when we visit Las Vegas.

yGkogi6nP7aPCaN5XhfwDw.text: Food was great and the service is fantastic. Everyone, especially the owner, went the extra mile to give us a personal touch and the experience made us feel valued and not just another customer/ticket. The pancakes here are awesome, big and fluffy, and they have good hashbrowns. Hubs really liked his Greek omelette, fluffy and generous, and they subbed in red peppers instead of tomatoes at his request with no problem. I had the Eggs Benny Florentine and I was happily surprised when the waitress asked how I liked my poached eggs, no one has ever asked to make poached eggs to my taste before and most breakfast joints are too busy to accommodate that kind of level of service. The place was hopping but food moves fast and we were never waiting. Great experience to set the tone of the day from a simple meal. I really appreciate the level of service from the staff, it can't be easy.

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs benny florentine, hashbrowns, and single pancake.

6RdJ1VlhsgVbQ8_fQXIH2w.text: I've had breakfast here twice with my girlfriend, steak and eggs, biscuits and gravy, and corned beef hash. Pretty standard good diner. Plan on returning.

kppvy5J_JRj35e24xGgwCg.text: This place is awesome, as soon as you walk in the door you're greeted by the owner of the establishment and he checked in on us the whole time to make sure we were being taken care of. The food is awesome and you get generous portions for a great price which is much more than I can say for most of the restaurants on the Las Vegas strip. I highly recommend the cinnamon roll in the ABC omelette and it was great. Highly recommended

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. ABC omelette (Avocado, Bacon, Cheese)
Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Huge 2 pancake short stack

5cjHhTk2-_TMJpgj8RTpGA.text: Basic.  Cramped dining area, I had several people brush up against me just to get through.  I found a piece of cooked macaroni in my scrambled eggs.. that was cool.  Eggs didn't taste like they were cooked to order.  Was very surprised our food came out about 5 minutes after we ordered.  Staff was efficient and friendly.  It wasn't horrible, but it wasn't good enough to entice me to return.

C5HG3iXWCaB7ZSyjJ4a2CQ.text: The Greek wrap and the chilli were delicious. Both a lot of flavor. The spinach omelet had too much cheese and was bland. I didn't care for the hashborwns; they were too oily. The biscuit and gravy was ok.  The service was great. Everyone was really friendly. Be ready to wait. We waited 25 minutes to be seated. The place was packed.

RAPSvKA-ot572rx0QNW9gA.text: My family and I came here this morning and it was delicious! We were welcomed at the door and when seated, all of our chairs were pulled out. Our server Alex was very accommodating and came at just the right times. He also recommended things for our orders and was always kind. The food was outstanding and reasonably priced. We definitely will be back, it was a great neighborhood breakfast place.

YGIv-0Rk_bfP4xHCXbW2YQ.text: Amazing, fast, great and welcoming service!! Always updated us on how much longer we needed to wait and what they were doing to actively seat us promptly. Food is reasonably priced and you get good sized portions. My friend got the Jenna wrap which she loved! I got the short stack pancakes with Greek yogurt parfait which was delicious. My friend for the French toast which she enjoyed as well. Definitely recommend this place for breakfast! I'll be coming back for sure.

fxE_12m8qiTLfJF47WqfIw.text: Awesome service! Awesome food!! I came from a small town so to find this little gem where the owner greets every customer is amazing!

xmx4Rw55PtSa2ftrJyYvSg.text: Was visiting and checked out Yelp for a breakfast place that wasn't in a Casino. Me Mamas was awesome. Walked in at 9:00 was seated immediately. Good thing we arrived when we did because they started getting really busy. But the employees were efficient and they were seating people as soon as possible. Our waitress Jenna was so nice, attentive and helpful with all our questions. Great experience and will definitely go back the next time in Vegas.

zKhNwuP4LQLdTfpVlhHZ8g.text: Very good pancakes that are homemade. People are very nice as they greeted us . Very good place to eat

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Homemade pancakes

vvakpEWX8ADIyUa4Rl8zww.text: Portion sizes are quite large for how much you pay! Love the old time feeling of the diner too. Staff is very friendly to greet you at the door. Though they were very busy we got a table at a pretty reasonable time. Over all very pleased with my experience here.

NsROLCAp8-s_wPxiKZ77VQ.text: This is my favorite breakfast place of all time !! I recently moved to the area about 4 months ago and decided to try this place out after finding them on yelp, been hooked ever since. 4 1/2 stars does not do justice!! This place is nothing short of 5 stars ! First I have to say the service is something out of this world. I don't think I've ever been to a restaurant with better service.. they are very friendly and personable and make you feel right at home.  EVERY single employee seems happy to be here.. even when it gets crazy crowded they work very well as a team. (So rare these days)  The food is ALWAYS on point , even when we order for pick up, by the time we get home and finally get to eat, the food is still warm and just as delicious !    My fave is the Denver omelette and OMG they have the best bacon everrr! But you can't really go wrong with anything on the menu .   Great service, great food at a great price... what more could you ask for??

Z_VwwoHNVJuJRjukjFzjdQ.text: Excellent service and terrific food. Nice large sitting area. I would definitely come back again when I visit Las Vegas

i4n1pLBkePynB7GdkfnUww.text: This restaurant has some of the nicest servers I've ever met. I came here with a big group and there was a pretty long wait (good sign). We were seated pretty quickly though! We came in and they were so nice. It was my friend's birthday and they brought her out a free cinnamon roll. Even people that worked there that weren't serving us came up and wished her a happy birthday and asked how we were doing. The food was awesome too! I got an omelette and it was great. The potatoes were nice and crispy. Everything was really reasonably priced. If I lived in Las Vegas I would definitely be here every week!

photos.caption: Photo of Mr Mamas - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Omelette

Lbgx1-GYLQmwdVNCxXCBEA.text: Heard so many good reviews so wanted to try- crowded and tight but good menu!  Food good but nothing to rave over.  Owner super nice greeting customers- maybe ordered wrong thing.

_1aRB7hfppT56clsxtj2Ew.text: Very nice atmosphere! Management very good gave us a 40 minute wait got us in after 25 minutes. We were greeted very warmly upon arrrival and the waiter was great. The portions are great not too big but not too small either. The Marty wrap was very good so was the bourbon burger.

3FNbagrsZ66uBwTABr52Ng.text: This place is the spot for after a long hard night! It's more mom and pops style. Which in my opinion is a good thing.

455OTFAMGAV-WVtiwBDUNg.text: visiting a friend in Las Vegas and he took me here for breakfast. Nice place. Nice staff. Nice host at the door. Food was great. Served within in reasonable time. I had the chicken fried steak and eggs, we both did. The only thing is that it is a popular place and the wait can be 30-40 minutes. Not so bad but for me, not having a place to seat while I wait is not good, as I have a bad knee. But over all the experience was great. Worth trying out this breakfast place!

NuUSsZsT_0ZX4g0j7tgwrA.text: This place was great in all aspects. Upon our arrival, nearly every employee greeted us. I knew they had good service by the wait time for a table but every few minutes or so they would assure us how much longer we'd have to wait and offered us a beverage. Soon after we were seated I totally forgot how long we waited becuz the food was so good and served smoking. Shawn was really informative as to what he recommend us to order and other eateries to visit throughout the day. I'm so happy we ate here and have so many good things to write about this place that I'd run out of time and space to write, so my final words are "you won't go wrong here if you  follow your taste buds"
